story:
FLOAT LIKE A BUTTERFLY: THE FLYING SAUCER EXPERIENCE 

 

 

Up, Up, and Away...

Grab the future by the saucer and make your flying dreams a reality!

The next generation Hover Airlift and Logistics Operations Vehicle (HALOGx), being developed by Aviation/Aerospace Professional Lindsay O'Brien Quarrie and John D'Alessandro of HALOSAUCER Corporation, is a flexible, Vertical Takeoff and Landing (VTOL) aircraft powered by multiple (8) rotary engine ducted fans -- granting it greater agility and maneuverability than any helicopter or fixed wing aircraft.

The HALOGx is the only vehicle possessing the potential applications needed on land, sea, snow and air, for any sports, entertainment, recreational, tourism, commercial or homeland/border security, first responder/emergency rescue, defense, and kit aircraft markets. Imagine the HALOGx as a United States Army's primary aviation vehicle -- Who needs a million-man army when your nimble aircraft can pivot directions at the tap of the joystick?!?!

The HALOGx is a multipurpose saucer that will be designed to operate up to several thousand feet and above land, water, sand, snow, swamp or grasslands. It can be used like other recreational vehicles, combining the capabilities of a boat, hovercraft, ATV, snowmobile or other off-road vehicle for a truly All-Terrain-Vehicle and carries two passengers.

Yeah, your AWD/4WD pick-up truck is your "baby" and sufficiently gets you from point A to point B, but what if something gets in your way and you need to keep going in that direction? --- With HALOGx, anyone at anytime has the ability to leap over barriers and other obstacles by vertically elevating on command!

The HALOGx is environmentally friendly, currently only using ethanol and water as fuel (Gasoline works if needed). Future fueling will include high density batteries and hybrid configuration.

3...2...1...Liftoff!

The funds raised on Kickstarter will allow us to take HALOGx to Spaceport America for a static display during the International Symposium for Personal and Commercial Spaceflight (ISPCS) in Las Cruces, New Mexico October 17-18, 2012.

Spaceport America--near Engle, New Mexico

This event is crucial for HALOGx taking the next steps towards production.  "The International Symposium for Personal and Commercial Spaceflight (ISPCS) is the most relevant, high-value commercial space conference of the year, featuring the industry’s top thought leaders and cutting-edge technologies with commercial applications for military, scientific and personal spaceflight." (courtesy ISPCS.com)

This is definitely where we need to be! We've had so much interest in HALOGx and we're ready to show how far we've come with this project.Displaying HALOGx at Spaceport America would be the first step in getting saucers in the hands (and skies!) of the public. Here's the funding tiers we've established:

Tier I: Static demonstration which includes insurance and transportation costs to get to the ISPCS 2012 and Spaceport America.

Tier II: For the live flight demonstration in April/May 2013, we need to retrofit the craft to the flight control system and the body, blades for the propeller system. We also need funding for the pre-flight demonstrations and check out.

Where on Earth Did This Come From?

The HALOGx is an advanced version of the Moller M-200x "Volantor," which was originally designed by Moller International (MI), with renovated sensors, electronics and modern equipment.

This engine design does not involve pistons, and hence, it offers less vibration and higher efficiency. Emissions tests performed by MI show that the Rotapower using ethanol complies with the stringent Super Ultra Low Emission Vehicle (SULEV) standard of California.

The HALOGx is the only vehicle possessing the potential applications needed on land, sea, snow and air, for any sports, entertainment, recreational, tourism, commercial or homeland/border security, first responder/emergency rescue, defense, and kit aircraft markets. Imagine the HALOGx as a United States Army's primary aviation vehicle -- Who needs a million-man army when your nimble aircraft can pivot directions at the tap of the joystick?!?!
The HALOGx is a multipurpose saucer that will be designed to operate up to several thousand feet and above land, water, sand, snow, swamp or grasslands. It can be used like other recreational vehicles, combining the capabilities of a boat, hovercraft, ATV, snowmobile or other off-road vehicle for a truly All-Terrain-Vehicle and carries two passengers.
Yeah, your AWD/4WD pick-up truck is your "baby" and sufficiently gets you from point A to point B, but what if something gets in your way and you need to keep going in that direction? --- With HALOGx, anyone at anytime has the ability to leap over barriers and other obstacles by vertically elevating on command!

The HALOGx is environmentally friendly, currently only using ethanol and water as fuel (Gasoline works if needed). Future fueling will include high density batteries and hybrid configuration.

3...2...1...Liftoff!
The funds raised on Kickstarter will allow us to take HALOGx to Spaceport America for a static display during the International Symposium for Personal and Commercial Spaceflight (ISPCS) in Las Cruces, New Mexico October 17-18, 2012.

Spaceport America--near Engle, New Mexico
This event is crucial for HALOGx taking the next steps towards production.  "The International Symposium for Personal and Commercial Spaceflight (ISPCS) is the most relevant, high-value commercial space conference of the year, featuring the industry’s top thought leaders and cutting-edge technologies with commercial applications for military, scientific and personal spaceflight." (courtesy ISPCS.com)

This is definitely where we need to be! We've had so much interest in HALOGx and we're ready to show how far we've come with this project.Displaying HALOGx at Spaceport America would be the first step in getting saucers in the hands (and skies!) of the public. Here's the funding tiers we've established:
Tier I: Static demonstration which includes insurance and transportation costs to get to the ISPCS 2012 and Spaceport America.
Tier II: For the live flight demonstration in April/May 2013, we need to retrofit the craft to the flight control system and the body, blades for the propeller system. We also need funding for the pre-flight demonstrations and check out.
Where on Earth Did This Come From?
The HALOGx is an advanced version of the Moller M-200x "Volantor," which was originally designed by Moller International (MI), with renovated sensors, electronics and modern equipment.
This engine design does not involve pistons, and hence, it offers less vibration and higher efficiency. Emissions tests performed by MI show that the Rotapower using ethanol complies with the stringent Super Ultra Low Emission Vehicle (SULEV) standard of California.

story:
The main technical and economic parameters

 

Projects preconditions

At present time regular service between Pesochin and Kharkov is organized using fixed-route buses and suburban trains. It is possible to get to station «Holodna Gora» (near subway station «Holodna Gora») in Kharkov by bus from Pesochin, and to Kharkov’s railway station by suburban train. Besides destination time by bus is about from 20 to 80 minutes, which depends from traffic workload. Destination time by train is about 30 minutes.

Proposed solution

By creating SkyWay transport system from Kharkov subway station to Pesochin will solve traffic problem. Also it is planned to create high-speed station in Pesochin combined with multifunctional center (sales outlet, restaurants, business center, medical facilities etc.). We assume significant growth in passenger flow after commissioning high-speed route and multifunctional center combined with station.

Img. 1. The station at the entrance to Kharkov.​

Traffic stream analyse

According to our estimates today passenger flow on route «Pesochin – Holodnogorskaya» can reach up to 10 thousand passengers per day (assuming, that people would travel to Kharkov and back to work and study). In perspective, as commissioning multifunctional station with entertainment and medical facilities pasenger flow will rise at least up to 20 thousand passengers per day (it would happen in 2 or 3 years after route commissioning). In addition, fare could be set 0,5 USD (destination time 5 minutes), while public transport fare at this route costs 5–6 hryvnia (0,19-0,23 USD, but destination time from 20 to 80 minutes). In this case, passengers will be willing to pay higher prices for travel in view of the fact that they will spend on the road several times less time.

Img. 2. Estimated highway route «Pesochin – Holodnogorskaya»

Route’s main technical parametres

Main technical parametres is shown in the following table: 

Main technical parametres Values
1. Route length 7,25 km
2. Average passenger traffic per year (after the exit of the complex at full capacity) 7 300 000 people
3. Maximum speed up to 150 km/h
4. The number of anchor track supports 5 pcs
5. The number of intermediate track supports 144 pcs

 

Ecological compatibility

Accommodation multifunctional route SkyWay above the ground on poles allows you to save the existing building and the infrastructure of the city and the village Pesochin. In addition, the use of SkyWay technologies will improve the ecological compatibility in the city, to avoid noise effects and harmful emissions 4 into the environment through the use of electric motors, patented inventions and know-how.

Capital expenditure

The estimated capital expenditure will amount to 26.3 million USD. Cost element structure is shown in the following table:

The main cost elements Amount of expenses (thousand usd)
Double-track trail urban skyway (7,25 km) 14 500
Rolling stock (8 unibuses) 2 400
Boarding station, combined with the anchor supports (2 pcs.) 2 200
Planning of maintenance and repair (1 pc.) 700
Automatic control systems, security and communication 2 100
Design and development works 2 200
Miscellaneous and unforeseen expenses 1 800
Total investments 26 300

 

The economic effect of the project

Building urban route from Pesochin to "Holodnogorskaya" station will significantly improve the quality of transportation between Pesochin and Kharkov and reduce villagers time losses (including the owners of new housing). Project payback around 10 years. Thus in 50 years of operation SkyWay transport system (by transportation 7.3 million passengers per year), the economic effect will be about 131 million USD for the cost of the track is about 26 million USD. The effect is calculated on the basis of income per passenger in the amount of 0,36 USD (if the passenger fare cost 0.14 USD and the price of USD 0,5 ticket): 0,36 USD / pass. x 3650000 pass. / year x 50 years = 131 400 000 USD. In addition, it should be noted that since the introduction of high-speed route on the Dnieper, Kiev and Sumy and multifunctional station on the adjacent land route return on investment will improve significantly and will not exceed 4-5 years (even more low fare). The presented calculations are preliminary and do not take into account the peculiarities of local expenditures for a variety of permits for construction, diversion, receipt of land, environmental services expertise, land surveyors, workstations projects as isolation units, electrical examinations, obtain technical 5 conditions, topographical surveys, transfer and extension utilities, local contributions to the infrastructure development areas etc., which affects the specific amount of the cost and the associated expenditure are direct, without which it is impossible to put into operation the aerial transport route of the second level with stations as interchange nodes.

TERMS OF PARTICIPATION

Our team offers an innovative transport technology of elevated type SKY WAY and would like to implement it in Ukraine as a pilot project of an urban transport system. The project is expected to be implemented by the team, made up of private individuals and legal entities, residents of USA, Ukraine.

At Indiegogo platform, we are represented by a legal entity, the resident of USA, CRYSTAL CORE LTD.

According to a number of international experts, SKY WAY transport system is the most economically efficient, eco-friendly and safe, compared to all existing and perspective transport systems.

Our project is implementation of new transport technology, the Road of elevated type, based on SkyWay technology, and we would like to start implementation of this technology in Ukraine with a small pilot project – construction of a 7.5 km long transport line of elevated type in Kharkov region, which will connect the suburb of Kharkov – the urban-type settlement of Pesochin with the city, thus making transportation between them comfortable.

This little project will show important aspects of preparing documents, harmonization, research work in the area of hub station placement, as well as at the stages of pre-engineering, planning and surveying activities and other complicated operations. Also, we would like to launch rolling stock production within this project and realize other approaches to implementation of the innovative transport technology, including document harmonization at different stages until the project starts operating.

In order to start implementation of this project, attract and interest major institutions, including finance ones, we need to prepare documents that include researches, analysis, business plan, its conceptual study of technical and economic background as it allows to save 20-25% of construction cost in future, prepare sketch designs of stations, analyze legal situation with providing land for stations, intermediate supports and performing a number of other organizational, legal and management procedures.

At preparatory phase we need to raise up to $415,000. In case of other sum is collected, we will take to consideration possibility of working with separate documents and taking actions using this money to promote the project.

The money preparatory phase is required for:

  1. Presentation materials for the pilot project: videos, brochures, posters and other supplementary materials – $15,000.
  2. Development of an avant-project, station concepts, sketch designs of the stations – $250,000.
  3. Analysis of legal situation with providing land and buildings on the selected – $80,000.
  4. Preparing and drafting documents for applying for land (two administrative centres are engaged, and, accordingly, institutions of two administrative units) – $70,000.

The need in money is approximate, but real. Preliminary negotiations have been already held. We can move to the next stages if we raise the money and pay for all documents.

The project itself is planned to start operating in summer of 2018, while the time before the planned launch should be used for profound preparation work, including all proceedings of the preparatory phase, mentioned above.

The participants, who have joined the project, have preference in participation in the project as a whole with the right for repurchase of their share by the participants of the second level at the coefficient 1.5-3 from the invested sum, depending on payback term and issuing a certificate, which gives the right of direct participation in the project.

If you invest money to participate in the project, it means you are a participant of the first level. Those, who purchase the shares of the first level participants, are participants of the second level.

Terms:

1. Participation in the first targeted project in Kharkov region, Ukraine – implementation on new transport technology of elevated type – is an opportunity of preferential participation in all further projects in Ukraine, initiated by the team of the project Initiator.

2. Issuing an electronic certificate, which proves participation in the project, and the right receiving the share of its repurchase at the coefficient 1.5 – 3 (depending on investment total and term of repurchase) for 4 years from the moment of obtaining a permission for construction work or a major investor joins the project, what will happen earlier, and also an opportunity of preferential participation in the project, prepared for implementation after this project or during its construction by the Initiator of this project. Repurchase of the share is made via the repurchase of the certificate. The repurchase of an electronic certificate implies discharge of obligations by the Company. If the major investor does not want to repurchase the shares of the first level participants, the Company does it itself within the specified terms.

3. Electronic certificate is issued for invested sum with the right of repurchase at the coefficient 1.5 – 3 with specification of repurchase term, which starts 3 years after the moment of investment is made and lasts until the transport line starts operating, but not longer than 4 years from the moment of obtaining the permission for construction work or until a major investor joins the company, which will happen earlier. According to agreement between the company and an investor, this terms can be specified in every particular case, but not earlier than 3 years from the moment of investment is made.

4. Amount paid is distributed according to the sum of the participation level:

  • Participation of level 1 - $200.
  • Participation of level 2 – $500.
  • Participation of level 3 – $1,000.

The investor, who wants to pay the amounts of different levels or amounts of the same level more than once, is not limited by any means. In this case, reward and liabilities of the Company correspond to the level of every investment. Investments can be made both separately at every level or together.

5. Here is the table with the description of participation terms:

No.

Reward

Participation of level 1 - $200

Participation of level 2 – $500

Participation of level 3 – $1,000

1.

Right for preferential participation in all projects in ukraine

Right for paying back the money within the term, defined in the rules of indiegogo, within the period of crowd funding campaign ****

yes

11.

Your electronic page in the electronic book of investors, placed at the station

1/3 page

* With a few certificates up to $1,000, an investor can exchange them for one certificate for $1,000. Only certificates for $1,000 are considered as a share of the project and participate in creating a publicly-traded Company, while the terms of attracting these participants and their not repurchased certificates are met.

** Repurchase of the share does not deprive an investor of an honoured status “Participant of level 1”

*** Depends on the term of repurchase of a share, whether it is the beginning of the term of the end. An investor has no right to refuse or prevent from repurchasing a share.

**** While paying pack, an investor (a participant) loses his rights and has no right to claim anything. The end of crowd funding campaign means the end of paying back investments, on accepted offer terms, defined further.

6. If an electronic certificate for the share in the project is not repurchased, it gives the right for participation in the company as a shareholder after the project starts operating.

7. Informational accessibility to the project and work of the group, the team on preparation and implementation of the project.

8. An investment gives you the right for participation in the project and the status of a participant of level 1.

9. The repurchase of an electronic certificate at the coefficient, which belongs to an investor (participant of level 1) implies discharge of money obligations by the Company.

10. If an electronic certificate for the share in the project is not repurchased, it gives the right for participation in the company as a shareholder after the project starts operating. The terms of participation are negotiated individually.

11. Taking to consideration the starting phase of the project, its innovative and scientific significance, KNOW-HOW elements, the participants bear equal responsibility for implementation of the project, at the same time, the Initiator will make every effort to implement the project of the line of elevated type in Kharkov region, Ukraine and fulfill obligations towards the investors – participants of level 1 and 2.

12. In order to be more confident and achieve the goal by the project initiators, the information about fund raising for starting phase of the project implementation is placed on indiegogo platform and, maybe, on other platform as well.

13. Current terms aim to interest potential investors and prove the seriousness of intentions of the Team to implement the project.

Current terms imply an offer to sign an agreement, addressed to unlimited number of individuals, of support and participation in the project and is shared on conditions of public offer. Its acceptance means agreement and confirmation of the terms of an agreement on behalf of an investor.  

If needed, a participant has the right for signing a contract on individual terms, if he accepts these terms while joining the project. The contract will be signed on the terms mentioned above and the terms, discussed with an investor.

The repurchase of an electronic certificate at the coefficient, which belongs to an investor (participant of level 1) implies discharge of money obligations by the Company.10. If an electronic certificate for the share in the project is not repurchased, it gives the right for participation in the company as a shareholder after the project starts operating. The terms of participation are negotiated individually.11. Taking to consideration the starting phase of the project, its innovative and scientific significance, KNOW-HOW elements, the participants bear equal responsibility for implementation of the project, at the same time, the Initiator will make every effort to implement the project of the line of elevated type in Kharkov region, Ukraine and fulfill obligations towards the investors – participants of level 1 and 2.12. In order to be more confident and achieve the goal by the project initiators, the information about fund raising for starting phase of the project implementation is placed on indiegogo platform and, maybe, on other platform as well.13. Current terms aim to interest potential investors and prove the seriousness of intentions of the Team to implement the project.Current terms imply an offer to sign an agreement, addressed to unlimited number of individuals, of support and participation in the project and is shared on conditions of public offer. Its acceptance means agreement and confirmation of the terms of an agreement on behalf of an investor.  If needed, a participant has the right for signing a contract on individual terms, if he accepts these terms while joining the project. The contract will be signed on the terms mentioned above and the terms, discussed with an investor.

story:
About The Fly-B:

The Fly-B is an electric powered Ultra-Light aircraft adapted to a modern light weight recumbent tricycle frame, combining the best of both worlds -- bicycling and ultra-light flying.  Fly-B owners can pedal around town (with optional electric assist) or extend the wings and fly anywhere ultralight operations are permitted.

The concept of a personal, portable and easy to fly aircraft is as old as aviation itself, but is now made practical by the new generation of batteries, motors, control systems and construction materials developed in recent years.  The Fly-B will store in a corner of a typical garage and can be pedaled  away in seconds, or the wings extended and flown in seconds more.

It's Green, It's Fun and it's an Aerobic Fat Burning Vehicle.

The Fly-B was designed by true aviation professionals, Captain Gary Pylant, a 20,000+ hour professional pilot and Mark Rumsey, a degreed aerospace engineer with an eclectic career in design that has included projects from the International Space Station, the Boeing 777 and the Nissan Maxima, among others, for clients such as Acushnet, BMW, Mercedes Benz, Nissan, Honda, Boeing and Motorola.

The Fly-B is an ideal Indiegogo project: not suited to large corporate mass market appeal, but able to tap an energetic niche market of adventure oriented free spirits already involved (or wanting to be) in the recumbent bicycle movement and ultralight aircraft.  We are looking to crowd funding to finance the tooling and production equipment for the initial production runs.

For those wanting a little background on ultralights in general and electric powered aircraft in particular, there are YouTubes from experts in the field posted in our Gallery (from the menu above.)

Questions About Safety...

A common question asked about ultra-light aircraft (and the Fly-B) is "How safe is it?"  Structurally, the Fly-B is exceptionally safe and stronger than most ultralights due to it's unique 4 main spar design, narrow wing span (technically, less moment arm at the wing tips) and unusually thick wing cross section.  This design means that the Fly-B is considerably OVERBUILT for the stress loads of normal flight.  Aerodynamically, the very low stall speed (26mph) means landings even in calm winds are exceptionally slow, and even a light headwind will reduce the landing speed to "school zone" speeds.  Check out the videos in our gallery which show recumbent bicycles moving at speeds well in excess of the Fly-B's top speed of 62mph and you will see that take-off and landing the Fly-B at speeds in the mid to low 20mph range -- or less -- is well within the range of safe recumbent bicycle speeds.

The video below by the FAA will explain some of the safety criteria of aircraft construction.


In The Press:




Our Partners:

EcoReco:


At EcoReco, we would like to preserve the environment in a cool and fun way.

We believe that rather than inheriting the planet from our ancestors, our generation is just temporarily borrowing it from future generations. Therefore, we promote acts of “green”-ness not due to the pursuing of self-importance but because it is the right and responsible thing to do.

Our mission at EcoReco is to provide eco-friendly alternatives to today’s energy-depleting, environment-threatening norms. We don’t want to accomplish the mission relying on charities or government subsides. We wish to build a self-sustainable business such that future entrepreneurs can be inspired and not afraid of joining the cause.

We put our efforts to innovate, to develop, and to source the brightest ideas from around the world, and we also try to build the right business models to bring them directly to the end users. We work hard to make sure our products are both practical and affordable.

Take the EcoReco electric scooter as an example:

A national household travel survey shows 50% of American car drivers’ daily trips are 3 miles or less, but most still choose to drive alone for them (even in an SUV!!). We propose an eco-friendly, efficient, and compact solution in the e-scooter. Not only can it do the job in these situations but also it’s much cheaper, faster and more fun for you, and less traffic congestion, pollution and CO2 emissions for all. With the energy, time, parking fee savings and its low price tag, the scooter practically pays for itself with just few months’ usage.

We’ll always advocate the use of e-scooters, whether you choose one of our state-of-the-art models or a product from a competitor. That’s because we’ve realized—and we hope you will, too—that along with saving a lot of green (both for the environment and for your wallet), riding an e-scooter will bring smiles to your face and to those of future generations.

THAT is our mission at EcoReco and we are driven to deliver that to you.


Some Background on Airplane Building...

story:
The MetroMule is one of the lightest cargo eBikes on the market. The MetroMule is nimble, easy to ride and can store a lot of cargo on a small frame. Its durable aluminum frame and high-quality components make this bike built to last. Using a 36V, 11.6AH battery combined with JUNTO's Intuitive Torque Sensing Pedal Assist Technology, the powerful, high torque 350w motor will carry you and your cargo 40-60 miles per charge - no matter how much stuff you load into its three storage components!

*Bike shown is prototype

Whether you use it as a grocery grabber, beer runner or general commuter, the MetroMule will save you time and money so you can spend both doing more of the things you love.

As more people continue to flood our cities, traffic, pollution and financial security are becoming bigger problems than ever before. Designed to fulfill our transportation needs without the carbon footprint, the electric drivetrain of the MetroMule produces zero carbon dioxide and reduces congestion.

Our proprietary Torque Sensor and Motor Combination is so efficient that we are able to get the equivalent of 750w of power from a much lighter and more compact 350w motor. 

Other eBike companies use heavy, high wattage motors with inefficient direct-drive systems. These clunky, outdated systems feel muddy and slow when compared to our system. JUNTO's torque-sensing pedal assist drive system creates a seamless connection between your pedaling and the motor's power output. The pedal assist feels incredible and gives you a massive amount of torque with minimal effort to make hauling your cargo and tackling hills a breeze. Dial in your perfect ride and feel the JUNTO difference.

Our perfectly balanced torque-sensing pedal assist allows you to carry up to 500lbs of cargo on the MetroMule and haul it without even breaking a sweat. This incredibly responsive torque sensor also has the added benefit of making the pedal assistance feel AMAZING and easy to operate. We even have a name for it…

Anyone who has ever ridden a JUNTO can tell you about the Holy Sh*t moment. It is a visceral experience where you instantly fall in love with your JUNTO once you feel the torque kick in. It feels so good, it'll blow your mind. It is a powerful, approachable and intuitive riding experience that keeps our customers coming back and makes our bikes amazing to ride every time. 

As pollution and congestion continue to plague our cities across the country, JUNTO inspires radical change with the introduction of its latest model - MetroMule.

The Metro Mule is available in two colors - Matte Black and Matte Yellow. With our one-size-fits all-frame, simply adjust the saddle and handlebars for a comfortable ride. Our eBike accommodates a rider up to 6’7’’.  Once, that the bike is adjusted to your specific preferences, you are all set to get moving! 

 

 

 

JUNTO started with a bold vision for the future; to build undeniable, brilliantly constructed eBikes at an affordable price to help get cars off the road and reduce our nation’s carbon footprint. 

Many American’s who live in and around major cities spend up to an entire week sitting in traffic every single year. That's time you could have spent with family, friends or doing really anything else!

According to an EPA study, nearly 3/4ths of the average American’s carbon footprint comes from the short car trips to work or while running errands.

The cost of gas, insurance and parking all contribute to the expense of owning a car, and we haven’t even mentioned the stress of idling in traffic. We see eBikes as the solution to city congestion and pollution because they are less expensive and detrimental to the environment than cars. Don’t believe us? We did the math for you. 

 

The MetroMule represents a big step towards JUNTO’s central mission: to get more cars off the road and inspire people to live greener, cleaner, more connected lives.

The MetroMule is the perfect bike for anyone who is looking to spend less time and money in their car and wants a practical, affordable, and reliable cargo eBike.

While JUNTO makes fantastic eBikes, it is driven to create them as a byproduct of its central mission: to reduce America’s carbon footprint and help inspire people to do their part in the green revolution.

Mobility needs to be a central aspect of future planning within cities, and we are working to support this initiative endlessly. We are partnering with local government organizations to build new protected bike lanes and trails across the southeastern Pennsylvania area.

To further show our commitment to this mission, JUNTO will donate a portion of the profits to the National Forest Foundation to plant 25 trees in each customer’s name. We’ll not only help you to reduce your carbon footprint by spending less time in your car, but we’ll also actively pull CO2 out of the atmosphere. You can rest assured knowing that you’re doing your part to help make this world a little greener for everyone.

JUNTO Electric Bicycle Works, Ltd. was founded in 2017 by its CEO, Brian Powell, with a bold vision for the future. The dream was to make an eBike that was more enjoyable and practical to ride than driving a car. Reality surpassed expectations. 

With the help of his son, Alec, and other driven individuals in the Philadelphia area, JUNTO created and launched its first eBike in 2018 - JUNTO One. After one year on the market, the JUNTO One sold out nationwide and received glowing reviews from its riders. At that moment, we knew the JUNTO movement had begun and we knew it was our responsibility to revolutionize the urban transportation.

Building upon the momentum of JUNTO One, we have created the MetroMule to further change the way we move. We want our latest eBike to help you beat traffic, save money, have fun and save the planet.

The success of this campaign will help us bring the MetroMule to market and continue to grow JUNTO into the eBike powerhouse the United States needs. We plan to make JUNTO into one of the great American brands and continue to lead and innovate in eBike technology for years to come. As our founder, Brian Powell, says, " To us, a brand is a very simple thing...it’s a PROMISE.  Our promise is to build and service truly magnificent eBikes.  Our goal is 100% satisfaction.

We plan to continue to expand our product line with a step-thru bike, large cargo bikes, premium high-performance bikes and more to accommodate every style of riding. Whether your JUNTO is just for getting around town, hauling cargo, or making you feel free and alive, JUNTO puts the same tender love and care into perfecting each bike to provide an incredible ride, at a great price. 

The JUNTO One had already received great reviews from its riders! We can't wait to hear from you about our latest model - MetroMule.

story:
It happens all the time, right?  The weather is beautiful, you and your Jeep are ready to explore the great outdoors, and it never fails - you take the top off... and it rains!  One thing Jeep lovers know all too well is that when you take your top off, you are making a commitment.  Maybe there's going to be rain in the next few days, maybe it's going to end up being a lot hotter than expected.  Either way, you are either stuck with the top off, or stuck putting a whole lot of time AND energy to put the top back on. 


 

With Trac-Top, you get the best of both worlds. Our patented design is simple: in a single motion, you can engage or disengage the top, retracting from the drivers seat or from the passenger seats. However much sun or shade you want is totally up to you. Everything installs using stock hardware and mounts, and you get protection from almost anything nature throws at you. Fire-resistant, non-toxic, and tear-resistant, the material used to create Trac-Top; will keep your seats dry and cool while still allowing you to enjoy nature.

          

Right now, we need your help.  We are looking to raise $50,000. These funds will cover the costs of expanding the manufacturing, marketing, and distribution processes behind Trac-Top. As a thank-you, we are offering a number of perks for the trails or the garage, along with Trac-Top at a major discount to you, our valued contributors.

 

When you are creating something that people will be using in conjunction with their vehicles, you need to be sure that everything works exactly as intended. We have gone to extreme lengths in order to ensure the safety of Trac-Top. We have the utmost confidence in its design and in our manufacturing team. You can rest assure that any challenges that may arise between now and the time that we deliver Trac-Top to you, we will be sure to face them intelligently and boldly.

In addition to contributing monetarily, you can help out by sharing our campaign with trail buddies and your local Jeep groups. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use! The more people that are aware of what we are doing with Trac-Top, the smoother the next few months will go for us. We appreciate your contributions, monetary and non-monetary, and thank you for your time.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why Crowdfunding?

All Jeep Enthusiasts know how expensive aftermarket parts can be.  Our goal is to give you an awesome product at an amazing price by keeping heavy investors and big companies out of the picture.

Why Trac-Top?

Trac-Top offers Sun or Shade on Demand and at a faction of the cost of competitors without sacrificing quality!  The better question is, why not?!

 Is there any drilling required?

None at all!  There is some minor assembly required, but everything will mount to your Jeep using existing bolts, clamps, and knobs.

Will there be any wind-flap?

This was one of the major concerns during the design stage as is a problem with some of our competitors.  It is important to use that we provide a comfortable ride for your Jeep, the goal is to provide something that your adventures more enjoyable and comfortable! We have addressed this issue head on to assure a silent, and protective Trac-Top without the wind flap.

What Jeep models does the Trac-Top fit?

The first production run is going to directed towards the JK model.  However, once established we fully intend on creating versions for the TJ and JL models as well. 

What protection will I get from the elements?

Well, we’re happy you’ve asked!  You already know that Trac-Top gives amazing protection from the sun.  It also protects against, both the heat; keeping you and your seats cool, and from the glare of the sun, and it provides SPF from a too hot/bright day!  Trac-Top also provides protection from rain as we’ve created a patented water distribution system as part of the top. The water drains to either side of the top and pours out into channels, and not into your jeep.  Trac-Top gives you protection from most all environmental elements – although we wouldn’t suggest you using it when it snows!

Can I put my soft or hard top on over the Trac-Top?

The Trac-Top is designed to give you the appearance of riding topless while giving you protection from the elements.  No need for your current top. 

When will the Trac-Top be available?

It all depends on you and this crowdfunding campaign!  We are in the process of fabricating our first prototype now, with plan to fully launch Trac-Top next Spring!  We also have a goal to expand our concept by the end of 2019.  The faster we can get funding, the faster the top will be on the market.  What are you waiting for?  Go spread the word about our awesome product!

Does the Trac-Top cover the rear seats as well?

Not right now, but remember that expansion we were just talking about?  How fast we grow greatly depends on how successful we are with this campaign.  We do have plans to expand Trac-Top to cover the rear seats by 2019.  IF we exceed our goal you may even see this step as early as next spring!

 

From one Jeep enthusiast to another, and because we are a crowdfunded company, our community is everything to us -- we seriously would not be here today without you.

We promise...

  • To update you.
  • To listen to your input and feedback.
  • To make addressing questions or concerns a priority from the campaign stage through delivery to your door.
  • To provide you with exceptional customer service.
  • To ensure you become a part of our long-term Jeep loving family!

 

0|||||||0

The first production run is going to directed towards the JK model.  However, once established we fully intend on creating versions for the TJ and JL models as well.

Well, we’re happy you’ve asked!  You already know that Trac-Top gives amazing protection from the sun.  It also protects against, both the heat; keeping you and your seats cool, and from the glare of the sun, and it provides SPF from a too hot/bright day!  Trac-Top also provides protection from rain as we’ve created a patented water distribution system as part of the top. The water drains to either side of the top and pours out into channels, and not into your jeep.  Trac-Top gives you protection from most all environmental elements – although we wouldn’t suggest you using it when it snows!
Can I put my soft or hard top on over the Trac-Top?
The Trac-Top is designed to give you the appearance of riding topless while giving you protection from the elements.  No need for your current top. 
When will the Trac-Top be available?
It all depends on you and this crowdfunding campaign!  We are in the process of fabricating our first prototype now, with plan to fully launch Trac-Top next Spring!  We also have a goal to expand our concept by the end of 2019.  The faster we can get funding, the faster the top will be on the market.  What are you waiting for?  Go spread the word about our awesome product!
Does the Trac-Top cover the rear seats as well? 
Not right now, but remember that expansion we were just talking about?  How fast we grow greatly depends on how successful we are with this campaign.  We do have plans to expand Trac-Top to cover the rear seats by 2019.  IF we exceed our goal you may even see this step as early as next spring!
 

From one Jeep enthusiast to another, and because we are a crowdfunded company, our community is everything to us -- we seriously would not be here today without you.
We promise...

To update you.
To listen to your input and feedback.
To make addressing questions or concerns a priority from the campaign stage through delivery to your door.
To provide you with exceptional customer service.
To ensure you become a part of our long-term Jeep loving family!

 
0|||||||0

story:
MEET ZED'O

 

WHAT IS IT?

ZED'O is the first standard-sized bicycle able to fold to the size of your backpack. It is possible due to sophisticated structure of folding wheels and frame. Thanks to its appearance, it's also eye-catching and unforgetable.

Our team consist mostly of creative and technical designers. Your cotributions will help us finalize and test the prototype and establish production of first bikes, that will end up in your closet, car trunk, uder your bed or anywhere else, waiting for a ride. Pick one of the perks and enjoy  a ride on your own.

 

HOW IS IT POSSIBLE?

ZED'O is designed to be light, compact yet practical and reliable. Materials used to reach these goals are light-weight aluminum and carbon fiber, which is also extremely strong and durable.

 

 

 

POSITION LOCKING MECHANISM

you can easily lock/release the frame in both folded or unfolded position by one simple press of a button.

 

 

TELESCOPIC FRAME SECTIONS

this parts allows frame to fold into smaller dimensions than you would expect

 

 

INTERNAL PLANETARY GEAR HUB

this option gives you whole spectrum of advantages compared to regular drivetrain

 

 

TELESCOPIC WHEEL STRUCTURE

the key element to achieve small dimensions in folded state

 

 

DISC BRAKES

powerful way to stop your bike safely

 

 

PERFORATED LEATHER SEAT

designed to be stylish and comfortable

 

 

PUNCTURE PROOF TIRE

composite material to prevent flat tire

 

 

TRANSFORMATION

 

WHY IS IT PRACTICAL?

 

 

You can take your bike with you even if you are traveling by public transportation such as bus, train, plane or spaceship.

 

 

Folded bike can be stored in the smallest closet, so you don't have to worry that the bike won't fit your apartment or room.

 

 

Take a few bikes on a trip with you. Even if your car isn't too big, you will be able to fit them in the trunk along with other luggage.

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

In case we reach the first goal, we'll add another one. So stay tuned for updates.

 

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS?

We need at least $100,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to finalize the prototype and establish production of first bicycles. Our funding goal is just a part of the amount, because we'll be raising funds for manufacturing by other resources. Contributions will be used to pay for materials, moldings and cnc machining of the prototype.

In return, you will get the most sophisticated and also coolest folding bike in the world for much less than the retail price. Each bike will come with original backpack that fits the bike precisely.

With your help, we'll be able to make these bikes the highest quality possible.

 

 

THE TIMELINE

 

THANK YOU!

We are thankful in advance for your kind support. You can support us by picking one of the perks, by sharing our campaign on your social media, or just telling your friends about us. Every help counts!

story:
This is a revolutionary UAV, which is able to fly for a long time, steadily and smoothly in a wide range of speeds of above 160 km/h (100mph)! The flight endurance of this drone is remarkably long. You will have the opportunity to fly with him about 5-15 hours! You do not have an UAV with similar performances? Now you have them on hand!


About this project

Best selling Christmas present was a drone. Most searched word on Google was "drone". It seems that in the future, drones will be all around us. So a lot of people looking for a drone. Some for fun, some for work. But what they find? The vast majority of them are multi-rotor copters. Or not? Yes! The vast majority of them are bees that hover in the air, but do not fly. They are hovering in the air for 15-20 minutes and then fall to the ground as dead flies.

Hovering above the target is one problem, but if you need to track it, then you need two things. You need speed and endurance. 

In addition, most of these "toys" they have no idea where they are in space and how high above the surrounding terrain, as they have only the data from the GPS. The problem with the detection of height by GPS is long known, but still  most drones today does not have an altimeter (pressure or laser) or backup inertial navigation system.

That's why we launched this project with working name MP-1A  STORK.



Flight range and flight time

Endurance isn't normally associated with most of the drones out there. We changed that! The flight time of out drone is depended on the flight profile. You will be able to fly about 5 hours in horizontal flight at speed Vh=160 km/h (100 mph). In this case, the motor run continuously on a low power.

However, if you need even higher endurance, you can then use a saw flight profile. In this case, the drone will be glide at speed Vopt=80 km/h (50 mph) for 23 sec. Then the motor will be running for a period of 1-2 seconds at maximum power for climbing back to the altitude, where gliding was initiated.


Speed

Speed isn't normally associated with most of the drones out there.  We changed that!  Ever heard of a multi-rotor taking great aerial shots at 160 km/h (100 mph)?  Well, now you have it on hand!


A Redefined Drone

The MP-1A STORK is not just a watchdog constantly monitoring a large area. Of course it can be used as search robot looking for people during rescue operations. It may also be used for monitoring the movement of animals in large areas, or tracking poachers killing the rhino, or other protected animals. Can autonomously fly near the beaches and to check the presence of sharks. You can use it as a tool for scaring the starlings who destroys crops.

Do you want to shoot video of the airplane flying low over the surface of the Lake around a small island? It should not be a problem. The aircraft can be equipped with an auxiliary universal curtain that is before landing plugs into a large section of the hull. On this hinge would be able to consolidate a stabilized gimbal with the popular GoPro camera. There are still options to modify these things, it's up for debate.

All of this is accomplished with our fast and persistent civil drone.


Easy to Fly

During our test-fly programs an autopilot will be tuned up, so the drone won't be able to fall by itself into uncontrolled spin. If the drone fall into a spin during the manual flight , the autopilot will be able to make correction manoeuvr himself and bring the drone to a steady horizontal flight.


How it Looks / How it Works

MP-1A STORK is designed as a single-engine multipurpose aircraft made from high modulus (HM) carbon fiber prepreg (CFRP). It is equipped with a three-well retractable landing gear. On this airplane can be installed a wide variety of sensors. In small surfaces on the tip of the fuselage is integrated a pair of cameras used for stereo-vision system to detect obstacles. The next planned equipment is a laser radar (LIDAR) for detection of obstacles under poor Visual conditions. This radar is in the landing configuration hidden in the fuselage and into the working position is ejected after take-off the aircraft. In the front part of the hull in the dome is designed to install two cameras (RGB, IR) with high resolution. The camera module is hidden in the landing configuration in the fuselage and into the working position is ejected after take-off the aircraft. 






Key Features


An Endurance worker: Need to fly long, far and away? Need to repetitively fly over a wide area like farms, beaches, vineyards? Need to fly above lake to film a small isle at the lake centre? Need to track a poacher? That's no problem, 5-15 hours of flying time will be available (depends on the flight profile and takeoff weight).

A Speed record man: Need to follow a fast moving object or want some fast relocation of the drone? Based on the situation you may fly with speeds about 160 km/h (86kn ; 100 mph) in horizontal flight and about 200 km/h (108 kn ; 124 mph) in dive flight - this is limiting speed used in design. None: we known that some special RC aircrafts are very fast and flying over 400 km/h (116 kn ; 248 mph), but they are limited for operation within special areas at RC club airports. For example here at "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zyRQ65pDmW0" is really shown a flying weapon.

Easy to fly: Stabilized during entire flight profile in takeoff, climb, cruise, manoeuvring and landing. During our test-fly programs an autopilot will be tuned up, so the drone won't be able to fall into uncontrolled spin, for example.

Safe: With GPS and Inertial Navigation System as a backup of GPS the drone will always known a shortest flight trajectory to the ground control station (GCS), so in case of low energy in battery they can safely fly back to home. Computer Stereo-vision system combined with the Laser Radar (LIDAR) in case of poor visual conditions send a warning to the GCS if there is a obstacle on trajectory of flight in time , or may make a evasive manoeuvre himself without assistance. All data from all sensors will be recorded on the microSD card and in real time will be send over Multi-way data lines to the ground control station. As well as video from the cameras can be transmitted over the wireless network.


Specifications


General characteristics

Length: 1600 mm (63 in)

Wingspan (without winglets): 3000 mm (118 in)

Height: 700 mm (28 in)

Wing area: 0,45 m2 (4,8 sq ft)

Empty weight: 6 kg (13,2 lb)

Max. takeoff weight (MTOW): 12 kg (26,5 lb)

Powerplant: 1 x Leopard LBP4065 series 2000W (planed)

Propeller: 3-bladed 14" x 4,7" (fixed or hinged)

Engine battery: 1 - 8 x battery packs 4S 14.8V 11,000 mAh 10C (planed)


Performance

g limits: +3.8 ; -1.52

Maximum glide ratio: 23.0 at 22 m/s ; 80 km/h (43 kn ; 50 mph)

Flying time: 5-15 hours estimated (depends on the flight profile 5 h - horizontal flight on Vh, continuous engine operation (at low power); 15 hours - saw flight with gliding at Vopt, non-continuous engine operation (every 23 sec. engine run at max power for 1-2 sec in climbing)

Take-off length (to 15m ; 50 ft altitude): TBD (depends on power unit and TOW)

Vc - Design cruising speed (EAS): 40 m/s; 143 km/h; 77 kn; 89 mph

Vh - Design horizontal speed (EAS): 44 m/s; 159 km/h; 86 kn; 99 mph

Vd - Design dive speed (EAS): 56 m/s; 200 km/h; 108 kn; 124 mph

Vs - Design stalling speed (EAS): 16 m/s; 58 km/h; 31 kn; 36 mph

Va - Design manoeuvring speed (EAS): 31 m/s; 112 km/h; 61 kn; 70 mph

Vopt - Optimum gliding speed: 22 m/s; 80 km/h; 43 kn; 50 mph

Note: EAS - Equivalent Airspeed


Equipment

  • Autopilot System (GPS, 3-axis accelerometer, 3-axis gyroscope, 3-axis magnetometer, barometer)
  • Laser altimeter
  • Multi-way data transfer (up to three 3G/4G links ; XBee - Outdoor RF line-of-sight range up to 64 km /40 miles/). All data from all sensors will be recorded on the microSD card and in real time will be send over wireless network to the ground control station.


Conditional equipment

  • First-Person View (FPV) - Stretch goal #1
  • Computer stereo-vision system (Collision avoidance) - Stretch goal #2
  • Laser radar - LIDAR (Collision avoidance during poor visual conditions) - Stretch goal #3
  • 3-axis gyro-stabilized gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras (RGB, infrared) - Stretch goal #4


Application


Potential groups for the MP-1A  STORK

  • Police
  • Search & Rescue service
  • Geographic Information System (GIS) / Photogrammetry
  • Energy & energy suppliers
  • Agricultural users
  • Media agencies
  • Service providers

Potential users of the MP-1A  STORK

  • Photographers
  • Journalists
  • Film and Video creative's
  • Television stations
  • Sports events
  • Archaeologists
  • Surveyors
  • Architects
  • Real estate agents
  • Environmentalists
  • Meteorologists
  • Environmental researchers
  • Farmers
  • Vineyards owner


Why We need Your Help

First, we need to complete the development, which is a work in progress and to make three functional prototypes. One for the purposes of the strength tests for verification of strength and stiffness of the drone structure. The other two will be used in the flight tests program for the purpose of verification and correction of the calculated flight performance and properties. Those are known today, see "Specifications-performance". For the production of prototypes is essential to make the form in which the individual components of the drone will be produced. This prototype mini-series allows us to resolve possible problems with the production.bvc

Profit from the Indiegogo campaign  will be used for the completion of the development and production of the verification series of the drone and his other equipment (stereo-vision system, LIDAR, FPV, 3-axis gyro-stabilized gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras). We need to increase the volume of production in order to reduce the price! It's as simple as that. Profit from the campaign will allow us to hire more engineers and specialist, hardware and software developers, app developers, etc. So we can continue to progress and innovate this fantastic product. And Yes, we are looking for talented people to join our team! So if you are an enthusiastic fan in the aviation industry are you interested in the latest UAV technology and you have the appropriate education, abilities and a set of skills that you think can contribute, write us a line to martin.plhal@mpeng.cz


Stretch Goals


Stretch Goal #1: € 100 000

We make MP-1A STORK! A revolutionary UAV, which is able to fly steadily and smoothly in a wide range of speeds of up to 160 km/h in horizontal flight! You will have the opportunity to fly with him about 5-15 hours! Included will be First-Person View (FPV).


Stretch Goal #2: € 300 000

All of the above. Plus Computer Stereo-vision system for collision avoidance.


Stretch Goal #3: € 500 000

All of the above. Plus Laser radar (LIDAR) for collision avoidance during poor visual conditions.


Stretch Goal #4: € 700 000

All of the above. Plus 3-axis gyro-stabilized gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras (RGB, infrared).


Timeline

November 2014 - conceptual design - DONE

December 2014 - preliminary aerodynamic design, analysis of flight performance and properties, weight and energy analysis - DONE

January 2015 - preparation of the project for publication - DONE

February - March 2015 - Indiegogo campaign - NOW

May - June 2015 - detailed aerodynamic design, numerical simulations using Computational Fluid Dynamics software (CFD)

July - September 2015 - detailed design of the individual components, units, and all the details. Detailed calculations of the flight and ground load cases with regard to the design speed, maneuver multiples and wind gusts

October - December 2015 - detailed strength control of individual components, units, and all the details. Any correction of the design

December 2015 - January 2016 - design of forms for the production of individual components

February - March 2016 - production and completion of three prototypes

April 2016 - first manual flight

April - May 2016 - flight tests-verification of flight performance and properties

June 2016 - first autonomous flight

June - July 2016 - autopilot tuning, verification of the ability to use uncontrolled maneuvers

Depending on the achievement of individual goals of the campaign will be carried out in parallel development and production of other components of equipment (stereo-vision system, LIDAR, 3-axis gyro-stabilized gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras (RGB, infrared).

Team

Our team is currently composed of five experts in the fields of aerodynamics - Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), mechanics of flight (flight performance, flight characteristics), flight management systems, construction and design, static and dynamic strength analysis - analytics method and Finite Element Method (FEM), information technology and computer image and video processing in real time. All of us have PH.D. degree education and practice in the aerospace industry for more than 15 years. We are all in the past, worked mainly on the development and certification of small aircraft (MTOW around 1500kg; 3300 lb) and their components according to the provisions of FAR-23, CS-23, CS-VLA.

Help to make it happen
