other equipment (stereo-vision system, LIDAR, FPV, 3-axis gyro-stabilized
gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras). We need to increase the volume of
production in order to reduce the price! It's as simple as that. Profit from
the campaign will allow us to hire more engineers and specialist, hardware and
software developers, app developers, etc. So we can continue to progress and
innovate this fantastic product. And Yes, we are looking for talented people to
join our team! So if you are an enthusiastic fan in the aviation industry are
you interested in the latest UAV technology and you have the appropriate
education, abilities and a set of skills that you think can contribute, write
us a line to martin.plhal@mpeng.cz
Stretch Goals
Stretch Goal #1: € 100 000
We make MP-1A STORK! A revolutionary UAV, which is able to fly steadily and smoothly in a wide range of speeds of up to 160 km/h in horizontal
flight! You will have the opportunity to fly with him about 5-15 hours! Included will be First-Person View (FPV).Stretch Goal #2: € 300 000
All of the above. Plus Computer Stereo-vision
system for collision avoidance.
Stretch Goal #3: € 500 000
All of the above. Plus Laser radar (LIDAR) for collision avoidance during poor visual
conditions.
Stretch Goal #4: € 700 000
All of the above. Plus 3-axis gyro-stabilized
gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras (RGB, infrared).

Timeline
November 2014 - conceptual
design - DONE
December 2014 - preliminary
aerodynamic design, analysis of flight performance and properties, weight and
energy analysis - DONE
January 2015 - preparation
of the project for publication - DONE
February - March
2015 - Indiegogo campaign - NOW
May - June 2015 -
detailed aerodynamic design, numerical simulations using Computational Fluid
Dynamics software (CFD)
July - September
2015 - detailed design of the individual components, units, and all the
details. Detailed calculations of the flight and ground load cases with regard
to the design speed, maneuver multiples and wind gusts
October -
December 2015 - detailed strength control of individual components, units, and
all the details. Any correction of the design
December 2015 - January
2016 - design of forms for the production of individual components
February - March 2016
- production and completion of three prototypes
April 2016 - first manual flight
April - May 2016
- flight tests-verification of flight performance and properties
June 2016 - first
autonomous flight
June - July 2016
- autopilot tuning, verification of the ability to use uncontrolled maneuvers
Depending on the
achievement of individual goals of the campaign will be carried out in parallel
development and production of other components of equipment (stereo-vision
system, LIDAR, 3-axis gyro-stabilized gimbal with two 24-megapixel cameras
(RGB, infrared).

Team
Our team is currently composed of five experts
in the fields of aerodynamics - Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), mechanics
of flight (flight performance, flight characteristics), flight management
systems, construction and design, static and dynamic strength analysis -
analytics method and Finite Element Method (FEM), information technology and
computer image and video processing in real time. All of us have PH.D. degree education
and practice in the aerospace industry for more than 15 years. We are all in
the past, worked mainly on the development and certification of small aircraft
(MTOW around 1500kg; 3300 lb) and their components according to the provisions
of FAR-23, CS-23, CS-VLA.

Help to make it happen

story:
Versión en Español 

UPDATE: Now you can order your YERKA through our website! http://yerka.bike


ACTUALIZACIÓN: Ahora puedes comprar tu YERKA desde nuestra página web!

http://yerka.bike


www.yerkabikes.com



Introducing a bicycle locking system designed to keep you feeling safe.

We went back to the roots of security and made a paradigm shift: “Make a lock out of the bike”. Now a thief would have to cut through the main structure to take the bicycle, defeating the purpose. Not only can you relax knowing your bike is secure, the quality and design of YERKA are unmatched.



1. What The Press is Saying

2. What makes YERKA different

     1.Safety

     2.Design

     3.Usability/Comfort

3. Perks

4. Bike Spec

5. Road Map

6. Team

7. Shipping

8. FAQ


Enjoy the Outdoors On a Comfortable Ride, Worry Free



WHAT THE PRESS IS SAYING





WHAT MAKES YERKA DIFFERENT

The main goal of this project was to produce the most secure bicycle system ever created without affecting the integrity of the frame itself. We realized that performance and comfort can be achieved together which is why the beauty of Yerka’s design is in its simplicity. By thinking out of the box we came up with a concept that merges everything into one sleek design. And we couldn’t be more excited!


1. SAFETY


YERKA LOCKING TECHNOLOGY

The Yerka Locking Technology features (same as Kryptonite locks): 

  • 12mm hardened steel shackle resist hand tools
  • Reinforced collar over keyway for increased protection
  • High security disc-style cylinder

Yerka Anti-Theft Nut

With special anti-theft nuts on the wheels, that only you have the special key for them, so no one can take them but you. Now you can park your bike anywhere comfortably knowing all its parts will be waiting for you right where you left them.



BLUETOOTH: A KEYLESS FUTURE
Now you can leave it parked outside and still find it where you left it!




2. DESIGN

The YERKA design can be applied to any classical frame shape. Unlike foldable or rental bikes, YERKA has a sleek design. The lock is so seamless and integrated we’ll bet no one can tell the difference between YERKA and a classical bike!



3. EASE OF USE/COMFORT


Securing your YERKA can be as fast as tying your shoelaces! Just 10 seconds and you are good to go!




PERKS

Update: All perks are sold out, but you can still donate and help us make our dream come true!

This campaign is aimed to give you the most secure bike ever, and also to give you some great perks! If you believe in our project, you can donate more than the perk itself. For example: USD $50 for an Eba Bike designed T-Shirt, or USD $350 for the frame alone. It is not an obligation by any means, but it will be highly appreciated and will also help lower shipping costs.


* You can choose your size/ color for the YERKA Bike, YERKA Frame and T-Shirt when the campaign ends. We will contact you vía e-mail. 

** The Yerka Frame includes Fork + Seat Post + Yerka Anti-Theft Nuts. Does not include a Seat.  


Coupons: Don’t have the money? Don´t worry!

We know that USD $449 may be a lot to spend at once, so for just USD $99 we will grant you a USD $499 price even for when the campaign is over. Just pay the remaining USD $400 balance in advance of delivery to get your Yerka (you can pay this remaining till end September and get it by November 2015) . The estimated market retail price is USD $600+.



Reflective T-Shirts 





Bike Specs




ROADMAP

Finding a great manufacturer is hard, and we don’t want to trade quality for quick and cheap production. Thinking towards quality, for every 1000 YERKA units sold, we will deliver them in batches with a month of separation, the first one starts shipping in October.


WHY WE NEED YOU

We have come to Indiegogo to share our project with all of you, our incredible community of bicycle supporters. You deserve a better locking mechanism to secure your bike when you’re not around to watch it We want you to feel and be safe. We also want to hear and learn from you--your suggestions and feedback will not only help us improve our project, but will also be implemented into our rewards and further bicycle designs. We know this is an ambitious project, but we are certain that with your help YERKA will become a worldwide reality.



A GREAT TEAM

Most people learn to walk before they run... we learned to ride before we walked! We have a deep love for the cycling, and we also know what it feels like to lose a bike to theft. We are three engineering students who had enough of getting our bicycles stolen and wanted to create a solution.

For us, Indiegogo is not just a way to get this thrilling project to you, it is a way to hear from and learn from you. With your help and support we know we can get this to the whole world.

As Engineering students we acquired all of the skills and knowledge necessary to bring this project to life.

From a young age our whole team always had great interests in robotics, design, and technology; always creating and testing and finding solutions--constantly wanting to do more. All of this prepared us for the complicated task at hand which required advanced knowledge of sophisticated laser cutting and lathe machines, 3D Printers, metal work, and welding.

Our hard work and life-long passion, along with the collaboration with accelerator institutes (Garage UAI, CHRYSALIS) paid off; we won the PRECITYE contest (Regional Entrepreneurship and Innovation Programme in Engineering), an OTT contest (Technology Transfer Office) at our University (UAI), and were finalists in the last Junior World Entrepreneurship Forum hosted in Santiago, Chile. Today, we are very proud to have won a Chilean Seed Capital from (CORFO)

We’ve since added on to our team and are working with the most accomplished experts out there, like Mikaela, one of the finest 3D Designers in the world; and Cristián Haquin, a serial entrepreneur, bluetooth developing expert, excellent solution provider, and Co- Founder of Azumi Mobile Phone Company.


We are dedicating all our efforts to give you nothing but the best, and are always looking for more motivated people to be part of The Team. Today, we want YOU to join us in this journey.



SHIPPING



RISK & CHALLENGES

We know great quality is hard to find, and with this project we cannot afford having bad quality components. That’s why we are traveling to Shenzhen, China, to ensure only the best materials are being used in our bikes. Developing the awesome bluetooth technology to unlock the YERKA is not easy, that’s why we are working with an expert in the subject, who also is an entrepreneur.

We are a motivated team who has decided to take this challenge and give you only our best!


FAQ

How can I pay for my YERKA®?

You can use your credit card. Here is a link with further information, but remember, we are currently not accepting paypal. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...


How does the USD $99 coupon works?

By reserving now at just USD $99 we will grant you a point price at USD $499. Pay the remaining USD $400 balance in advance of delivery.


Will my YERKA® be compatible with grills and baskets?

Of course it will! The YERKA® has the mounts to them, so feel free to add them on your own.


Can the wheels be taken away by thieves?

We got that cover! We have designed a special nut security system to protect the wheels. The only way to get them out is with a special key, which only you have. This way, your whole bike is secured.


What if I cut the seat tube and replace it with another?

Our mechanism works in such way that if someone were to cut the tube, the whole bicycle wouldn’t close to it’s original shape. Doing this renders the bike useless, so replacing the broken seat tube for another wouldn’t solve anything.


Is there another way to secure the mechanism or a key is the only way?

In the beginning and for the most basic models, yes. Although, we are working in a bluetooth locking mechanism, leaving the key in the past and maximising your comfort while riding.


What happens if I want to change any part of my YERKA?

Easy, it’s just like any other bike. If you want to replace any component of your YERKA, like wheels, brakes, pedals, etc… feel free to do it. You can buy any aftermarket products to easily modify it for best suiting you.


To which places can I secure my YERKA?

You can secure it to any kind of poles, fences, traditional or inverted U bike racks, etc, up to 20,3 cm (8 inches). Get creative, this are only suggestions, there are many other places where you can secure it and we encourage you to tell us about your favourite.


Will it be available in different sizes?

Of course it will! Sizes available are Small, Medium, Large and X-Large, all of them available to pick at the end of the campaign.


How much will the shipping cost?

If you are within the USA or Chile your YERKA will arrive with no extra charges! If you are outside, the shipping cost will no more than USD $150. We will update shipping information at the end of the campaign, however – with the USD $150 – it’s a cap. The more we sell the lower this figure will become, it will not go up. There is no need to pay for shipping now, we will update you on this with more accurate estimates based on volume. We'll send you a reminder about shipping cost before the end of the campaign, at which point we'll present you with an option to pay the cost.


How do I choose the color of the YERKA®?

By voting on your favourite color you can make it available for choosing. At the end of the campaign we will contact you by mail and ask you to pick your desired color and size of your YERKA.


What material is it made of? Is it heavy?

The whole frame of the YERKA is made out of steel, and the whole system is made of the best quality hardened aluminium. The YERKA weights 11,5 kilos (25 pounds), making it lighter than a traditional fixie bike with a strong lock.


Is the YERKA® compatible with gears?

Yes it is! With the option of buying only the YERKA frame, we’re giving you the possibility to use the gears you like using a mass with internal gears.


Can I use it on the mountains?

Sadly we haven’t developed a YERKA mountain bike… yet. For now you can comfortably use it as a bike for your daily commute, friendly trips, or riding the city.


Why do you call it ‘unstealable’?

By using the frame as the lock, breaking the lock implies breaking the structure of the bike. Even a dumb thief can reckon that it is not a good idea. By breaking the lock you break the bike, making it no longer a bicycle. If by any chance the thief breaks the pole, fence, or bike rack your YERKA was secured to, he won’t be able to ride it. The frame is still in its locking position, which makes it impossible to ride.That’s why we call it ‘unstealable’.


Is the system by any chance demountable?

Yes and no. To detach the pivots you need a special tool to take the crossed security screw out, a tool owned by us. Without the tool you would have to cut the frame and we’re back to having a useless bicycle.


How is the YERKA® built?

The YERKA is manufactured using almost all existing parts, lowering the cost but not the quality. The locking mechanism is made using the best materials possible to ensure the quality and lifespan.


How does the bluetooth connection work?

By connecting your smartphone (iOS or Android) to the YERKA® and downloading the app you are good to go! Any device with Bluetooth 4.0 or above is compatible.


Is there any YERKA® authorised dealer?
Eventually there will be, and we hope many. In the meantime for any inquiry you can contact us at info@yerkaproject.com


Español
ENVÍO GRATIS a USA & Chile

Introduciendo un sistema de bloqueo de bicicletas diseñado para mantenerte seguro. 

Volvimos a los inicios de la seguridad y cambiamos un paradigma: “Hicimos un candado utilizando la bicicleta”. De este modo un ladrón tendría que cortar la estructura principal para llevarse la bicicleta, lo que la dejaría inutilizable. Ahora puedes relajarte sabiendo que tu bicicleta está segura, y que además cuenta con un diseño y calidad inigualables.



Disfruta Del Aire Libre Con Un Andar Cómodo y sin Preocupaciones




PRENSA



LO QUE DIFERENCIA A YERKA®

El objetivo de este proyecto es producir el mejor sistema de seguridad para bicicletas. Nos dimos cuenta que desempeño y comodidad pueden ser logrados juntos, y es en esto que radica la belleza del diseño de YERKA®, en su simplicidad. Pensando fuera de la caja, logramos un concepto que combina todo dentro de un diseño sobrio. No podríamos estar más emocionados!



1. SEGURIDAD


TECNOLOGÍA YERKA



TUERCAS DE SEGURIDAD ANTI- ROBO


BLUETOOTH: UN FUTURO SIN LLAVES

Ahora puedes asegurarla en cualquier lugar, y estar seguro de encontrarla donde la dejaste!



2. DISEÑO



Con increíbles colores, un bloqueo de aluminio fundido, y un hermoso sillín grabado, esto es realmente lo mejor que podrías pedir.



3. USABILIDAD/COMODIDAD


Asegurar tu YERKA® puede ser tan rápido como atar tus cordones! Sólamente 10 segundos y estás listo!




RECOMPENSAS

Actualización: Todas las recompensas se han agotado, pero aún aceptamos donaciones!

Esta campaña está enfocada en darte la bicicleta más segura, y además para darte increíbles recompensas! En esta ocasión serás nuestro inversionista, y puedes aportar más que valor de una recompensa si así lo deseas. Por ejemplo: USD $50 por una hermosa Polera Eba Bike con estampas reflectantes, o USD $350 por el cuadro solo. Por ningún motivo es una obligación, pero si lo haces será enormemente apreciado, y además ayudará a bajar los costos de envío.


Contribuir con una recompensa


* Al final de la campaña te contactaremos para la elección de tallas/colores de la bicicleta Yerka, cuadro Yerka y poleras.
** El cuadro Yerka incluye Horquilla + Tuercas Anti-Robo + Tubo de Sillín. No incluye Sillín. 



No tienes el dinero aún? No te preocupes!

Por tan sólo USD $99 dólares puedes reservar tu YERKA a un precio de USD $429 incluso cuando la campaña finalice. Pagas luego los USD $400 restantes antes del envío (puedes pagar la diferencia hasta finales de septiembre y recibir tu YERKA en noviembre 2015). El precio estimado de mercado de una YERKA será de USD $600 o más.



Polera Reflectante




ESPECIFICACIONES DE LA BICICLETA




LÍNEA DE TIEMPO


Encontrar un gran proveedor es difícil, y no estamos dispuestos a cambiar la calidad por una rápida entrega. Pensando siempre en la calidad, por cada 1000 unidades vendidas de YERKA®, estas serán entregadas en distintos lotes con separación de un mes, empezando el primero en Octubre.


POR QUÉ TE NECESITAMOS

Hemos llegado a Indiegogo para compartir nuestro proyecto con todos ustedes, con este increíble grupo de amantes de la bicicleta y que merecen un mejor sistema para asegurar sus bicicletas al dejarlas estacionadas. Queremos que te sientas y estés seguro, pero también queremos escucharte. Tu ayuda y comentarios no sólo ayudarán a mejorar este proyecto, también tus sugerencias serán incorporadas dentro de nuestras recompensas y futuras bicicletas.

Sabemos que es un proyecto ambicioso, pero estamos seguros que con tu ayuda, esto se puede volver una realidad mundial.


UN GRAN EQUIPO


Dicen que algunos corren antes de aprender a caminar… nosotros aprendimos a pedalear antes de caminar! Tenemos un profundo amor por las bicicletas, y al igual que tú, sabemos lo que se siente perder una en manos de un ladrón. Somos tres estudiantes de Ingeniería hartos de que nos roben nuestras bicicletas.

La bicicleta es más que simplemente un cuadro, las ruedas y la cadena. La bicicleta es nuestra forma de movernos, de expresarnos. Andar en bicicleta es una experiencia… y creemos que no hay mejor manera de asegurarla que con nuestro innovador diseño. Desarrollar YERKA® ha sido un trabajo de pasión. 

Para nosotros, Indiegogo no es solamente un medio para mostrarles este emocionante proyecto, es una forma de escucharlos y aprender de ustedes. Estamos seguros que con su apoyo podemos hacer llegar esto al mundo entero.


Como estudiantes de Ingeniería, hemos adquirido habilidades y conocimientos importantes para llevar a cabo este proyecto. Desde pequeños siempre estuvimos interesados en la robótica, el diseño y en siempre querer hacer más. Todo esto ayudó a que hoy pudiésemos usar increíbles herramientas como cortadoras laser, impresoras 3D, tornos para mecanizado de piezas e incluso soldar.

Ganamos el concurso de PRECITYE (Programa Regional de Emprendedorismo e Innovación en Ingeniería), además un concurso de la OTT (Oficina de Transferencia Tecnológica) de nuestra Universidad, y fuimos finalistas en el JWEF (Foro Mundial del Emprendimiento Juvenil) realizado en Santiago de Chile.  Y ahora estamos muy orgullosos de haber ganado un capital semilla de CORFO.

Para potenciar aún más nuestro equipo estamos trabajando con distintos profesionales dando el máximo en sus áreas, como Mikaela, una de las mejores diseñadoras 3D; Cristián Haquin, emprendedor serial, experto desarrollador en bluetooth, y Co- Fundador de la compañía de teléfonos movil, Azumi.


Estamos dedicando todos nuestros esfuerzos para entregarte sólo lo mejor, y siempre estamos buscando gente motivada. Es por esto que te queremos a TÍ dentro de este viaje.


DESPACHO/ ENVÍO



RIESGOS Y DESAFÍOS

Sabemos que la buena calidad cuesta, pero en nuestros pilares esta entregarte una bicicleta de la mejor calidad. Es por esto que viajaremos a Shenzhen, China, para asegurarnos de que los mejores materiales están siendo utilizados en tu YERKA.

El desarrollo de la tecnología Bluetooth, para desbloquear el seguro de la YERKA®, no es sencillo de desarrollar, es por esto que estamos trabajando con un experto con años de prueba y error en la materia.

Somos un equipo motivado que ha decidido tomar este desafío y entregar lo mejor de sí!



PREGUNTAS FRECUENTES


¿Cómo puedo pagar mi YERKA®?

Puedes usar tu tarjeta de crédito. Aquí hay un link con mayor información, pero recuerda que actualmente no estamos aceptando PayPal. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...


¿Cómo funciona el cupón de USD $99?

Al comprar el cupón estás reservando el precio promocional de USD $499 para cuando saquemos el producto físico a la venta. Es decir, solo pagarás USD $400 por tu YERKA®, una fracción del precio final.


¿Es compatible con canastos o parrillas??

Tu YERKA® trae las monturas para estos accesorios, por lo que es completamente compatible con cualquiera de estos accesorios que elijas ponerle por tu cuenta.


¿Los ladrones pueden robar las ruedas?

¡Lo tenemos solucionado! Hemos diseñado un sistema especial de tuercas de seguridad para proteger las ruedas. La única forma de sacarlas es con una llave especial que solo tú tienes. De esta forma tu bicicleta está completamente segura.


¿Qué ocurre si corto el tubo del asiento y lo reemplazo por otro?

Nuestro mecanismo funciona de forma tal que si alguien corta el tubo del asiento, toda la bicicleta no encajaría en su forma original. Haciendo esto deja a la bicicleta obsoleta, por lo que reemplazar el asiento por otro no serviría de nada.


¿La única forma de asegurar el mecanismo es usando la llave o hay alguna otra manera de hacerlo?

En un comienzo y para los modelos más básicos será la única forma. Actualmente estamos trabajando en un mecanismo de seguridad operado por Bluetooth, lo que deja las llaves en el pasado y maximiza la comodidad al andar en bicicleta.


¿Qué sucede si quiero cambiar alguna parte de mi YERKA®?

Muy fácil, es como cualquier otra bicicleta. Si quieres reemplazar cualquier parte de tu YERKA® como ruedas, frenos, pedales, etc… siéntete libre de hacerlo. Puedes comprar cualquier accesorio del mercado para modificar tu bicicleta del modo que más te guste.


¿A qué lugares puedo asegurar mi YERKA®?

Puedes asegurarla a cualquier tipo de postes, rejas, bicicleteros tradicionales o de U invertida, etc, de hasta 20.3 cm (8 pulgadas). Sé creativo, estos son solo ejemplos. Hay muchos otros lugares en donde la puedes asegurar. ¿Te animas a contarnos cuál es tu lugar favorito?


¿Estará disponible en distintos tamaños?

Por supuesto que lo estará! Los tamaños disponibles son Small, Medium, Large y EXtra Large. Todos estarán disponibles para que los elijas al término de la campaña.


¿Cuánto será el costo de envío?

Si estás en Chile o Estados Unidos no habrá costo de envío. El costo de envío a otros lugares será informado al término de la campaña, pero no será mayor a USD $150 . Actualizaremos la información relacionada al costo de envío al término de la campaña, sin embargo este será el límite. Mientras más vendamos menor será el costo de envío. No hay necesidad de pagar ahora por este costo. Vamos a actualizar esta información con estimaciones más precisas basadas en volumen. Te enviaremos un recordatorio sobre el costo de envío antes de que termine la campaña, en donde pondremos a tu disposición la opción de pagar este costo.


¿Cómo puedo escoger el color de la YERKA®?

A través de tu voto puedes hacer que el color que escogiste esté disponible. Al final de la campaña te contactaremos por email para preguntarte en qué color y tamaño deseas tu YERKA®.


¿De qué material está hecha? ¿Es pesada?

Todo el marco de la YERKA® está hecho de acero reforzado, y el sistema de bloqueo está hecho del aluminio de la mejor calidad. El peso de la YERKA® es de aproximadamente 11.5 Kg (25 libras), lo que la hace más liviana que una bicicleta tradicional de piñón fijo con un seguro resistente.


¿Es la YERKA® compatible con velocidades?

¡Es compatible! Si compras solo el marco YERKA® tienes la posibilidad de usar los engranajes que quieras. Utilizando una masa con cambio interno.


¿Puedo usarla en la montaña?

Desafortunadamente aún no hemos desarrollado una YERKA® para montañas, pero estamos trabajando en eso!. Por el momento puedes usarla para tus viajes diarios, paseos, o andar en la ciudad.


¿Por qué la llaman “imposible de robar”?

Al usar el marco como seguro, romper el seguro implica romper la estructura de la bicicleta. Incluso el más inepto de los ladrones puede darse cuenta que no es una buena idea robarla. Al romper el seguro rompes la bicicleta, haciéndola imposible de usar. Si el ladrón llegara a romper el poste, reja o bicicletero al cual estaba asegurada tu bicicleta, no será posible que el ladrón la pueda usar ya que el marco sigue en su posición de seguro. Por eso la llamamos “imposible de robar”.


¿Es posible desmontar el sistema?

Sí y no. Para desarmar los pivotes necesitas una herramienta especial para sacar el perno de seguridad cruzado, herramienta que solo nosotros tenemos. Sin la herramienta tendrías que romper el marco, lo que llevaría a tener una bicicleta inservible.


¿Cómo están construidas las YERKA®?

Las YERKA® están construidas usando casi en su totalidad partes existentes, lo que disminuye los costos pero no la calidad. El mecanismo de seguridad está hecho con los mejores materiales posibles para asegurar la calidad y la vida útil.


¿Cómo funciona la conexión bluetooth?

Conectando tu smartphone (iOS o Android) a tu YERKA® y descargando la aplicación estás listo para usar el bluetooth! Es compatible cualquier dispositivo con Bluetooth 4.0 o mayor.


¿Hay algún distribuidor de YERKA®autorizado?

Habrá eventualmente, y esperamos que sean muchos. Por mientras, si tienes preguntas puedes contactarnos en info@yerkaproject.com

Not only can you relax knowing your bike is secure, the quality and design of YERKA are unmatched.

     1.Safety

Enjoy the Outdoors On a Comfortable Ride, Worry Free


WHAT THE PRESS IS SAYING




















WHAT MAKES YERKA DIFFERENT

The main goal of this project was to produce the most secure bicycle system ever created without affecting the integrity of the frame itself. We realized that performance and comfort can be achieved together which is why the beauty of Yerka’s design is in its simplicity. By thinking out of the box we came up with a concept that merges everything into one sleek design. And we couldn’t be more excited!





1. SAFETY








YERKA LOCKING TECHNOLOGY



The Yerka Locking Technology features (same as Kryptonite locks): 

12mm hardened steel shackle resist hand tools
Reinforced collar over keyway for increased protection
High security disc-style cylinder


Yerka Anti-Theft Nut


With special anti-theft nuts on the wheels, that only you have the special key for them, so no one can take them but you. Now you can park your bike anywhere comfortably knowing all its parts will be waiting for you right where you left them.





BLUETOOTH: A KEYLESS FUTURE







Now you can leave it parked outside and still find it where you left it!









2. DESIGN

The YERKA design can be applied to any classical frame shape. Unlike foldable or rental bikes, YERKA has a sleek design. The lock is so seamless and integrated we’ll bet no one can tell the difference between YERKA and a classical bike! 












3. EASE OF USE/COMFORT



Securing your YERKA can be as fast as tying your shoelaces! Just 10 seconds and you are good to go!










PERKS





Update: All perks are sold out, but you can still donate and help us make our dream come true!
This campaign is aimed to give you the most secure bike ever, and also to give you some great perks! If you believe in our project, you can donate more than the perk itself. For example: USD $50 for an Eba Bike designed T-Shirt, or USD $350 for the frame alone. It is not an obligation by any means, but it will be highly appreciated and will also help lower shipping costs.






* You can choose your size/ color for the YERKA Bike, YERKA Frame and T-Shirt when the campaign ends. We will contact you vía e-mail. 

** The Yerka Frame includes Fork + Seat Post + Yerka Anti-Theft Nuts. Does not include a Seat.  







Coupons: Don’t have the money? Don´t worry!

We know that USD $449 may be a lot to spend at once, so for just USD $99 we will grant you a USD $499 price even for when the campaign is over. Just pay the remaining USD $400 balance in advance of delivery to get your Yerka (you can pay this remaining till end September and get it by November 2015) . The estimated market retail price is USD $600+.

Reflective T-Shirts 







Bike Specs







ROADMAP

Finding a great manufacturer is hard, and we don’t want to trade quality for quick and cheap production. Thinking towards quality, for every 1000 YERKA units sold, we will deliver them in batches with a month of separation, the first one starts shipping in October.


WHY WE NEED YOU
We have come to Indiegogo to share our project with all of you, our incredible community of bicycle supporters. You deserve a better locking mechanism to secure your bike when you’re not around to watch it We want you to feel and be safe. We also want to hear and learn from you--your suggestions and feedback will not only help us improve our project, but will also be implemented into our rewards and further bicycle designs. We know this is an ambitious project, but we are certain that with your help YERKA will become a worldwide reality.





A GREAT TEAM

Most people learn to walk before they run... we learned to ride before we walked! We have a deep love for the cycling, and we also know what it feels like to lose a bike to theft. We are three engineering students who had enough of getting our bicycles stolen and wanted to create a solution. 




For us, Indiegogo is not just a way to get this thrilling project to you, it is a way to hear from and learn from you. With your help and support we know we can get this to the whole world.

As Engineering students we acquired all of the skills and knowledge necessary to bring this project to life.
From a young age our whole team always had great interests in robotics, design, and technology; always creating and testing and finding solutions--constantly wanting to do more. All of this prepared us for the complicated task at hand which required advanced knowledge of sophisticated laser cutting and lathe machines, 3D Printers, metal work, and welding.
Our hard work and life-long passion, along with the collaboration with accelerator institutes (Garage UAI, CHRYSALIS) paid off; we won the PRECITYE contest (Regional Entrepreneurship and Innovation Programme in Engineering), an OTT contest (Technology Transfer Office) at our University (UAI), and were finalists in the last Junior World Entrepreneurship Forum hosted in Santiago, Chile. Today, we are very proud to have won a Chilean Seed Capital from (CORFO) 
We’ve since added on to our team and are working with the most accomplished experts out there, like Mikaela, one of the finest 3D Designers in the world; and Cristián Haquin, a serial entrepreneur, bluetooth developing expert, excellent solution provider, and Co- Founder of Azumi Mobile Phone Company.

We are dedicating all our efforts to give you nothing but the best, and are always looking for more motivated people to be part of The Team. Today, we want YOU to join us in this journey.





SHIPPING






RISK & CHALLENGES
We know great quality is hard to find, and with this project we cannot afford having bad quality components. That’s why we are traveling to Shenzhen, China, to ensure only the best materials are being used in our bikes. Developing the awesome bluetooth technology to unlock the YERKA is not easy, that’s why we are working with an expert in the subject, who also is an entrepreneur. 
We are a motivated team who has decided to take this challenge and give you only our best!





FAQ

How can I pay for my YERKA®?
You can use your credit card. Here is a link with further information, but remember, we are currently not accepting paypal. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

How does the USD $99 coupon works?
By reserving now at just USD $99 we will grant you a point price at USD $499. Pay the remaining USD $400 balance in advance of delivery. 


Will my YERKA® be compatible with grills and baskets?
Of course it will! The YERKA® has the mounts to them, so feel free to add them on your own.


Can the wheels be taken away by thieves?
We got that cover! We have designed a special nut security system to protect the wheels. The only way to get them out is with a special key, which only you have. This way, your whole bike is secured.

What if I cut the seat tube and replace it with another?
Our mechanism works in such way that if someone were to cut the tube, the whole bicycle wouldn’t close to it’s original shape. Doing this renders the bike useless, so replacing the broken seat tube for another wouldn’t solve anything.

Is there another way to secure the mechanism or a key is the only way?
In the beginning and for the most basic models, yes. Although, we are working in a bluetooth locking mechanism, leaving the key in the past and maximising your comfort while riding. 

What happens if I want to change any part of my YERKA?
Easy, it’s just like any other bike. If you want to replace any component of your YERKA, like wheels, brakes, pedals, etc… feel free to do it. You can buy any aftermarket products to easily modify it for best suiting you.

To which places can I secure my YERKA?
You can secure it to any kind of poles, fences, traditional or inverted U bike racks, etc, up to 20,3 cm (8 inches). Get creative, this are only suggestions, there are many other places where you can secure it and we encourage you to tell us about your favourite. 

Will it be available in different sizes?
Of course it will! Sizes available are Small, Medium, Large and X-Large, all of them available to pick at the end of the campaign.

How much will the shipping cost?
If you are within the USA or Chile your YERKA will arrive with no extra charges! If you are outside, the shipping cost will no more than USD $150. We will update shipping information at the end of the campaign, however – with the USD $150 – it’s a cap. The more we sell the lower this figure will become, it will not go up. There is no need to pay for shipping now, we will update you on this with more accurate estimates based on volume. We'll send you a reminder about shipping cost before the end of the campaign, at which point we'll present you with an option to pay the cost.

How do I choose the color of the YERKA®?
By voting on your favourite color you can make it available for choosing. At the end of the campaign we will contact you by mail and ask you to pick your desired color and size of your YERKA.

What material is it made of? Is it heavy?
The whole frame of the YERKA is made out of steel, and the whole system is made of the best quality hardened aluminium. The YERKA weights 11,5 kilos (25 pounds), making it lighter than a traditional fixie bike with a strong lock.

Is the YERKA® compatible with gears?
Yes it is! With the option of buying only the YERKA frame, we’re giving you the possibility to use the gears you like using a mass with internal gears. 

Can I use it on the mountains?
Sadly we haven’t developed a YERKA mountain bike… yet. For now you can comfortably use it as a bike for your daily commute, friendly trips, or riding the city. 

Why do you call it ‘unstealable’?
By using the frame as the lock, breaking the lock implies breaking the structure of the bike. Even a dumb thief can reckon that it is not a good idea. By breaking the lock you break the bike, making it no longer a bicycle. If by any chance the thief breaks the pole, fence, or bike rack your YERKA was secured to, he won’t be able to ride it. The frame is still in its locking position, which makes it impossible to ride.That’s why we call it ‘unstealable’.

Is the system by any chance demountable?
Yes and no. To detach the pivots you need a special tool to take the crossed security screw out, a tool owned by us. Without the tool you would have to cut the frame and we’re back to having a useless bicycle. 

How is the YERKA® built?
The YERKA is manufactured using almost all existing parts, lowering the cost but not the quality. The locking mechanism is made using the best materials possible to ensure the quality and lifespan. 

How does the bluetooth connection work?
By connecting your smartphone (iOS or Android) to the YERKA® and downloading the app you are good to go! Any device with Bluetooth 4.0 or above is compatible.

Is there any YERKA® authorised dealer?
Eventually there will be, and we hope many. In the meantime for any inquiry you can contact us at info@yerkaproject.com






Español


ENVÍO GRATIS a USA & Chile





Introduciendo un sistema de bloqueo de bicicletas diseñado para mantenerte seguro. 
Volvimos a los inicios de la seguridad y cambiamos un paradigma: “Hicimos un candado utilizando la bicicleta”. De este modo un ladrón tendría que cortar la estructura principal para llevarse la bicicleta, lo que la dejaría inutilizable. Ahora puedes relajarte sabiendo que tu bicicleta está segura, y que además cuenta con un diseño y calidad inigualables.



Disfruta Del Aire Libre Con Un Andar Cómodo y sin Preocupaciones 




PRENSA










LO QUE DIFERENCIA A YERKA®
El objetivo de este proyecto es producir el mejor sistema de seguridad para bicicletas. Nos dimos cuenta que desempeño y comodidad pueden ser logrados juntos, y es en esto que radica la belleza del diseño de YERKA®, en su simplicidad. Pensando fuera de la caja, logramos un concepto que combina todo dentro de un diseño sobrio. No podríamos estar más emocionados!






1. SEGURIDAD



TECNOLOGÍA YERKA








TUERCAS DE SEGURIDAD ANTI- ROBO




BLUETOOTH: UN FUTURO SIN LLAVES



Ahora puedes asegurarla en cualquier lugar, y estar seguro de encontrarla donde la dejaste!



2. DISEÑO








Con increíbles colores, un bloqueo de aluminio fundido, y un hermoso sillín grabado, esto es realmente lo mejor que podrías pedir.





3. USABILIDAD/COMODIDAD




Asegurar tu YERKA® puede ser tan rápido como atar tus cordones! Sólamente 10 segundos y estás listo!





RECOMPENSAS
Actualización: Todas las recompensas se han agotado, pero aún aceptamos donaciones!
Esta campaña está enfocada en darte la bicicleta más segura, y además para darte increíbles recompensas! En esta ocasión serás nuestro inversionista, y puedes aportar más que valor de una recompensa si así lo deseas. Por ejemplo: USD $50 por una hermosa Polera Eba Bike con estampas reflectantes, o USD $350 por el cuadro solo. Por ningún motivo es una obligación, pero si lo haces será enormemente apreciado, y además ayudará a bajar los costos de envío.




Contribuir con una recompensa


* Al final de la campaña te contactaremos para la elección de tallas/colores de la bicicleta Yerka, cuadro Yerka y poleras.


** El cuadro Yerka incluye Horquilla + Tuercas Anti-Robo + Tubo de Sillín. No incluye Sillín. 



No tienes el dinero aún? No te preocupes!


Por tan sólo USD $99 dólares puedes reservar tu YERKA a un precio de USD $429 incluso cuando la campaña finalice. Pagas luego los USD $400 restantes antes del envío (puedes pagar la diferencia hasta finales de septiembre y recibir tu YERKA en noviembre 2015). El precio estimado de mercado de una YERKA será de USD $600 o más.



Polera Reflectante









ESPECIFICACIONES DE LA BICICLETA





LÍNEA DE TIEMPO

Encontrar un gran proveedor es difícil, y no estamos dispuestos a cambiar la calidad por una rápida entrega. Pensando siempre en la calidad, por cada 1000 unidades vendidas de YERKA®, estas serán entregadas en distintos lotes con separación de un mes, empezando el primero en Octubre.


POR QUÉ TE NECESITAMOS

Hemos llegado a Indiegogo para compartir nuestro proyecto con todos ustedes, con este increíble grupo de amantes de la bicicleta y que merecen un mejor sistema para asegurar sus bicicletas al dejarlas estacionadas. Queremos que te sientas y estés seguro, pero también queremos escucharte. Tu ayuda y comentarios no sólo ayudarán a mejorar este proyecto, también tus sugerencias serán incorporadas dentro de nuestras recompensas y futuras bicicletas. Sabemos que es un proyecto ambicioso, pero estamos seguros que con tu ayuda, esto se puede volver una realidad mundial.


UN GRAN EQUIPO


Dicen que algunos corren antes de aprender a caminar… nosotros aprendimos a pedalear antes de caminar! Tenemos un profundo amor por las bicicletas, y al igual que tú, sabemos lo que se siente perder una en manos de un ladrón. Somos tres estudiantes de Ingeniería hartos de que nos roben nuestras bicicletas.




La bicicleta es más que simplemente un cuadro, las ruedas y la cadena. La bicicleta es nuestra forma de movernos, de expresarnos. Andar en bicicleta es una experiencia… y creemos que no hay mejor manera de asegurarla que con nuestro innovador diseño. Desarrollar YERKA® ha sido un trabajo de pasión. Para nosotros, Indiegogo no es solamente un medio para mostrarles este emocionante proyecto, es una forma de escucharlos y aprender de ustedes. Estamos seguros que con su apoyo podemos hacer llegar esto al mundo entero.


Como estudiantes de Ingeniería, hemos adquirido habilidades y conocimientos importantes para llevar a cabo este proyecto. Desde pequeños siempre estuvimos interesados en la robótica, el diseño y en siempre querer hacer más. Todo esto ayudó a que hoy pudiésemos usar increíbles herramientas como cortadoras laser, impresoras 3D, tornos para mecanizado de piezas e incluso soldar.
Ganamos el concurso de PRECITYE (Programa Regional de Emprendedorismo e Innovación en Ingeniería), además un concurso de la OTT (Oficina de Transferencia Tecnológica) de nuestra Universidad, y fuimos finalistas en el JWEF (Foro Mundial del Emprendimiento Juvenil) realizado en Santiago de Chile.  Y ahora estamos muy orgullosos de haber ganado un capital semilla de CORFO.
Para potenciar aún más nuestro equipo estamos trabajando con distintos profesionales dando el máximo en sus áreas, como Mikaela, una de las mejores diseñadoras 3D; Cristián Haquin, emprendedor serial, experto desarrollador en bluetooth, y Co- Fundador de la compañía de teléfonos movil, Azumi.
Estamos dedicando todos nuestros esfuerzos para entregarte sólo lo mejor, y siempre estamos buscando gente motivada. Es por esto que te queremos a TÍ dentro de este viaje.

DESPACHO/ ENVÍO








RIESGOS Y DESAFÍOS

Sabemos que la buena calidad cuesta, pero en nuestros pilares esta entregarte una bicicleta de la mejor calidad. Es por esto que viajaremos a Shenzhen, China, para asegurarnos de que los mejores materiales están siendo utilizados en tu YERKA.
El desarrollo de la tecnología Bluetooth, para desbloquear el seguro de la YERKA®, no es sencillo de desarrollar, es por esto que estamos trabajando con un experto con años de prueba y error en la materia.
Somos un equipo motivado que ha decidido tomar este desafío y entregar lo mejor de sí!


PREGUNTAS FRECUENTES
¿Cómo puedo pagar mi YERKA®?
Puedes usar tu tarjeta de crédito. Aquí hay un link con mayor información, pero recuerda que actualmente no estamos aceptando PayPal. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

¿Cómo funciona el cupón de USD $99?
Al comprar el cupón estás reservando el precio promocional de USD $499 para cuando saquemos el producto físico a la venta. Es decir, solo pagarás USD $400 por tu YERKA®, una fracción del precio final.


¿Es compatible con canastos o parrillas??
Tu YERKA® trae las monturas para estos accesorios, por lo que es completamente compatible con cualquiera de estos accesorios que elijas ponerle por tu cuenta.

¿Los ladrones pueden robar las ruedas?
¡Lo tenemos solucionado! Hemos diseñado un sistema especial de tuercas de seguridad para proteger las ruedas. La única forma de sacarlas es con una llave especial que solo tú tienes. De esta forma tu bicicleta está completamente segura.

¿Qué ocurre si corto el tubo del asiento y lo reemplazo por otro?
Nuestro mecanismo funciona de forma tal que si alguien corta el tubo del asiento, toda la bicicleta no encajaría en su forma original. Haciendo esto deja a la bicicleta obsoleta, por lo que reemplazar el asiento por otro no serviría de nada.

¿La única forma de asegurar el mecanismo es usando la llave o hay alguna otra manera de hacerlo?
En un comienzo y para los modelos más básicos será la única forma. Actualmente estamos trabajando en un mecanismo de seguridad operado por Bluetooth, lo que deja las llaves en el pasado y maximiza la comodidad al andar en bicicleta.

¿Qué sucede si quiero cambiar alguna parte de mi YERKA®?
Muy fácil, es como cualquier otra bicicleta. Si quieres reemplazar cualquier parte de tu YERKA® como ruedas, frenos, pedales, etc… siéntete libre de hacerlo. Puedes comprar cualquier accesorio del mercado para modificar tu bicicleta del modo que más te guste.

¿A qué lugares puedo asegurar mi YERKA®?
Puedes asegurarla a cualquier tipo de postes, rejas, bicicleteros tradicionales o de U invertida, etc, de hasta 20.3 cm (8 pulgadas). Sé creativo, estos son solo ejemplos. Hay muchos otros lugares en donde la puedes asegurar. ¿Te animas a contarnos cuál es tu lugar favorito?

¿Estará disponible en distintos tamaños?
Por supuesto que lo estará! Los tamaños disponibles son Small, Medium, Large y EXtra Large. Todos estarán disponibles para que los elijas al término de la campaña.

¿Cuánto será el costo de envío?
Si estás en Chile o Estados Unidos no habrá costo de envío. El costo de envío a otros lugares será informado al término de la campaña, pero no será mayor a USD $150 . Actualizaremos la información relacionada al costo de envío al término de la campaña, sin embargo este será el límite. Mientras más vendamos menor será el costo de envío. No hay necesidad de pagar ahora por este costo. Vamos a actualizar esta información con estimaciones más precisas basadas en volumen. Te enviaremos un recordatorio sobre el costo de envío antes de que termine la campaña, en donde pondremos a tu disposición la opción de pagar este costo.

¿Cómo puedo escoger el color de la YERKA®?
A través de tu voto puedes hacer que el color que escogiste esté disponible. Al final de la campaña te contactaremos por email para preguntarte en qué color y tamaño deseas tu YERKA®.

¿De qué material está hecha? ¿Es pesada?
Todo el marco de la YERKA® está hecho de acero reforzado, y el sistema de bloqueo está hecho del aluminio de la mejor calidad. El peso de la YERKA® es de aproximadamente 11.5 Kg (25 libras), lo que la hace más liviana que una bicicleta tradicional de piñón fijo con un seguro resistente.

¿Es la YERKA® compatible con velocidades?
¡Es compatible! Si compras solo el marco YERKA® tienes la posibilidad de usar los engranajes que quieras. Utilizando una masa con cambio interno.

¿Puedo usarla en la montaña?
Desafortunadamente aún no hemos desarrollado una YERKA® para montañas, pero estamos trabajando en eso!. Por el momento puedes usarla para tus viajes diarios, paseos, o andar en la ciudad.

¿Por qué la llaman “imposible de robar”?
Al usar el marco como seguro, romper el seguro implica romper la estructura de la bicicleta. Incluso el más inepto de los ladrones puede darse cuenta que no es una buena idea robarla. Al romper el seguro rompes la bicicleta, haciéndola imposible de usar. Si el ladrón llegara a romper el poste, reja o bicicletero al cual estaba asegurada tu bicicleta, no será posible que el ladrón la pueda usar ya que el marco sigue en su posición de seguro. Por eso la llamamos “imposible de robar”.

¿Es posible desmontar el sistema?
Sí y no. Para desarmar los pivotes necesitas una herramienta especial para sacar el perno de seguridad cruzado, herramienta que solo nosotros tenemos. Sin la herramienta tendrías que romper el marco, lo que llevaría a tener una bicicleta inservible.

¿Cómo están construidas las YERKA®?
Las YERKA® están construidas usando casi en su totalidad partes existentes, lo que disminuye los costos pero no la calidad. El mecanismo de seguridad está hecho con los mejores materiales posibles para asegurar la calidad y la vida útil.

¿Cómo funciona la conexión bluetooth?
Conectando tu smartphone (iOS o Android) a tu YERKA® y descargando la aplicación estás listo para usar el bluetooth! Es compatible cualquier dispositivo con Bluetooth 4.0 o mayor.

¿Hay algún distribuidor de YERKA®autorizado?
Habrá eventualmente, y esperamos que sean muchos. Por mientras, si tienes preguntas puedes contactarnos en info@yerkaproject.com

story:
UPDATE: US Patent Granted Sept. 20, 2016

US Patent Number: D767,043

All Orders Shipping Now!

You missed the campaign, but you can still order here on Indiegogo!

Our initial funding goal was met in the first 6 days of our campaign and we closed at 263% funded. Indiegogo put us on the IN-DEMAND program so you can still get one now!

 

The Coolest Drone is Really, Really, Small.

Aerix Drones™ of Rochester, NY (a division of Morrison Innovations) is proud to introduce the Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners, featuring a bevy of technical and design improvements over the original CX-10 series quadcopters, including:

  • Built-in side and top impact guards to help prevent blade damage
  • Landing Skids that help keep the rotors off the ground and carpet
  • 3-Speed calibration that provides smoother lift and maneuverability
  • Improved 6-Axis Stabilization for better hovering capability
  • Hard sided packaging that doubles as a protective storage and travel case
  • Easy to read and comprehend instruction manual (written in real English!)

We have designed the perfect learner drone that will save you thousands of dollars while you perfect the mechanics of quadcopter flight before moving onto larger, more expensive equipment.

Technology:

The built-in Aerix Nano Drone™ software is much more forgiving than a costly machine yet designed to function the same way, allowing you to master the basic techniques on a smaller, safer scale.

With the 6-Axis stabilization, you can hover easily and not have to worry about over compensating all of the time (that means no more “pogo-sticking” with your quadcopter too).

The 3-Speed Calibration allows us to create a phase for each learning process: 

 

  1. The low-speed is designed to practice lifting off, trim, hovering and landing.
  2. The mid-speed is designed to practice rotation and directional movement.
  3. The hi-speed is designed for full flight functionality, including 4-direction flips.

Protection:

One of the main features that makes the Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners better than the competition is the use of built-in flight protection, making it the most beginner-friendly Nano Drone on the market.

Blade Guards:

The Aerix Nano Drone™ features a patented blade guard design that allows for gentle mistakes to be made against the ceiling and even walls without causing much damage or loss of flight time.
 

 

We found that a crash with other small quadcopters could scatter all four blades across the room. 

While, it was preferable that the blades popped off to prevent permanent breakage, it made sense to avoid that issue in the first place…hence the collision guard that limits having to re-install the blades. 

Landing Skids:

The patented design also includes removable landing skids which keep the motors off of the surface below.

The landing skids help to prevent the Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners from becoming tangled in carpet, pet hair or other debris found on the floor or ground, which would damage the blades and motor.

Ready to Fly:

Each Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners comes fully assembled and ready to fly after a short 15-20 minute USB charge and adding the required (but not included) 2-AAA batteries to the remote control.
 

Each Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners comes with the Drone itself, a 2.4gHz remote controller, a USB charging cable and one spare set of blades.

Color Options:

 

Tech Specs:

 

Convenience:

The previous packaging as well as most drone packaging is simple, yet disposable. 

No one wants to store the charging cable and extra blades in a ziploc bag…it was a simple “A-ha” moment when our customer feedback dictated that we upgrade the packaging to be reusable and recyclable. 

Now the packaging even doubles as a permanent storage or carrying case!

Instructions (RTFM?):

While you can fly from the get-go, some of us (*cough* ) might be better off reading the manual at least once to answer any questions. The instructions are clear and much easier to follow. 

Yeah, we might have dropped the ball on this one before, but you reminded us that sometimes simpler is better when it comes to teaching first time flyers how to control their drones.

Long Term:

By backing our flagship design you will be contributing to the growth of our small business, helping us create new jobs in Rochester, NY and getting a front row seat to all of our newest designs before they even launch!

We hope you will back us and join our journey into the world of quadcopters.

What We Needed:

We needed a total of $15,246 for final tooling, packaging, production costs and quality testing to complete our first run of Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners and fulfill backer perks...we met that goal in less than a week thanks to our amazing network of backers.

All Orders Shipping Now!
You missed the campaign, but you can still order here on Indiegogo!
Our initial funding goal was met in the first 6 days of our campaign and we closed at 263% funded. Indiegogo put us on the IN-DEMAND program so you can still get one now! The Coolest Drone is Really, Really, Small.

Built-in side and top impact guards to help prevent blade damage

Landing Skids that help keep the rotors off the ground and carpet

3-Speed calibration that provides smoother lift and maneuverability

Improved 6-Axis Stabilization for better hovering capability

Hard sided packaging that doubles as a protective storage and travel case
Easy to read and comprehend instruction manual (written in real English!)

We have designed the perfect learner drone that will save you thousands of dollars while you perfect the mechanics of quadcopter flight before moving onto larger, more expensive equipment.

Technology:

The built-in Aerix Nano Drone™ software is much more forgiving than a costly machine yet designed to function the same way, allowing you to master the basic techniques on a smaller, safer scale.
With the 6-Axis stabilization, you can hover easily and not have to worry about over compensating all of the time (that means no more “pogo-sticking” with your quadcopter too).
The 3-Speed Calibration allows us to create a phase for each learning process: 
 

The low-speed is designed to practice lifting off, trim, hovering and landing.
The mid-speed is designed to practice rotation and directional movement.
The hi-speed is designed for full flight functionality, including 4-direction flips.

Protection:
One of the main features that makes the Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners better than the competition is the use of built-in flight protection, making it the most beginner-friendly Nano Drone on the market.
Blade Guards:
The Aerix Nano Drone™ features a patented blade guard design that allows for gentle mistakes to be made against the ceiling and even walls without causing much damage or loss of flight time.
 

 
We found that a crash with other small quadcopters could scatter all four blades across the room. 
While, it was preferable that the blades popped off to prevent permanent breakage, it made sense to avoid that issue in the first place…hence the collision guard that limits having to re-install the blades. 
Landing Skids:
The patented design also includes removable landing skids which keep the motors off of the surface below.

The landing skids help to prevent the Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners from becoming tangled in carpet, pet hair or other debris found on the floor or ground, which would damage the blades and motor.
Ready to Fly:
Each Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners comes fully assembled and ready to fly after a short 15-20 minute USB charge and adding the required (but not included) 2-AAA batteries to the remote control.
 

Each Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners comes with the Drone itself, a 2.4gHz remote controller, a USB charging cable and one spare set of blades.
Color Options:





 
Tech Specs:
 

Convenience:
The previous packaging as well as most drone packaging is simple, yet disposable. 
No one wants to store the charging cable and extra blades in a ziploc bag…it was a simple “A-ha” moment when our customer feedback dictated that we upgrade the packaging to be reusable and recyclable. 

Now the packaging even doubles as a permanent storage or carrying case!
Instructions (RTFM?):
While you can fly from the get-go, some of us (*cough* ) might be better off reading the manual at least once to answer any questions. The instructions are clear and much easier to follow. 
Yeah, we might have dropped the ball on this one before, but you reminded us that sometimes simpler is better when it comes to teaching first time flyers how to control their drones.
Long Term:
By backing our flagship design you will be contributing to the growth of our small business, helping us create new jobs in Rochester, NY and getting a front row seat to all of our newest designs before they even launch!
We hope you will back us and join our journey into the world of quadcopters.

What We Needed:
We needed a total of $15,246 for final tooling, packaging, production costs and quality testing to complete our first run of Aerix Nano Drone for Beginners and fulfill backer perks...we met that goal in less than a week thanks to our amazing network of backers.

story:
Less expensive than integrated helmets, the Argon Transform lets you make any motorcycle helmet smarter. Designed specifically to limit distraction, every detail is designed to keep your eyes on the road with all the essential features including:

  • AR Heads Up Display
  • Front/Rear Camera
  • One-Tap Answer/Reject/Hang-Up Calls
  • Video/Picture Capture
  • Dual  Mode GPS (Simplified and Full Map)
  • Select From A Playlist And Listen to Music
  • MESH Intercom Technology
  • and more....

 

The Argon Transform features an intuitive design and is packed with all the essential functions you need to keep in control of how connected you are, even when you’re on the open road. Toggle back and forth between video and photo capture and answer, reject, or hang up on calls hands-free. You can also keep an eye on the road behind you, as well, with the rearview camera for added safety so you can react if danger appears from behind. 

 

All the features you need at the price you want.

 

 

It would cost almost $1000

to get all the devices that make up 

just one Argon Transform.

 

 

 

- Daily Hunt

 

The Argon Transform doesn't just make you like Ironman, it gives you the focus you need to stay safer on the road. Designed specifically to help you have access to everything you need without being a distraction, the Heads-Up AR display is transparent enough that you can see the road through it and the brightness is adjustable for day or night.

The added security of the near 180-degree rear camera keeps you informed on what's going on around you so you can see danger coming even from behind. All it takes is one tap to answer/hang-up calls and you can listen to music, follow a GPS navigation, and more, without taking your eyes off the road ahead.

 

 

This is the Future!

 

Argon Transform combines a see-through AR heads-up display with a Bluetooth handlebar controller, allowing riders a safe way to access GPS, music, calls, and more.

 

Using 3-way wireless control, Argon Transform connects to your mobile phone and the handlebar controller using Bluetooth for smoother data transfer. You can also connect using WIFI when you need to download software updates, offline maps, or anything else you may need before you hit the road. 

 

The Argon Transform is durable under rugged environmental conditions and features a streamlined design to optimize helmet weight balance and airflow to keep your ride as smooth as possible

 

The Augmented Reality (AR) high-definition, translucent display also features brightness control so you can use it at any time of day. No need to take your eyes off the road and risk your safety by glancing at your phone. Get quick, vital information at a glance, including: 

  • Caller ID 
  • View Music Titles
  • GPS With Arrows
  • Speedometer
  • Rear-View Blind Spot Camera Feed
  • Digital Clock

 

Wireless and hassle-free you can safely use the handlebar controller while riding. Easy to install, use in conjunction with the AR display for another way for quick, one-touch access to image capture, start/stop front dash cam recording, music controls, GPS full or simplified maps view (turn by turn navigation), rear-view camera feed, or accept and reject calls.

 

Eliminate blindspots and see danger before it reaches you.  A rear-view feed with a near 180-degree field of view streams directly to the AR HUD display, giving you a full picture of what’s going on around you.

 

No need to install an unsightly Go-Pro or complicated in-vehicle cameras without easy access to your footage. Argon Transform has a front dashcam with loop recording at 720p, 30FPS, and image capture at 1080p. Media is then stored on an expandable micro SD card which may be accessed directly using the Argon mobile app. It’s right where you need when you need it in high-definition. Capture all your rides for safety or just to record your latest adventure for posterity.

 

Keep in close contact on the road with other riders using a private and seamless intercom communication channel for riders up to distances of 100 meters apart. Chat when riding with your buddy so you know what the next exit is, important information about your journey, or just shoot the breeze and share the experience.

 

Noise-canceling speakers and microphone fitted into the helmet and connected to the back attachment for music, calls, and audio navigation cues.

 

Get where you need to go whether you have access to data or not. The built-in GPS does not require data and operates even in remote areas where the cellular network is weak. Explore scenic mountains and long roads through sweeping desert landscapes without getting lost.

 

Access specific ride statistics, captured media, Argon settings, Argon social community, digital riding logbook (maintenance dates, spare part changes/cost, etc.), and more with the intuitive and easy-to-use app.

 

The built-in battery lasts up to 8 hours for longer, uninterrupted rides. When you’re out of juice, simply charge it with micro USB charging (USB charging cable included).

 

Argon transform features a compact, light design that’s easy to install or even transfer between helmets.

No screws or drilling required, so the integrity of your helmet isn’t compromised. Simply affix the unit using sticky mounts and install within minutes. 

Whyre is a technology start-up in the area of road safety intelligence with a mission to create safer road environments for all road users. Founded by 5 riding buddies and fueled by the passing of their mutual friends due to road traffic accidents. They set to create an all-in-one tech product to enhance the rider’s senses and provide more lifestyle features alongside safety applications. Giving rise to Argon Transform- The world’s first dual-camera Head-up Display helmet attachment made for motorcyclists

story:
Background


We are Bombaleo BV -  a young startup located in The Hague, founded by three students from The Hague University.

Besides our studies what we have in common is enthusiasm for self-balancing devices like the amazing Hoverboards.


Our idea and mission is as simple as it gets:

Bringing Hoverboards to a large audience – and that means creating an amazing offer in terms of price, quality, and service.

If You have already looked into some of the many offerings in the market You may have noticed TWO major problems:

First, prices are astronomic, or they are unrealistically small – both reason for concern!

Second, buying from Aliexpress has its advantages, but more often than not, it’s a gamble. Many times there are hidden fees to pay, or the product quality is simply inferior.

That's why we (Bombaleo B.V.) started STREETBLADE HOVERBOARDS:

Perks



Colors Available





Specifications



Warranty


12 months for the main vehicle, except the battery, tires and the plastic casing.

6 months for battery. 

1 month for inner and outer tires.


What We Need & What You Get


The goal of the campaign is bringing Hoverboards to a large audience!

The larger the order quantity the better the deal, therefore by reaching certain quantities additional benefits will be delivered to You!   


Order quantity reaches 50:   Protection Band with each Hoverboard.

Order quantity reaches 100:  Hoverboard Bag with each Hoverboard.

Order quantity reaches 150:  Surprise Gift with each Hoverboard.


Here is how it works:

Every backer makes a definite purchase of a Hoverboard at a fix price and fix delivery time window by making a pledge. Even if we just get one order, it will be shipped as promised.


All offers are only available in limited number!

Naturally, the biggest part of the funds (approximately 90% of each pledge) goes into buying and distributing the Hoverboards.



The Impact


How this campaign has a positive impact on You and the world?

Well, sometimes more is less – and even though we highly appreciate the many attempts of young entrepreneurs trying to change the world with a "smart" phone charger – our mission is much simpler.

It is about creating value in a fair way that benefits all parties involved.

We did not invent anything, we “just” did our homework: i.e found the best product in the market, and thought of the best way to bring it to You under the best conditions possible.

However, if you want to buy the coolest Christmas present ever AND make a positive impact, feel free to pick one of our charity perks. All donations are going 100% to the Dutch Red Cross - a competent and trustworthy organization.




Risks & Challenges


Risk and challenges for backers are minimized through this offer.

Quality management is done in close cooperation between us and the suppliers in Asia.

Each backer enjoys a full 12 month warranty on the device – the responsibility for that is contractually transferred to a Dutch B.V. and physically executed by one of the biggest bicycle store chains in the Netherlands.


Other Ways You Can Help After Placing A Pledge


Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign - remember, we all benefit!  Also, remember to use the Indiegogo.com share tools!

story:
INTRODUCING THE UPCART® CITY

UpCart® City simplifies daily tasks by reducing the effort of carrying items on stairs, over curbs and irregular terrain. Our unique multi-wheel design provides for smooth ride on any supporting surfaces and improves stability. Patented technology allows the UpCart City to fold completely flat for easy storage! Lightweight but strong, this folding cart can haul up to 77lbs just about anywhere. Save your back one stair at a time with the UpCart City! FEAR NO STAIR! 

 

 

HOW DOES THE UPCART® CITY WORK? 

By using a multi-wheel design, the UpCart® City is able to "walk" over obstacles such as sidewalk curbs, stairs and uneven surfaces. As any wheel encounters an obstacle, the other wheels rotate forward over the obstacle, while the stopped wheel continues to support the load. This approach has several distinct advantages over the traditional single-wheel approach:  

  • It is able to pivot to a different wheel and keep moving where a single wheel cart would get stuck.
  • UpCart City has two wheels on each side in contact with the ground (total of 4 wheels), with the load centered between them to improve stability and balance.
  • The multi-wheel design reduces the amount of effort required when moving up and down stairs and irregular terrain.
  • Tall handle (the tallest handle in its class) minimizes how far you bend your back and assures better posture when pulling a load on stairs. 

 

 

WHAT MAKES THE UPCART® CITY UNIQUE?

Our patented folding technology allows us to use a multi-wheel design yet still fold completely flat in seconds, with no disassembly required. Equally, UpCart® City unfolds in seconds fully assembled and ready to go. With the tallest handle in its class, the UpCart city minimizes bending and saves your back. The ability to use a multi-wheel design gives the cart extreme versatility. This isn't just a grocery getter, it's perfect for transporting boxes, laundry, potters, mulch, water softener, dog food, small furniture/appliances, you decide! UpCarts are Up For Anything!

WHAT PROBLEM DOES THE UPCART CITY SOLVE?

If you have ever struggled to get something heavy or bulky up and down the stairs, but don't have the space for a large dolly, UpCart® City is your solution. The UpCart City is the most compact and portable multipurpose cart. The UpCart City can go virtually anywhere while carrying all your gear, then folds completely flat in seconds to fit easily in your car, on public transportation or in a closet. It's more than just a stair climber, this one small folding cart can be used for multiple purposes all year round. Save your back one stair at a time!

 

HISTORY OF THE UPCART

We first tried to launch our company via crowdfunding campaign back in 2014. While our campaign did not fund, we found an angel investor and learned an amazing amount through the process. With the help of our angel investor, we brought our first product, the UpCart® Original, from idea to reality. Since then, we have successfully released the UpCart® Original and a number of additional products. And while we will always have a fond place in our hearts for the UpCart® Original, it is important to us that we listen to our customers.

UpCart® City is a result of feedback from our amazing customers. You spoke, we listened. The UpCart® City has many of the same great features as its bigger brother, but was designed to be the most compact and portable all-terrain stair climber. Weighing in at only 8 lbs, the UpCart® City is several inches narrower to make navigating tight spaces easier. However, the 14-inch platform is strong and can support up to 77lbs on stairs. The wheels are 100% behind the frame, allowing for better balancing of your cargo and for very wide objects (wider than the platform) to be placed on the cart.  

Our customers asked for a smaller, lighter, less expensive sibling to the UpCart® Original for lighter-duty daily use. We are extremely proud to be able to offer the UpCart® City.

TriFold was co-founded by two very unlikely business partners. Leonid Khodor, the inventor, is an engineer and patent agent who is a long-time friend of the family of Michael Reznik, a Management and Operational Excellence consultant. The two connected at Michael’s father’s birthday party and aligned on a vision for changing the future of mobility.  

The UpCart® line was officially launched at the 2015 NHRA National Hardware Show to remarkable success. The UpCart® was awarded the “Most Innovative Concept” award at the show. Michael was invited to pitch a panel of buyers from QVC. The UpCart was selected to be featured live on QVC. The UpCart sold out within 5 min of being on-air. 

The UpCart has continued to grow in popularity ever since. In addition to going viral on Facebook in Late 2015, the UpCart returned to the NHRA National Hardware show in 2016 to win the “Retailer’s Choice” award. The UpCart Original continues to sell well through a variety of channels and is now available in 15 countries.

Risks and challenges

HOW FAR WE HAVE COME: We are still a small family business with a commitment to helping improve mobility and independence for our customers. However, since our first crowdfunding campaign back in 2014 and our first product launch in 2015, we have learned a great deal about the manufacturing process, fulfilling orders and customer service. We are extremely proud to say we have a proven track record of meeting our commitments and delivering awesome products to our customers.

With that said, developing a new product is extremely challenging, risks always exist and delays are possible...

MANUFACTURING: Creating the tooling to manufacture a product like this is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it right. There is typically a 60-day lead time to create the molds and fixtures for a product of this size, and this is where delays could occur. To minimize that possibility, we're working with manufacturers with a track record for prompt quality.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the UpCart City gets ready for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product. They also allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by manufacturing partners and independent product testers. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. You have our commitment that we will do everything in our power to hit our timeline.

We are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering folding hand carts in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but we have excellent partners with decades of experience sourcing similar products. Any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with advice and expertise from our partners and advisors. You have our commitment that all decisions will be made with protecting your interest as the primary goal.

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make the UpCart City a reality by clicking the 'Back This Project' at the top of the page, or by sharing our page to help spread the word.
