We are extremely proud to say we have a proven track record of meeting our commitments and delivering awesome products to our customers.
With that said, developing a new product is extremely challenging, risks always exist and delays are possible...
MANUFACTURING: Creating the tooling to manufacture a product like this is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it right. There is typically a 60-day lead time to create the molds and fixtures for a product of this size, and this is where delays could occur. To minimize that possibility, we're working with manufacturers with a track record for prompt quality.
PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the UpCart City gets ready for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product. They also allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by manufacturing partners and independent product testers. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.
FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. You have our commitment that we will do everything in our power to hit our timeline.
We are working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering folding hand carts in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but we have excellent partners with decades of experience sourcing similar products. Any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with advice and expertise from our partners and advisors. You have our commitment that all decisions will be made with protecting your interest as the primary goal.
Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make the UpCart City a reality by clicking the 'Back This Project' at the top of the page, or by sharing our page to help spread the word.

story:
Next generation of Road Safety System "LET THEM OUT!"

Seat belts and  airbags were a revolution. They significantly reduced the number of road accidents fatalities. 

Now it's time to introduce blocked door opening and jammed seat belt cutting devices to release drivers and passengers trapped inside damaged vehicles after road accidents.

We’ve already developed such solution, proved it effective during tests and patented worldwide (including EU, USA and Hong Kong).

This safety system could be a real factor in decreasing fatalities number on a huge scale. Smart and cheap. Not related with driver's bad condition or decision. Works automatically like airbags. Saves lives. Potentially. When implemented.

And if it is a standard for everyone, not exclusive feature in expensive cars. 

We have a great idea - but we are only a start-up with limited resources. Join us, support this idea.


We’re not selling the devices here - we’re looking for support and contributors to go global! Join our safe journey!




Why this system is so important: 

It minimizes at least two main threats that car users are exposed to: 

  •   entrapment due to blocked doors after accident because of deformed/distorted car body;
  •  unfastened seat belts' consequences.

Entrapment is very common. It increases the risk of death more than 800% in comparison to not entrapped victims of road accidents. The main cause of death among entrapped victims is bleeding.  High energy impacts most commonly entrap victims, however, the high energy also ensures the growth of death risk. It is hard to estimate precisely how much blocked door opening and jammed seat belt cutting devices can reduce mortality rate among entrapped victims. For sure they can reduce this numbers relevantly.


source: Entrapped victims in motor vehicle collisions; Clinics Magazine, January 2011

Many car users deliberately fail to fasten their seat belts to avoid being trapped and as a consequence e.g. burn to death. EU Transport Commission estimates that fastened seat belts could save up to 7.300 lives yearly in EU. New safety system could minimize the fear of being entrapped and reduce this number.

source: EU Transport Commission 2014 seat belts
                Eurostat statistics explained, Road safety statistics at regional level


The global status report on road safety 2015 by WHO (reflecting 180 countries) depicts 1.25 mln deaths. In USA/EU "only" 55.000 deaths and over 500.000 heavily injured yearly (NHTSA; EU Transport Department). Every 1% in reduction of these numbers means thousands of people alive or less injured.

Blocked door opening and jammed seat belt cutting devices open blocked doors and cut seat belts after accidents in every type of vehicles. This road safety system is based on similar principle as airbags. It is controlled by reliable electronic unit and sensors. Powered by gas generators. Completely safe for users and rescue teams. Smart and cheap - total cost should be below 200 USD per car (both front seats, mass production scale, new cars; in used cars hard to estimate but more expensive and only in authorized services). 




How it works:

Automatic emergency door opening (AEDO, de-jammer):

AEDO system opens vehicle doors jammed or blocked. It consists of telescopic actuators powered by electronically controlled gas generators (same like in airbags). It is placed in the vehicle door pillar. System works sequentially:  firstly – it unlocks door bolts/locks, secondly – it checks with very little gas generators  if door is blocked (without destroying it),  thirdly – if door is blocked, it uses bigger gas generator and pushes the door out.



Seat belts emergency cutting system (SECS)

SECS system cuts seat belts with a pyrotechnic cutter which is mounted by the belt fixing to the car body. SECS system is controlled by an electronic control unit (the same system as the one used in AEDO above and airbags).


Both systems (AEDO and SECS) are activated after an accident (collision, rollover / roll, fire, sinking) and start working only after the vehicle stops and after a certain delay - 5-15 sec (programmed individually by car makers).

Blocked door opening and jammed seat belt cutting system also works when vehicle doors are blocked due to  water pressure, which makes it impossible to open them before the vehicle completely sinks, people often drown trapped in such vehicles.

The devices are efficient for many years: 
  •  operational durability of 15 years for micro-explosives 
  •  20 years for mechanical parts.

 

"System developed by Nowak Innovations is simple and effective. Pushing power is adjusted to the situation. When the doors are not blocked, the system can recognise it without unnecessary damages. The system is powered with electronically controlled gas generators,the same like in airbags. Completely safe for users and rescue teams." 
           Pawel Goller, PIMOT Automotive Industry Institute, Warsaw, Poland

"Electronic control unit of the system developed by Nowak Innovations can co-work with such control units of airbags or seat belt tensioners. Or can work individually with own sensors and programmed by car makers in relevant way depending on the needs and law." 
          Andrzej Sikora, PhD. Eng., prof. IEI, vice Director Industry Cooperation,                  Electrical Engineering Institute, Wroclaw, Poland


There are only few such solutions on the market so far – GM and Audi have implemented pyrotechnical charges in construction of vehicle windows (only in bullet-proof limousine version of their serial models – Audi A8 L and GM – Cadillac One, The Beast – the limousine of the US President). Mercedes in model Gullwing uses complicated and expensive system of emergency door opening  - hinge blasting. In contrast to these “exclusive” applications, Nowak Innovations’ system is universal and can be implemented in every kind of automotive vehicle.




The beginning:

Our story started in the late 90's when one of our three inventors - Nowak brothers - witnessed a car accident in France. A young woman and two kids were trapped inside an overturned Renault 5. The kids, with help, managed to get out but the woman couldn't. Many people tried to help her but when smoke and fire started to threaten their lives they had to move away from the car. The woman burnt alive. Nowak brothers decided to try to prevent such tragic events and they started working on safety system which releases trapped drivers and passengers.

Nowak brothers (Nowak Innovations) aim to make the new road safety system a standard such as seat belts and airbags. Can you imagine driving a car not equipped with both of the above? Exactly! The roads would be much safer with emergency door opening and seat belt cutting devices as obvious as  seat belts and airbags.



CALL to ACTION

Vote for this solution - we need a scale of supporters  to negotiate with road safety authorities and car manufacturers

every vote is 1 USD

We need funds to increase general awareness of the system:

  • present it at motor shows (Paris, October 2016 and Detroit, January 2017);
  • lobbying among car experts and authorities;
  • give commercial presentations for 10 main car manufacturers plus Tesla (July - November 2016).  
MISSION POSSIBLE: new road safety standard  in every car at minimum cost.
Time: as soon as possible, 12-18 months from mass implementation decision.
You can not buy it now. You can only support us to encourage car manufacturers to implement this system to every new car.

Our declaration: we don't want to sell patents to any corporation exclusively but license them to everyone interested in, for "little penny" per car.



Meet the Team:

Krzysztof Olbrycht  CEO and Co-Founder

MSc degree in organization of industry (Faculty of Management at the AGH University of Science and Technology in Cracow) and post-graduate degree in finance at the Main School of Economics in Warsaw.

Zygmunt, Janusz and Wieslaw Nowak Constructors and Co-Founders

Wojciech Jedliczka Electronic Engineer and Co-Founder

AGH University of Science and Technology in Cracow: Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Automatics, Computer Science and Electronics, Master of Science
AGH University of Science and Technology in Cracow, Department of Computer Science, Faculty Information Technology (IT).

Artur Rybka Sales & Communication and Co-Founder

Wroclaw University of Economics,  Master of Economics.


FAQ:

How often jammed doors occur - is it worth to be bothered? 
They occur very often, every third (32,5%) car accident causes driver/passengers entrapment;

Will the system work after an accident?
Yes, the system uses electronic system and gas generators - as air bags; air bags work;

Can it work incorrectly - cause an explosion?
Gas generators have to meet strict requirements concerning safety (e.g. mechanical failure and high temperature endurance); the same gas generators are used in air bags and seat belt tensioners;

Can emergency door opening system damage car during an inoffensive crash?The system works based on sensors and electronic control unit like air bags; in case jammed door  doesn’t occur and the system works anyway - it works sequentially, in the first phase system opens the door lock, then the gas generator of low power examines the deadlock and if the door opens, the system stops working (the high power generators aren’t activated);

Does the system require periodic inspection?
It doesn’t, like air bags it is efficient for many years - operational durability of 15 years for gas generators and 20 years for mechanical parts;

Can the system be mounted in used cars?
Yes, the system can be mounted in used cars at Authorized Car Service Stations after mass production starts;

Is the system available only for the front door?
The system can be mounted in all car doors;

How much will it increase weight and costs?
The system weight doesn’t exceed 1kg per door; costs would increase by about 200 USD (both front doors);

Does the system require any renovation after it worked, after an accident?
The system can be used again, gas generators need to be replaced;

When will the system be available?
About 12-18 months after car manufacturer’s decision to implement the system;

Does the system work when the car is sinking?
The system is waterproof, it can open door in sinking car; it would speed up sinking but enable victims to get out of the car;

How much time does the system need to open the door?
It depends on the electronic control unit settings, when a vehicle stops moving - about 5-20 seconds;

Is it possible to fix the door after an accident if the system worked?
It depends on the deadlock factor and cost-effectiveness as in case of other parts;

What happens if doors open upward?
The system works in such case as well;

Will the system work the same way in every car type?
The operational principle is the same in mechanical terms; differences may result from electronic control unit settings depending on the manufacturer’s needs and standards and the region applicable law;

Can an event such as an earthquake activate the system?
Sensors activating the system, electronic control unit and gas generators work alike air bags - they are refractory to all phenomena causing unwarranted action;

How is the system powered and is it safe for car users?
Electric supply is based on a battery and low-tension capacitors which are safe for people;

Is the device visible and will it influence car’s esthetics?
No, the device will not be visible; esthetics will be remained;

Does the system work in all types of cars (trucks, racers)?
It works in all types of cars; both in variety of doors and hatches types;

Are there situations in which the system will absolutely not work?
It works under any conditions, although it can be turned off, e.g. when the vehicle lies aside, the pneumatic actuator of the door the vehicle lies on won’t be activated.

Can the seatbelt cutting device work uncontrolled, i.e. seat belt is needed but the mechanism cuts it?
The seatbelt cutting device works strictly as intended by the electronic control unit; it works after air bags activation, when the vehicle stops and after certain delay, e.g. 5-10 sec. The risk of device’s uncontrolled activation is the same as in case of air bags.

How can I implement the solution into my car?
It is best to purchase the system in a new car as soon as it comes on stream but we’re trying to make it possible to mount the system in used cars at Authorized Car Service Stations.

Does the system work only during severe accidents or also inoffensive crashes?
Likewise air bags system, the device will be activated when the impact force specified by the manufacturer is reached; the system initiation threshold can be set as desired depending on the needs and practical usage.

Can the system be activated spontaneously, e.g. because of temperature?
The system is refractory even to high temperatures.

Does the system work in the cold?
Even very low temperatures aren't a problem for the system.

Will the system work if the battery is destroyed?
Yes, the system is equipped with emergency power supply (capacitors).

How does the explosive materials used in the device work? Aren’t they too strong?
The system works based on gas generators which are used on a massive scale, e.g. in air bags; they don’t pose any threat.

Does any company use similar solutions?
There are not such solutions on the market; the most comparable is hinge blasting (manual or automatic) used on small scale in armored vehicles - expensive and causing severe damages, requiring additional intervention involving forcing out the door.

Is it possible that the device will work while driving?
Alike in air bags system, it can happen in theory but it’s statistically irrelevant.

What is the profit from the system?
Every third car accident poses a threat of being trapped in the vehicle; emergency  door opening and seat belt cutting devices enable unassisted evacuation and ease access to victims for first aiders - they decrease the risk of death and severe injuries.

Is it possible that the system won’t be activated when needed?
In theory - yes - e.g. when door/seat belt gets jammed at low speed and the system initiation threshold isn’t reached;

Is the problem of entrapped drivers/passengers common?
Clinics Magazine (January, 2011) published a report implying that every third car accident causes entrapment in a vehicle and the risk of death increases 8 times in comparison to situations when victims aren’t trapped.

Is it possible to install only one device?
In theory - yes - but it’s up to the car manufacturers.

What material is the device made of?
Pneumatic actuators are made of stainless steel, seat belt cutters - of plastic; although they can be made of other materials such as carbon fibers and titanium.

How wide will the opening be after the system works?
The system pushes the door out of the car's  structure; the width depends on the car model.

story_txt: The Gooblins are at it again,. They will not let care-bears speak the truth. Fortunately we have Lucky Bear and Samurai bear who they fear, to come drive them out. They just need your wings.

story:
Introducing EcoReco Model R:
the most critically claimed and market-tested last-mile personal EV 
is now connected and even smarter!

An eco-friendly, energy-efficient, compact and intelligent electric scooter, designed for your everyday urban commute. Model R is a giant leap forward from its wildly popular EcoReco predecessors while keeping the same premium quality and excellent customer support.

 

Model R is the best way to move in urban cities

EcoReco Model R is designed to provide an unprecedentedly fun, intuitive, and practical user experience for personal commute and recreation. Packed with generous specs and full of innovative features, such as Dynamic Battery Switching System, Carefree Fall Detection, Lightvigation, Tile location tracking, smart lock, and endless configurablility, EcoReco is the ultimate last mile EV for your active lifestyle and passion for technologies.

EcoReco knows scooters 

A scooter is safer than a skateboard and more portable than a bike. It is accessible for everyone and compatible with cars and public transits. We believed the form factor so much we created a company to make it.

Since established in 2013, EcoReco has been widely considered the best scooter maker that revived a faded industry and opened up markets for more electric personal transports. Here are some reasons that tens of thousands of riders choosing EcoReco: 

  1. Domestic supports: EcoReco is based in Silicon Valley, and we provide sales and technical supports domestically with established service networks. We don't do ship directly from the factory non-sense because your backers deserve better and our continuous supports

  2. Proven track records on design and quality: EcoReco knows what ingredients work so you don't need to be your own chef to navigate a maze of combinations and try your luck. EcoReco has figured out the basic and nuances in scooter design: modularized rear tire (separateable from the motor), right balance and weight distribution, handle and control, wheel size to base ratio, trade-offs between speed and torque, voltage systems and drives, so you only need to consider the range and configure your ride styles.

  3. Compliance and regulations: Scooters with more than 750 Wh are subjected to the special registration, license and insurance requirements with DMV. Most states only allow e-scooters and bikes to go under 20 mph (it's already very fast on a personal EV!). That's why we choose to develop the most efficient scooter in a lightweight package instead of just throwing high capacity batteries and wasteful motors to handle all your usage scenarios. 

  4. No risk backing: EcoReco is an established company with a professional team and existing products. You can swap your Model R backing to our existing models if you don't like the development progress. Your pledge is safe with EcoReco.

  5. More than utility: EcoReco scooter is just sleekier and cooler. Our vision for the personal mobility sets us apart from imitators and their low-cost importers.

EcoReco Model R is Ridiculously Feature-Rich

The feature list of Model R is so long that we can only list the key ones here. When you feel tired reading it, the exit is the backing button on your right. ;)

Model R offers the unmatched freedom to choose the most preferred riding mode in any occasion.

Throttle (Classic) mode:

  • Indoor use, outdoor racing, cruise control, you can master the speeds at your finger under the classic Throttle mode. Or get the extra BOOST for hill climbing
  • You can also set up the top speed, and configure acceleration ramp-up using the EcoReco smartphone app.

Kick-Assist modes:

  • Kick-Ass Amplified mode is perfect when you want to exercise or ride the scooter stealthily. The smart sensors can read and calculate your kick, and push you faster and further with the electric power boost.
  • Kick-Ass Extended mode enables the longest range out of your scooter. It maintains the top speed you can reach from manual kicks until the battery runs out or the brake is pressed. 

Safety is essential for personal transportation, and that's why we pack a lot of lighting and active safety features such Lightvigation,  eBCAS and Carefree Fall Notification on Model R.

Let the light guide you 

Model R cleverly integrates the turn-by-turn navigation with turn signals on the handlebars and the rear fender. The patented Lightvigation  would notify you where to turn while you keep eyes on the roads, and cars around you would know your next moves at all time. The flash frequency also changes quicker when you get closer to the turn, so you would never miss your turn.

Model R protects you like an angel

Model R implemented emerging standard eBCAS (Early Bicycle Collision Avoidance System) that enables cars to detect nearby connected bikes and scooters. Your Model R is detectable even when out of sight (fog, traffic, blind spots, around the corner etc.) for smart cars with the same advanced feature. 

In the rare event of an impact or fall, sensors on Model R would record the impacts and scooter conditions. After several secs of inactivity of both rider and the scooter, the patented Carefree Fall Notification would trigger your smartphone to text the GPS location to a pre-set emergency contact. Just for your and your loved one's peace of mind that Model R is your safety guardian.

Model R is more practical and secure than a bike because you can bring it with you anywhere so there is a lower risk of getting it stolen. To make it even more secure, we make it lockable physically thru a lock hole or electronically by the app to keep any curious and ill-intentioned away (the built-in buzzer could be really loud!!).


You can unlock the electronic lock with a configurable button sequence from the throttle unit or use your phone as a proximity smart key. You can also send a temporary access code to your friends for scooter sharing.

First findable scooter without a data plan

EcoReco partners with Tile, the leading Bluetooth tracking device maker, to natively integrate the tracking function. Even if you have to step away from Model R, the built-in Tile feature can keep you updated on its whereabout. You would receive a notification if it's moved out of range. You can also leverage the world's leading crowd-finding Tile network to locate your Model R, find where it's last seen, or get notified when it's found again.

No hassle with a sim card and data plan. No additional costs. Simple as that.

Your life is eventful so your personal ride should be versatile to make the best of it. 

All Model R battery packs are made of Panasonic cells, similar to the ones Tesla uses for its EVs, which are highly stable and reliable. There are 2 battery sizes to choose from. The "Lite" battery pack solves your last mile needs while offering low costs, light weight, and portability. It also follows the Federal Aviation Regulation compliance for air travels. The “Pro” battery pack (300Wh) gives you max power and lasts 10-20 ranges.

The battery bays are under your feet and batteries are quickly swappable. The batteries install in a forward or rear slot, ensuring that the scooter is never off-balance to the left or right. You have the freedom to choose the right battery size you need and to expand later. You can also use the extra space to store a travel charger or other things you like.

The patented Dynamic Battery Switching system coordinates Model R battery packs. It adjusts the power performance automatically and shuts off immediately under unusual situations. You can choose to use just one single pack or to mix-or-match different battery packs where you could set to use them in tandem or simultaneously. 

It's safe, balanced, and flexible.

The possibilities are endless!

You can mount all your gadgets including your phone, GoPro and camera on our universal mount on the handlebar and charge them on the go using the USB port on the throttle unit. Most bike accessories work well on EcoReco scooters and there would be more 1st part and 3rd party accessories to make Model R even more useful in all occasions. Share what your want to see in the comment sections, and we and our EcoReco community might actually make it happen! 

Partnership and expandability 

EcoReco is teaming up with Sony | Future Lab Program to explore the applications in the realm overlapped by personal mobility and smart wearable devices. N is a prototype featuring a voice interaction system. With ears open, hands-free, and eyes no longer distracted by mobile displays, you can enjoy music and get up-to-the-minute information on demand, promoting a more agreeable active lifestyle. It's a great hit at SXSW this year. Stay tuned for more technical details of our co-development program.

If you are also based in San Francisco bay areas, you can also participate in the FLP with us. For more information, please visit Sony Future Lab Program N.

 

We are also proud to introduce EcoReco XS,
the lightest and most affordable 
smart scooter in the world.

Many EcoReco riders were requesting an entry level e-scooter that is smart, ultra-portable, and affordable for their loved ones and kids. 

We heard you!!

We are proud to introduce the EcoReco XS, the lightest and most affordable smart scooter in the world. Made of carbon fibers and aluminum enforcers, EcoReco XS is only 17 lbs with ranges of up to 13 miles. EcoReco's patented folding handlebars and the compact sensor-enabled motor enables XS to be super slim and easy to take in and out of public transits. XS is also equipped with the space saving LCD dash unit, Energy Recover Braking (E.R.B.) and the smart cruise control.

XS is the most portable companion for your last mile commute.  

*For more information, please check out our product comparison chart.

 

EcoReco has also established a best-in-industry service network in the US and actively looked for global expansion. EcoReco also provides a comprehensive customer support materials including the troubleshooting guide and technical support videos.

 

Testimonials from our Riders

 

Backing EcoReco Model R is as risk-free as it can get for any crowdfunding campaigns! 

EcoReco is an established company with a professional team and existing production capacity. We have products on the market since 2014 and have been working with top-tier retail partners. The time spent developing and delivering our existing models will help ensure the Model R makes it to your hands in time. If for any unforeseeable reason the production of Model R is delayed, you can choose to swap your Model R and battery pledges for one of our available models on the market with compariable costs.

We need you to join us!

We truly appreciate you reading this far and your support.
In return, we will make and deliver a good product that you would be proud of using.

Your backing will enable us to provide a sustainable alternative to the current energy-depleting and time-consuming modes of transportation. Your feedbacks and new ideas would make our products and services better.

Most importantly, we need you to be our advocate, to bring your friends to the movement.

Together, we can make our city greener, more pedestrian friendly and full of vivid local businesses. One EcoReco ride at a time.

Back us now, and don't be shy about spreading the word. ;)

EcoReco Team

FAQ:

For basic questions about EcoReco scooters in general, please visit (ecorecoscooter.com/faq)
If you can't find your answers about Model R there and below, please ask us in Comments and we will update the most asked question here.

Model R looks head and shoulders above any scooters on the market. I want a lot of my friends to know about it. Do you have a referral program to refer friends for a discount? Or a bulk discount?

Yes. You can use our referral program [See Update #2] to get discounts on your unit or even get it completely free. You and your friends can also back the Love Bird or Rude Boys perks for multi-unit purchases.

Do you ship internationally? 

Yes. We would love to expand our EcoReco trek to more places so international backers are very welcome. Please notes that (1) arrangements of international shipments might cause slight delays in comparison with shipments for US backers. (2) If the shipping costs are more than $250 (for Model R) for your specific location, the difference would need to be collected additionally before we ship out the products. (3) Because we couldn't factor it in in advance, the customs fees and duty are backer's responsibility. In the rare case, any other fees associated with import goods inspection, storage, return, damage, and other extra fees in comparison with a similar US shipment would not be covered by EcoReco.

How do you charge the scooter? Does it take 220V?

Our scooters can be charged conveniently using regular wall outlets via the included external charger. The charger is CE certified, and it can take 110-240V, just like most popular consumer electronics. We work our best to make your life simpler.

Can I do a local pick up?

Yes. You are welcome to attend our local delivery gathering in the San Francisco bay areas that we would announce dates and locations later. You would be able to get some extra perks and meet our EcoReco team if you show up!!
Unfortunately, we won’t be able to arrange individual pick up or waive the shipping fees for logistic reasons.

What is the weight limit for a rider?

We recommend up to 280 pounds for best performance even though the mechanics can support heavy riders. Please note the scooter’s top speed will decrease slightly for heavier riders on flat ground, but its performance would be noticeably affected in accelerations on and slopes.

Where can I ride the e-scooter? Is it street legal?

State laws vary on this issue. Most states require the top speed to be below 20 MPH. Some state laws approve the use of electric scooters in bike lanes of general road traffic and some do not. To the best of our knowledge (don’t hold it against us), e-scooters are street legal in California, Connecticut, Kentucky, Missouri, Nevada, Texas, Virginia and Washington, with many other states expected to follow suit. Some cities/counties have their own rules on light electric vehicles so it’s best to consult with your local transportation authorities.

Is the scooter water resist? Can it handle the rain?

The scooter is built like a tank, not a submarine. ;)
It's water-resist so you can use a water hose to clean it. but it's not water-proof, so don't dump it in a pool. We put pretty good sealing all around. If you get caught up by the rain on the way home, it will still work. Just remember to wipe out water and let it dry afterward. Moist and electronics don't get along well.
With that being said, we still recommend avoiding riding in the rain for safety reasons, mainly due to poor visions and road conditions.  

What happens if my scooter has an issue and I need tech support?

EcoReco has also established a best-in-industry service network in the US and actively looked for global expansion. EcoReco also provides a comprehensive customer support materials including the troubleshooting guide and technical support videos. 

What's the warranty of the Model R?

The statutory warranty on the frame, the electronic system and the battery pack is 6 months for manufacturing defects. Wears-n-tears of consumable parts, damages caused by improper usages & user's negligence, and water damage are not under the warranty.

How well can the Model R scooter handle a hill?

For a normal 170 lbs weight person, our scooter can take an uphill up to ~20-degree incline (~35% slope), which should be adequate for more than 99.99% of streets/roads. A rider can also kick scoot a bit to increase the up-hill speeds or take a longer detour.

Will you be providing other accessories and personalized products?

Yes, we are working hard to provide an array of accessories to complement the e-scooter. What do yo would like to have?

Will you guys keep improving Model R or make new scooters for other demography?

You bet!

Does the Model R have any LCD display included or do you have to use your phone and an app?

 

Yes. You can operate Model R using the built-in LCD display for most of the daily functions. You can choose to access more advanced features and the rich configurabilities using the EcoReco app on your smartphone. 

Does the scooter have a USB charging port?

Yes. The UPS port is on the Throttle/dash unit for easy access.
story_txt:
Introducing EcoReco Model R:the most critically claimed and market-tested last-mile personal EV is now connected and even smarter!

An eco-friendly, energy-efficient, compact and intelligent electric scooter, designed for your everyday urban commute. Model R is a giant leap forward from its wildly popular EcoReco predecessors while keeping the same premium quality and excellent customer support.



 








Model R is the best way to move in urban cities

EcoReco Model R is designed to provide an unprecedentedly fun, intuitive, and practical user experience for personal commute and recreation. Packed with generous specs and full of innovative features, such as Dynamic Battery Switching System, Carefree Fall Detection, Lightvigation, Tile location tracking, smart lock, and endless configurablility, EcoReco is the ultimate last mile EV for your active lifestyle and passion for technologies.


EcoReco knows scooters 
A scooter is safer than a skateboard and more portable than a bike. It is accessible for everyone and compatible with cars and public transits. We believed the form factor so much we created a company to make it.

Domestic supports: EcoReco is based in Silicon Valley, and we provide sales and technical supports domestically with established service networks. We don't do ship directly from the factory non-sense because your backers deserve better and our continuous supports

EcoReco has figured out the basic and nuances in scooter design: modularized rear tire (separateable from the motor), right balance and weight distribution, handle and control, wheel size to base ratio, trade-offs between speed and torque, voltage systems and drives, so you only need to consider the range and configure your ride styles.
Compliance and regulations: Scooters with more than 750 Wh are subjected to the special registration, license and insurance requirements with DMV. story: This campaign has been closed.
story_txt: This campaign has been closed.

story:
I come to you as a humble man, I believe the best of human kind come out of unity and an aspiration for a better tomorrow. I am convinced that together we can change the way we travel and share the benefit along the way. Lets build a sustainable rideshare community and explore our land a mile at the time. 


Whether its a local ride to the grocery store or a long distance trip across the U.S. we got you. Explore the best of the most entertaining cities around the Globe, we make it possible and all by a simple touch of a button.


A safe and reliable platform for all, everyone is getting paid. For each ride a friend you refer takes, you receive credit not once but for life. We let  the driver in control of his  fare providing more competition and less corporate intrusion, the rider selects whats best for his wallet and favored his favorite drivers for future trips. The ability to pre-book an airport days ahead as you would for a plane ticket.  We just keep it smooth for you to move. A world of transparency. A venture that works for all.


I want my app not only to provide reliable and safe transportation to travelers around the country and the world but incorporate a social media component allowing travelers to communicate instantly with a driver or riders prior to a trip.

 Reward you for supporting the effort and spreading the word!!! Why should you pay once for referring a friend when the company earns on your referral forever? We believe that is unfair. As we grow, we want you to grow with us. The road remains a safe way to travel and sharing brings more you way. Lets start a revolution together.   

Why build it?


To give control back to the people.
Being a driver isn't just sitting behind a wheel, it takes focus and professionalism, patience and knowledge of the streets. A noble profession torn apart for the sake of profit and monopoly.


To offer more choices to consumers. The current system only allows one choice but what if you could select who drives and keep the highest quality of service. I am a father, a son, a driver, a consumer, an entrepreneur who believes in creating solutions for  the benefit of all.



How it works? 

This will be a free app. Anywhere you are, there will always be a friend, a driver, a partner ready to take you on your journey no matter how far it is. Explore the land, meet people, discover our diversity and build connections and memories for life. I have a few more improvement ideas. Either way, I think this idea will disrupt the current monopoly, bring better options when traveling for consumers, and I appreciate your support!


What's the money for?

- Finalizing the design of the software IPhone and android application. 

- Complete and finalize the insurance process which has been approved.

- Expand the marketing to universities and colleges.

- promotional rides to charities ( veterans, youth empowerment).


THANK YOU A MILLION MILES, A MILLION WAYS

I put up all this work to prove you, i believe in this venture. Every line  every word Every picture and video come from my soul and perseverance. Before coming to you i had to convince myself i deserve your attention. Please support me.

It is an hard thing to ask for help, being at the mercy of the world but I realized that changes is not a one man task and no one gets there without support. An humble awakening. Ideas are free, the collaboration of minds turn it into reality. Thank you a million. I am so excited of the road we heading towards....


Feel free to ping me with questions Christiannoah@krazyRide.com or check out the site - www.KrazyRide.com, There you can sign up to be notified when the app launch and start enjoying the ride.
story_txt: I come to you as a humble man, I believe the best of human kind come out of unity and an aspiration for a better tomorrow. I am convinced that together we can change the way we travel and share the benefit along the way. Lets build a sustainable rideshare community and explore our land a mile at the time. Whether its a local ride to the grocery store or a long distance trip across the U.S. we got you. Explore the best of the most entertaining cities around the Globe, we make it possible and all by a simple touch of a button.A safe and reliable platform for all, everyone is getting paid. For each ride a friend you refer takes, you receive credit not once but for life. We let  the driver in control of his  fare providing more competition and less corporate intrusion, the rider selects whats best for his wallet and favored his favorite drivers for future trips. The ability to pre-book an airport days ahead as you would for a plane ticket.  We just keep it smooth for you to move. A world of transparency. A venture that works for all.I want my app not only to provide reliable and safe transportation to travelers around the country and the world but incorporate a social media component allowing travelers to communicate instantly with a driver or riders prior to a trip. Reward you for supporting the effort and spreading the word!!! Why should you pay once for referring a friend when the company earns on your referral forever? We believe that is unfair. As we grow, we want you to grow with us. The road remains a safe way to travel and sharing brings more you way. Lets start a revolution together.   Why build it?To give control back to the people.Being a driver isn't just sitting behind a wheel, it takes focus and professionalism, patience and knowledge of the streets. A noble profession torn apart for the sake of profit and monopoly.To offer more choices to consumers. The current system only allows one choice but what if you could select who drives and keep the highest quality of service. I am a father, a son, a driver, a consumer, an entrepreneur who believes in creating solutions for  the benefit of all.How it works? This will be a free app. Anywhere you are, there will always be a friend, a driver, a partner ready to take you on your journey no matter how far it is. Explore the land, meet people, discover our diversity and build connections and memories for life. I have a few more improvement ideas. Either way, I think this idea will disrupt the current monopoly, bring better options when traveling for consumers, and I appreciate your support!What's the money for?- Finalizing the design of the software IPhone and android application. - Complete and finalize the insurance process which has been approved.- Expand the marketing to universities and colleges.- promotional rides to charities ( veterans, youth empowerment).THANK YOU A MILLION MILES, A MILLION WAYSI put up all this work to prove you, i believe in this venture. Every line  every word Every picture and video come from my soul and perseverance. Before coming to you i had to convince myself i deserve your attention. Please support me.It is an hard thing to ask for help, being at the mercy of the world but I realized that changes is not a one man task and no one gets there without support. An humble awakening. Ideas are free, the collaboration of minds turn it into reality. Thank you a million. I am so excited of the road we heading towards....Feel free to ping me with questions Christiannoah@krazyRide.com or check out the site - www.KrazyRide.com, There you can sign up to be notified when the app launch and start enjoying the ride.

story:
Meet Ridy! 

Ridy uses machine vision analytics to determine whether you are concentrated on the road. It continuously analyzes eye blinking frequency, eyes movement, and other facial expression patterns.

 

 

 

Hi, this is Andy, co-founder of Ridy.

Driving a car after an exhausting working day is dangerous. I've learned it the hard way - I've crashed my car in an accident. 

But it's not only about being tired. We are so used to our smartphones, that texting, liking Instagram posts becomes a natural habit. Unfortunately, many people forget that it is dangerous and illegal to do that while driving. 

 

 

Driving a long road? Working long shifts? Have a teen driver in the family? Get Ridy!

 

Install Ridy on your dashboard or windshield (see more installation options below):

Ridy will monitor if you are focused on the road by analyzing various behavior patterns.

For example, if you feel drowsy and might fall asleep.

Or if you (or your teen kid) are checking your Snapchat stories or texting your friends.

Your kids won't distract you from driving! 

Even at night or in the tunnel. Ridy will alert you if it thinks you feel drowsy or distracted. 

Ridy is simple to use and won't ruin your driving experience. 

 
 

You think it can never happen to you or your loved ones?

U.S. Centers for Disease Control (CDC) warns: one-third of U.S. adults sleep less than seven hours a day (the optimal time needed). A lack of sleep slows your reaction time and overall awareness. It increases car accident risk and negatively impacts your driving performance.

 

 

You can setup Ridy in less than 60 seconds. No Internet or apps required. Just connect Ridy to the power source, place it near the dashboard and turn on. That's it. It works with any car day and night. There are three places where you can mount Ridy in your car:

1. Dashboard

2. Rear mirror 

3. Windshield

How do you define drowsy or distracted driving?

You can predict drowsily behavior by analyzing facial muscle moment, eye movement, the speed of reaction. Drowsy or distracted driver’s behaviors is mostly the same on average. If you don’t sleep well, your body clock will force you to shut down. Many people think they can fight this feeling, they try to explain themselves that they are ok, they need to drive. And then accidents happen. 

The second problem we are trying to solve is distracted driving. The most distracting thing we have in our car is the smartphone. You can admit it or not but many people, especially young ones, are addicted to social networks and instant messaging. Sometimes you start checking Instagram in the traffic jam without even noticing it. The same eye movement pattern can be applied to this case.

How does Ridy work? 

Ridy uses machine vision analytics to determine whether you are concentrated on the road. It continuously analyzes eye blinking frequency, eyes movement, and other facial expression patterns. Based on the behavior patterns it can understand the situation and give the driver alerts.

We use real-time analytics. When you turn on Ridy for the first time we request you to calibrate the device so we can detect your head normal driving position. Later on we will adjust the algorithm to learn user's head position automatically, so the "calibration" would not be needed, but at this time there is a simple "touch of a button" calibration. Then we can monitor and score certain events, such as eye blinking frequency, duration of eyes closing, relative head rotation, yawning and so on. Depending on event or overall scoring, we produce different alerts. It may be more or less mild reminder like "keep your eyes on the road" if we detect a user not looking ahead for a prolonged period of time, or rather stiff warning with loud and screechy beep: "Danger! Danger! Wake up!" if we detect that a driver closes their eyes. So in a nutshell, we constantly monitor the user's face and take an appropriate action as situation requires: from alerting the user to keep off their smartphone to waking up the driver to recommending to take a rest.

 

Do I need an Internet connection? Do you store my data anywhere?

Ridy is designed to be absolutely autonomous. All the video Ridy uses is being processed in real time by Ridy’s central processor. Ridy does not need to record or store the video – all the frames are being instantly discarded once processed.

Drowsy driving is an epidemic and a great threat. Many foundations and government departments are working on various solutions for this problem. We've made our solution using something we know most - technology. It's been a long road from an idea to the final prototype. But finally, we are happy to show you Ridy. 

Ridy is ready to be manufactured, however, we need money to build our first batch and jump-start our project. We've invested our own money in R&I and prototyping. Now we ask for your help. Every action counts - together we can make our roads safer. 

Pre-order Ridy today for yourself, your husband or wife, your children, your friends or relatives. Let's make our roads safer together! 

"The only true countermeasure to drowsiness is sleep."

William J. Horrey, Traffic Research Group leader at the AAA Foundation.

Ridy is a combination of many hours of research, amazing engineering, new machine vision techniques and our true passion to make the roads safer. We worked hard to create this product. We believe that Ridy is very accurate in identifying drowsy or distracted driving. 

That said, only the driver is responsible for what happens on the road. Every time you decide to drive you should be 100% confident that you are ready. And until you park your car and turn it off - you are responsible to stay focused and alert. 

Like many other assist systems in your car, Ridy is made to help you perform better. However, the driver should count on his/her skills at the first place and only then on the technology. 

Why do I need a device to help me stay focused on the road?

"Fatigue driving? It never happens to me". But according to National Sleep Foundation, 60% of all drivers in the US have driven a vehicle while feeling drowsy. Uber drivers, busy parents, night shift workers, young drivers - anyone who lacks sleep, drives long distance or is easily distracted. 

How does it work?

Ridy uses machine vision analytics to determine whether you are concentrated on the road. It continuously analyzes eye blinking frequency, eyes movement, and other facial expression patterns. Based on the behavior patterns it can understand the situation and give the driver alerts. 

Does it work in the dark?

Yes, it also works during nighttime (or in the tunnels). There are small infrared LEDs that highlight the driver's face if there's too dark in the car. 

Does it work with any car or SUV?

Yes, Ridy works with any car, SUV, sports car, etc. Even if you have a flying DeLorean, Doc.

Does it work with my truck?

Yes, you can use Ridy in a truck no matter the size.

Are these IR LEDs safe? I heard IR LEDs can hurt human retina.

Yes, these LEDs are safe. We've tested Ridy's components against EN/IEC 62471 standard (Photobiological Safety of Lamps and Lamp Systems), and they completely passed it. 

Is it easy to install?

Yes, even my grandma can nail it! You can setup Ridy in less than 60 seconds. No Internet or apps required. Just connect Ridy to the power source, place it near the dashboard and turn on. That's it. It works with any car day and night.

Is it battery powered?

No, you have to connect it to the car power socket (cigarette lighter socket) to guaranty constant operation. But the cord is easy to hide behind your dashboard. 

Does it record me? What about privacy?

Ridy doesn't save the video anywhere. It has no connection to the Internet and can't transfer any data. 

So it can say if I should drive or not? 

Only you can decide for yourself if you need to drive or not. Ridy constantly monitors your behavior and can recommend watching the road when it thinks you are losing concentration. But in the end, it is you who need to decide and who is responsible for driving. 

Why crowdfunding? 

We've spent a lot of time and savings to build Ridy. Ridy is ready to be manufactured, however, we need more money to order our first batch from the factory and jump-start our project.

Do you ship internationally? 

Yes, we do. US delivery is Free, Canada delivery is $20 ($30 for x2 pack) and Worldwide delivery is $30 ($40 for x2 pack). 

 

Refund/return policy

Our refund policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately, we can’t offer you a refund. To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase and we will need you to ship the product back to us.

story:
One of the most unique and coolest watercraft in the world!

 

 

WHAT THEY'RE SAYING ABOUT US

 

"Mantra watercraft is the perfect combo of vintage car and batmobile"

   "Fit for a Bond-esque villain the Mantra jet ski is an impressive-looking vehicle"

"a futuristic looking winged watercraft designed to race across open waters at incredible speeds."

 

ALSO FEATURED IN

 

UNIQUE DESIGN

The Mantra features the most beautiful and unique design of any watercraft available, with a futuristic shape and retro design touches.  This watercraft is for those who want a little style with their water fun, at unheard of pricing. The Mantra is also a limited edition, with a maximum of 340 standard, and 340 RS models to be produced for this first series, and each Mantra will have a numbered plaque. So make sure you're one of the very few who gets the chance to own this amazing watercraft at our discounted indiegogo supporter pricing!

 

BUILT LIKE A BOAT

We build the Mantra with simplicity, economy and affordability in mind, as well as incredible looks. We use non proprietary parts, so that any parts can be easily sourced from your local boat shop, online sellers or directly from us. Our hulls are built using standard GRP (glass reinforced plastic) boat building techniques, so any boat repair shop can fix collision damage. This building method also means that customizing your Mantra is simple.

 

FUN AND STABLE

The Mantra is designed with super fun drift style handling, and it's so stable that beginners have no problem riding it, this is due to our unique wing design. This also makes it an excellent fishing platform!

 

 

FEATURES

Stainless fittings and prop

GPS speedometer

Push button start

GRP Hull

Acacia wood dash

Embroidered logo

Custom throttle options

 

SAFETY FEATURES  

 

  • Lanyard engine kill switch
  • Manual engine kill switch
  • Propeller guard
  • Fire extinguisher included
  • Collapsible aluminum paddle included

 

OPTIONS

Hull Color Options - Jet Black, Ivory White, Deep Red

Upholstery Options - Vintage Tan, Classic Black

Throttle Options - Right Hand Trigger, Left hand trigger, Right hand thumb

 

ABOUT OUR PERKS

 

Standard Mantra

You'll be one of the very first to get your Mantra at the best discounted price! You'll receive one standard Mantra watercraft, with a top speed of 37mph/60kph +, you just need to connect the included battery, add oil and fuel, then you're ready to go. No assembly required. Estimated delivery starting September 2019, on a first to order first to ship basis.

 

Mantra RS

You'll be one of the very first to get your Mantra RS at the best discounted price! You'll receive one Mantra RS watercraft, with stage 4 engine upgrade, giving a top speed of 50mph/80kph+, you just need to connect the included battery, add oil and fuel, then you're ready to go. No assembly required. Estimated delivery starting September 2019, on a first to order first to ship basis.

 

Trydent Flat Peak Cap

Show your support with our flat peak snap back cap, with embroidered Trydent logo. Available in black only.

 

Standard Mantra 34% deposit

For those who can wait a little longer, pay for your Mantra in three stages. The deposit ensures your reservation and complete hull, when your hull is complete you will be emailed a picture and invoiced for the second payment. Upon completion of your Mantra you'll be emailed a picture again and invoiced for the final payment and shipping. The full paying supporters will get priority and a better price, so those opting for the staged payment plan will have to wait until January 2020 for their Mantra to be delivered.

 

Mantra RS 34% deposit

For those who can wait a little longer, pay for your Mantra RS in three stages. The deposit ensures your reservation and complete hull, when your hull is complete you will be emailed a picture and invoiced for the second payment. Upon completion of your Mantra you'll be emailed a picture again and invoiced for the final payment and shipping. The full paying supporters will get priority and better pricing, so those opting for the staged payment plan will have to wait until January 2020 for their Mantra to be delivered.

 

Mantra Fishing Package

A removable fishing package for your Mantra. Includes 2 stainless fishing rod holders, 1 extra seat, with integrated storage bin for tackle, wing mounted cargo nets.

 

 

 

ABOUT US

We're an international team, bringing together boat building ideas from east and west. Our founder is Australian, with a team of local craftsmen, and an italian mechanical engineer who has done work for both Ferrari and Ducati, we bring you the Mantra.

 

WHERE WE'RE AT

We are launching with indiegogo for three reasons, so that we can gauge how much of a demand there is for our watercraft, so that we can deliver our boats faster through pre-ordering, and so that we can offer the best direct to the consumer pricing by being able to control and bulk order manufacturing inventory. We are ready to start making units, we have everything we need to start production, and full control of the assembly process, which is being done at our own facility. Our engines are being sourced from Honda, one of the world's most reputable brands, and our other components are non proprietary boat parts, which are already being manufactured in bulk for the world market. We have designed our hull manufacturing and assembly process to be scale-able, so whether we receive only 20 Mantra orders or the full limited run of 680, we have ensured that we can deliver on time.

 

IMPACT

Your contribution will directly help to create employment in Tablas Island, Philippines, a place with very high unemployment and poverty rates.  Our manufacturing process is intentionally designed to be labor intensive, so we can hire more people and use less machines! We also pledge that for every kilogram of watercraft we sell, we will clean a kilogram of plastic waste from the ocean. So each Mantra watercraft perk ordered will sponsor the cleaning of 134kg of plastic garbage from the ocean. This will also further help create employment in our area.

 

WANT A FREE MANTRA?

We are offering a referral program for our supporters, just make sure you're logged in and have made a contribution (however small) to our campaign, then use the indiegogo referral button at the top of the page to share our campaign using your unique link. This program will last from the beginning to the end of our campaign, after the campaign finishes we'll notify you by email to arrange your rewards. Please read this article for more information on the rules of indiegogo referral programs.

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest

 

$1000 in referrals and you'll get a FREE Trydent Cap

$30,000 in referrals and you get a FREE standard Mantra watercraft, just pay shipping

$50,000 in referrals and you get a FREE Mantra RS watercraft, just pay shipping

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even if you don't want to or can't support our campaign financially, you can still help us out. Please hit that share button on our campaign if you think it's interesting or cool, every little bit of support helps us, and our local community.

 
 

DUTY AND TAXES

The Philippines is considered a developing country, and because the Mantra is made in Philippines it is exempt from duty under the Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) to signatory countries. Value added taxes vary from country to country, please check your local customs authorities for more information.

The Mantra is Duty Free to the following countries

USA

EU

UK

JAPAN

CANADA

Reduced duty rate to Australia

We're an international team, bringing together boat building ideas from east and west. Our founder is Australian, with a team of local craftsmen, and an italian mechanical engineer who has done work for both Ferrari and Ducati, we bring you the Mantra.

 
WHERE WE'RE AT
We are launching with indiegogo for three reasons, so that we can gauge how much of a demand there is for our watercraft, so that we can deliver our boats faster through pre-ordering, and so that we can offer the best direct to the consumer pricing by being able to control and bulk order manufacturing inventory. We are ready to start making units, we have everything we need to start production, and full control of the assembly process, which is being done at our own facility. Our engines are being sourced from Honda, one of the world's most reputable brands, and our other components are non proprietary boat parts, which are already being manufactured in bulk for the world market. We have designed our hull manufacturing and assembly process to be scale-able, so whether we receive only 20 Mantra orders or the full limited run of 680, we have ensured that we can deliver on time.
 
IMPACT
Your contribution will directly help to create employment in Tablas Island, Philippines, a place with very high unemployment and poverty rates.  Our manufacturing process is intentionally designed to be labor intensive, so we can hire more people and use less machines! We also pledge that for every kilogram of watercraft we sell, we will clean a kilogram of plastic waste from the ocean. So each Mantra watercraft perk ordered will sponsor the cleaning of 134kg of plastic garbage from the ocean. This will also further help create employment in our area.
 
WANT A FREE MANTRA?
We are offering a referral program for our supporters, just make sure you're logged in and have made a contribution (however small) to our campaign, then use the indiegogo referral button at the top of the page to share our campaign using your unique link. This program will last from the beginning to the end of our campaign, after the campaign finishes we'll notify you by email to arrange your rewards. Please read this article for more information on the rules of indiegogo referral programs.
https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-To-Participate-In-A-Referral-Contest
 
$1000 in referrals and you'll get a FREE Trydent Cap
$30,000 in referrals and you get a FREE standard Mantra watercraft, just pay shipping
$50,000 in referrals and you get a FREE Mantra RS watercraft, just pay shipping
 OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPEven if you don't want to or can't support our campaign financially, you can still help us out. Please hit that share button on our campaign if you think it's interesting or cool, every little bit of support helps us, and our local community.  DUTY AND TAXESThe Philippines is considered a developing country, and because the Mantra is made in Philippines it is exempt from duty under the Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) to signatory countries. Value added taxes vary from country to country, please check your local customs authorities for more information.The Mantra is Duty Free to the following countriesUSAEUUKJAPANCANADAReduced duty rate to Australia

story:
/ ENGLISH VERSION / (version française plus bas)

After building a series of custom motorcycles in 2017, Dab Design has designed its first custom motorcycle kit for all BMW R nineT owners : the Enhanced Racer kit. The ER kit will drastically change the design of your bike without modifying anything on the factory chassis, retaining reliability, performance and safety. 

No grinding, no welding, no long waits, only basic tools are needed to customize your one-of-a-kind motorcycle. Our kit is for any rider who wants to customize the R nineT in their garage with standard tools and that doesn't require any welding skills or special equipment.

Features

The ER Kit is a bolt-on kit that allows you to customize your stock R nineT by yourself without any special mechanical skills, to transform it into a one-of-a-kind motorcycle.

Available in BMW color themes: 

Other colors can be selected on demand.

1/ Front Fairing

Maintained by its metal structure mounted on the factory chassis, the front fairing incorporates the new lighting system : a dual position lenticular optics coupled with a led bar acting as a position light. 

 2/ Front mudguard/Fork cover

Our front fender comes with an ultra neat design which has two functions : fender and fork cover.

 3/ Tail

The new rear shell and side covers greatly changes the look of the original rear of your R nineT. You can also remove it at will and mount the passenger seat if you want to carry someone with you.

 4/ Radiator side guards

Your radiator will be protected with 2 side guards participating in the racing aspect of the ER kit. 

 5/ Dab Design CNC logos

Final detail : 2 CNC Aluminum Dab Design emblems which will make your bike make your bike look like a real gem.

 

6/ Dual position lenticular headlight E4 CERTIFIED & LED daylight strip E4 CERTIFIED

Asymmetry is the signature of BMW Motorrad, and to keep its essence, we have selected these two perfect, street legal lighting components, that will add style and safety to your bike.

Design

 

We have reconstructed the BMR R nine T in 3D with 3D scanners, to record as accurately as possible, all dimensions and details. Once the motorcycle has been virtualized, all our components have been carefully designed and simulated in 3D and then sent to our manufacturer in France. 

For pilots who want to carry someone occasionally, the rear shell can still be removed and replaced by the BMW passenger seat.

New bike, new challenge. The keywords of this project were: "Style, Racing, Innovation, Design and ... Safety".

The trend of custom is widespread around the world, but there are still some sensitive topics ... like the conformity and security of your bike. As a custom motorcycles builder, we decided to offer a kit with a completely unique design and 100% safe. That is to say that the kit can be mounted without modifying anything on the factory motorcycle to keep the stock bike structure and its conformity.

 

 

What do I need to install the ER kit?

 

A 2014 or later model BMW R nineT 1200. The ER kit can also be mounted on the BMW R nineT Pure and Racer, only the front fender needs to be adapted.

Basic tools (sockets, screwdrivers, ... )

Basic wiring skills : the front headlight requires rewiring the lenticular optic and the LED strip.

The desire to ride a unique motorcycle

Note: If you like the others parts mounted on our demonstration R nineT, we have made a suggestion of parts on our website especially for you. 

 

Our Offer

 

Our Mission

As a custom motorcycle company, we are aware that customizing a motorcycle is a really tough work. You are starting with a basic motorcycle that you have to transform into a one-of-a-kind machine. That means a lot of time-consuming manufacturing steps (welding, rewiring, bodywork, metal shaping, ...). 

We want to make customization accessible to as many people as possible through innovative custom parts. We want to stimulate riders to customize their own custom motorcycle, which gives a personal satisfaction that you will not find anywhere else.

The ER kit has been tested, validated and approved by our manufacturer. Right now, the only thing we need is to raise some money in order to pay manufacturing costs linked to production like molds and materials.

Over the last months, we received a lot emails about doing our own line of custom products.

Time has come.

By backing us today, you will allow us to commercialize the ER kit and also democratize our vision of customization. 

About Dab Design

By mastering the unexpected alliance of new technologies and craftsmanship, Dab Design shakes up the custombike rules and reinvents a little more each day its own playground.

Thanks to new manufacturing and design technologies, each step of a project is redefined, from the visualization of the final product to the manufacturing of custom parts. This atypical vision is the essence and the strength of Dab Design, founded by Simon Dabadie in 2015.

Simon is a kind of mixture of engineering, design and motorcycling.

He worked in these new emerging industries such as 3D Printing, 3D software publishing and also in the world of custombikes, especially for Roland Sands Design and Deus Ex Machina. With all these emerging technologies, Simon set himself the challenge of customizing motorcycles in a totally antagonistic way to the oldschool spirit, integrating new technologies into the creative process.

This is how Dab Design was born. The desire to create exclusive motorcycles in a very specific way. 


They talk about Dab Design

 

 The Bike Shed - Article

 

 

The Arsenale - Article 

 

BikeBound - Article

 


 

/ VERSION FRANÇAISE /

Après avoir réalisé une série de motos customs en 2017, Dab Design a créé son premier custom kit pour tous les possesseurs de BMW R nineT : le Enhanced Racer kit. Le kit ER change drastiquement le design de votre moto sans rien modifier sur le chassis d'origine dans le but de conserver sa fiabilité, performance et sécurité.

Pas de meulage, pas de soudure, pas de longues attentes, juste quelques outils basiques sont nécessaires pour customiser votre moto unique. Notre kit est pour n'importe quel motard souhaitant customiser sa BMW R nineT soi-même dans son garage avec des outils standards et sans connaissances en soudure ou d'équipement spécial.

Caractéristiques

Le kit ER est un kit "bolt-on" qui vous permet de customiser votre R nineT d'origine vous même, sans aucunes connaissances mécaniques nécessaires, et qui la transforme en une moto exclusive.

 

Disponible dans les coloris BMW :

D'autres couleurs peuvent être appliquées sur demande.

 

1/ Bulle avant

Maintenue par sa structure en métal montée sur le chassis d'origine, la bulle intègre le nouveau système d'éclairage : un feu lenticulaire double position couplé à une barre LED fonctionnant comme feu de position.

 2/ Garde-boue avant/Cache fourche

Notre garde-boue avant possède un design ultra clean et a deux fonctions : garde-boue et cache fourche. 

 3/ Arrière

La coque arrière et les écopes latérales change drastiquement ce qu'était l'arrière de votre R nineT. Vous pouvez aussi la démonter et monter la selle passager si vous souhaitez porter occasionnellement quelqu'un. 

 4/ Ecopes de radiateur

Votre radiateur sera protégé grâce aux deux écopes participant à l'aspect racing du kit ER. 

5/ Insignes Dab Design usinées

Le détail final : deux insignes Dab Design en aluminium taillé dans la masse qui fera paraître moto comme un véritable bijou. 

6/ Feu lenticulaire double position Certifié E4 & feu de position LED Certifié E4 

L'asymétrie est la signature de BMW Motorrad, et pour garder cette essence de la marque nous avons choisi deux parfaits systèmes d'éclairage homologués qui donneront à votre moto du style et de la sécurité.

Design

 

Nous avons complètement scanner en 3D la BMW R nineT pour récupérer toutes les dimensions. Une fois la moto virtualisée, tous nos composants ont été conçu et simulé soigneusement en 3D et ensuite envoyé à notre fabricant Français.

Pour les pilotes voulant transporter occasionnellement quelqu’un, la coque arrière peut être démontée et remplacée par une selle passager. 

Nouvelle moto, nouveau défi. Les mots d’ordre de ce projet ont été : « Style, Racing, Innovation, Design et … Sécurité ».

Malgré que la tendance du custom soit répandue partout dans le monde, il reste encore des sujets sensibles … dont la conformité et la sécurité de votre moto.   En tant que constructeur, j’ai décidé de proposer une moto au style complètement unique et 100% safe. C’est à dire que la conception de la moto a été pensé de manière à ne pas modifier la structure d'origine de la moto afin de conserver sa conformité.

De quoi ai-je besoin pour installer le kit ?

Une BMW R nineT 1200 de 2014 ou plus. Le kit ER peut être aussi monté sur la BMW R nineT Pure et Racer, seul le garde-boue avant devra être adapté.

Des outils basiques

Un peu de connaissances en câblage pour connecter le feu lenticulaire et la barre LED.

L'envie d'avoir une machine unique 

 

Note : Si les autres pièces montées sur notre R nineT vous plaisent, nous avons préparé spécialement pour vous une suggestion d'accessoires sur notre site web.

 

Notre Offre

Notre Mission

En tant qu'entreprise de motos customs, nous sommes conscients de la complexité de customiser sa moto soi-même. Commencer avec une moto très standard pour ensuite la transformer en une machine unique : cela implique des étapes de fabrication intenses et chronophages (soudure, électronique, carrosserie, metal shaping, ...).

Nous voulons rendre la customisation accessible au plus grand nombre de personnes à travers nos accessoires innovants. Nous souhaitons encourager l'enthousiasme de construire sa propre moto et la satisfaction personnelle qui en découle.

Le kit ER a été testé, validé et aussi approuvé par notre fabricant. Aujourd'hui, la seule chose dont nous avons besoin est d'atteindre notre objectif financier pour financer les coûts de fabrication liés à la production du kit comme les moules et les matériaux.

Nos motos ont suscité beaucoup d'intérêt et nous recevons depuis le début des demandes pour produire notre propre gamme d'accessoires. 

Le temps est venu.

En nous soutenant aujourd'hui, vous allez rendre possible la commercialisation du kit ER et vous nous aiderez à démocratiser notre vision de la customisation. 

A propos de Dab Design

 

En maîtrisant l’alliance inattendue des nouvelles technologies et de l’artisanat, Dab Design bouscule les codes des motos customs et réinvente un peu plus chaque jour son propre terrain de jeu. 

A travers l’utilisation des nouvelles technologies de fabrication et de conception, chaque phase de la réalisation de projets est redéfinie, de la visualisation du produit fini à la conception de pièces sur-mesure. C’est ce background, pour le moins atypique, qui fait la force et l’essence même de Dab Design, fondé en 2015.

Simon est un mélange d’ingénierie, de design et de fascination pour les 2 roues.

Il a eu l’occasion de travailler dans ces nouvelles industries émergentes comme l’Impression 3D, l’édition de logiciels 3D et également dans le monde du custom, notamment pour Roland Sands Design et Deus Ex Machina.   Avec toutes ces technologies naissantes, il s'est lancé le défi de personnaliser les motos d’une manière totalement antagoniste à l’esprit oldschool, en intégrant les nouvelles technologies dans le processus créatif.

C’est ainsi que Dab Design est né. Le désir de créer des motos exclusives fabriquées d'une manière unique.

Ils parlent de Dab Design

 

 The Bike Shed - Article

 

 

The Arsenale - Article 

 

BikeBound - Article

story:
POWERFUL MOTORIZED INLINE SKATES THAT WILL BLOW YOUR SOCKS OFF. JUST STEP IN AND GO. (Street shoes, foot wrap or dress shoes all work fine.)

LEARN MORE ABOUT THIS AMAZING GREEN TECHNOLOGY AND ITS EARTH FRIENDLY POTENTIAL IN THE GALLERY TAB.

MOTORBLADES.  Fun, personal motorized transportation to school or work, for a strong workout, or just cruising down the street.  More convenient then scooters or electric bikes. As you reach your destination just throw them in your backpack. Click on the MOTORBLADES link.   http://motorblades.com/

Backers, we are raising funds for the final software tweaking,  manufacturing, beta testing and inventory. We have inline skate working prototypes developed over 13 years. This can be the start of something big!  The final wheel frame and battery pack will be shaped a little differently than shown in the photos. Our Indiegogo Goal is an honest assessment of our capital needs to get you in MOTORBLADES and down the road.  As we reach our goal on Indiegogo we can produce the inline skates and other awards to fill our obligation to the fans of MOTORBLADES.  Also we have partnered with some very talented and skilled companies and individuals:

  • Electrical and Mechanical Engineers
  • Industrial Designer
  • Plastics Molding Company
  • Manufacturing Company
  • Powerslide, a dominate force for in-line skates in design, manufacturing, distribution, marketing, and sales with outlets worldwide.    http://www.powerslide.de/

We need your help Backers to make it all happen! Not only will you feel good about helping us get started, you will have a ton of fun with MOTORBLADES. Generations of MOTORBLADERS will thank you!

 

 

 

 

IMPACT ON ALL OF US

Adam Brandley our CEO and President and our Chief Engineer Rick Irwin have developed a electromagnetic direct drive motor that is scalable, stackable, develops high torque and high efficiency at low speeds and works underwater.  MOTORBLADES is a totally green motor technology that can be sized for use in  electric vehicles and larger applications such as large wind turbines, saving us millions of dollars. 

This powerful technology was developed in over 13 years of research and development. Other similar technologies exist, but our controller, software design and the architecture creates a powerful environment that cannot be equaled.  The motorized inline skate for recreation and personal transportation is our first commercial application. With your help and support other applications, such as an electric vehicle will follow (prototype shown below). Together we can lessen our dependency on fossil fuels.  

I joined the effort several years ago and currently serve as the Project Manager and Global Licensing Director and have done the photo work and layout and design for the web sites. I also sit on the Board of Directors and very excited to be a part of such an environmentally friendly technology. Thank you so much for your support.  Dick Freeman
