Manufacturing Company

Powerslide, a dominate force for in-line skates in design, manufacturing, distribution, marketing, and sales with outlets worldwide.    http://www.powerslide.de/

We need your help Backers to make it all happen! Not only will you feel good about helping us get started, you will have a ton of fun with MOTORBLADES. Generations of MOTORBLADERS will thank you!
 
 







 


 
IMPACT ON ALL OF US
Adam Brandley our CEO and President and our Chief Engineer Rick Irwin have developed a electromagnetic direct drive motor that is scalable, stackable, develops high torque and high efficiency at low speeds and works underwater.  MOTORBLADES is a totally green motor technology that can be sized for use in  electric vehicles and larger applications such as large wind turbines, saving us millions of dollars.  
This powerful technology was developed in over 13 years of research and development. Other similar technologies exist, but our controller, software design and the architecture creates a powerful environment that cannot be equaled.  The motorized inline skate for recreation and personal transportation is our first commercial application. With your help and support other applications, such as an electric vehicle will follow (prototype shown below). Together we can lessen our dependency on fossil fuels.  
I joined the effort several years ago and currently serve as the Project Manager and Global Licensing Director and have done the photo work and layout and design for the web sites. I also sit on the Board of Directors and very excited to be a part of such an environmentally friendly technology. Thank you so much for your support.  Dick Freeman

story:
What is Kohortis?

Kohortis is a complex (yet easy-to-use) system designed for transportation and storage of tabletop gaming armies. Its basic concepts are comfort and functionality as well as adaptation to user's needs, and its principal advantages are versatility and maximum protection.

What makes Kohortis special?

Bags:

Our bags are made of durable materials and designed to ease the access to your models. They include a shoulder-strap, a  handle and additional pockets, which allow the comfortable transport of accessories such as dice, tape measures and rulebooks.

(click here to find out more about our bags)

Boxes:

They are cheaper, but just as useful alternative to bags. They are made of durable cardboard and come with a handle. 

(click here to find out more about our boxes)

Foams:

We offer nearly 100 types of foams (including foams designed for specific games) - allowing you to always find a perfect fit for your model. The smaller foam sizes allow for better usage of space inside your bag and higher degree of protection. 

If you don't find the desired kind of foam, we also offer the Pick and Pluck(raster) foams as well as custom-made foams.

(click here to find out more about our foams - sizes, shapes and types)

Magnetic system:

Kohortis magnetic system is an alternative way of transporting and storing your models. It is designed for armies that contain multiple models in specific formations and for models composed of delicate parts.


(click here to find out more about our magnetic solution)

Versatility:

All the elements described above can be used together to fulfill your individual needs (for example, you can use the magnetic system and various types of foams together in your bag).

Using the same set of sizes for boxes, bags, foams and magnetic system makes it possible to combine all those solutions.


We developed five types of containers named after Roman gods. Boxes and bags of similar type have the same inner measurements:



Other accessories:

We have also prepared many additional accessories, which will make using the Kohortis system even easier.

Forms - which ease the process of gluing your foams.

Perks:

Since Kohortis is composed of many different elements that can be joined into nigh limitless number of sets, we don't want to force predefined sets here. For this reason, you can choose to use entire amount of your contribution to compose individual sets out of the unlocked products from our catalogue, and in addition to that you will receive special gifts (many of which are limited-edition and only available in this campaign):

$10 - Freeman
- $10 to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue(For more information, click here.)

$25 - Citizen
- $25 to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue (For more information, click here.)
- one gagdet of your choice(For more information, click here.)

$50 - Centurion
- $55 to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue (For more information, click here.)
- two gagdets of your choice (For more information, click here.)
- "A" pattern t-shirt (For more information, click here.)
- free shipping in Poland

$100 - Patrician
- $110 to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue (For more information, click here.)
-  three gagdets of your choice (For more information, click here.)
- "A" pattern t-shirt (For more information, click here.)
- free shipping in Poland

$250 - Senator
- $275 to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue (For more information, click here.)
- four gagdets of your choice (For more information, click here.)
- "B" pattern t-shirt (For more information, click here.)
- free shipping in Poland

$500 - Consul
- $550 to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue (For more information, click here.)
- five gagdets of your choice - including a personalized measure (For more information, click here.)
- "C" pattern t-shirt (For more information, click here.)
- free shipping in Europe

$1000 - Caesar
- $1100$ to spend on all Kohortis products in our catalogue (For more information, click here.)
- six gagdets of your choice - including a personalized measure (For more information, click here.)
- "C" pattern t-shirt (For more information, click here.)
- foam form or (in case of magnetic system) 1 combination wrench and 1 ratchet wrench
- free shipping 

Click here to see sample sets for each Perk level.

You can use our web catalogue to check how much you can get out of your perk.


Campaign:

The development and pre-production of Kohortis are almost complete now. We are ready to start production as soon as this campaign ends. The funding from the project will enable us to fully fund the production, but will also help us to support the long-range financial commitment to develop Kohortis as a full product line.

The success of this Campaign will also allow us to properly fund future developments of this product line.

An additional benefit of launching Kohortis as a campaign is that it will provide us with valuable feedback from you, our backers, to help us direct the future development.


Campaign stages:

We intend to further develop Kohortis with new exciting products in next stages of the campaign.

Stages:

5,753$

Our first, basic goal. Once reached, following products will become available:

- Jupiter bag (click here to find out more)

- Mercury box (click here to find out more)

- Mars box (click here to find out more)

- Magnetic system (click here to find out more)

- Almost 100 types of foams, including:

Standard foams (click here to find out more)

Pick and Pluck foams (click here to find out more)

Custom made foams (click here to find out more)



7,509$

Following products will become available:

- Pluto box (click here to find out more)

- Jupiter box (click here to find out more)


11,506$

Twice the initial goal. Following products will become available.

Double foams

- Double separators

- Double Pick and Pluck foams

- Double custom made foams

Double platforms for the magnetic system

15,044$

Following products will become available:

- Mars bag

18,395$

Following products will become available:

- Pluto bag

20,476$

Four times the initial goal. Following products will become available:

- Quadruple separators

- Quadruple Pick and Pluck foams

- Quadruple custom made foams

- Another bag size: Mercury

About us:

We are a group of hobbyists based in Krakow, Poland, and we have over ten years of experience in wargaming. We often attend various wargaming events and know the typical issues players face with transporting their army and keeping it protected and the needs it creates. We have founded our company to address those needs.

Other forms of support:

You like our campaign, but you can't or don't want to pledge any money? You can still help us out!

Help us promote our project. Like us on Facebook, share the link to this campaign, mention it on your blog or simply tell your friends about it.

We would love to hear what you think - don't hesitate to leave your comments, as we will surely make use of any feedback that will help to make this project even better.

Webpage:

If you want to find more detailed information about Kohortis, visit our webpage:

(indiegogo.kohortis.com.pl.)

story:
An Innovative technology that not just re-invented the wheel, it re-invented the bike.

The dream of developing a future bicycle began when I was a teenager, and I have been trying and searching for development concepts for years. 
The SuperWheel project started in 2014 and later working with two Irish universities (DKIT and DCU)  and was supported by Enterprise Ireland and Climate-KIC programmes. (EU acceleration programme focused on climate impact by cleantech commercialization.) 

After numerous prototypes, modifications and testing (both in house and by public) within the past four years, including the public trial run event in DKIT this July. This revolutionary Weight (mass) to energy conversion technology (WTECT) is now ready to be introduced to the world.

Who is talking

 

Turn your bike into a super performing power-assisted bike within minutes and without a battery.

  • Daily commuter, casual rider or weekend sports enthusiast? SuperWheel uses the reactive force of your bodyweight to generate additional torque to take you further, faster without breaking a sweat.
  • Do you want to arrive at work fresh after your commute during the week, and to burn extra calories at the weekend? Simply replace the SuperWheel with a standard wheel, it only takes a few minutes, and you're  ready to hit the pavement or the hills. No need to own two bikes!!
  • SuperWheel has no limits!
    • No Plugs.
    • No Sweat
    • No Limits.
    • Works at all speeds - unlike a regular e-bike
    • Has no range limit -you have the freedom to go as far as you want.
    • Has no battery, no hassle of regular charging, expensive to replace the end of life battery and no toxic e-waste.

Power assisted by the reactive force of your body weight.

SuperWheel continually diverts the reactive force of your body weight (ground reaction force)to the springs on the upper section of the wheel during rotation. The spring compression (from approx. 9 to 12 o'clock position) and decompression( from 12 to 9 position), the impact on the rim section caused by the compresses and decompresses of the spring mechanism during rotation providing additional momentum for the rotation, combined with our patent pending - Internal Drive system, provides simple and reliable power assistance and makes for a comfortable ride.

SuperWheel

  • Gives you more than a 30% power boost
  • Reliable, robust and low maintenance
  • Has no battery, charging or range problems
  • No Max. power assisted speed limit..Power assistance unlimited
  • Environmental friendly and no toxic e-waste.
  • Sustainable, a bike is for life and not just for a few years.
  • Light weight and without a battery means you can take your bike anywhere.

A new chapter in cycling

The SuperWheel (WTECT) is the first technology using the 'Ground reaction force' of weight to generate additional energy to improve cycling efficiency, https://lnkd.in/gWXZkn2

The impact of this energy can been seen on the bottom part of every car's tyres. The SuperWheel system  produces power assistance with an unlimited range. SuperWheel assists you to cycle further, faster and easier. Also you don't have any ongoing battery charging costs. 

SuperWheel 700c model suitable for road and hybrid bike with  (700mm,27",28") wheels.

The Secret of SuperWheel

The SuperWheel (WTECT) comprises of two mechanism- The external springs mechanism and the Internal drive, both system are powered by the reactive force of weight during rotation. 

We are currently working on production model development to improve the aerodynamic design and reduce the overall wheel weight. We definitely need your support to complete this stage of the journey. 

Overall we need €50,000 to fund the first production run, moulding for this run, compliance testing to ISO standards and initial manufacturing costs. With your support the first SuperWheel will be ready within the next 6 months.

SuperWheel - Future Impacts

Fundamentally bicycle technology has changed little over the past one hundred years. This means that cycling is hard work, in particular cycling uphill or for long distances.

Currently E-Bikes provide the only technology that can improve cycling efficiency. However, they are restricted by the range limitations due to the on-board battery technology. 

Some materials used in E-Bike batteries are toxic to the environment.

SuperWheel was developed as an alternative to electric power to allow the user enjoy cycling without the hard work. Simply replace the back wheel of your bike to a SuperWheel and get immediate power assistance to aid you when cycling uphill making your long cycling journeys an enjoyable experience.

SuperWheel technology maintains the traditional value of the bicycle, it’s convenient to use and 100% human powered and lasts a very, very long time.

Why we need your help? 

The prototype development and the testing trials of SuperWheel have been completed and we are currently fine tuning the design, optimising parts, configurations and logistics.

We now need a large batch order to start production and are reaching out to the Indiegogo community for support to raise the required funds to get this exciting product to the market. 

By backing our campaign you’ll get a once in a lifetime opportunity to get  up to 54% off the retail cost of SuperWheel, be one of the first to own one and help revolutionise cycling.

Please share and support our campaign. 

Timeline

2014

March - The SuperWheel concept was born

September - Development testing with a wooden prototype.

2015

March - Awarded R&D funding from Enterprise Ireland and began to work with Dublin City University (DCU)

2016

February- The virtual prototyping, computerised evaluation and prototype design completed by DCU.

June - Prototype development begins and supported by ACT Automation, County Down, N Ireland and Dublin City University.

2017

October - Design breakthrough with prototype KM1. Ongoing development and testing continues.

2018

March - Project receives support from Climate KIC Accelerator

April - Start of public tests.

July - Pre-launch and public trial event held in Dundalk Institute of Technology. Successfully completed 23 trial runs with fantastic feedback from users. 

August - The final prototype KM9 completed.

November - Crowdfunding campaign (scheduled)

2019

January - collecting order information.  

February - Manufacturing and testing begins.

April - Final product standard testing.

May - Shipping to awesome backers.

       

                                                        

Meet the SuperWheel team

                            

                    Oisin                 Simon,        Leigh              Charlie,

                                             Founder                                  Co. founder

“Biking is something we are very passionate about, We aim to develop the most eco friendly and sustainable bike of the future”. The SuperWheel team

 Kam Sing Chan

I prefer people to call me Simon . My passion to develop a new bicycle began when I was a teenager. I believe that the development of bike technology must be based on fully utilizing human generated power and I have spent years researching and developing this technology. My other inventions including the a high efficiency bike pedal that has successfully completed the proof of principle testing with the University of Ulster in 2013 and is currently licensed for manufacture. 

  Charlie Fegan

Engineering is Charlie's passion, He is a creative and experienced engineer who loves exploring new technology and has been a partner in an engineering company for the past 19 years.

story:
Nowa strona 1

English version    |  Deutsche Sprachversion    |  Polska wersja 

Motorcycling is a beautiful hobby, but motorcyclists are more exposed to be injured in an accident or collision than other road users. Almost every motorcyclist experienced more or less risky traffic incident...


SAMO - The electronic system which we want to build is plugged into the motorcycle illumination installation and substantially increases the safety of traveling by motorbike!

 

FEATURES.

- Turning on the stop lights during engine braking (when the driver do not press the brake lever).
Motorcycle structure and lightweight allows you to achieve great acceleration, that causes powerful engine braking as well. There are well known situations where unnecessary danger is caused because neither car or motorcycle did not notice that vehicle in front of it is braking. Especially in motorcycles where “the stop lights” is activated by sensor in a braking lever. The stop light will not activate during the engine braking – when the throttle grip is released. At that moment the speed loss is huge and could easily reach 2m/s! Quite a lot of experienced motorcyclists instinctively pushes the braking lever gently during engine braking – even if situation do not require – just to announce the speed loss to other vehicles. And this is the moment where SAMO – The Safety Ride Module comes into action. Thanks to the built-in accelerometer our module by itself detects the braking power and automatically signals this activity by using the stop lights.


- Switching Emergency Lights on (turn lights) during emergency braking. Unexpected situations on the road are very dangerous – also from the vehicles behind us. Driver behind you may not see the cause of your emergency braking, therefore it is very important to warn the driver about this situation as soon as it possible. In brand new cars emergency braking is indicated by emergency lights – our module automatically warns vehicles behind us by flashing turn lights in case of emergency braking if the braking force exceeds a certain value.


- Increased the STOP signalisation. Motorcycle equipped in our module warns drivers about braking much more efficiently. Instead of constant light with no intensity change, our system instantly flashes 4-5 times before the STOP light illuminates continuously.
A lot of “Safe Motorcycle Driving” manuals recommends to push braking lever several times before the proper braking – from now on, our module will do it for us.


- The ALARM function.If you connect the module to the ignition wire, the simple alarm mode would be turned on. The Alarm turns on automatically a few seconds after turning the ignition switch off. The Module signals alarm with turn lights, stop light and horn caused by motorcycle vibration or inclination – until the owner switches the ignition to “ACC” position.

-The SOS function. On the road sometimes we can face some unexpected dangerous situations – collision or glide. It is extremely important to inform other road users about collision instantly. Using turn lights, stop light and klaxon, overturned motorcycle efficiently informs about danger. The signalisation continues until we switch the ignition off, or pull up the motorcycle.

animation

HOW DOES IT WORK?

The module is based on a 3-axis accelerometer, which transmits information to the processor about position, acceleration, and braking of motorcycle. Software compares the sensor readings and indicates the appropriate behavior of the vehicle using the brake light, turn lights and klaxon.

 

INSTALLATION.

Module installation is very simple. Stick the cover to a flat horizontal surface (such as in the glove recess under the seat).

- Connect the module to the lights wiring, turning lights, battery, ignition - according to the scheme:

- The module is compatible with all motorcycles and LED lights (also bulb lights).

 

WORK TO DO...

Currently, we have a working prototype of the device, but it requires a lot of work and money.

The minimum amount of required components, PCBs, covers are expensive, so we look forward for YOUR help! For collected funds we are going to finish the project - the final version will be made in SMD technology - so that the device will miniaturized and reliable!

For collected funds we are going to finish the project - the final version will be made in SMD technology - so that the device will miniaturized and reliable!

The device in the pictures is just a visualization.

Please notice, that by supporting our project, you are not only the founder of the next gadget – you personally improve the safety of motorcyclists on the road!

THE TEAM:

KAMIL

tests / amendments / tests...

 ANTON

artwork / advertising / sales

 PIOTR

CEO / programmming

PERKS.

1€  and more – Gratitudes and place on the list of donors on our website!
25€ – T-shirt with print - a practical gift for motorcyclist!
89€ – One of the first mass-produced devices in a special price!
110€ – Limited Edition Module - only 100 pieces, distinctive pattern on the cover with a numbered special limited series!
165€ – You got 2 motorcycles? Get two Modules in special price!

 

find us on: www.motomonster.com.pl  www.facebook.com/motomonsterpl contact: mail@motomonster.com.pl

 Deutsche Sprachversion   

 

Motorradfahren ist ein wunderbares Hobby, jedoch sind Motorradfahrer häufiger als anderen Verkehrsteilnehmer Verletzungen bei Unfällen oder Kollisionen ausgesetzt. Mit Sicherheit hat jeder Motorradfahrer mehr oder weniger risikoreiche Verkehrssituationen erlebt...


Unsere Elektronikeinheit, die wir bauen wollen, verbunden mit der Motorradinstallation, erhöht dank der Beleuchtung unseres Motorrads enorm die Sicherheit wehrend des Reisens!

 

FUNKTIONEN.

- Einschalten des Stopplichts während des bremsen mit dem Motor (wenn der Motorradfahrer die Bremse nicht betätigt).
Das Motorrad erlaubt es, dank seiner Konstruktion, blitzartig zu beschleunigen und die leichte Masse verursachen, dass das abbremsen mit dem Motor ebenfalls sehr stark ist und das Motorrad schnell an Geschwindigkeit verliert. Persönlich war ich Zeuge von einigen Ereignissen bei denen es zu unnötigen Gefahrensituationen gekommen ist, da der Autofahrer bzw. Motorradfahrer das vor ihm stoppende Gefährt nicht bemerkt hat. Vor allem bei Motorrädern, ist das „Stopplicht“ erst dann sichtbar wenn wir den Bremshebel betätigt und nicht wenn wir die Hand vom Gasnehmen und mit dem Motor abbremsen. Der Geschwindigkeitsverlust ist gar nicht so klein und kann sogar 2 Meter pro Sekunde betragen! Viele der erfahrenen Biker, auch wenn die Situation dies nicht erfordert, betätigen nur leicht den Bremshebel, wenn sie vom Gas gehen, einfach nur deswegen um über ihren Geschwindigkeitswechsel zu informieren. Und genau hier kommt unser System zum Einsatz, das allein dank seiner eingebauten Beschleunigungssensoren die Bremskräfte erkennt und diese durch das Stopplicht wiedergibt.


 

- Einschalten der Warnblinker (Blinker) während einer Notbremsung. Ungewollte Situationen auf der Fahrbahn, auch von Fahrzeugen die sich hinter uns befinden, sind ein großes Sicherheitsrisiko. Der Fahrer hinter dir kann wohlmöglich den Grund deines Blitzartigen Bremsens nicht erkennen. Es ist deswegen lohnenswert, das er sieht das du stehst! Neue Autos deuten eine Notbremsung mit den Warnblinkern an. Unser System macht dies genauso, indem es die Blinker einschaltet und diese dann das blinken anfangen, wenn die Bremskraft einen voreingestellten Wert überschreitet.


 

- Änderung der Art und Weise der Signalisierung des Stopplichts. Ein Motorrad das mit unserem Modul ausgestattet ist, informiert den hinter uns sich befindenden Fahrer viel wirksamer das wir bremsen. Es macht den Fahrer, der sich hinter uns befindet, auf uns aufmerksam da das Stopplicht zuerst 4 bis 5 blinkt und erst dann normal leuchtet. Viele Lehrbücher die sich mit sicherem
Motorradfahren befassen, beschreiben, dass man zuerst den Bremshebel einigemal leicht betätigen soll bevor man den eigentlichen Bremsvorgang einleitet.


 

- Alarmanlage. Das Gerät kann zusätzlich an die Zündung angeschlossen werden und somit als einfache Alarmanlage dienen. Die Alarmanlage wir automatisch, nach einigen Sekunden, eingeschaltet nachdem wir die Zündung abgeschaltet haben. Jegliche Neigungen oder Vibrationen werden von dem Gerät erkannt und die Alarmanlage aktiviert. Am Motorrad wird dies durch die Blinker, Beleuchtung sowie der Hupe signalisiert und erst dann ausgeschaltet, wenn der Eigentümer des Motorrads den Schlüssel auf die Position „ACC“ dreht.

-S.O.S. Funktion. Na drodze może nas spotkać również jakieś nieprzyjemne zdarzenie… Auf der Straße können wir auf verschiedenen unangenehme Situationen stoßen wie z.B. Kollisionen, ins Rutschen geraten, usw.. Hier ist es wichtig, dass die anderen Verkehrsteilnehmer auf unser umgefallenes Motorrad und uns aufmerksam gemacht werden. Dank der Blinker, der Stoppleuchte sowie der Hupe die angehen, wird auf uns, das umgefallene Motorrad und die Gefahrensituation hingewiesen. Das Motorrad macht auf sich aufmerksam bis die Zündung abgestellt wird oder das Motorrad aufgestellt wird.

> Flash Animation <

WIE FUNKTIONIERT DAS?

Das Modul basiert auf einem Dreiachsenbeschleunigungssensor, der den Prozessor über die Lage, Beschleunigung und das abbremsen des Motorrads informiert. Die integrierte Software vergleicht die durch die Sensoren angegebenen Parametern mit den vorgegebenen und signalisiert es anhand der Stoppleuchte, Blinkern und/oder Hube.

 

Montage.

Das anbringen des Moduls ist kinderleicht.

Man muss das Gehäuse an einer flachen und ebenen Stelle am Motorrad ankleben, z.B. in der Ablage unter dem Sitz und es mit den Kabel der Leuchten, Blinker, Akku und Zündschloss verbinden - laut Schema:

Das Gerät ist mit allen Motorräder und allen Leuchten wie LED oder klassischen Glühbirnen kompatibel.

 

Was muss getan werden…

Aktuell verfügen wir über einen funktionierenden Prototyp, jedoch verlangt es hier noch Arbeit sowie Geld…

Alle Bauteile die benötigt werden, PCB Boards und Gehäuse sind recht teuer, deswegen zählen wir auf EURE Hilfe!

Mit dem gesammelten Kapital sind wir in der Lage das Projekt zu Ende zu führen – die finale Version entsteht im SMD Verfahren. Dank dessen wird das Gerät kleiner und absolut zuverlässig!

*Das Gerät auf den Bildern ist nur eine Visualisierung.

Seit euch dessen bewusst, dass wenn Ihr unser Projekt unterstützt, Ihr nicht nur Geldspender für ein weiteres Gadget seid, sonder zur Sicherheit für zahlreiche Motorradfahrer beiträgt!

 

TEAM.

KAMIL

Tests / Fixes / Tests...

 ANTON

Grafik / Werbung / Vertrieb

 PIOTR

CEO / Programmierung

 

AUSZEICHNUNGEN.

1€  oder mehr – Vielen Dank für Ihre Unterstützung!
25€ – T-Shirt mit Print – praktisches Geschenk für Motorradfahrer!
89€ – eines der ersten Seriengeräte zum Sonderpreis!
110€ – Modul mit einer limitierten Serie – Nur 100 Stück!
165€ – Sie haben 2 Fahrräder? Kaufen Sie 2 Module zum Sonderpreis!

 

finden uns auf:: www.motomonster.com.pl  www.facebook.com/motomonsterpl kontakt: mail@motomonster.com.pl

Polska wersja 

 

Jazda motocyklem to piękne hobby, niestety motocykliści są bardziej narażeni na urazy podczas wypadku, czy kolizji niż inni użytkownicy drogi.
Niemal każdy motocyklista przeżył mniej lub bardziej ryzykowne zdarzenie drogowe...


Układ elektroniczny który chcemy zbudować wpięty w instalację motocykla, za pomocą fabrycznego oświetlenia znacząco podnosi bezpieczeństwo podróżowania motocyklem!

 

FUNKCJE.

- Włączanie światła STOP podczas hamowania silnikiem (gdy kierowca nie naciska dźwigni hamulca).
Konstrukcja motocykla pozwala na osiąganie wielkich przyspieszeń, nieduża masa sprawia że hamowanie silnikiem również jest bardzo duże. Osobiście znam kilka przypadków gdzie dochodziło do niepotrzebnego niebezpieczeństwa ponieważ kierujący samochodem lub motocyklem nie zauważył hamującego pojazdu przed nim. Szczególnie w motocyklach, gdzie światło stopu jest uruchamiane czujnikiem na dźwigni hamulca, „stop” nie zaświeci się podczas hamowania silnikiem - po zamknięciu gazu. Utrata prędkości nie jest wcale mała – opóźnienie bez problemu przekracza 2m/s2! Nie jeden z doświadczonych bikerów zamykając gaz odruchowo delikatnie pociąga za klamkę – nawet jeśli sytuacja nie wymaga używania hamulca – tylko po to aby poinformować o zmianie swojej prędkości. Tutaj z pomocą przychodzi nasz moduł, który sam rozpoznaje siłę hamowania i sygnalizuje to za pomocą światła "stop"


- Włączanie AWARYJNYCH (kierunkowskazy) w momencie ostrego hamowania. Nieplanowana sytuacja na drodze to wielkie zagrożenie – również ze strony pojazdów znajdujących się za nami. Kierowca za Tobą może nie zauważyć powodu Twojego awaryjnego hamowania, warto więc zadbać aby jak najszybciej zobaczył że stoisz!
Nowe samochody awaryjne hamowanie sygnalizują światłami awaryjnymi – nasz moduł także ostrzeże jadące za nami pojazdy migając kierunkowskazami jeśli siła hamowania przekroczy ustaloną wartość.


- Zmiana sposobu sygnalizowania sygnału światła STOP. Motocykl wyposażony w nasz moduł o wiele skuteczniej informuje kierowców znajdujących się za nim o hamowaniu. Zamiast, nie jednokrotnie nie dostrzeganej zmiany natężenia światła, układ szybko błyśnie 4-5 razy zanim zaświeci „stop” światłem ciągłym.
Wiele podręczników opisujących bezpieczną jazdę motocyklem zaleca kilkukrotne „kliknięcie”  dźwignią hamulca przed właściwym hamowaniem – od teraz zrobi to za nas nasze urządzenie.


- Funkcja  ALARM. Po opcjonalnemu podłączeniu naszego urządzenia do przewodu załączającego zapłon uruchomimy funkcję prostego alarmu. Alarm załącza się automatycznie kilka sekund po wyłączeniu zapłonu. Moduł sygnalizuje za pomocą kierunkowskazów, światła stop oraz klaksonu drgania lub przechylenie motocykla – aż do momentu kiedy właściciel przełączy stacyjkę w pozycję „ACC”

-Funkcja SOS. Na drodze może nas spotkać również jakieś nieprzyjemne zdarzenie… Kolizja, poślizg? Ważne w tedy, aby inni uczestnicy drogi zauważyli nasz przewrócony motocykl. Za pomocą kierunkowskazów, światła stop oraz klaksonu przewrócony motocykl skutecznie daje znać o zagrożeniu.  Sygnalizacja trwa do momentu wyłączenia zapłonu, lub postawienia motocykla.

> prezentacja funkcji <

JAK TO DZIAŁA?

Moduł oparty jest na 3-osiowym akcelerometrze, który przekazuje do procesora informacje o pozycji, przyspieszaniu oraz hamowaniu motocykla. Oprogramowanie porównując odczyty czujników sygnalizuje odpowiednie zachowania pojazdu za pomocą światła stop, kierunkowskazów oraz klaksonu.

 

INSTALACJA.

Instalacja modułu SAMO jest prosta, dzięki załączonej instrukcji każdy może zrobić to w kilka minut samodzielnie!

-  Obudowę przyklejamy do płaskiej poziomej powierzchni (np. w schowku pod siedzeniem).

- Podłączamy moduł do przewodów lampy, kierunkowskazów, akumulatora, stacyjki – według schematu:

Instalacje ułatwiają dołączone do urządzenia szybkozłączki:

- Po podłączeniu ustawiamy motocykl w pionie i resetujemy moduł za pomocą przycisku "reset".

- Moduł jest kompatybilny ze wszystkimi motocyklami oraz rodzajami oświetlenia (LED lub zwykłe żarówki).

 

DO ZROBIENIA…

Aktualnie posiadamy działający prototyp urządzenia, ale wymaga on jeszcze wiele pracy i pieniędzy...

Minimalne ilości potrzebnych podzespołów, płytek PCB, obudów są kosztowne, dlatego liczymy na WASZĄ pomoc!

Za zebrane fundusze uda nam się dokończyć projekt – ostateczna wersja będzie wykonana w technologii SMD - dzięki czemu urządzenie będzie nie wielkich rozmiarów oraz niezawodne!

*Prezentowany kształt modułu to tylko wizualizacja!

Pamiętaj, że wspierając nasz projekt, nie jesteś tylko fundatorem kolejnego gadżetu – osobiście poprawiasz bezpieczeństwo motocyklistów na drogach!

TEAM.

KAMIL

testy / poprawki / testy...

 ANTON

grafika / reklama / sprzedaż

 PIOTR

CEO / programowanie

NAGRODY.

1€  i wiecej – wielkie dzięki za wsparcie!
25€ – koszulka z nadrukiem – praktyczny prezent w motocyklowym klimacie!
89€ – jedno z pierwszych seryjnie produkowanych urządzeń w specjalnej cenie!
110€ – Moduł w limitowanej edycji – tylko 100sztuk, wyróżniający wzór na obudowie z numerem egzemplarza specjalnej limitowanej serii!
165€ – Masz 2 motocykle? Oferta 2 urządzeń jest dla Ciebie!

 

znajdziez nas na: www.motomonster.com.pl  www.facebook.com/motomonsterpl kontakt: mail@motomonster.com.pl

Nowa strona 1English version

Deutsche Sprachversion 
  
|  Polska wersja 



Motorcycling is a beautiful hobby,  but motorcyclists are more exposed to be injured in an accident or collision than other road users.
Almost every motorcyclist experienced more or less risky traffic incident...


SAMO - The electronic system which we want to build is plugged into the motorcycle illumination installation and substantially increases the safety of traveling by motorbike!
 

FEATURES.
-
Turning on the stop lights during engine braking 
(when the driver do not press the brake lever).
Motorcycle structure and lightweight allows you to achieve great acceleration, that causes powerful engine braking as well.  There are well known situations where unnecessary danger is caused because neither  car or motorcycle did not notice that vehicle in front of it is braking. Especially in motorcycles where “the stop lights” is activated by sensor in a braking lever. The stop light will not activate during the engine braking – when the throttle grip is released. At that moment the speed loss is huge and could easily reach 2m/s! Quite a lot of experienced motorcyclists instinctively pushes the braking lever gently during engine braking – even if situation do not require – just to announce the speed loss to other vehicles. And this is the moment where SAMO – The Safety Ride Module comes into action. Thanks to the built-in accelerometer our module by itself detects the braking power and automatically signals this activity by using the stop lights.
-
Switching Emergency Lights on (turn lights) during emergency braking. Unexpected situations on the road are very dangerous – also from the vehicles behind us. Driver behind you may not see the cause of your emergency braking, therefore it is very important to warn the driver about this situation as soon as it possible. In brand new cars emergency braking is indicated by emergency lights – our module automatically warns vehicles behind us by flashing turn lights in case of emergency braking if the braking force exceeds a certain value.

-
Increased the STOP signalisation. 
Motorcycle equipped in our module warns drivers about braking much more efficiently. Instead of constant light with no intensity change, our system instantly flashes 4-5 times before the STOP light illuminates continuously.
A lot of “Safe Motorcycle Driving” manuals recommends to push braking lever several times before the proper braking – from now on, our module will do it for us.

-
The ALARM function.If you connect the module to the ignition wire, the simple alarm mode would be turned on. The Alarm turns on automatically a few seconds after turning the ignition switch off. The Module signals alarm with turn lights, stop light and horn caused by motorcycle vibration or inclination –  until the owner switches the ignition to “ACC” position.
-The SOS function.
On the road sometimes we can face some unexpected dangerous situations – collision or glide. It is extremely important to inform other road users about collision instantly. Using turn lights, stop light and klaxon, overturned motorcycle efficiently informs about danger. The signalisation continues until we switch the ignition off, or pull up the motorcycle.


animation

HOW DOES IT WORK? 
The module is based on a 3-axis accelerometer, which transmits information to the processor about position, acceleration, and braking of motorcycle. Software compares the sensor readings and indicates the appropriate behavior of the vehicle using the brake light, turn lights and klaxon.
 

INSTALLATION.

Module installation is very simple. Stick the cover to a flat horizontal surface (such as in the glove recess  under the seat).
- 
Connect the module to the lights wiring, turning lights, battery, ignition - according to the scheme:






- The module is compatible with all motorcycles and LED lights (also bulb lights).
 
WORK TO DO...

Currently, we have a working prototype of the device, but it requires a lot of work and money.

The minimum amount of required components, PCBs, covers are expensive, so we look forward for YOUR help! 
For collected funds we are going to finish the project - the final version will be made in SMD technology - so that the device will miniaturized and reliable! 

For collected funds we are going to finish the project - the final version will be made in SMD technology - so that the device will miniaturized and reliable!

The device in the pictures
is just a visualization.

Please notice, that by supporting our project, you are not only the founder of the next gadget – you personally improve the safety of motorcyclists on the road!

THE TEAM:















KAMIL
tests / amendments / tests...


ANTON
artwork / advertising / sales


PIOTR
CEO / programmming





PERKS.







1€  
and more – Gratitudes and place on the list of donors on our website!

T-shirt with print - a practical gift for motorcyclist!







89€ – 
One of the first mass-produced devices in a special price!

Limited Edition Module - only 100 pieces, distinctive pattern on the cover with a numbered special limited series!

You got 2 motorcycles? Get two Modules in special price!

Polska wersja 

 



Jazda motocyklem to piękne 
hobby, niestety motocykliści są bardziej narażeni na urazy podczas wypadku, czy 
kolizji niż inni użytkownicy drogi. 
Niemal każdy motocyklista przeżył mniej lub bardziej ryzykowne zdarzenie 
drogowe...

Układ elektroniczny który chcemy zbudować wpięty w instalację motocykla, za 
pomocą fabrycznego oświetlenia znacząco podnosi bezpieczeństwo podróżowania 
motocyklem!
 

FUNKCJE.
-
Włączanie światła STOP podczas hamowania silnikiem 
(gdy kierowca nie naciska dźwigni hamulca).
Konstrukcja motocykla pozwala na osiąganie wielkich przyspieszeń, nieduża masa 
sprawia że hamowanie silnikiem również jest bardzo duże. Osobiście znam kilka 
przypadków gdzie dochodziło do niepotrzebnego niebezpieczeństwa ponieważ 
kierujący samochodem lub motocyklem nie zauważył hamującego pojazdu przed nim. 
Szczególnie w motocyklach, gdzie światło stopu jest uruchamiane czujnikiem na 
dźwigni hamulca, „stop” nie zaświeci się podczas hamowania silnikiem - po 
zamknięciu gazu. Utrata prędkości nie jest wcale mała – opóźnienie bez problemu 
przekracza 2m/s2! Nie jeden z doświadczonych bikerów zamykając gaz odruchowo 
delikatnie pociąga za klamkę – nawet jeśli sytuacja nie wymaga używania hamulca 
– tylko po to aby poinformować o zmianie swojej prędkości. Tutaj z pomocą 
przychodzi nasz moduł, który sam rozpoznaje siłę hamowania i sygnalizuje to za 
pomocą światła "stop"

-
Włączanie AWARYJNYCH (kierunkowskazy) w momencie 
ostrego hamowania. Nieplanowana sytuacja na drodze to wielkie zagrożenie – 
również ze strony pojazdów znajdujących się za nami. Kierowca za Tobą może nie 
zauważyć powodu Twojego awaryjnego hamowania, warto więc zadbać aby jak 
najszybciej zobaczył że stoisz!
Nowe samochody awaryjne hamowanie sygnalizują światłami awaryjnymi – nasz moduł 
także ostrzeże jadące za nami pojazdy migając kierunkowskazami jeśli siła 
hamowania przekroczy ustaloną wartość.


-
Zmiana sposobu sygnalizowania sygnału światła STOP. 
Motocykl wyposażony w nasz moduł o wiele skuteczniej informuje kierowców 
znajdujących się za nim o hamowaniu. Zamiast, nie jednokrotnie nie dostrzeganej 
zmiany natężenia światła, układ szybko błyśnie 4-5 razy zanim zaświeci „stop” 
światłem ciągłym.
Wiele podręczników opisujących bezpieczną jazdę motocyklem zaleca kilkukrotne 
„kliknięcie”  dźwignią hamulca przed właściwym hamowaniem – od teraz zrobi 
to za nas nasze urządzenie.


-
Funkcja  ALARM. Po opcjonalnemu podłączeniu 
naszego urządzenia do przewodu załączającego zapłon uruchomimy funkcję prostego 
alarmu. Alarm załącza się automatycznie kilka sekund po wyłączeniu zapłonu. 
Moduł sygnalizuje za pomocą kierunkowskazów, światła stop oraz klaksonu drgania 
lub przechylenie motocykla – aż do momentu kiedy właściciel przełączy stacyjkę w 
pozycję „ACC”
-Funkcja 
SOS. Na drodze może nas spotkać również jakieś nieprzyjemne zdarzenie… 
Kolizja, poślizg? Ważne w tedy, aby inni uczestnicy drogi zauważyli nasz 
przewrócony motocykl. Za pomocą kierunkowskazów, światła stop oraz klaksonu 
przewrócony motocykl skutecznie daje znać o zagrożeniu.  Sygnalizacja trwa do 
momentu wyłączenia zapłonu, lub postawienia motocykla.


> prezentacja funkcji <

JAK 
TO DZIAŁA? 
Moduł 
oparty jest na 3-osiowym akcelerometrze, który przekazuje do procesora 
informacje o pozycji, przyspieszaniu oraz hamowaniu motocykla. Oprogramowanie 
porównując odczyty czujników sygnalizuje odpowiednie zachowania pojazdu za 
pomocą światła stop, kierunkowskazów oraz klaksonu.
 

INSTALACJA.

Instalacja modułu SAMO jest prosta, dzięki załączonej instrukcji każdy może 
zrobić to w kilka minut samodzielnie!
-  
Obudowę przyklejamy do płaskiej poziomej powierzchni (np. w schowku pod 
siedzeniem).
- 
Podłączamy moduł do przewodów lampy, kierunkowskazów, akumulatora, stacyjki – 
według schematu:




Instalacje ułatwiają dołączone do urządzenia 
szybkozłączki:



- Po podłączeniu ustawiamy 
motocykl w pionie i resetujemy moduł za pomocą przycisku "reset".
- Moduł jest kompatybilny 
ze wszystkimi motocyklami oraz rodzajami oświetlenia (LED lub zwykłe żarówki).
 
DO 
ZROBIENIA…

Aktualnie posiadamy działający prototyp urządzenia, ale wymaga on jeszcze wiele 
pracy i pieniędzy...

Minimalne ilości potrzebnych podzespołów, płytek PCB, obudów są kosztowne, 
dlatego liczymy na WASZĄ pomoc!
Za 
zebrane fundusze uda nam się dokończyć projekt – ostateczna wersja będzie 
wykonana w technologii SMD - dzięki czemu urządzenie będzie nie wielkich 
rozmiarów oraz niezawodne!
*Prezentowany kształt modułu to tylko 
wizualizacja! 

Pamiętaj, 
że wspierając nasz projekt, nie jesteś tylko fundatorem kolejnego gadżetu – 
osobiście poprawiasz bezpieczeństwo motocyklistów na drogach!

TEAM.















KAMILtesty / poprawki / testy...


ANTONgrafika / reklama / sprzedaż


PIOTRCEO / programowanie





NAGRODY.







1€  
			i wiecej – wielkie dzięki za wsparcie!







25€ – 
koszulka z nadrukiem – praktyczny prezent w motocyklowym klimacie!







89€ – 
jedno z pierwszych seryjnie produkowanych urządzeń w specjalnej cenie!







110€ – 
Moduł w limitowanej edycji – tylko 100sztuk, wyróżniający wzór na obudowie z 
numerem egzemplarza specjalnej limitowanej serii!







165€ – 
Masz 2 motocykle? Oferta 2 urządzeń jest dla Ciebie!



 

znajdziez nas na:
www.motomonster.com.pl 
www.facebook.com/motomonsterpl 
kontakt: mail@motomonster.com.pl

story:
Short Summary

We are making a car apps which will create 2000+ jobs per year saves times and money of car owners. Provide all car related services from a platform. Over all it would be all in one car solution. 

  • Z Soft Solution Limited is developing this apps and I am Mohammed Imtiaz Zahid the founder of Z Soft Solution Limited. 
  • We are trying to give a solution of existing trend.

    Existing trends are bellow

    For car servicing (wash and other service)Car  owner or driver go to the garage and talk with shop owner or mechanic.  They negotiate for the bill of car service and after fixing the bill mechanic has started to give service. 

     When a car get stuck on the middle of the road, driver/owner  and local people push the car and fix it in a safe place. Then driver/owner  try to find a garage near the location. 

    Some ridesharing app launches in many city. But Still a lot of people use manual rent service for car rent. 

    There are lot of car drivers who sit in one place for whole day.  Their car used only in the morning and evening.(in the office time)

    For parking a car at day time city dwellers searches for an empty space. 

    If someone go another city do not find safe space or garage to put car. 

    People who visit another country experience several problems when they reach foreign airport.  So we are just trying to solve this existing trends by creating jobs of freelancers whom are not highly qualified but have a desire of doing something. This apps will even enable people cash deal with freelancers after getting services. 

  • If you be a part of this apps means you are helping people to find their own job and keep a great contribution of GDP growth. Not only that you are getting financial return from this apps

If you don't want to read more then our heartiest request to you to share this fundraising link to your keens. Who knows if we get helped from them.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We have a shortage of £1,50,000 GBP to complete this apps and build a full company. An estimate of cost to build this apps is £10,000 GBP, Form a company in Dhaka will cost £450 GBP, Rent a office for a year in Dhaka will cost £39,000 GBP, Setup a Call Center will cost £50,000 GBP, Channel advertising and branding will cost £50,000 GBP, Allocating share £550 GBP
  • Think a platform where all services would be, no need to wast time by going for car services but freelancers will come at you and do services even if you need materials they will bring with them. Even for rental and airport pickup don't worry to visit other apps but you have all these function in 1 apps. If you are a land or Flat owner with parking then earn money by sharing your parking with others car owners. They will pay you for time. How will you find them just open our apps and you will get them easily. 
  • All fund should go to Z Soft Solution Limited's chairman account to complete all above.

The Impact

  • To make life simple and easy. Saves times and Money. 
  • Let's give our agenda.

Car Wash/Wax

  •  CAR detail 

     Interior detail

     Exterior detail 

     Hand wax

     Upholstery cleaning

     Headlight restoration

     Many more

Car Services

  • Road test

     Testing ,Changing & repairing

     Servicing of models and accessories

     Welding 

     Underbody & Exterior

     Others

Tow Service 

  • Excellent roadside assistance

     Refueling and gasoline service

     other service with first response

Car Rental

  • CAR hire for one and two way

     CAR hire for long term

     CAR hire with GPS include and without GPS. 

      All forms of modern rent a service.

Parking share

  • Connect Land and Flat owner with parking and car owner/driver

     Easy solution for parking (short & long time)

     Both will be benefited

Airport Pickup for Air BNB clients

  •  AIRPORT pick and drop

      Excellent Service

     24 hours service

Risks & Challenges

Our main obstacle is money or funds. 

  • If we have all funds which will be rolling all time will enable to run our business smoothly and investors will get return of money.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you are not interested to invest still your 1 share would be a great achievement for us again we say who knows if they might interest to invest on us. 
  • So share our campaign and keep a great contribution to help people. We think positive but we think to create more jobs that people can be established.

story:
ezyPick is a truly intelligent car Bluetooth headset. With super slim and feather light aluminum design, ezypick makes it very convenient to attend calls while driving. Say good-bye to your charging woos, ezyPick is always charged thanks to its unique Magnetic base. Calls get automatically connected the moment you pick it up from its base. Whether you use an iPhone, android phone or a laptop, this works with all. At the end of call ,  just put the device back in its magnetic charging base without needing to press any key to disconnect call. 

ezyPick makes it very easy to take calls while driving ,it helps you focus more on driving. Nearly 15-20% of car accidents in the world happen due to phone usage during driving.Out of this,most accidents happen due to sudden deviation while trying to take calls. ezyPick makes your life safe with it's unique solution.

The mission of ezyPick is "Safe Drive, Simple Life".


Designed in USA, ezyPick sports a unique, yet very functional and useful design. It’s 180 degree rotatable magnet charging base easily plugs in Car’s USB charger. The ezyPick packs a sleek looking car charger,magnetic base along with its super sexy ear piece.


  1. Auto Smart Bluetooth Hands-free Kit.
  2. In-ear Speaker design
  3. Super Slim design Rotated
  4. Magnetic Wireless USB Charging Solution
  5. Colorful Aluminum Material
  6. Aluminium Material.
  7. Rotated & Magnetic USB Charging.
  8. Multi-point Bluetooth headset.
  9. Supports all OS ( iOS,android)

  1. Bluetooth Specification : V3.0
  2. Bluetooth Profiles Supported : Headset, Hands free
  3. Operation Range : Up to 10 meters
  4. Talk Time* : Up to 4 hours
  5. Standby Time* : Up to 100 hours
  6. Dimensions(mm) : L53.5 x W13.5 x H6 (See Design Section)
  7. Weight : About 6.6g





We shall provide multiple ear-tips to use with ezyPick.

You can choose from four color options.
  1. SmartBlue 
  2. IndiePink
  3. SimpleGolden
  4. ProfessionalBlack

We are a smart hardware startup based out of San Mateo , California. Driven with passion , we are a team of hardware experts who had a vision to create the best, smart bluetooth headset ever for car owners. With safety, power, usability and convenience as the main parameters, we have designed ezyPick such that picking and taking calls becomes super convenient while driving.

We believe that hands free products must eliminate the barriers to adoption (big and bulky, complex to install and complex to use), and add simple meaningful functionality together with seamless hands free experiences out of the box!

Please help us realize ezyPick by pledging and sharing this link.

USD 35 Get 1x ezyPick - Early Bird

EzyPick  is available in Black, Golden, Pink and Blue. Color options will be chosen at the end of the campaign via a survey. Prices will go up! *Free Shipping Worldwide*. 

USD 85 Special Deal - Get 3x ezyPick

EzyPick  is available in Black, Golden, Pink and Blue. Color options will be chosen at the end of the campaign via a survey. Prices will go up! *Free Shipping Worldwide*. 

USD 150 Group Buy- Get 6x ezyPick

EzyPick  is available in Black, Golden, Pink and Blue. Color options will be chosen at the end of the campaign via a survey. Prices will go up! *Free Shipping Worldwide*




What happens to the money you raise?

Your money will only be used to build your product - all funds pledged will be spent for tooling, manufacturing setup, component costs and certification.

How much talktime EzyPick Provide?          

After full charge you can use nearly 4 hours of talktime and in standby mode it runs nearly 100 hours.

Any certification for quality?

EzyPick is getting certified with CE, FCC, RoHS, BQB approval. We are undergoing the process of  these certifications right now.

How do I choose my color?

Color options will be chosen at the end of the campaign via a survey.

Is there a warranty?

We are super serious in getting the best user experience possible. We offer a 1-year warranty on all the electronic components.

How is the sound quality?

Sound quality is a top priority for us. That's why we partnered with a world renowned sound specialists and engineers. We're also using the same speakers as high-end audio companies.

What happens if I change address before you ship?

We'll make an announcement 15 days before we ship. You'll then be able to update your address on your Indiegogo profile.

Which phones are compatible with EzyPick?

EzyPick is compatible with iPhone, Android,Windows, Blackberry family of phone.

How much is shipping and handling?

Shipping is FREE worldwide.

When will my ezyPick  be delivered?

We anticipate to start delivery in October 2016.

Disclaimer: iPhone, Apple logo are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. Android logo is registered trademark of Google Inc. Windows logo is registered with Microsoft Corporation.

story:
Make mission critical, mission possible.

We're a team of private pilots and aviation enthusiasts with a passion for utilizing available technology to make flying safer and more fun! Our goal: create a simple Heads Up Display (HUD) that any pilot can use, in any scenario, to have a better sense of what's going on. 

 

Skyline is great for:

Pilots

Copilots

Passengers

Students 

 

Every time we see reports of another crash resulting from poor visibility or malfunctioning navigational equipment, we think, "There's got to be a way to prevent these tragedies with better technology!" Relying on instrumentation alone is challenging to say the least, and if you've ever sat in front of one of the sophisticated computerized nav sets, you've likely sweat beads of stress just looking at it!

Working with a range of pilots, from commercial airline aviators, private jet pilots, to bush pilots, to several Top Gun trainers, we designed Skyline to be intuitive and an extra set of eyes when you can't see out the cockpit.

While not meant as a primary means of flight navigation, the iPad’s visualization and front facing augmented reality view could turn a deteriorating situation into a recoverable and successful one.

Skyline is designed to give you an added layer of visibility, when visibility may be at a minimum. It sees what you can’t see, and simplifies your view with the most essential information needed to fly. It’s a toolset we call "SOAR.” 

Situational Orientation and Awareness Recognition:

  • 360º Compass utilizing a heading tape to give you a clear indication of your direction.
  • Pitch ladder, so you know whether you’re up or down when a visual out the window isn’t possible.
  • Ground Speed to confirm velocity.
  • AGL and MSL to confirm altitude.

Augmented Reality (AR) Terrain

It’s a step up from Synthetic Vision. Know where there terrain and other obstacles are, what they look like, and with an easy color reference – red for danger, yellow for caution, and green for safety, you can fly clear even in zero visibility weather.

(Actual screenshot from flight.) 

Nearest Airport

Automatically and constantly indicates your nearest airport, what direction, and how far. All in one easy to read indicator. In addition, Runway IDs will appear within the HUD when you’re within 50Km (~31Mi), Airport IDs within 20km (~12mi), and nav waypoints appear within 70Km (~43Mi).

 

Included in the indicator are: direction and heading in degrees to turn, airport identifier, and distance to the airport.

(Actual screenshot from flight.)

What We Need & What You Get

We've built the prototype. We need your help to finish the race. With your support, we will:

  • Improve the app's performance.
  • Add features to the interface, like airspace traffic.
  • Create a data delivery system that will load terrain anywhere in the world.

What you get:

  • Early access to the app (pre-launch to the app store) (Runs only on iOS 10+ devices).
  • Discounted price: $50 for a lifetime of use (versus $85 app store price).

Impact

We all know of someone who's died in a crash – whether a friend or family-member, or a celebrity. Many of these accidents are preventable, and result simply because the pilot has no visibility. If you're a pilot, this risk is very real.

Let's decrease the risk.

Challenges

This project has so far been 100% self-funded, and we are 100% committed to its success. The remaining steps to make Skyline ready for the world are very achievable, but require your backing. 

Join the Squadron

  • Share Skyline on your social profiles!
  • Back the campaign and become a part of history!
story_txt:
Make mission critical, mission possible.
We're a team of private pilots and aviation enthusiasts with a passion for utilizing available technology to make flying safer and more fun! Our goal: create a simple Heads Up Display (HUD) that any pilot can use, in any scenario, to have a better sense of what's going on. 
 
Skyline is great for:
Pilots
Copilots
Passengers
Students 
 
Every time we see reports of another crash resulting from poor visibility or malfunctioning navigational equipment, we think, "There's got to be a way to prevent these tragedies with better technology!" Relying on instrumentation alone is challenging to say the least, and if you've ever sat in front of one of the sophisticated computerized nav sets, you've likely sweat beads of stress just looking at it!
Working with a range of pilots, from commercial airline aviators, private jet pilots, to bush pilots, to several Top Gun trainers, we designed Skyline to be intuitive and an extra set of eyes when you can't see out the cockpit.

While not meant as a primary means of flight navigation, the iPad’s visualization and front facing augmented reality view could turn a deteriorating situation into a recoverable and successful one.
Skyline is designed to give you an added layer of visibility, when visibility may be at a minimum. It sees what you can’t see, and simplifies your view with the most essential information needed to fly. It’s a toolset we call "SOAR.” 
Situational Orientation and Awareness Recognition:

360º Compass utilizing a heading tape to give you a clear indication of your direction.
Pitch ladder, so you know whether you’re up or down when a visual out the window isn’t possible.
Ground Speed to confirm velocity.
AGL and MSL to confirm altitude.

Augmented Reality (AR) Terrain
It’s a step up from Synthetic Vision. Know where there terrain and other obstacles are, what they look like, and with an easy color reference – red for danger, yellow for caution, and green for safety, you can fly clear even in zero visibility weather.

(Actual screenshot from flight.) 
Nearest Airport
Automatically and constantly indicates your nearest airport, what direction, and how far. All in one easy to read indicator. In addition, Runway IDs will appear within the HUD when you’re within 50Km (~31Mi), Airport IDs within 20km (~12mi), and nav waypoints appear within 70Km (~43Mi).
 

Included in the indicator are: direction and heading in degrees to turn, airport identifier, and distance to the airport.
(Actual screenshot from flight.)

We've built the prototype. We need your help to finish the race. With your support, we will:

Improve the app's performance.
Add features to the interface, like airspace traffic.
Create a data delivery system that will load terrain anywhere in the world.

What you get:

Early access to the app (pre-launch to the app store) (Runs only on iOS 10+ devices).
Discounted price: $50 for a lifetime of use (versus $85 app store price).

story:
Instant Flash - Saving life one car at a time

You're protected with Instant Flash Device

Instant Flash is a patent pending device owned by JHA Corp, a company founded by car guys for car guys.  JHA Corp’s mission statement is to create and invent vehicle safety device that will protect drivers on the road.  This invention helps making our street a safer place to drive.  Please help us fund this campaign.

We’ve all seen dangerous driving before. Driving texting on their phones, eating lunch, putting on makeup while driving, accidents happens everyday. Instant flash is a device that is an active device designed to give other driver a heads up when something is wrong with your car. Sudden swerve in lane, hydroplaning, emergency braking…etc. The device will automatically flash the blinker light (or headlight and brake light) and sound your horn to try and prevent accident from happening. In case of accident, instant flash device will inform the driver around you that your life may be in danger in case the car is caught on fire and you were knocked out unconscious by sounding the horns, flashing all lights, and with the optional sim module, it will automatically notify your loved ones and the police official.

JHA Corp is committed to making the street a safer place for the drivers. Please help us fund this campaign and make street driving a safer place. 

How it all started:

It all started with a concept:

Jayson, first inventor of Instant Flash design has been in the car industry for over 21 years. His experience in the car Industry range from modify JDM to being factory technician for couple luxury European brands.

With the birth of his twin sons, his wife became full time housewife. They drive on the road without Jayson almost everyday. Although the distance may be short but sometimes Jayson’s wife had to drive the twins at night due to his busy schedule. That has been Jayson’s biggest concern, their safety.

Just like every husband/father, Jayson never truly feel comfortable about his wife driving alone. He thought about a lot of scenarios where things can go wrong and trying his best to modify the car to improve their safety.

There were many modifications made to his family van and he thought he already did my best to protect my family, until one incident happened and it really sent chills to Jayson’s back. Jayson’s wife was driving the twins and him at night, it was a short distance and he was ill, so Jayson agreed to let her take the wheel. There was pickup truck in front of us near the freeway exit to their home. The license plate of the pickup truck suddenly dropped off. Jayson’s wife didn't evade the license on the freeway successfully, we heard the loud noise coming from the bottom of their van. Jayson’s wife reacted by pulling over on the side. There was no lighting on that part of the freeway and it was very dark.

Right after their immediate drop of speed, even before we can speak to each other, we saw very bright light gotten closer and closer to us. It stopped with a loud break grinding sound. It was extremely close to their van, like only about 4 feet away. Everything happened so fast, Jayson almost lost his family, he couldn't stop thinking about what happens for weeks after the incident.

It bothers Jayson that he wasn't able to prevent such a thing from happening, so Jayson told his wife not to drive at night. However, He know that's not a realistic solution and he had to do something. Jayson started recalling every little details of that incident, creating different scenarios around it. After about millions of "what ifs", Jayson finally drafted one scenario that he will be able to protect my family under that circumstance.

Instant Flash Device, Jayson had this simple modification to our van, that 18 wheelers wouldn't even get that close to us. Instant Flash, a simple device that will turn on the hazard light automatically when it detected emergency breaking, engine malfunctions, hydroplane, or when collision occurred.

Instant Flash has been one of the most innovative automotive invention and vehicle safety modification idea so far. Instant Flash device needs your help to fund the campaign so that it can protect all the families out there!

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help in making the prototype into the mass market.  Most of the hard part in done and we’re now in the final R&D phase to perfect our device.  With your help of raising $180,000, we will be releasing the first version of the Instant Flash Device in Q2 of 2018. 

This fund will enable us to finish our rigorous testing and put the manufacture process to action.  We have the production company lined up and the we're almost at the finished line. 

By helping us you’ll be getting the most innovative active vehicle safety device that’s  out on the market and it fits any vehicle and trucks.  You’ll also get a great saving by ordering yours early. 

There are 2 version of the Instant Flash Device, a basic version and a deluxe version.  The basic version comes complete with the Instant Flash Device, and external reset button, and a complete installation manual.  The Deluxe version come extra with an OBD2 connection that allows the Instant Flash device to communicate with the car's ECU.

Instant Flash is featured in:

Instant Flash Device’s complete feature:

Using latest technology, Instant Flash device is designed to save life.  The system will automatically warn the other driver on the road when it detects your car is under unsafe condition.

Instant Flash Device is a vehicle safety device that will detect when vehicle having emergency break down while driving, and turn on the hazard light system, headlight and brake light as well as the horn system to inform other vehicle behind you or around you, before your vehicle gets into an accident

Instant Flash Device will activate itself under the following condition:

Basic Version:

  1. When sensing emergency braking situation
  2. When sensing emergency braking situation plus ABS activated
  3. When sensing car spin out
  4. When sensing airbags are activated
  5. When sensing excess lateral G force
  6. When sensing vehicle is hit from any angle
  7. When sensing swerving
  8. When sensing hydroplaning or skidding – wheel speed doesn’t match gyro sensor physic

Deluxe Version (with OBD II)

  1. When Wheel sensor(wheel is turning) but ignition is off – car parked but still moving
  2. Using distance warning system such as Mercedes Distronic when distance warning sensor sens closing up very fast
  3. (condition voltage drops below .6V) plus any of the below condition
    • faulty voltage regulator
    • faulty Serpentine/Drive Belt
    • faulty drive belt tensioner
    • DME control module faulty (vehicle will stall)**turn on hazard**
    • faulty ignition wires / coil
    • faulty spark plugs
    • faulty fuel pump unit
    • faulty crankshaft sensor
    • faulty camshaft sensor
    • faulty a/f sensor
    • faulty air / oil temp sensor
    • faulty air / oil pressure sensor
    • faulty coolant temp sensor
    • faulty auxiliary fan
    • faulty throttle control
    • faulty idle control valve
    • faulty P-CAN
    • faulty B-CAN
  4. ETC control module faulty (vehicle will stall)**turn on hazard**
    • faulty AT valve body solenoid
    • faulty AT torque converter
    • faulty AT clutch disc
    • faulty Manual clutch disc
    • faulty Manual clutch pressure plate
    • faulty clutch slave cylinder
    • faulty clutch master cylinder
    • faulty clutch release bearing
    • DSC / ESP / TRAC control module faulty
  5. faulty ABS sensor
  6. faulty wheel bearings
  7. faulty steering angle sensor
  8. Air  / hydraulic suspension control module
  9. faulty air spring
  10. faulty air compressor
  11. faulty hydraulic pump
  12. faulty hydraulic suspension
  13. faulty level sensor
  14. TPMS  control module warning**turn on hazard & horn**
    • faulty TPMS sensor
    • low tire pressure
    • flat tire
  15. Any much more

By contributing to this campaign, for as little as $100, you can safe the life of those you care.

Risk and Challenges

Achieving the funding from Indiegogo, will enable us together with our partners to get the project off the starting blocks on schedule.

The main risk is that the start date gets delayed if the funding target is not met.

We think we’ve taken most of the other risks into account: 
- We’ve got the hardest part of the R&D done and we have the production company lined up so we are ready for production.
- Rigorous testing will take place at every stage of the manufacture process so we will iron out any problems before the final item goes into full production.

This project has been thoroughly planned and every step of design, testing and production has been carefully detailed.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don’t think this is the right product for you, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!  Please help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign so we can make driving a safer place.

story:
We know connected cars are the future. No doubt about it. But what about the 250 million cars that are on the road right now?

Wouldn't it be nice to know if your car is using more gas of late? How about checking if you need gas on the way home while you are stuck in a long meeting? How often have you wondered if your kid reached school safely? Wouldn't it be nice if your car told you about a mechanical failure before it happened?

What can Truvolo do for me?

With Truvolo, you can get all this information, and much much more. We started with the premise that safe driving is important to everyone.

We can:

  • Tell you if your car is being driven safely, and if it is safe to drive
  • Detect unsafe driving and alert you
  • Tell you why your check engine light is on
  • Show you a driving score, so you can work on driving safer



But we didn't stop there. We figured you want to drive smarter too.

We added:

  • Maintenance reminders
  • A gas level indicator with warnings when you run low on gas
  • Commute suggestions based on current traffic conditions
  • A way to classify your business and personal trips separately, so it is very easy to report taxes



Finally, we made it easy for you to integrate your cars with your life.

We made it easy:

  • To manage all cars and drivers in your family in one place
  • Save your favorite locations and receive location alerts when your car reaches a location
  • Customize alert settings for each driver in your family

How Does It Work?

Truvolo Drive™ is a small device that plugs in to your car's standard diagnostic port. It comes with a free app that you install on your smart phone. The Truvolo app communicates via Bluetooth with the Drive to collect data while you drive and sends it to our secure platform. The platform does all the number crunching and converts the raw data into information that is actually useful to you.

Truvolo does not require a monthly subscription fee.

Truvolo provides you with lifetime access to your data and requires no monthly data fee commitment to realize the potential of our features. Truvolo users will also have an option for a premium subscription that provides features above and beyond standard functionality.

* An OBD port is standard in all cars sold in the US since 1996.

What do we do with your data?

We take your privacy and protection of your personal information very seriously. Truvolo will not sell or rent your personal information to any other person, company or organization.

Truvolo implements commercially reasonable safeguards intended to protect your personal information from unauthorized use and disclosure. Your information is processed and stored on controlled servers with restricted access. Truvolo uses commercially reasonable effort to ensure the integrity and security of its network and systems.

Truvolo in the News

www.truvolo.com/#news

Handing the car keys over to a teen driver doesn't come without concerns for many parents:

  • Over 77% of parents worry about their kids speeding
  • Over 73% of parents worry about their kids texting
  • Over 83% of parents would consider buying a product that can help improve the safety of their loved ones while driving

In fact, the inspiration behind Truvolo came when our own teenage son started learning how to drive. We knew that we couldn’t always be there when he was behind the wheel, but thought there should be a way to make sure he was safe without infringing on his freedom. With Truvolo, we can make sure our teen is driving safely, get updates when he arrives at his destination and be alerted should he speed or text. Truvolo also provides a five-star rating system upon completion of the trip, which can be a valuable learning tool for new drivers. Whether it’s a teen, an elderly family member or just a friend who is borrowing the car, Truvolo brings car owners peace of mind that their loved ones are safe.

Truvolo’s platform provides useful data to make your car and your daily life more efficient. It can track gas mileage letting you know how fuel-efficient your car is and whether it may need maintenance.

Our cars are equipped with sophisticated onboard computers that collect diagnostic information. However, a typical driver still depends on archaic methods such as a check engine light or “a strange sound” when something is wrong with their car. A recent survey shows 75% of car owners use the sticker on the windshield to track routine scheduled maintenance. Furthermore, many car owners rely solely on the word of their mechanic when a check engine light or other problem arises. Truvolo is putting the power of car maintenance into the hands of car owners. Truvolo provides smart alerts and reports that track auto performance for better visibility. We can tell you what that check engine light means. With Truvolo, car owners have real insight into how their car is running and what problems it may be having.

Simplify your life with an easy to use interface

If you are low on fuel, the Truvolo app can point you in the direction of the nearest gas station. Stuck in traffic? Truvolo can help you find an alternative route to your favorite locations. Lost your car in a crowded parking lot? Truvolo can help you find it. Truvolo can also be a business tool for those companies employing fleets of vehicles.

How is Truvolo Different?

Truvolo is the only complete and affordable product for the entire family. Truvolo Drive™ has a very small footprint and we are working hard to make it smaller.

Truvolo offers a modular solution that includes the Truvolo Drive™, a smartphone app, and a robust cloud based big-data platform and API for advanced analytics. Our architecture allows us to ensure that diagnostic data is never lost even when the driver occasionally forgets to take his phone during a trip. Our solution allows you to manage all the cars and drivers in your household using one easy to use interface.

Most importantly, we do not require an additional data usage plan, thereby making us a very affordable solution for a typical family. There are no annual or monthly fees required to continue to use the product.

What is a "Premium Subscription"?

"I thought with Truvolo there are no monthly data fees, what is premium subscription and why would I pay for it?" you ask...

With Truvolo your data is always available to you and it will always be free. All of our standard features described here are included with this free version of the app. However, we have a grand vision with a lot of ideas on very cool features that will significantly add value to your daily lives. We are in the process of designing and implementing these features. We plan to introduce some of these new features as part of a premium subscription option. We will launch this option a few months after we deliver Truvolo Drive™ to you. The subscription fees for this option will be announced at the same time.

For all of our Indiegogo supporters, we will include the first six months of this premium subscription for free. This clock will start after the premium features are active. After the six months, you will have the option of continuing with this by paying a small subscription fee or continuing to use all the standard features for free.

Your Perks

Summary of perks we are offering to our campaign supporters:

Shipping for all the perks is free in the US. There is additional cost for shipping internationally as noted in each perk. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. If we are not able to ship to your country, we will reimburse your order.

Referral Bonus and Contest

Referral Bonus: If you refer five (5) or more friends who contribute to our Indiegogo campaign, we will ship you a free Truvolo Tshirt (same as the $30 perk) if we reach our funding goal. The minimum contribution of all your referrals combined must be at least $200.

Referral Contest : Here is how the referral contest works:

  • Referral contest starts on January 23 and will run until we achieve our goal of $100,000.
  • We will announce a new contest with stretch goals at the end of this contest - you can win multiple prizes!
  • To start referring your friends, you must be on this campaign page and logged in to Indiegogo. Then simply use the personalized "Share This Campaign" link under the video.
  • First prize is a $100 gift certificate to the supporter who brings in the highest total contribution to Truvolo's Indiegogo campaign and helps achieve our $100,000 goal.
  • The contest prize will be awarded only if we are successful in reaching our goal. Anybody directly associated with Truvolo does not qualify for the prize.

Project Status

We started working on Truvolo in January 2013. We have a working prototype of the device, andriod app and cloud platform that we have tested with a number of cars. We have completed the design of the final production device.

Here were some of our key milestones from 2013

We are continuing to work on the product in 2014. The final version of the app has been designed. Android app is in development. We will star the iOS app development soon. The cloud platform is ready and is being tested.

Here is the expected schedule for 2014

The Bottom Line

Truvolo is bringing peace of mind to car owners and parents alike, providing real time updates on vehicle performance and driving behavior. Truvolo is connecting people to their cars like never before, resulting in a safer, smarter and more efficient driving experience. 

We have been working on Truvolo for over a year and now we need your support for tooling to enable high volume production. We believe Truvolo Drive™ will be a standard fixture in all cars as connected cars becomes the norm. By supporting us, you will be among the first to get Truvolo Drive™ and get our premium subscription for free for the first six months after it is introduced. This offer will not be available after this Indiegogo campaign.

Are you ready for your connected car? Get Truvolo and start driving smarter today.
