The platform does all the number crunching and converts the raw data into information that is actually useful to you.

Truvolo does not require a monthly subscription fee.


Truvolo provides you with lifetime access to your data and requires no monthly data fee commitment to realize the potential of our features. Truvolo users will also have an option for a premium subscription that provides features above and beyond standard functionality.
* An OBD port is standard in all cars sold in the US since 1996.
What do we do with your data?
We take your privacy and protection of your personal information very seriously. Truvolo will not sell or rent your personal information to any other person, company or organization. 

Truvolo implements commercially reasonable safeguards intended to protect your personal information from unauthorized use and disclosure. Your information is processed and stored on controlled servers with restricted access.  Truvolo uses commercially reasonable effort to ensure the integrity and security of its network and systems. 
Truvolo in the News
www.truvolo.com/#news


Handing the car keys over to a teen driver doesn't come without concerns for many parents:

Over 77% of parents worry about their kids speeding
Over 73% of parents worry about their kids texting
Over 83% of parents would consider buying a product that can help improve the safety of their loved ones while driving
In fact, the inspiration behind Truvolo came when our own teenage son started learning how to drive. We knew that we couldn’t always be there when he was behind the wheel, but thought there should be a way to make sure he was safe without infringing on his freedom. With Truvolo, we can make sure our teen is driving safely, get updates when he arrives at his destination and be alerted should he speed or text. Truvolo also provides a five-star rating system upon completion of the trip, which can be a valuable learning tool for new drivers. Whether it’s a teen, an elderly family member or just a friend who is borrowing the car, Truvolo brings car owners peace of mind that their loved ones are safe.

Truvolo’s platform provides useful data to make your car and your daily life more efficient. It can track gas mileage letting you know how fuel-efficient your car is and whether it may need maintenance.

Our cars are equipped with sophisticated onboard computers that collect diagnostic information. However, a typical driver still depends on archaic methods such as a check engine light or “a strange sound” when something is wrong with their car. A recent survey shows 75% of car owners use the sticker on the windshield to track routine scheduled maintenance. Furthermore, many car owners rely solely on the word of their mechanic when a check engine light or other problem arises. Truvolo is putting the power of car maintenance into the hands of car owners. Truvolo provides smart alerts and reports that track auto performance for better visibility. We can tell you what that check engine light means. With Truvolo, car owners have real insight into how their car is running and what problems it may be having.
Simplify your life with an easy to use interface



If you are low on fuel, the Truvolo app can point you in the direction of the nearest gas station. Stuck in traffic? Truvolo can help you find an alternative route to your favorite locations. Lost your car in a crowded parking lot? Truvolo can help you find it. Truvolo can also be a business tool for those companies employing fleets of vehicles.
How is Truvolo Different?
Truvolo is the only complete and affordable product for the entire family. Truvolo Drive™ has a very small footprint and we are working hard to make it smaller.
Truvolo offers a modular solution that includes the Truvolo Drive™, a smartphone app, and a robust cloud based big-data platform and API for advanced analytics. Our architecture allows us to ensure that diagnostic data is never lost even when the driver occasionally forgets to take his phone during a trip. Our solution allows you to manage all the cars and drivers in your household using one easy to use interface.
Most importantly, we do not require an additional data usage plan, thereby making us a very affordable solution for a typical family. There are no annual or monthly fees required to continue to use the product.
What is a "Premium Subscription"?
"I thought with Truvolo there are no monthly data fees, what is premium subscription and why would I pay for it?" you ask...
With Truvolo your data is always available to you and it will always be free. All of our standard features described here are included with this free version of the app. However, we have a grand vision with a lot of ideas on very cool features that will significantly add value to your daily lives. We are in the process of designing and implementing these features. We plan to introduce some of these new features as part of a premium subscription option. We will launch this option a few months after we deliver Truvolo Drive™ to you. The subscription fees for this option will be announced at the same time.
For all of our Indiegogo supporters, we will include the first six months of this premium subscription for free. This clock will start after the premium features are active. After the six months, you will have the option of continuing with this by paying a small subscription fee or continuing to use all the standard features for free.
Your Perks
Summary of perks we are offering to our campaign supporters:

Shipping for all the perks is free in the US. There is additional cost for shipping internationally as noted in each perk. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. If we are not able to ship to your country, we will reimburse your order.
Referral Bonus and Contest
Referral Bonus: If you refer five (5) or more friends who contribute to our Indiegogo campaign, we will ship you a free Truvolo Tshirt (same as the $30 perk) if we reach our funding goal. The minimum contribution of all your referrals combined must be at least $200.
Referral Contest :  Here is how the referral contest works:

Referral contest starts on January 23 and will run until we achieve our goal of $100,000.
We will announce a new contest with stretch goals at the end of this contest - you can win multiple prizes!
To start referring your friends, you must be on this campaign page and logged in to Indiegogo. Then simply use the personalized "Share This Campaign" link under the video.
First prize is a $100 gift certificate to the supporter who brings in the highest total contribution to Truvolo's Indiegogo campaign and helps achieve our $100,000 goal.
The contest prize will be awarded only if we are successful in reaching our goal. Anybody directly associated with Truvolo does not qualify for the prize.
Project Status
We started working on Truvolo in January 2013. We have a working prototype of the device, andriod app and cloud platform that we have tested with a number of cars. We have completed the design of the final production device.
Here were some of our key milestones from 2013

We are continuing to work on the product in 2014. The final version of the app has been designed. Android app is in development. We will star the iOS app development soon. The cloud platform is ready and is being tested.
Here is the expected schedule for 2014

The Bottom Line
Truvolo is bringing peace of mind to car owners and parents alike, providing real time updates on vehicle performance and driving behavior. Truvolo is connecting people to their cars like never before, resulting in a safer, smarter and more efficient driving experience. 
We have been working on Truvolo for over a year and now we need your support for tooling to enable high volume production. We believe Truvolo Drive™ will be a standard fixture in all cars as connected cars becomes the norm. By supporting us, you will be among the first to get Truvolo Drive™ and get our premium subscription for free for the first six months after it is introduced. This offer will not be available after this Indiegogo campaign. 

Are you ready for your connected car? Get Truvolo and start driving smarter today.

story:
Guaranteed Delivery 

Cuboid Eco-Buzz is production-ready, we are just waiting for graphics to be delivered so we can finish the build.

The Big-Buzz is starting Initial production run, prototype testing is done and we have secured manufactures and quality control checks have been passed satisfactorily.

Shipping will be Late February for the first contributors with the rest being sent early March, shipping to New Zealand might take an extra two weeks.

Eco-Buzz Production

Internal combustion is old skool

The days of ICE vehicles are numbered, with Elon Musk leading the charge on-road vehicles. But what about small trips? Imagine when the sun is shining and you want to cruise the beach pathways or when you are running late for that 9:05 bus?

  • My name is Brandon, I am an electric vehicle enthusiast and love the freedom of riding. 
  • The Australian market for eScooters is only just starting to form, with the introduction of Lime, Zoom, Beam and the Government is finally taking notice with many states endorsing some type of governance. 
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

 

What You Get

Eco-Buzz

Motor: 350 watt 36 Volt
Range: 20 km
Water rating: IPX
Speed: 25km/h
Battery: 6Ah
Charge time: 6-8hr
Weight: 13kg

Other features 
8.5 inch tires
3 Speed settings 
Eco 10km/h
Normal 15km/h
Sports 25 km/h
Electric and Disk break
Cruise control function
and
Integrated display

The break down:

  • Cuboid is hoping to reach a target of $15,000 AUD to get this project off the ground, this will enable Cuboid eScooters to get a decent amount of scooters out to the public. The funding will also go to Renting/Buying/Building a warehouse to start Australian operations of a 100% Australian made edition already being dubbed "the Green and Gold". Once units are paid and shipped the leftover funding will be used to push for safer paths, better legislation and better awareness.
  • Enough of the politics what you will get is the perk is a limited Edition Eco-Buzz or Power-Buzz, with a unique build plate number, shirt and helmet combo and the freedom to explore
  • If Cuboid does not meet the funding goal we will push forward with a reduced funding target and get those eScooters to you.

     

The Impact

  • Hiring an eScooter can quickly become expensive. A $1 unlock fee and a 15-minute ride will rake you up to $5.50, that's a coffee and if you are anything like me I can definitely fit in another coffee.
  • There are times where zooming past drivers on your ubeaut eScooter will be quicker than sitting in a classic Sydney traffic jam.
  • Our product is designed to outlast the 1-year typic eScooter lifespan that's why we will back our models with 6 months 1 for 1 replacement, 12 months warranty and will fix minor issues for up to 2 years for free.
  • If you couple riding with charging from an alternative power source you can cut down emissions by over 30%.

 

Challenges

  • Some of the risks will be not hitting the funding target. The flexed funding option will mean all contributors will get what they have paid for but additional features like colour options or graphics may not become available.
  • Push Back from Government and current market leaders.

 

Share this campaign 

If you can't donate share this campaign with your friends.

  • Grab your mates and share the link!
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hello, my name is Jun Byung-sub and I am the CEO of Insight Power. I have been working as a semiconductor engineer for over 20 years since I started my career as an engineer at Samsung Electronics. I generally like machines and making products. 


The product I like to introduce you through crowd funding is an energy-saving Multi-Tap which is a result of my great effort and all my energy. I hope that this product can satisfy a lot of people since I invested all my passion and energy in it. 

If this crowd funding is realized, mass production will begin to manufacture products directly and, if not, mass production will be delayed a lot. And I will also have to find other way of funding for mass production. 


I got to create wattdream because I wanted to find a way to allow every individual to do something to prevent global warming at the end of 2000s where global warming was considered as a serious issue. I had been thinking about small things that each individual can perform to prevent global warming so I came up with this idea and created wattdream.



This is the detailed introduction of Watt Dream Table.

On top of the cable organizing function, the Watt Dream Table is equipped with an on/off reservation function for the energy saving by regulating time for each outlet. 


The time setup and remote-controlling function by smart phone can be also used within a ten-meter radius. If there is a wall, it can be used within 4-5m. 









- Setting up each plug with schedule(On/off & timer functions of three plugs)

- As its time setup can be done in the unit of minute and day of week, energy can be simply saved suitable for different lifestyle.

- Owing to its Down Timer function, the power can be off within minutes or hours.



- Combining the maximum 24 time setups, the time intervals can be adjusted. 


-  Digital clock on the front side of the table(Planned)


-  Manual switch



-  Its polished design goes well with living room and desk. 






Although I finished developing the product and manufacturing a test product on my own, I still need some funds for mass production of this product. I got to plan the Indiegogo Crowd Funding Project to introduce Insight Power's wattdream to more people and to raise funds required for mass production of such.

I need at least 200 million won for mass production of wattdream. All funds raised will be used for mass-producing wattdream.

If 200 million won is not raised, all funds will be returned. Mass production cannot be realized without at least 200 million won of funds so it is unfortunate for me to say that I will have to return your valuable money to you if the funds do not reach that amount.


I will offer people who participate in this crowd funding wattdream 30% cheaper than the retail price. Since the next mass production is not scheduled after the closure of this funding, this funding is a golden opportunity for you to get wattdream cheaper and faster.

Using wattdream at home or office helps you save electric charges and therefore is great for individuals and also can preserve global environment since it helps save electricity.


I won and am planning to win a number of awards in Korea. wattdream was selected as one of 500 hit items designated by the Small and Medium Business Administration and the Small and Medium Company of the Month Award from Korea Economy which is one of the representative press in Korea was given to wattdream. And the Small and Medium Business Administration Director's Award is to be given this summer.

The above description proves that wattdream has public confidence. The product I have applied for crowd funding is our company's second product. The first product was also launched and has been sold successfully and I believe that this product will achieve a huge success as well. I added consumers' needs and design elements to the former product to create wattdream table. I am planning to launch a series of practically designed wattdream products henceforward.


There are no big issues with regard to the development of wattdream table because the basic concept of wattdream table which is applied for crowd funding this time is similar to that of wattdream which is Insight Power's first product.

Our efforts for good design are invested in wattdream table on the basis of the existing wattdream technology. We have added functions and enhance the convenience of wattdream.

Furthermore, we always try to find a way of effective energy saving. The biggest issue is how to secure funds. We need to make molds but our company is small so we have to worry about a shortfall in expenses for mass production.

Insight Power will grow and develop with the support from all of you through Indiegogo Crowd Funding. We will continue to launch finely designed energy-saving products, investing in wattdream brand.

story:
Fueled by coffee (and money), this campaign is intended to fund the Supporters Community website and also to pay the designer who's working on the Continuum Hybrid Hypercar first prototype.

Are you a Canadian car enthusiast? If yes, continue reading!

Short Summary

I know your time is precious so I'll keep it short. My name is Dominic Miller. I’m a father of two, a car enthusiast and I’ve always been passionate about science and technology. After high school, I studied computer science, and then electrical engineering. As far as I can remember, I’ve always love cars for their speed, engineering and design. Starting a car company has been in the back of my head for over 15 years, now it’s time to do it! Now, you know me... kinda!

We are now founding Miller, a Canadian Automotive Manufacturer. We want to work with people from Alberta, Ontario and Quebec to unite our power in industrial capabilities, manufacturing expertise and technological knowledge to create a Canadian car company.

We are beginning our journey by making two limited production hypercars as a technological prequel to a mass produced electric SUV. Someone once said: "Dream big and dare to fail".

Our plan can be broken down into three main projects:

  1. Making the Continuum, a 1400 horsepower Hybrid Hypercar.
  2. Making the Imperium, a 1800 horsepower Hybrid HyperSUV.
    (Steps 1 and 2 are the prequel for the ultimate objective, the third step)
  3. And finally, the biggest challenge of all, the Industria, a mass produced and affordable electric SUV.

What We Need

In order to make this project happens, we will need to spend a lot of time designing and building. So, many coffees will be drunk! Help us financed our caffeine consumption for the next couple of months.

What You Get

You will become an official Miller Automotive supporter, your name and contribution will appear forever on our official website under the Supporters page. In exchange of those incredibly delicious coffees, you will also get an exclusive access to the Supporters Community gated website.

The Supporters Community will give you access to many things:

  • An exclusive behind the scene on our cars production.
  • Taking part in the decision process by voting and commenting our design and engineering solutions.
    Ex: Exhaust pipes configuration, the color of the prototype, ...
  • Have an early access to the official unveiling of our cars.
    You'll be able to spoil non-supporters!
  • Have access to some exclusive events where we could meet each others.

The Impact

Having a group of supporters/fans will definitely help us promote our brand and products.

With all those coffees, we'll be able to work countless number of hours!

Risks & Challenges

The challenge will be to sell our cars to the customers, to succeed in gaining their trust in our products. 

Another challenging element: These days, cars are so high-tech, this isn't just a car company, this is also a tech company.

The biggest risk is going bankrupt before we are able to achieve any car. But we are going to work hard so it doesn't happen.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Talk about us and join us on social media like Instagram.
  • Share this campaign with you friends so we don't run out of coffee!

Thank you so much for your time!

story:
Short Summary

The BoardStoppa is an idea that originates from personal experiences as well as ideas for safety on University Campuses. I am currently a college student Studying Mechanical Engineering at Arizona State University and ride a Penny Board. The idea came to my entrepreneurship group and I when discussing an accident I had gotten into a day before. I had fallen off my board, but the Penny Board rolled away and struck someone in ankle. I felt sorry for the whole situation because there was nothing I could do to prevent it. That's when the idea of a brake system for a board came up; the birth of The BoardStoppa.

What We Need & What You Get

We believe the amount of funding we chose would be enough to start production and distribution. For just $12, you can have your very own BoardStoppa accessory. Those who contribute this $12 will become unique owners of our new product. If we cannot reach our fixed funding goal of $1,500 by the designated deadline, your credit card will not be charged. 

Risks & Challenges

One big risk for The BoardStoppa is the backing for it. If we don't make our goal, we will not be able to start production. At the moment, there are 3D printed models that are being tested on the boards. So far the stopping distance for this product is better than expected. Challenges for the user can be assembly, which requires a screw driver and proper placement. This product is still being tested and developed as we go along in our design process, but we are confident that The BoardStoppa can be a useful tool for everyday Penny Board riders.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to back us at this time, make sure to share our design with family and friends who would be interested in using our product!

This product is still being tested and developed as we go along in our design process, but we are confident that The BoardStoppa can be a useful tool for everyday Penny Board riders.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not able to back us at this time, make sure to share our design with family and friends who would be interested in using our product!

story:
The Cannondale Trigger 29 Carbon Team mountain bike is a technological marvel and priced as such.

I can't afford this bike as I'm assuming most of you can't either. The beauty of this project is that we can use the multiple power of the cost of a cup of coffee per individual to make sure I get one of these wunderbikes.  I offer the chance for you to ride vicariously through this mountain bike and be rewarded with photographic action shots of OUR adventures.  Don't be so stingy, it's a couple of buck.  I promise not to sell or trade this homage to mountain bike technology.

My devotion to this project and to you, my fine and intelligent pledgers, is so strong that I will do a 100 mile mountain trail ride in a day festooned with your names on my bike and body (for the lucky few who pledge the right amount).

No one NEEDS this bike, myself included, but I want it and this is the only way I'm ever going to get it.

Risks 

No risks to me don't you know, other than a destroyed butt from a 100 mile ride and even more damage to a spine held together with titanium rods and screws. Actually, I think the screws are stainless steel.

If I get attacked by bear during the ride it will be the second time I've gone Mano-a-Mano with my orsine cousin. Then again I might split my jaw in half or break some more ribs like I did when I took a spectacular face plant on my bike. One can only hope.

Nevertheless, I will persevere to finish the ride for YOU, my loyal pledgers.

story:
1. English
2. Deutsch

Hi!
I am Laczik István from Hungary. I want present one of my ideas. This is fixCall System, an emergency call system.

FixCall System

FixCall System is made up of two parts.
The first part is an Emergency Appliance with emergency access, which will be installed at the customer's address. The second part is a database management programme, which is running on the computer of the centre receiving the emergency call.

The device is a mobile phone-technology-based emergency equipment.
In an emergency (e.g.: personal injury, fire, offence) it is important to notify competent authorities quickly and effectively. The most important tool for achieving this is the Uniform Emergency Call System, i.e. the use of emergency access number 112 to be introduced in Hungary in 2014. The system can be effective if at the place of an emergency there is an emergency device and a person who will make the call and has all the necessary information. It may occur that in an emergency there is no mobile phone, or it has a dead battery or for any other reason it can't be used. It also often happens that because of a fright, a shock or for any other reason the caller does not remember the emergency phone number or gives false or incomplete information about the place of the emergency. Any of these problems greatly reduces the efficiency of emergency help.

The major disadvantage of private systems currently operating is that the call is first received at a despatch centre, and only then it is transmitted to the emergency telephone system, losing valuable time with the delay. Another disadvantage is that such a device and its operation is very expensive, therefore their spread is limited.

The device is designed to decrease or eliminate these disadvantages, making emergency calls from specific places fast, easy andreliable. Our further aim is to provide the emergency device at a reasonable price making it easier for them to spread.

The device is able to initiate call with a simple push of the pre-programmed emergency telephone number 112. Using the built-in speaker-phone makes it easier to conduct a conversation with the operator. Energy supply of the device is continuous due to power supply.

Identification data associated with the installed device are recorded after installation in the database management program's database.
In the event of an incoming call, the caller's phone number will be transferred to the emergency centre's computer. The database management program will display, within moments, the following data of the caller: name, address, phone number, GPS data, specific information, etc.

In this way the operator of the emergency centre gets information immediately. It will be seen immediately that the call is coming from a device, which is part of an "official" network. Even before a connection is established, all those data are displayed on the screen, which are the most important for emergency help, and the point is: as a result of system properties, all information is accurate and reliable.

Beside these basic functions of the device the system offers a number of other options for both the device and the database management program.

Advantages of fixCall System

The call can be started in a very simple way, with a simple motion (push of a button).
The disturbed, shocked  caller should not have to remember the phone number.
At the emergency centre the caller's name, address, telephone number, location of the call with coordinates can be seen immediately and all data can be forwarded to the emergency unit.
Valuable time can be saved on both the caller's and on the receiver's side.
As a result of continuous power supply it can be used at any time.
It can be installed and operated at low cost.
The possibility of a false call is minimised.
Recorded audio or image data (optional) may be useful in the event of a medical examination.
Silent alarm (optional) informs the emergency centre in case of an attack without the knowledge of the attacker.
Logged incoming calls can help making useful statistics.
The system can be used by anyone (agencies, companies, individuals).

Advantages for State administration

Lives can be saved using the system.
Time until assistance can be reduced greatly, so personal injury, property damage can be smaller and as a result healing and recovery cost is lowered.
Accurate and reliable data reduces costs of emergency units.
Manufacturing and installing the equipment creates new job opportunities.

In addition to basic data, information shown can be (with the client's consent) as follows:

Personal information (age, serious illness, life-saving drug, disability, etc. ).

Expected number of persons, such as a pensioner living alone, or in an institution the average number of visitors.
Stable with the number of animals.
Fire hazard classification.
On-site defibrillator availability.
Special accessibility.
On-site storage of hazardous materials.
etc.

Unfortunately, it cannot be expected that the device will spread widely, therefore government measures and related legal environment are required for creating an effective network. Insurance companies can be relied on as sponsor partners as I firmly believe that a call made through fixCall System results a timely emergency help, significantly reducing compensation claim amounts.

Naturally, as any other safety device, this is not for free. Fire extinguishers, air bags, seat belts, or defibrillators are basic necessity despite the fact that actual use is rare.
The following should be considered: firstly, that a one-time minor investment has long-term benefits and savings, secondly that the user is protected from personal or material loss.

In Finland in the European Union  ... they start to identify the place of residence right after the call and transfer it to the relevant emergency unit. (http://hvg.hu/itthon/20130519_tuzolto_riasztas_...)
How long does it take to identify a location and how precise is it? Probably the precision of measurement is different in a territory where carrier stations are less frequent than in a large metropolitan area. Of course one-meter accuracy is not necessarily much help if we want to locate the place of the emergency call in a 20-storey business building. In this case the exact address with floor and door number is more important.
These data (and more) can be seen on the screen already in the first seconds of the call when using fixCall System.

Data, statistics

In Hungary sudden cardiac death is a leading cause for deaths. Although mostly affects people with a heart disease, sudden cardiac death can occur anywhere to anyone, even without a warning signal. After a circulatory system arrest the lack of oxygen is becoming more and more severe and our brain has the most severe reaction: after 4 or 5 minutes there is already irreversible damage. Therefore the only chance for survival is immediate resuscitation, which cannot be done without early detection and timely emergency call.

In Hungary, sudden cardiac death takes 70 lives daily, most of which occur at home or at a public place and takes 26,000 lives annually. This number can be radically reduced by emergency help arriving in time! Immediate assistance could result in rescuing the life of 10- 12 people daily.

There are 42,000 new stroke cases registered in Hungary every year. Immediately upon detection of the symptoms ambulance must be called since treatment should be started within 3 hours in order that it will be successful. In Hungary someone dies due to stroke in every 30 minutes, in Austria it happens in every one and a half hours.

The number of household accidents is very high in developed countries, in Hungary the number is at least 250,000 per year.
Most people die of cardiovascular diseases in Hungary ... While in 1960 about 45,000 people died of heart disorders, in 2012 this number was almost 65,000.

In Hungary patients delay calling emergency help abnormally long after detecting the signs of cardiac arrest. It is extremely important that in the case of a very strong, grabbing chest pain persistent for several minutes, not seconds, immediately call the ambulance. The first 3 hours are the most important for treatment and rehabilitation!

My goal: the introduction of the system in an EU country.

The operation of fixCall is only possible with the assistance of the government agency operating 112 emergency call centre, therefore it is our goal to draw the attention of competent officials to this reliable and low cost system. In order to achieve our goal we need supporters from as many (EU) countries as possible.

Support

For the introduction of the system we primarily need supporters, not a lot of money, therefore the maximum amount of support is only €5.

At the end of the campaign there will be a "Funders" presentation with all supporters names. (http://prezi.com/prorryyf6f2j/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share)

The money collected will be donated for buying life-saving devices to the country from which the most aid is received. In case of sponsoring please indicate which country you live in.

Presentation

http://prezi.com/tkmykn8mhigs/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share

WEB

http://fixcall.hu/eng/

You never know when you are going to need it!

Thank you for your support!

Laczik István
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2. Deutsch


Hallo!

Ich bin Laczik István aus Ungarn! Ich möchte eine meiner Ideen vorzustellen. Diese fixCall System, also ein Notrufsystem.

FixCall System

FixCall System besteht aus zwei Teilen.

Der erste Teil ist ein Notrufgerät, das bei dem Anrufer zu finden ist. Das wird fix an der Adresse des Bestellers installiert. Der andere Teil ist ein Datenbank-bearbeitendes Programm, das auf dem Computer des Notrufempfängers läuft.

Das Gerät funktioniert nach dem Prinzip einer allgemeinen, Mobiltelefon-Technologie.

Bei Gefahr (z.B.: Verletzungen, Brandfall, Verbrechen) ist es wichtig, dass die jeweiligen Behörden schnell  und  auf einer optimalen Weise  benachrichtigt werden.  Dabei  ist das  Benutzen  des Einheitlichen Notrufsystems (Notrufnummer 112), das 2014 auch in Ungarn eingeführt wurde, sehr wichtig. Das System kann nur dann wirksam sein, wenn vor Ort ein geeignetes Notrufgerät und eine Person, die den Notruf macht, vorhanden sind. Diese Person muss alle wichtigen Informationen kennen. Es kann auch passieren, dass es vor Ort kein Handy dabei ist, oder das Akku leer ist. Es kommt auch sehr oft vor, dass vor Schreck, vor Schockzustand, die Notrufnummer dem Anrufer nicht einfällt, oder er gibt falsche Informationen im Bezug auf den Ort der Gefahr. Diese Faktoren sinken die Wirksamkeit der Rettung enorm.

Der Nachteil des heutzutage existierenden Notrufsystems ist, dass der Anruf zuerst in einer Zentrale ankommt, und erst dann wird er ins Einheitliche Notrufsystem weitergeleitet, wodurch wertvolle Zeit verschwendet wird. Ein anderer Nachteil ist, dass so ein Gerät, sowie dessen Instandhalten sehr teuer ist, so ist das Verbreiten solcher Geräte begrenzt. Der Zweck des Gerätes ist, von bestimmten Orten kommende Notrufe schneller, einfacher und sicherer zu machen. Dabei sollten die bekannten Nachteile zu beheben bzw. minimieren. Ein weiteres Ziel ist es, dieses System preiswert herzustellen, damit dessen Verbreiten auch versichert ist.

Das Gerät kann auf einen Knopfdruck einen Anruf anhand der einprogrammierten Nummer 112 zu beginnen.

Durch die eingebaute Lautsprechsystemwird das Gespräch mit dem Operator vereinfacht. Die Energieversorgung des Gerätes ist mit Hilfe einer Stromversorgungseinheit ununterbrochen. Zu dem installierten Gerät gehörende Identifizierungsdaten werden nach dem Installieren im datenbearbeitenden Programm fixiert.

Wenn der Anruf in der Notrufzentrale eintrifft, wird die Telefonnummer des Anrufers an den Computer weitergeleitet. Das datenbearbeitende Programm ruft sofort die im Datenbank zu dieser Telefonnummer vorhandenen Daten hervor: Name, Adresse, Telefonnummer, GPS-Daten, spezielle Informationen usw.

Dadurch bekommt der Operator der Notrufzentrale sofort wichtige Informationen. Er sieht sofort, dass der Anruf von einem Gerät kommt, das Teil eines „offiziellen" Netzes ist. Noch vor dem Verbinden sieht er auf dem Bildschirm Daten, die im Zusammenhang mit der Rettung am wichtigsten sind, und was noch wichtiger ist: infolge dieses Systems sind diese Daten zuverlässig und richtig.

Die Bisherigen beinhalten die Grundbeschreibung des Gerätes, aber das System hat mehrere Möglichkeiten seitens des Gerätes, aber auch des datenbearbeitenden Programmes.

Die Vorteile des fixCall System:

Der Anruf ist sehr einfach, kann mit einem Knopfdruck gestartet werden.
Der meist schockierte, verwirrte Anrufer muss nicht sehr lange über die Notrufnummer nachdenken.
In der Notrufzentrale sieht man den Namen, die Adresse, die GPS-Koordinaten des Anrufers, die sofort zu den alarmierten Einheiten weitergeleitet werden können.
Auf der Seite des Anrufers und des Empfängers kann wertvolle Zeit gespart werden.
Infolge der ständigen Stromversorgung kann das Gerät jederzeit benutzt werden.
Es ist billig ausführ- und betriebbar.
Beim Benutzen ist das Risiko eines Fehlanrufes sehr gering.
Die optional fixierten Stimm- oder Bilddaten können bei einer eventuellen Untersuchung behilflich sein.
Mithilfe des optional-funktionierenden Stummalarmes kann bei einem Überfall die Notrufzentrale benachrichtigt werden, ohne darüber den Überfallers zu informieren.
Anhand der eintreffenden Anrufe können nützliche Statistiken angefertigt werden.
Das System kann von allen benutzt werden. (Ämter, Firmen, Privatpersonen)

Vorteile seitens des Staates:

Mithilfe des Systems können Menschenleben gerettet werden.
Die Zeit bis zur Hilfeleistung wird gekürzt, so können die Verletzungen, die Sachschäden verringert werden, so werden die Kosten der Heilung und Wiederherstellung der Schäden minimiert.
Mithilfe der genauen  und zuverlässigen  Daten können die  Kosten der Patrouilleneinheiten gesunken werden.

Neben den Grunddaten ( mit der Einwilligung des Bestellers):

Persönliche Daten (Alter, schwere Krankheiten, lebensrettende Medikamente, Behinderungen usw).
Anzahl der Personen, z.B.: alleinlebende Rentner, oder die Durchschnittszahl der Besucher eines Instituts.
Stall mit der Zahl der Tiere.
Brandgefahreinstufung.
Vorhanden des Defibrillators.
Spezielle Barrierefreiheit.
Gelagerte gefährliche Stoffe.
usw.

Leider ist es nicht zu erwarten, dass sich das Gerät auf freiwilliger Basis verbreiten wird. Um einen guten Netz auszubauen, benötigen wir die entsprechenden Maßnahmen seitens der Regierung und den Ausbau des dazu nötigen rechtlichen Umfeldes. lm Bezug auf die Kosten kann man mit der Unterstützung der Versicherungen rechnen, ich bin fest überzeugt davon, dass mit der Hilfe des fixCall System wird die Rettung rechtzeitig kommen und so kann man die Entschädigungskosten auch verringern.

Wie andere Versicherungsapparate, ist dies auch nicht kostenlos. Trotzdem glaube ich nicht, dass die Notwendigkeit der Airbag, des Sicherheitsgürtels oder des Defibrillators von jemandem in Frage gestellt würde, obwohl sie in der Wirklichkeit nicht so oft benutzt werden.

Was überlegt werden muss: welche Vorteile und Ersparnisse eine einmalige Investition landesweit hat. Anderseits kann dieses Gerät den Benutzer vor Sach-und Personenschäden schützen.In Finnland (Mitglied der EU) wird sofort nach dem Anruf der Aufenthaltsort der jeweiligen Person festgestellt, danach wird es an den Behörden weitergeleitet.                                                                             (http://hvg.hu/itthon/20130519_tuzolto_riasztas_kaosz)

Wie lange dauert so eine Bemessung und wie genau ist die? Ich denke, die Genauigkeit der Bemessung ist ganz anders an einem Gebiet, wo die Überspielstationen eher selten vorkommen, wie in einer Großstadt. Natürlich hilft die 1-Meter-Genauigkeit auch nicht, wenn wir den Ort des Anrufes auf dem 20. Stock eines Geschäftsviertels suchen. Da bedeuten die genaue Anschrift, Stock, Türnummer viel mehr.

Diese Daten (und vieles mehr) können wir mithilfe des fixCall System sofort auf dem Bildschirm sehen.

Daten, Statistiken:

Der plötzliche Herztod ist in Ungarn eine leitenden Todesursache. Obwohl er meistens Herzkranken betrifft, muss man wissen, dass der plötzliche Herztod überall und bei allen- ohne Warnsignal-vorkommen kann. Durch das fortschreitende Herzversagen wird unser Gehirn am meisten geschädigt: nach 4-5 Minuten können bleibende Beschädigungen auftreten. Die einzige Chance fürs Überleben ist, wenn die Wiederbelebung sofort stattfindet, deren erste Schritte die frühe Wahrnehmung und Hilferufe sind.

In Ungarn sterben täglich 70 Menschen infolge eines plötzlichen Herztodes, der meistens zu Hause oder auf der Straße stattfindet und hat jährlich 26 000 Opfer. Mit der rechtzeitig begonnenen Hilfeleistung könnte diese Zahl radikal gesunken werden. Die sofortige Hilfeleistung würde täglich das Leben von 10-12 Menschen bedeuten.

In Ungarn werden jährlich 42 000 neue Strokefälle (Schlaganfall) registriert. Bei der Wahrnehmung der Symptome muss sofort ein Rettungswagen gerufen werden, denn die Behandlung muss innerhalb von drei Stunden begonnen werden, um Erfolg haben zu können. In Ungarn stirbt ein Mensch infolge des Stroke in jeder halben Stunde, in Osterreich in jeder anderthalb Stunden.

Die Haushaltsunfälle sind in allen Industrieländern besonders hoch, in Ungarn passieren jährlich 250 000 Haushaltsunfälle.

Die meisten Menschen sterben infolge von Herz-und Kreislaufkrankheiten.... 1960 starben 45 000 Menschen an Herzkrankheiten, 2012 war diese Zahl beinahe 65 000.

In Ungarn warten die Leute besonders lange nach der Wahrnehmung der Symptome eines Herzinfarktes. Besonders wichtig ist es, dass es zu einem Kranken, der sehr starke, spannende Brustschmerzen hat, und diese nicht nur ein paar Sekunden, sondern mehrere Minuten lang dauern, sofort ein Rettungswagen gerufen wird. Die ersten drei Stunden sind am wichtigsten hinsichtlich der Behandlung und der Rehabilitation!

Mein Ziel: die Einführung des Systems in einem EU-Land.

Das Istandhalten Betrieb des fixCall System ist nur durch die Mitwirkung der Notrufzentrale der Regierung möglich, deshalb ist unser Ziel, dass wir die Beamteten darauf aufmerksam machen, wie zuverlässig und billig das System ist. lm Interesse dessen brauchen wir so viel Unterstützer wie möglich, möglichst aus den EU-Ländern.

Unterstützung:

Zur Einführung des Systems braucht man in erster Linie nicht viel Geld, sondern sehr viele Unterstützer, so ist der maximale Unterstützungsbeitrag nur 5 €.

Am Ende der Kampagne wird eine „Funders"- Präsentation angefertigt, wo die Namen der Unterstützer angegeben werden. (http://prezi.com/prorryyf6f2j/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share)

Das gesammelte Geld wird fürs Kaufen von lebensrettenden Geräten an das Land gespendet, aus dem die meiste Spende gekommen ist. Beim Unterstützen gib uns bitte das Land an, in dem du lebst!

Präsentation:

http://prezi.com/itii8jgcge7b/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share

WEB:

http://fixcall.hu/de/

Du kannst nie wissen, wann du es brauchen wirst!

Vielen Dank für Ihre Unterstützung!

Laczik István

necessity despite the fact that actual use is rare.
The following should be considered: firstly, that a
one-time minor investment has long-term benefits and savings, secondly that the
user is protected from personal or material loss. 
In Finland in the
European Union  ... they start to
identify the place of residence right after the call and transfer it to the
relevant emergency unit. (http://hvg.hu/itthon/20130519_tuzolto_riasztas_...)
How long does it take to identify a location and how
precise is it? Probably the precision of measurement is different in a
territory where carrier stations are less frequent than in a large metropolitan
area. Of course one-meter accuracy is not necessarily much help if we want to
locate the place of the emergency call in a 20-storey business building. In
this case the exact address with floor and door number is more important.
These data (and more) can be seen on the screen
already in the first seconds of the call when using fixCall System.
Data,
statistics

In Hungary sudden cardiac death is a leading cause for
deaths. Although mostly affects people with a heart disease, sudden cardiac
death can occur anywhere to anyone, even without a warning signal. After a
circulatory system arrest the lack of oxygen is becoming more and more severe
and our brain has the most severe reaction: after 4 or 5 minutes there is already
irreversible damage. Therefore the only chance for survival is immediate
resuscitation, which cannot be done without early detection and timely
emergency call.
In Hungary, sudden cardiac death takes 70 lives daily, most
of which occur at home or at a public place and takes 26,000 lives annually.
This number can be radically reduced by emergency help arriving in time!
Immediate assistance could result in rescuing the life of 10- 12 people daily. 
There
are 42,000 new stroke cases registered in Hungary every
year. Immediately upon detection of the symptoms ambulance must be called since
treatment should be started within 3 hours in order that it will be successful.
In Hungary someone dies due to stroke in every 30 minutes, in Austria it
happens in every one and a half hours. 
The number of household accidents is very high in developed
countries, in Hungary the number is at least 250,000 per year. 
Most people die of cardiovascular diseases in Hungary
... While in 1960 about 45,000 people died of heart disorders, in 2012 this
number was almost 65,000. 
In Hungary patients delay calling emergency help abnormally
long after detecting the signs of cardiac arrest. It is extremely important
that in the case of a very strong, grabbing chest pain persistent for several
minutes, not seconds, immediately call the ambulance. The first 3 hours are the
most important for treatment and rehabilitation! 
My goal: the introduction of the system in an EU
country.
The
operation of fixCall is only possible with the assistance of the government
agency operating 112 emergency call centre, therefore it is our goal to draw
the attention of competent officials to this reliable and low cost system. In
order to achieve our goal we need supporters from as many (EU) countries as
possible.
Support

For
the introduction of the system we primarily need supporters, not a lot of
money, therefore the maximum amount of support is only €5.
At
the end of the campaign there will be a "Funders" presentation with
all supporters names. (http://prezi.com/prorryyf6f2j/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share)
The money collected will be donated for buying life-saving devices to
the country from which the most aid is received. In case of sponsoring please
indicate which country you live in.
Presentation

http://prezi.com/tkmykn8mhigs/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share
WEB

http://fixcall.hu/eng/
You never know
when you are going to need it!
Thank you for your support!
Laczik István---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------2.
Deutsch 
Hallo!
Ich bin Laczik
István aus Ungarn! Ich möchte eine meiner Ideen vorzustellen. Diese fixCall System, also ein Notrufsystem.
FixCall System
FixCall System
besteht aus zwei Teilen.
Der erste
Teil ist ein Notrufgerät, das bei dem Anrufer zu finden ist. Das wird fix an
der Adresse des Bestellers installiert. Der andere Teil ist ein
Datenbank-bearbeitendes Programm, das auf dem Computer des Notrufempfängers
läuft.
Das Gerät
funktioniert nach dem Prinzip einer allgemeinen, Mobiltelefon-Technologie.
Bei
Gefahr (z.B.: Verletzungen, Brandfall, Verbrechen) ist es wichtig, dass die
jeweiligen Behörden schnell  und  auf einer optimalen Weise  benachrichtigt werden.  Dabei 
ist das  Benutzen  des Einheitlichen Notrufsystems (Notrufnummer
112), das 2014 auch in Ungarn eingeführt wurde, sehr wichtig. Das System kann
nur dann wirksam sein, wenn vor Ort ein geeignetes Notrufgerät und eine Person,
die den Notruf macht, vorhanden sind. Diese Person muss alle wichtigen
Informationen kennen. Es kann auch passieren, dass es vor Ort kein Handy dabei
ist, oder das Akku leer ist. Es kommt auch sehr oft vor, dass vor Schreck, vor
Schockzustand, die Notrufnummer dem Anrufer nicht einfällt, oder er gibt
falsche Informationen im Bezug auf den Ort der Gefahr. Diese Faktoren sinken die
Wirksamkeit der Rettung enorm.
Der
Nachteil des heutzutage existierenden Notrufsystems ist, dass der Anruf zuerst
in einer Zentrale ankommt, und erst dann wird er ins Einheitliche Notrufsystem
weitergeleitet, wodurch wertvolle Zeit verschwendet wird. Ein anderer Nachteil
ist, dass so ein Gerät, sowie dessen Instandhalten sehr teuer ist, so ist das
Verbreiten solcher Geräte begrenzt. Der Zweck des Gerätes ist, von bestimmten
Orten kommende Notrufe schneller, einfacher und sicherer zu machen. Dabei
sollten die bekannten Nachteile zu beheben bzw. minimieren. Ein weiteres Ziel
ist es, dieses System preiswert herzustellen, damit dessen Verbreiten auch
versichert ist.
Das Gerät kann auf einen Knopfdruck einen
Anruf anhand der einprogrammierten Nummer 112 zu beginnen.
Durch die eingebaute Lautsprechsystemwird
das Gespräch mit dem Operator vereinfacht. Die Energieversorgung des Gerätes
ist mit Hilfe einer Stromversorgungseinheit ununterbrochen. Zu dem
installierten Gerät gehörende Identifizierungsdaten werden nach dem
Installieren im datenbearbeitenden Programm fixiert.
Wenn der Anruf in der Notrufzentrale
eintrifft, wird die Telefonnummer des Anrufers an den Computer weitergeleitet.
Das datenbearbeitende Programm ruft sofort die im Datenbank zu dieser Telefonnummer
vorhandenen Daten hervor: Name, Adresse, Telefonnummer, GPS-Daten, spezielle Informationen
usw.
Dadurch
bekommt der Operator der Notrufzentrale sofort wichtige Informationen. Er sieht
sofort, dass der Anruf von einem Gerät kommt, das Teil eines „offiziellen"
Netzes ist. Noch vor dem Verbinden sieht er auf dem Bildschirm Daten, die im
Zusammenhang mit der Rettung am wichtigsten sind, und was noch wichtiger ist:
infolge dieses Systems sind diese Daten zuverlässig und richtig.
Die Bisherigen beinhalten die
Grundbeschreibung des Gerätes, aber das System hat mehrere Möglichkeiten
seitens des Gerätes, aber auch des datenbearbeitenden Programmes.
Die Vorteile des fixCall System:

Der Anruf ist sehr einfach, kann mit einem
Knopfdruck gestartet werden.Der meist schockierte, verwirrte Anrufer
muss nicht sehr lange über die Notrufnummer nachdenken.In der Notrufzentrale sieht man den Namen,
die Adresse, die GPS-Koordinaten des Anrufers, die sofort zu den alarmierten
Einheiten weitergeleitet werden können.Auf der Seite des Anrufers und des
Empfängers kann wertvolle Zeit gespart werden.Infolge der ständigen Stromversorgung kann
das Gerät jederzeit benutzt werden.Es ist billig ausführ- und betriebbar.Beim Benutzen ist das Risiko eines Fehlanrufes
sehr gering.Die optional fixierten Stimm- oder
Bilddaten können bei einer eventuellen Untersuchung behilflich sein.Mithilfe des optional-funktionierenden
Stummalarmes kann bei einem Überfall die Notrufzentrale benachrichtigt werden,
ohne darüber den Überfallers zu informieren.Anhand der eintreffenden Anrufe können
nützliche Statistiken angefertigt werden.Das System kann von allen benutzt werden.
(Ämter, Firmen, Privatpersonen)
Vorteile seitens des Staates:

Mithilfe des Systems können Menschenleben
gerettet werden.Die Zeit bis zur Hilfeleistung wird
gekürzt, so können die Verletzungen, die Sachschäden verringert werden, so
werden die Kosten der Heilung und Wiederherstellung der Schäden minimiert.Mithilfe der genauen  und zuverlässigen  Daten können die 
Kosten der Patrouilleneinheiten gesunken werden.
Neben den Grunddaten ( mit der Einwilligung des Bestellers):
Persönliche Daten (Alter, schwere
Krankheiten, lebensrettende Medikamente, Behinderungen usw).Anzahl der Personen, z.B.: alleinlebende
Rentner, oder die Durchschnittszahl der Besucher eines Instituts.Stall mit der Zahl der Tiere.Brandgefahreinstufung.Vorhanden des Defibrillators.Spezielle Barrierefreiheit.Gelagerte gefährliche Stoffe.usw.
Leider ist es nicht zu erwarten, dass sich
das Gerät auf freiwilliger Basis verbreiten wird. Um einen guten Netz
auszubauen, benötigen wir die entsprechenden Maßnahmen seitens der Regierung
und den Ausbau des dazu nötigen rechtlichen Umfeldes. lm Bezug auf die Kosten
kann man mit der Unterstützung der Versicherungen rechnen, ich bin fest
überzeugt davon, dass mit der Hilfe des fixCall System wird die Rettung
rechtzeitig kommen und so kann man die Entschädigungskosten auch verringern.
Wie andere Versicherungsapparate, ist dies
auch nicht kostenlos. Trotzdem glaube ich nicht, dass die Notwendigkeit der
Airbag, des Sicherheitsgürtels oder des Defibrillators von jemandem in Frage gestellt
würde, obwohl sie in der Wirklichkeit nicht so oft benutzt werden.
Was überlegt werden muss: welche Vorteile
und Ersparnisse eine einmalige Investition landesweit hat. Anderseits kann
dieses Gerät den Benutzer vor Sach-und Personenschäden schützen.In Finnland
(Mitglied der EU) wird sofort nach dem Anruf der Aufenthaltsort der jeweiligen
Person festgestellt, danach wird es an den Behörden weitergeleitet.                                                                             (http://hvg.hu/itthon/20130519_tuzolto_riasztas_kaosz)
Wie lange dauert so eine Bemessung und wie
genau ist die? Ich denke, die Genauigkeit der Bemessung ist ganz anders an
einem Gebiet, wo die Überspielstationen eher selten vorkommen, wie in einer
Großstadt. Natürlich hilft die 1-Meter-Genauigkeit auch nicht, wenn wir den Ort
des Anrufes auf dem 20. Stock eines Geschäftsviertels suchen. Da bedeuten die
genaue Anschrift, Stock, Türnummer viel mehr.

Diese
Daten (und vieles mehr) können wir mithilfe des fixCall System sofort auf dem
Bildschirm sehen.
Daten, Statistiken:

Der plötzliche Herztod ist in Ungarn eine
leitenden Todesursache. Obwohl er meistens Herzkranken betrifft, muss man
wissen, dass der plötzliche Herztod überall und bei allen- ohne
Warnsignal-vorkommen kann. Durch das fortschreitende Herzversagen wird unser
Gehirn am meisten geschädigt: nach 4-5 Minuten können bleibende Beschädigungen
auftreten. Die einzige Chance fürs Überleben ist, wenn die Wiederbelebung
sofort stattfindet, deren erste Schritte die frühe Wahrnehmung und Hilferufe
sind.
In Ungarn sterben täglich 70 Menschen
infolge eines plötzlichen Herztodes, der meistens zu Hause oder auf der Straße
stattfindet und hat jährlich 26 000 Opfer. Mit der rechtzeitig begonnenen
Hilfeleistung könnte diese Zahl radikal gesunken werden. Die sofortige
Hilfeleistung würde täglich das Leben von 10-12 Menschen bedeuten.
In Ungarn werden jährlich 42 000 neue
Strokefälle (Schlaganfall) registriert. Bei der Wahrnehmung der Symptome muss
sofort ein Rettungswagen gerufen werden, denn die Behandlung muss innerhalb von
drei Stunden begonnen werden, um Erfolg haben zu können. In Ungarn stirbt ein
Mensch infolge des Stroke in jeder halben Stunde, in Osterreich in jeder anderthalb
Stunden. 
Die Haushaltsunfälle sind in allen
Industrieländern besonders hoch, in Ungarn passieren jährlich 250 000
Haushaltsunfälle.
Die meisten Menschen sterben infolge von
Herz-und Kreislaufkrankheiten.... 1960 starben 45 000 Menschen an Herzkrankheiten,
2012 war diese Zahl beinahe 65 000.
In Ungarn warten die Leute besonders lange
nach der Wahrnehmung der Symptome eines Herzinfarktes. Besonders wichtig ist
es, dass es zu einem Kranken, der sehr starke, spannende Brustschmerzen hat,
und diese nicht nur ein paar Sekunden, sondern mehrere Minuten lang dauern,
sofort ein Rettungswagen gerufen wird. Die ersten drei Stunden sind am
wichtigsten hinsichtlich der Behandlung und der Rehabilitation!
Mein Ziel: die Einführung des Systems in einem EU-Land.
Das Istandhalten Betrieb des fixCall System
ist nur durch die Mitwirkung der Notrufzentrale der Regierung möglich, deshalb
ist unser Ziel, dass wir die Beamteten darauf aufmerksam machen, wie
zuverlässig und billig das System ist. lm Interesse dessen brauchen wir so viel
Unterstützer wie möglich, möglichst aus den EU-Ländern.
Unterstützung:

Zur Einführung des Systems braucht man in
erster Linie nicht viel Geld, sondern sehr viele Unterstützer, so ist der
maximale Unterstützungsbeitrag nur 5 €.
Am Ende der Kampagne wird eine „Funders"-
Präsentation angefertigt, wo die Namen der Unterstützer angegeben werden. (http://prezi.com/prorryyf6f2j/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share)
Das gesammelte Geld wird fürs Kaufen von
lebensrettenden Geräten an das Land gespendet, aus dem die meiste Spende gekommen
ist. Beim Unterstützen gib uns bitte das Land an, in dem du lebst!
Präsentation:

http://prezi.com/itii8jgcge7b/?utm_campaign=share&utm_medium=copy&rc=ex0share
WEB:

http://fixcall.hu/de/
Du kannst nie wissen, wann du es brauchen
wirst!
Vielen Dank für Ihre Unterstützung!
Laczik
István

story:
Be Mobile

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Designed for congested megacities
     

 

Smaller than a bicycle, yet similar load capacity with a cargo bike, rider up to 120 kg and additional load of 70 kg!

 

MIMO C1 with a similar wheelbase to a bicycle, has much smaller turning radius compares to the long john type of cargo bicycle, therefore more nimble and suitable in congested cities. 

 


(Actual footage shot with GoPro during test trial in Singapore central business district 2019)

 

  • Removable battery

 

E-scooters fulfil short distance and first/last mile trips. A single MIMO battery pack can lasts between 15~25km. Bring multiple batteries with you for the extra juice.

 

 

Multipurpose

 

 

For a briefcase? For transporting food? For large cargo? Meet your needs with any of the  modules available. The rack design will be available open-source so you can customize for your needs.

 

 

REGISTER WARRANTY

 

Each MIMO is assembled with pride and unique serial number. Warranty information will be available soon on our official website.

 

 

Limited edition phone holder FREE with every purchase of MIMO C1 with any rack!

 

Crafted in anodized aluminum, seamlessly integrate on your bicycle/scooter with this minimalistic design. No more ugly phone holder on your bike/scooter.

 

Motivations & Comparisons

 

Traffic congestion takes up 1% of Europe's GDP yearly, and parking alone can take up to 40% of driving time, 10% of CO2 emissions.

Personal mobility devices such as bicycle and cargo bicycle (with or without electric assist) offer alternatives to the conventional combustion engine vehicles. Considering well-to-tank efficiency, electric cargo bicycle can emits >1% total emission of cargo van.

However cargo bicycle has not been widely adopted world-wide due to several reasons:

 

MIMO C1 requires no parking, safekeep your belongings, take everything with you wherever you go!

 

 

Specifications

 

(note for Germany/France users, we understand that there is a speed limit of 20km/h for the mentioned country. Please contact us prior to your order (contact(at)mimomotor.com) so we can install a custom controller with 20km/h for you.)
 

Awards 

 

Solar Impulse
Efficient Solutions Label (Sept 2020)

Movin'on Startup Challenge (2020) by Michelin

Impact on sustainable mobility in
“Global warming and Air Pollution” &
“Global Transport Efficiency”

 

 

Partners

 


 

 

Vision and Mission

 

We are innovators, designers, engineers, and change makers who want to make the world more sustainable to live in.

Engineer and founder Witono Halim vowed not to buy a car until he had succeeded in building his own electric car. Witono spent years designing and researching various electric vehicles with Singapore and Germany universities since 2010. Witono founded a small, dedicated team to bring his vision of practical, low-carbon commute to life. MIMO products are designed to remove the barriers to seamless commute, and aims to reward the sustainable commuter with cost savings while delivering higher performance. MIMO C1 took more than 2 years from prototyping to visualize today.

We work very closely with our partners with over 20 years of experience producing bicycle and electric bike. Official production will begin in Apr 2021 and expect to ship out by Aug 2021 (may take up to 1~2 months by sea to reach USA/Europe region)

We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by COVID to deliver some pre-production units to our valued partners.

Help us by supporting us in this crowdfunding!

story:
Short Summary

Hello,

My name is Brandon L. Thompson. I am a 100% disabled combat veteran and a proud representor of the LGBTQ+ community. I am also a Computer Engineer with over 15 years’ experience. I was raised in Japan for 19 years then spent 12 years living in Europe. I love to travel, sightsee, dance, cook, skydive, jet ski amongst many other things.

The reason I started this journey of creating the SATCR device is because it will address a few issues all at once including maintenance cost, roadside assistance cost and wait time to name a few. I have noticed that most vehicles come with a jack and spare tire for unfortunate circumstances like a flat tire while you are traveling. Although in the past this proved to be sufficient, it is time, we update this feature with the technology we currently have available in today’s world. Most of the jacks in your everyday vehicle are a heavy piece of metal that is not always the easiest to lift or the most user friendly to operate.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Currently, I'm looking for $25K. This money will go towards the completion cost of the SATCR Robot and fees associated with it's contract.
  • I'm willing to not only give equity in my company I'm also willing to provide the first 50 SATCR Devices to people who are willing to help my progression forward and believe in the project.
  • If I do not reach my entire goal, I will ensure I reach out to everyone who donated to see if they want their refund or they still want to support and keep pushing with me.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Most people can not change a flat tire if they unfortunately get one on the side of the road. It could be because they have physical limitations or lack of knowledge or many other things. Now they have to wait somewhere on the side of the road for roadside assistance or someone and those cost could become pretty outrageous. With SATCR we out the ability in everyone's hands if they were to get a flat tire. No need to pay costly monthly roadside assistance or no need to sit at home up all night worrying about your loved ones on the road.  .
  • I have loved large scale projects every since the United States Air Force trained me to be an IT Project Manager and put me in charge of creating, building, completing an $84M Project at just 22 years old!
  • I'm a brand new Entrepreneur so I know there are things I need to learn and understand. I'm asking for some faith and confidence in myself and this project. I'm willing to and always do go above and beyond any project I'm on. I'm believe in quality not quantity and my product is like my personalized signature to the world or whoever is enjoy my product. I'm willing to do ALL the legwork, groundwork, dirty work whatever it takes to see the vision all the way through.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • The biggest risk I have currently is not having enough funding to complete this. I've put over $12K into this but I still have to maintain a lively hood as well.
  • I'm working a second job and contract work to make sure I secure this funding one way or another. If I fall I plan to fall forward not backwards. 
  • One reward to the risk is if I can get this developed we have already completed market research and this is a $270B Market with no patents or devices like mine! THERE IS CURRENTLY NO COMPETITION! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Any support is always greatly appreciated! I understand these times and finances aren't always the best option to support. Feel free to share to others you think may be interested.

story:
Who we are:

For the past 3 years Rob McEwen and his team in New Zealand have designed, spec'd and built e-bikes to meet the needs of the rugged NZ terrain and roads.  Now we have leveraged his experience to create the best e-bikes for the US market branded "Further." Our team of 7 has worked together collectively in businesses for decades. The team consists of brothers Wayne, Conley , Wade, & Clint Giles located in Central Texas.  Rob lives in NZ and Texas, and Holger & Cheri live in China full time.

Your participation in this campaign will help us build this company and pipeline as the leading direct to consumer e-bike supplier in North America.  As an e-bike rider you are making a valuable contribution to reducing your carbon footprint.  You are also becoming a founding member of the Further community and culture.

We are not just building a company, we are building a community of like minded people who understand each of our daily choices have an impact on our grater community.  Our focus is on creating energy efficient products with minimal environmental impact and the best value for our customers.

What We Need & What You Get:

We are in production! We have calculated the minimum number of bikes we need to sell via this campaign in order to manufacture and ship each of you your Further e-bike.

This campaign is about building a great quality e-bike and delivering it direct to you at a fantastic price (25-40+% lower than other comparable e-bikes ). We are also developing and introducing additional new innovative products and accessories for your Further e-bike.

All of the funds raised in this campaign are going direct to the production and shipping of our first container of 40 Further e-bikes.

The Impact:

E-bikes have become incredibly popular in Europe, Asia, and other parts of the world.  They are just now starting to gain momentum in the USA.  FurtherBike has been established to be the leading direct to consumer e-bike company in North America.  We are providing the highest quality e-bike at the best price.  

Further e-bikes are a great alternative to driving a combustion engine vehicle.  A single charge can take you 20-60 miles and are an enjoyable way to get 80-90% exercise value of a traditional bike ride.   

We have learned a lot from Rob's e-bike experience in New Zealand. Now we are excited to bring an even greater e-bike to the US market. When you buy a Further e-bike you become a member of the growing Further Community. 

Risks & Challenges:

We will deliver!   As a result of our lifetime of working together as brothers and 30+ year friendship with Rob, we are a team that knows how to work together and deliver! 

The only real concerns would be natural disaster or war.

What we are doing to make this venture a sustainable success:

We use proven quality suppliers in the e-bike industry. Our manufacturing partner Holger and his wife Cheri live in China so each bike is inspected by them before it goes into the container.  We keep our overhead to a minimum to be able to offer an extremely high quality product for an amazingly reasonable price.  We are building a transparent community for open sharing of information, experiences, ideas for new products and suggestions. Visit our website at www.FurtherEbike.com

Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if a Further e-bike is not in your immediate future, share the word with someone you think would enjoy owning a Further e-bike.

Use the communication links to share the word.

Our team of 7 has worked together collectively in businesses for decades.
