story:
• Hi, my name is László, and I'm a sheet metal expert with 10+ years of experience in sheet metal production from A to Z, including a 2 year managing director job of a small company. I have driving license for any kind of motorcycle, but I will never ride other motorcycle than the sPereBike, because I want to live for my family, and I want others also not to die in an accident.
  • My personality keeps spinning around improvements, how can I make something better. It comes from deep inside. I'm aware of global warming, I see the huge traffic jams, where people are sitting in cars alone, making it impossible get to the destination, just staying there with engine on. I believe a lot of people don't ride a motorcycle because they are afraid, and they are right! What if somebody else makes a mistake? I'm going to die, or seriously injure and become disabled no matter how much I'm focusing on the road. Or do you already have a fast motorbike, and you (or your wife, kids, parents) aren't affraid? Well you should be. I'm reading always the same story about death cases: "she/he was an experienced driver and was never driving fast", but after all, she/he is dead. "Per vehicle mile traveled, motorcyclists have a 34-fold higher risk of death in a crash than people driving other types of vehicles." - says a source.
  • If you help, a revolution will happen. Much less injuries (one of the greatest causes of human deaths and injuries are traffic crashes - 5th place US 2010), much less traffic jams, so much less air pollution, and: much more fun.
  • it's very simple, built of simple, common motorcycle parts, there are absolutely no too complicated components or ideas
  • I know real motorcycle enthusiasts don't think like me, but for me, all motorcycles in the whole world are the same, no matter if it's a chopper, a speedbike, a crossbike etc. This is completely different, this is completely new, this is the best. The world needs a better solution and this is it!
  • I have followed and studied feet forward, or feet first, or recumbent motorcycle projects on the web for years now (not because I wanted a FF or recumbent motorcycle to build, but these were the closest to my idea and I don't think we should call the sPB a FF, because it was not the goal, but only an additional result of the concept), and my conclusion is, that with such proportions and in such composition and with design regarding mostly safety as mine, no other motorcycle exists and more than less approximately this is how a safe and cool looking motorcycle should look like. This is what I would like to see in my and in your garage.

What We Need & What You Get

I need the money to build a professional prototype, get permissions from authorities and promote to catch the attention of a big investor.

  • This way we can show investors, we also have something in our hands. Nobody accepts you if you have just a concept (I know because I have tried it). Investors want to see a product that is working and live up to the expectations. If we want to see a lot of sPereBikes on the roads - and that's what we want - we have to work together with a big fish.
  • First step: buying a used motorcycle with a good and decent engine (not too small, not too big). That would be the most reasonable way.
  • develop and desing a frame (together with someone who has the right experience), that fits to the engine and all other devices needed.
  • buy material for the frame and the special component that will allow us to transfer steering and drivetrain.
  • buy a nice weather resistant sports car seat with seatbelt.
  • bend and cut the pipes with a CNC tube bender and tube laser
  • build a welding gauge
  • weld the pipes together
  • paint the frame
  • assemble the whole thing and try how it feels to ride... I guess we have to modify a few things a few times until we get the right results. When we are ready, we look for magazines to ask them to try and publish their (hopefully positive) reviews. When we have enough positive feedback, it will be easier to find large investors to start mass production. Buying a CNC pipe bender for example costs more than 10x than our goal.
  • we go to exhibitions, and arrange meetings with people, like you
  • If we don't reach the 40.000, the money goes back to contributors.

The Impact

  • Airbag, and safety belt suddenly begins to make sense on a motorcycle!
  • We know it will be working, because we have already seen Dan Gurney's Alligator, with similar lowered seat position
  • If you check hyperphysics' site, you can see what difference it makes to use a seatbelt.

Risks & Challenges

A risk can be that the frame becomes too heavy. On one side, weight is good, especially in an accident. Otherwise it results a higher fuel consumption, and maybe becomes hard to handle. We have to find the right material to build the frame.

  • I have 10+ years experience in producing parts and assemblies of steel including 3D design, CNC programming, bending, welding etc. so it shouldn't be a problem to make it real.
  • we have to be able to transfer steering and drive. We have to buy or develop and produce custom parts for that, but the good thing is, that more than less these are the two biggest challanges, and they are fortunately not too big.
  • I have talked to an automotive engineer, who said, for the first sight it doesn't seem too complicated to make real. He said it would be definitely a huge thing if such motorcycle would exist: probably one of his friends would still be able to walk without a stick (he has had a serious leg injury in a motorcycle accident where he was absolutely not driving fast, but a car driver unfortunately hasn't noticed him and turned out in front of him).
  • I have a friend nearby, Attila Pechó who has also seen my blueprints (in an earlier stage), and he is a professional motorcycle driver, and a professional motorcycle mechanic (he has disassembled, fixed, repaired and assembled hundreds of motorcycles from old to new). He works now in the motorcycle museum in Olasz, where he is the official restorer of old veteran motorcycles. He is also willing to help make it real.
  • We have to get permissions from authorities for our frame and the whole motorcycle completely assembled, otherwise we will not be allowed to start batch production.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • please get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you very much for any kind of contribution you make!
story_txt:
Hi, my name is László, and I'm a sheet metal expert with 10+ years of experience in sheet metal production from A to Z, including a 2 year managing director job of a small company. I have driving license for any kind of motorcycle, but I will never ride other motorcycle than the sPereBike, because I want to live for my family, and I want others also not to die in an accident. My personality keeps spinning around improvements, how can I make something better. It comes from deep inside. I'm aware of global warming, I see the huge traffic jams, where people are sitting in cars alone, making it impossible get to the destination, just staying there with engine on. I believe a lot of people don't ride a motorcycle because they are afraid, and they are right! What if somebody else makes a mistake? I'm going to die, or seriously injure and become disabled no matter how much I'm focusing on the road. Or do you already have a fast motorbike, and you (or your wife, kids, parents) aren't affraid? Well you should be. I'm reading always the same story about death cases: "she/he was an experienced driver and was never driving fast", but after all, she/he is dead. "Per vehicle mile traveled, motorcyclists have a 34-fold higher risk of death in a crash than people driving other types of vehicles." - says a source. If you help, a revolution will happen. Much less injuries (one of the greatest causes of human deaths and injuries are traffic crashes - 5th place US 2010), much less traffic jams, so much less air pollution, and: much more fun.

it's very simple, built of simple, common motorcycle parts, there are absolutely no too complicated components or ideas

I know real motorcycle enthusiasts don't think like me, but for me, all motorcycles in the whole world are the same, no matter if it's a chopper, a speedbike, a crossbike etc. This is completely different, this is completely new, this is the best. The world needs a better solution and this is it!

I have followed and studied feet forward, or feet first, or recumbent motorcycle projects on the web for years now (not because I wanted a FF or recumbent motorcycle to build, but these were the closest to my idea and I don't think we should call the sPB a FF, because it was not the goal, but only an additional result of the concept), and my conclusion is, that with such proportions and in such composition and with design regarding mostly safety as mine, no other motorcycle exists and more than less approximately this is how a safe and cool looking motorcycle should look like. This is what I would like to see in my and in your garage.
   What We Need & What You Get
I need the money to build a professional prototype, get permissions from authorities and promote to catch the attention of a big investor.

This way we can show investors, we also have something in our hands. Nobody accepts you if you have just a concept (I know because I have tried it). Investors want to see a product that is working and live up to the expectations. If we want to see a lot of sPereBikes on the roads - and that's what we want - we have to work together with a big fish.

First step: buying a used motorcycle with a good and decent engine (not too small, not too big). That would be the most reasonable way.
develop and desing a frame (together with someone who has the right experience), that fits to the engine and all other devices needed.
buy material for the frame and the special component that will allow us to transfer steering and drivetrain.
buy a nice weather resistant sports car seat with seatbelt.
bend and cut the pipes with a CNC tube bender and tube laser
build a welding gauge
weld the pipes together
paint the frame
assemble the whole thing and try how it feels to ride... I guess we have to modify a few things a few times until we get the right results. When we are ready, we look for magazines to ask them to try and publish their (hopefully positive) reviews. When we have enough positive feedback, it will be easier to find large investors to start mass production. Buying a CNC pipe bender for example costs more than 10x than our goal.
we go to exhibitions, and arrange meetings with people, like you If we don't reach the 40.000, the money goes back to contributors.    The Impact  
Airbag, and safety belt suddenly begins to make sense on a motorcycle!
 We know it will be working, because we have already seen Dan Gurney's Alligator, with similar lowered seat position
If you check hyperphysics' site, you can see what difference it makes to use a seatbelt.    Risks & Challenges  A risk can be that the frame becomes too heavy. On one side, weight is good, especially in an accident. Otherwise it results a higher fuel consumption, and maybe becomes hard to handle. We have to find the right material to build the frame.  I have 10+ years experience in producing parts and assemblies of steel including 3D design, CNC programming, bending, welding etc. so it shouldn't be a problem to make it real.
we have to be able to transfer steering and drive. We have to buy or develop and produce custom parts for that, but the good thing is, that more than less these are the two biggest challanges, and they are fortunately not too big.
I have talked to an automotive engineer, who said, for the first sight it doesn't seem too complicated to make real. He said it would be definitely a huge thing if such motorcycle would exist: probably one of his friends would still be able to walk without a stick (he has had a serious leg injury in a motorcycle accident where he was absolutely not driving fast, but a car driver unfortunately hasn't noticed him and turned out in front of him).

I have a friend nearby, Attila Pechó who has also seen my blueprints (in an earlier stage), and he is a professional motorcycle driver, and a professional motorcycle mechanic (he has disassembled, fixed, repaired and assembled hundreds of motorcycles from old to new). He works now in the motorcycle museum in Olasz, where he is the official restorer of old veteran motorcycles. He is also willing to help make it real.

We have to get permissions from authorities for our frame and the whole motorcycle completely assembled, otherwise we will not be allowed to start batch production.

    Other Ways You Can Help 
please get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. please don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!   Thank you very much for any kind of contribution you make!

story:
Bicycle signalling system that enable cyclists to signal their intentions and also to increase road safety.

Safety is the No. 1 priority in every sport and this product would help to make cycling a more safer sport.

Reggal Originals have been featured in online press worldwide.


Reggal Originals have won numerous international design awards  worldwide.

Currently, This product have won

  • Red Dot Award: Design Concept 2012 (Winner)
  • A' Design Award 2013 (Winner)
  • International Design Awards Los Angeles 2012 (Bronze Award)

http://www.red-dot.sg/en/online-exhibition/concept/?code=655&y=2012&c=9&a=0

http://www.adesignaward.com/design.php?ID=26216

http://idesignawards.com/winners/zoom2.php?eid=9-5825-12&cat=Safety%20Designs

 

What Is Reggal Original Exactly?

Reggal Original is an all directional signalling system for bicycle system. Mountain Bicycles/ folderable bicycles will be the first rollout and followed by road bicycle with dropbars.

  • For the front, there would be a lock-on grip for easy mounting and unmounting.Lighting would be side the grip unlike what it is shown below.

  • For the back, there would be a light on the seat pole

Please do check up on the topic (Features) to know more about the changes in the product  that would make the product more visible.

All this are handmade prototype photos, to make it more appealing in apperances i would need your generous funding.

 

The Designer Behind The Award Winning Design

Nicholas Tay is a Singaporean citizen, age 22. Cycling is his passion and have constantly been thinking about safety as a whole.

Under his portfolio, he have design 5 products which touch on safety and 3 of his designs have won international awards.

To see more works please like his page at http://www.facebook.com/nicholastayproductdesign

 

Making A Turn, Not As Easy.

As a cyclist, i come across a irritating problem when i try to make a turn. Seeing the vehicles beside my cyclist signal out before starting to make a turn, i questioned myself on why bicycles do not have signalling system like a vehicle. 

I find out most accidents happen due to the lack of directional indication cyclist give to other vehicles and that is why making use of signalling system for bicycle would be the best option available.

This gave me a very clear idea of creating a signalling system just for bicycle.

 

 

Safety Is What I Preach!

To understand more about the features, please look at this brochures.

Updates on Production

To Make the product more visible from the back of the bicycle, the design structure would be tweak alittle to be something like this shown below.

 

First In This Industry, Protecting Our Rights.

This design is in a patent pending progress & has been filed in Singapore IPO under

Patent Application No. 201207863-0.

This patent pending application would be great to protect the designer product and also to make sure that everyone gets the unique one and only product in the market.

 

I Need Your Generous Help In Propelling My Project.

This project needs at least 75 thousand SGD (Singapore Dollars), which would be 60 thousand USD. This funding would be use on:

  • Molding
  • Production

Most important different perk would support my project in a meaningful way

  1. Supporter Rewards

    • Your fundings would go towards Research for a more newer product like wireless charging, wireless locking system.

  2. Fan Rewards

    • Your fundings would go towards the design of the mold and this is very important for the quality I can produce for every cyclist.

  3. Cyclist Rewards

    • Your fundings would go towards the production of the physical product.And this ultimately would help me in bringing safety to others cyclist too.

 

If everyone could just generously fund my project, i would be able to design wireless version & more projects tag to safety.

Thank you for your kind consideration!

 

Different Amount, Different Rewards/Perks.

Bottle and Sticker are one-time produced just for this Fundrising project.

Wallpaper With The Innovator Signature (1600 X 900 Pixel)

Limited Edition T-Shirt

Designer Sticker 

Water Bottle

 

Safety is something that any amount of money would be spent to exchange back.

This project have come a long way to where it is now.

This is the birth of Reggal Original where the LED Lights were glued onto the seat and the handlebar.

This is one of the prototype part where this idea came from the handlebar lock-on grips.

With all the awards, I believe i am on the verge to make this product a success hit.

Together, let's revolutionize the way how road safety is. Help me bring more Safety products that would save someone one way or the other.

Help me in sharing my projects with your friends and relatives!

Thank you for your attention.

Nicholas Tay.

story:
Introducing e-kick electric scooter

We are from Barcelona. A new way of living is coming and we have an example in our city with the recent introduction of the first Smart City Area in Spain.

We are also committed to the idea of making the city  a nice and peaceful place for its people, promoting social cohesion and citizens’ participation, a place to enjoy life creating  space not only for vehicles but for people, giving the city its  human dimension back.

We implemented all these ideas in one device and today we are proud to introduce e-kick electric scooter, the new way of moving around the city, quickly, safely and having fun, while reducing noise and emissions for the benefit of all the community.

Why get e-kick?

For travellers (Visit a City in a Day)

For those who have limited time to visit the cities when travelling, we offer a one-day ride all around Barcelona visiting all important places such as Monumental, Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia, Diagonal, Plaza Catalunya, Ramblas, Port, etc.

No matter you are businessman, elite crowd, office worker or senior citizen, you can go everywhere with it. (Having fun on the way).

For people who go to work or move around many times within short distance.

For Teachers or Students (Arrive fresh full of energy to the school or universtity)

For those who move frequently within a 10 Km area, this is the best choice.

For Everyone (Who wants to enjoy riding around)

For people that do further distance also can complement it with public or private transportation.

 

What we need?

We need your support to go to production and fulfill factory requirements to reward you with your own early bird e-kick electric scooter.

Back this project Now and get until 200€ off

Thank you for your support.

e-kick Specs in deep

 

The Electric Scooter features

•    Light Weight Just 7.8 kg.

•    Quick Folding System (Folds in 1 second)

•    Easy and comfort to handle to go upstairs, downstairs, inside the subway, bus or anywhere.
The electric scooter can be used instead of or combined with public transportation.

•    Puncture and inflate Free due to its 5 inch Solid tires.
This tires provide sufficient stability and an efficient absorption of the street bumps.

•    A very Fun and Pleasant Riding Experience, just Amazing.
Top speed limited to 30 km/h approx.

•    Very Powerful, climbing ability until 15 degrees.
300W Front Wheel Direct Drive Brushless Engine (Peak 500W).

•    Smooth braking system
Front Electronic ABS Regenerative Brake, and Rear Friction Mechanical Brake.

•    High Performance Autonomy
High Quality LG Rechargeable Lithium Batteries.
Between 15 kms (Standard e-scooter) and 25 Kms (Pro e-scooter)

•    Quick Charge (3-4 hours)
You can charge it, everywhere, and save time.

•    Very Strong Magnesium Alloy Frame 6601-T6.

•    Front LED Headlight

•    Multifunctional Display with 3 Speeds Mode
Normal “15km/h”, Sport “22km/h” and Advanced “30km/h”

•    4 Colors Available (Pink, Orange, Blue and Black)

•    2 Editions (Standard, and Pro).
Standard E-scooter build in 36 V 4.4 Ah LG batteries
Pro E-scooter build in 36 V 5.8 Ah LG batteries.

•    Very Compact Design.
The functional design is made and produced to give the best sensations and safety to the driver.
Dimensions 105 cm x 22.5 cm x 20.5 cm.

•    The mudguards keep you dry when the street is wet.

•    Antiskid exchangeable layers.

 

About e-kick electric scooter Team by E-totem

Established in 2003, E-totem Company was initiated like an engineering company who took constant direction, to make technology projects specially e-bike and all types of electric vehicles
At its founding, it established a core research and development team with a global vision composed by Co-Founder and CEO, Director of Sales, Customer relations, Finance manager, Marketing manager, Head of Industrial Design, 3D Designer, Mechanical Engineer, Lab Manager.                                                                                                                                             
This team has accumulated 12 years’ experience in the production and industrial design. It has had close and cohesive cooperation with important companies and other global brands. Now it devotes itself of portable and smart transport industry all over the world making people benefit from the advance of high-tech.
Based in Barcelona (Spain), our team is made up of electrical, mechanical engineers, and designers, who share a special love for the new ways of personal mobility.

We introduced the first original e-kick Electric scooter, for test, on January 2016 and have listened to the feedback from our partner riders all over the world. We implemented those feedbacks into the final product to achieve a definitive final e-kick version.

We are very excited to have you as a customer and we hope you can join and ride e-kick with us.
e-kick has one year warranty (battery 6 months).


Please, feel free to ask any questions at info@e-totem.es or in our social networks:
https://www.facebook.com/Ondabikes
https://www.youtube.com/user/ondabike
https://twitter.com/Ondabikes
https://plus.google.com/+OndabikeEs
E-totem website


Timeline:

January 2016: Project origin
March - August 2016: Engineering and prototypes
August 2016: Final testing and certifications
September 2016: Launch on Indiegogo website
October - November 2016: Preparing for mass production
December 2016: Start Mass Production
January-February 2017: Shipping worldwide


Shipping

North America and Europe: After the campaign finish we will calculate the shipping cost regarding the volum and we will make it as cheap as possible.

Rest of the world: Shipping average cost is 99€ due to the fact, that we ship worldwide directly from our factory. But, every shipping must be evaluated independently before.

 

Frequently Asked Questions - FAQ'S

Q: How can you ensure such a low price?
A: We have extensive experience in sourcing and manufacturing products as electric bikes and components. This is a key factor that enables us to maintain a low units cost based on volume. With increased sales and production volume, we are confident that we can ensure a low price, even after the campaign has ended.
Q: In how many countries is possible order e-kick?
A: We deliver the e-kick scooter anywhere in the world.  
Q: How much does electric scooter weigh?
A: The scooter e-kick weighs approximately 7.8 kg including battery, easy to lift and transport, well designed for daily trips as personal complement.
Q: How much weight can the scooter e-kick handle?
A: The scooter is built strong and can handle riders up to 120 kg with ease.
Q: How much does shipping cost?
A: Shipping cost will be calculated after the campaing finish to make it as cheap as possible.For European and North American countries maxim shipping cost will be 99€.
For the rest of the countries the price will be around 99€.
Q: Do all perks require shipping be paid?
A: Yes, at the time of transportation.
Q: When will my electric scooter arrive?
A: All first batch productions will be shipped in January/February 2017.
Q: How is scooter delivered?
A: The scooter comes delivered with instructions in safely packed box and not requires assembly.
Q: I live in Europe can I pick it up myself in my country?
A: No. The scooter is ordered in bulk, and will be shipping to individual directly from our factory. All scooters will be shipped to the address on file.
Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  
A: All e-kick electric scooters come with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty (6 months for batteries). As many elements of an electric scooter may damage due to normal use, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, brakes, etc.
Q: What is your returns-policy?
Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...
Q: Do I need a license to ride an electric scooter?
A: No. The scooter e-kick do not need license to ride, it has a motor will only help normally you up to 25 km/h, with its 300W motor, the maxim speed is electronically limited to 20 mph (32 km/h), which is the legal and logical limit to ride
Q: How is e-kick manufactured?
A: We dedicated a lot of time looking the right suppliers and manufacturers, for e-kick. Our experience dealing with providers, factories and shipping companies have helped us a lot, to be able to offer high quality product with the lowest price.
This platform helps us to keep the costs down; we can work together with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related costs.
Q: How confident are you that your structure can produce on time?
A: Our relationships with the manufacturing partners and the testing already performed, confident in our ability to meet the timeline.
We intend to run everything efficiently, transparently, and on-time to take on the expectations
Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?
A: The backer is responsible; please check your country's import duties before purchasing.
Q: What kind of accessories do you have; can I expect others accessories in the future?
A: We currently no offer accessories, but we are regularly working to develop modifications. Stay tuned for more information. Feel free to let us know what kind of accessories you’d be most interested in seeing.
Q: What colors are available?
Pink, Orange, Blue and Black
Q: How do I choose the color?
A: When the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey or email where you can tell us your color choice and any other info we need to get you the electric scooter.
Q: How long does the battery last?
A: The battery inside e-kick electric scooter is built to last on average up to 25 kms (Pro version) and 15 kms (standard version). The main factors affecting the battery life are: power, speed, weight, road conditions, and temperature.
Q: How do regenerative brakes work?
A: Electric vehicles with regenerative braking system recover some kinetic energy via the electric motor and store it as electric energy in a battery. The electric motor can then use this stored energy when driving off or accelerating.
Q: Can I charge the battery by riding?
A: Yes, but only recharge the battery when using the Front electrical Brake.
Q: Differences between standard and pro version?
A: The only difference is the battery capacity (that it translate to the autonomy of the scooter). The standard version has 36V 4.4Ah LG battery (around 15 kilometers), and pro version has 36V 5.8Ah LG battery (25 kilometers).
Q: Will the charger work with 120V and 240V outlets around the world?
A: Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V and uses the same power cable that laptops use. The charger works in all countries.
Q: How much maintenance does the motor require?
A: The motor is maintenance free.
Q: Where is the battery?
A: Batteries are inside the direction tube protected and secured by a rigid mechanical system
Q: How much maintenance does the battery require?
A: Battery life is prolonged by not allowing it to discharge fully before recharging: keep it topped up as much as possible.
Experts commonly recommend recharging before the capacity is down to about 50% of full.
Storage: We recommend to recharge it 1 time every 2-3 months for best battery performance.
Q: How many charges can I get out of a battery?
A: E-kick electric scooter uses LG lithium-ion battery technology. Each battery will provide approximately 1000 “full” charges. The battery has no memory effect, so if you recharge the battery when it is around 50% charge, that counts as only half a charge. The amount of charges will also be impacted by factors such as temperature, etc.
Q: Is the battery replaceable?
A: Yes, The battery is very easy to replace it for a new one.
The battery is designed in such a way that you can change it or replace easy  
Simply disassemble the direction tube, pull out the battery and replace for the new one.
Q: How long does it take to charge the battery?
A fully discharged lithium ion battery will take 3-4 hours to recharge. It will take less time if the battery has a partial charge.
Q: Can I still ride on scooter if the battery runs out of power?
A: Of course! If you run out of power, you can ride as you would do with a regular scooter.
Q: What’s the top speed of the electric scooter?
A: The electric scooter can easily achieve 30Km/h with the advanced mode selected.
Q: Do I need to wear a helmet?
A: They are required by law in some places and optional in other places but we recommend it.
Q: Can I order multiples e-kick electric scooters?
Yes, to request multiple perks, please make a separate transaction for each perk.
Q: Who can ride the e-kick electric scooter?
A: E-kick electric scooter is designed for people over 10 years old and 120 cm height.
Q: Will I be able to buy replacement parts?
A: Yes, via the official e-totem.es website
Q: How dust and waterproof is e-kick electric scooter?
A: IP65 this means that is protected against contact (dust tight), no ingress of dust and water jets projected by a nozzle (6.3 mm) from any direction.

•    Quick Folding System (Folds in 1 second)
•    Easy and comfort to handle to go upstairs, downstairs, inside the subway, bus or anywhere.The electric scooter can be used instead of or combined with public transportation.
•    Puncture and inflate Free due to its 5 inch Solid tires.This tires provide sufficient stability and an efficient absorption of the street bumps.
•    A very Fun and Pleasant Riding Experience, just Amazing.Top speed limited to 30 km/h approx.
•    Very Powerful, climbing ability until 15 degrees.300W Front Wheel Direct Drive Brushless Engine (Peak 500W).
•    Smooth braking systemFront Electronic ABS Regenerative Brake, and Rear Friction Mechanical Brake.
•    High Performance AutonomyHigh Quality LG Rechargeable Lithium Batteries.Between 15 kms (Standard e-scooter) and 25 Kms (Pro e-scooter)
•    Quick Charge (3-4 hours)You can charge it, everywhere, and save time.
•    Very Strong Magnesium Alloy Frame 6601-T6.
•    Front LED Headlight
•    Multifunctional Display with 3 Speeds ModeNormal “15km/h”, Sport “22km/h” and Advanced “30km/h”
•    4 Colors Available (Pink, Orange, Blue and Black)
•    2 Editions (Standard, and Pro).Standard E-scooter build in 36 V 4.4 Ah LG batteriesPro E-scooter build in 36 V 5.8 Ah LG batteries.
•    Very Compact Design.The functional design is made and produced to give the best sensations and safety to the driver.Dimensions 105 cm x 22.5 cm x 20.5 cm.
•    The mudguards keep you dry when the street is wet.
•    Antiskid exchangeable layers.
 
About e-kick electric scooter Team by E-totem
Established in 2003, E-totem Company was initiated like an engineering company who took constant direction, to make technology projects specially e-bike and all types of electric vehiclesAt its founding, it established a core research and development team with a global vision composed by Co-Founder and CEO, Director of Sales, Customer relations, Finance manager, Marketing manager, Head of Industrial Design, 3D Designer, Mechanical Engineer, Lab Manager.                                                                                                                                             This team has accumulated 12 years’ experience in the production and industrial design. It has had close and cohesive cooperation with important companies and other global brands. Now it devotes itself of portable and smart transport industry all over the world making people benefit from the advance of high-tech.Based in Barcelona (Spain), our team is made up of electrical, mechanical engineers, and designers, who share a special love for the new ways of personal mobility.
We introduced the first original e-kick Electric scooter, for test, on January 2016 and have listened to the feedback from our partner riders all over the world. We implemented those feedbacks into the final product to achieve a definitive final e-kick version.
We are very excited to have you as a customer and we hope you can join and ride e-kick with us.e-kick has one year warranty (battery 6 months).
Please, feel free to ask any questions at info@e-totem.es or in our social networks:https://www.facebook.com/Ondabikeshttps://www.youtube.com/user/ondabikehttps://twitter.com/Ondabikeshttps://plus.google.com/+OndabikeEsE-totem website

Timeline:
January 2016: Project originMarch - August 2016: Engineering and prototypesAugust 2016: Final testing and certificationsSeptember 2016: Launch on Indiegogo websiteOctober - November 2016: Preparing for mass productionDecember 2016: Start Mass ProductionJanuary-February 2017: Shipping worldwide

Shipping
North America and Europe: After the campaign finish we will calculate the shipping cost regarding the volum and we will make it as cheap as possible.
Rest of the world: Shipping average cost is 99€ due to the fact, that we ship worldwide directly from our factory. But, every shipping must be evaluated independently before. Frequently Asked Questions - FAQ'S
Q: How can you ensure such a low price?A: We have extensive experience in sourcing and manufacturing products as electric bikes and components. This is a key factor that enables us to maintain a low units cost based on volume. With increased sales and production volume, we are confident that we can ensure a low price, even after the campaign has ended.Q: In how many countries is possible order e-kick?A: We deliver the e-kick scooter anywhere in the world.  Q: How much does electric scooter weigh?A: The scooter e-kick weighs approximately 7.8 kg including battery, easy to lift and transport, well designed for daily trips as personal complement.Q: How much weight can the scooter e-kick handle?A: The scooter is built strong and can handle riders up to 120 kg with ease.Q: How much does shipping cost?A: Shipping cost will be calculated after the campaing finish to make it as cheap as possible.For European and North American countries maxim shipping cost will be 99€.For the rest of the countries the price will be around 99€.Q: Do all perks require shipping be paid?A: Yes, at the time of transportation.Q: When will my electric scooter arrive?A: All first batch productions will be shipped in January/February 2017.Q: How is scooter delivered?A: The scooter comes delivered with instructions in safely packed box and not requires assembly.Q: I live in Europe can I pick it up myself in my country?A: No. The scooter is ordered in bulk, and will be shipping to individual directly from our factory. All scooters will be shipped to the address on file.Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  A: All e-kick electric scooters come with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty (6 months for batteries). As many elements of an electric scooter may damage due to normal use, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, brakes, etc.Q: What is your returns-policy?Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...Q: Do I need a license to ride an electric scooter?A: No. The scooter e-kick do not need license to ride, it has a motor will only help normally you up to 25 km/h, with its 300W motor, the maxim speed is electronically limited to 20 mph (32 km/h), which is the legal and logical limit to rideQ: How is e-kick manufactured?A: We dedicated a lot of time looking the right suppliers and manufacturers, for e-kick. Our experience dealing with providers, factories and shipping companies have helped us a lot, to be able to offer high quality product with the lowest price.This platform helps us to keep the costs down; we can work together with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related costs.Q: How confident are you that your structure can produce on time?A: Our relationships with the manufacturing partners and the testing already performed, confident in our ability to meet the timeline.We intend to run everything efficiently, transparently, and on-time to take on the expectationsQ: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?A: The backer is responsible; please check your country's import duties before purchasing.Q: What kind of accessories do you have; can I expect others accessories in the future?A: We currently no offer accessories, but we are regularly working to develop modifications. Stay tuned for more information. Feel free to let us know what kind of accessories you’d be most interested in seeing.Q: What colors are available?Pink, Orange, Blue and BlackQ: How do I choose the color?A: When the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey or email where you can tell us your color choice and any other info we need to get you the electric scooter.Q: How long does the battery last?A: The battery inside e-kick electric scooter is built to last on average up to 25 kms (Pro version) and 15 kms (standard version). The main factors affecting the battery life are: power, speed, weight, road conditions, and temperature.Q: How do regenerative brakes work?A: Electric vehicles with regenerative braking system recover some kinetic energy via the electric motor and store it as electric energy in a battery. The electric motor can then use this stored energy when driving off or accelerating.Q: Can I charge the battery by riding?A: Yes, but only recharge the battery when using the Front electrical Brake.Q: Differences between standard and pro version?A: The only difference is the battery capacity (that it translate to the autonomy of the scooter). The standard version has 36V 4.4Ah LG battery (around 15 kilometers), and pro version has 36V 5.8Ah LG battery (25 kilometers).Q: Will the charger work with 120V and 240V outlets around the world?A: Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V and uses the same power cable that laptops use. The charger works in all countries.Q: How much maintenance does the motor require?A: The motor is maintenance free.Q: Where is the battery?A: Batteries are inside the direction tube protected and secured by a rigid mechanical systemQ: How much maintenance does the battery require?A: Battery life is prolonged by not allowing it to discharge fully before recharging: keep it topped up as much as possible.Experts commonly recommend recharging before the capacity is down to about 50% of full.Storage: We recommend to recharge it 1 time every 2-3 months for best battery performance.Q: How many charges can I get out of a battery?A: E-kick electric scooter uses LG lithium-ion battery technology. Each battery will provide approximately 1000 “full” charges. The battery has no memory effect, so if you recharge the battery when it is around 50% charge, that counts as only half a charge. The amount of charges will also be impacted by factors such as temperature, etc.Q: Is the battery replaceable?A: Yes, The battery is very easy to replace it for a new one.The battery is designed in such a way that you can change it or replace easy  Simply disassemble the direction tube, pull out the battery and replace for the new one.Q: How long does it take to charge the battery?A fully discharged lithium ion battery will take 3-4 hours to recharge. It will take less time if the battery has a partial charge.Q: Can I still ride on scooter if the battery runs out of power?A: Of course! If you run out of power, you can ride as you would do with a regular scooter.Q: What’s the top speed of the electric scooter?A: The electric scooter can easily achieve 30Km/h with the advanced mode selected.Q: Do I need to wear a helmet?A: They are required by law in some places and optional in other places but we recommend it.Q: Can I order multiples e-kick electric scooters?Yes, to request multiple perks, please make a separate transaction for each perk.Q: Who can ride the e-kick electric scooter?A: E-kick electric scooter is designed for people over 10 years old and 120 cm height.Q: Will I be able to buy replacement parts?A: Yes, via the official e-totem.es websiteQ: How dust and waterproof is e-kick electric scooter?A: IP65 this means that is protected against contact (dust tight), no ingress of dust and water jets projected by a nozzle (6.3 mm) from any direction.

story:
Please read the latest update!

 

Designed to keep you safe

If you’ve ever ridden a bicycle at night, you’ve worried about being seen by motorists. Bikes can be hard to spot, especially for a distracted driver.

Typical bike lights are small and do little to identify the bicycle in the roadway. They also need to be charged between rides, or have a generator system that adds drag and weight to the bike’s wheel that makes it a bit harder for you to pedal.

But we’ve solved the problem. It’s called Arara, and it’s the first wheel-mounted, battery-free bicycling lighting system. Because it’s wheel-mounted, the entire wheel appears to be lighted, and it makes a bike easily recognizable from every angle at night.

 

Features

Gallery

 

How it works

Arara lights are powered by magnetic induction – no batteries or wires needed.

 

They charge continuously while your bike moves and gradually fade to black when it stops. There are two models available: the A5 and the A200. The A5 lights up in seconds, and turns off just as quickly when your bike rolls to a halt. The A200 takes a bit of time to charge, but when you stop it takes a few minutes to fade to black.

 

Perks

Please note that you will be able to choose any of the 6 colors after the campaign ends.

4 × A5 Arara light kit

Get this perk for $85 $76 (10% off) + shipping

 

2 × A5 + 2 × A200 Arara light kit

Get this perk for $99 $89 (10% off) + shipping

 

4 × A5 + 4 × A200 Arara light kit

Get this perk for $190 $171 (10% off) + shipping

 

 

Other ways you can help

If you just can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help. Please help us get the word out by making some noise about our campaign! Tweet about Arara.

 

As seen on

Team

Arara lights were created by the Filippov brothers, who live in Kemerovo (Siberia, Russia).

 

Risks & challenges

  • We will finalize the design of the Arara lights just after the campaign ends. So the technical specifications are likely to change. But we definitely won’t make anything worse, just try to make Arara even more compact and efficient.
  • All of the Arara production locations will be within one region, so production-related delays will be minimal.
  • Arara lights might be illegal for use on roads in your country. Please check this before contributing and write us about any country-specific regulations and laws in the comments.
  • It’s impossible to make an absolutely universal mount that will fit any bicycle. While Arara lights are compatible with most bikes, there might be some models that are incompatible. In that case, we will do our best to solve the problem.

We have met and overcome a lot of challenges while fabricating our pre-production samples, so we’re sure we’ll be able to solve any problems we might encounter.

 

Timeline

FAQ

How bright are these lights?
Arara lights are made "to be seen" (not "to see"). Their luminous intensity is in the 50…700 mcd range and depends on the LED color, magnet clearance, rotational speed and wheel diameter.
 
Will it fit my bike?
Probably, yes. Arara will fit most bikes, except:
  • some BMX models (minimum spoke spacing of 33 mm is required, as measured along the rim)
  • some fatbikes (hub spacing larger than 150 mm may affect efficiency of the magnetic lights unless the spokes are fixed near the rim edge)
  • bikes with non-standard spokes (e.g., Aerospoke, some carbon spokes and alloy wheels)
 
Do you have it for motorcycles?
We didn't test it on motorcycles yet, so no guarantee that it would be safe to use on them.
 
Are these lights street legal?
Arara lights might be illegal for use on roads in your country. Please check this before contributing and write us about any country-specific regulations and laws in the comments.
 
Can I choose more than 2 colors?
Yes. We will send you a survey after the campaign ends, where you’ll be able to tell us what colors you want.
 
How many lights go on each wheel?
There are different sets available. Two lights per wheel are enough to keep the wheel balanced. Four are be brighter, but a bit heavier and more expensive.
 
Will you ship to my country?
Yes, we will ship worldwide. Please note that you will be responsible for any import fees and taxes.

Have a different question? Feel free to ask it in the comments or write to us at ask@arara.bike.

Project homepage: Arara: The Battery-Free Wheel-Mounted Bike Lights

story:
Blizwheel isn't the same tech repackaged into a new box. If we did that, we'd have no way to reach our lofty goals of reinventing transportation the way we did, and certainly not in such a minimal package. We're a group of skaters and engineers with a mission: to combine all the best parts of the different e-vehicles and revolutionize the industry with an intuitive, accessible and truly portable way to get around. And we're really proud to finally introduce Blizwheel.

 

 

As we ourselves are skaters, we appreciate how much fun it is to roll around on rollerblades. We take the ability to use advanced techniques very seriously, and developed with those capabilities in mind.

Wearing it, you can master the advanced techniques of one foot, scissors kick, S-lines, right angle turns and more.

 

Folds and unfolds intuitively and easily. Just turn the foot bar, unfold the heel bar, and put it on. To stow away, just do the opposite and put it in its thin case.

The folded  is only 3.1 inch thick, which is the same as the width of IPhone 8 Plus.

  

  

 

  

Setting up is simple. Just take it out of the bag, unfold it and put it on. Connect the buckles, adjust the binding straps and turn it on. That’s it, you’re ready to roll!

Blizwheel's premium kit comes with a finger controlled speed controller. We invented this smooth, intuitive method to control your acceleration and it's a whole lot of fun. The way it works is simple - just to bend your finger to accelerate and straighten your finger to slow down and stop.

 

The finger controls are available in the Pro kit. The other kits come with intuitive handheld controllers.

The Dashboard on the controller can show you the current speed, max speed, mileage and remaining battery life.

  

  

  

  

Built into this stunning casing is some of the most impressive transportation technology to date. Besides the powerful motor, there's the coil, battery pack, sensors, electric speed controller (ESC) and speed sensors. This type of innovation is never easy. In fact, our first seven prototypes failed to deliver the level of performance we wanted. And it took us more than a year to finalize all the relevant technologies and systems into our eighth prototype. Then industrial design elements were added to this finalized prototype V9.4. Now we are ready to deliver a product that works so well, it’s stable, and fun to ride.

Not a single inch wasted. All the components fit perfectly into each wheel.

  

Because of the two split wheels, blizwheel frees up your legs. While riding blizwheel, you can switch from skating to walking in no time. And you can enter the elevator hassle free.

  

The app takes all the data from your dashboard and displays them on your smartphone. Plus, you can see how you match up against other riders worldwide. 

  

On a basic level, the experience will remind you of rollerblades, and learning to ride it is just as easy. Anyone with experience riding rollerblades, skateboards, unicycles and anything of that nature should be able to have full control in about 20 minutes or practice. If you are totally new to skating, it might take about 2 hours to pick up the basics of how to balance and ride with skates.

  

  

    

 

The Blizwheel Team consists of members in both the United States and China. Most of us are skaters, and we happen to be engineers and designers, with years of working experiences in Manufacturing, Mechanics, Electronics, Industrial Design, Supply Chain, Software, Project Management and Marketing. We are enthusiasts of innovation as well as skates. 

We registered companies in both the United States and China. It means we can control our supply chain better and make sure the delivery. If you have any questions about blizwheel, please go to www.blizwheel.com or email us at info@blizwheel.com.

 

 

Developing Blizwheel was never an easy task, because it took so much creativity and passion. In order to invent a perfect product, our team had to “reinvent the wheel” many times. After more than a year of calculating, designing, testing, we finally got to this special and innovative design. Then we adjusted the design for mass production availability. In total, we’ve designed 9 big versions and 19 small versions. The whole procedure took more than 2 years, and it required dedication, passion, and perseverance to arrive at a final product that we feel great about.

Our China team is located very close to the suppliers. So anytime we need to make adjustments to our manufacturing, we already have partner manufacturers lined up down the street.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have team members in both the United States and China. And our China team has very strong backgrounds in manufacturing and supply chain. We've found all the suppliers for every single part. So the risk of manufacturing is somewhat very low. However, as it is a brand new product, there should be some problems during the molds making and mass production, which may lead to postpone of the delivery date. If such problems happen, our team will directly go to the factories on site to deal with them as soon as possible.

Another risk is the Legal issue. So please check your local law for whether it is legal to use in your city. As we mentioned in FAQs, generally if any one of Electric Skateboard, Segway, Self-balance hover-board or unicycle is legal in your city, blizwheel will be also legal.


FAQs  

1. What is the Max Weight?  

Up to 250 LBS.  

2. Water proof?  

It can be used in the rain. But please do not deep the wheel into the water deeper than 1 inch.

3. How long for charging?  

2 - 3 hours for a full charge.  

4. Max Incline?  

Roughly up to 5 - 15 degrees. It depends on the road condition and the weight of the rider.  

5. Shoe size?  

US 6 - 13.5, Euro 36 - 46.  

6. Will the Battery Explode?  

Our supporters did ask this question seriously, and the answer is NO. We use 18650 cells which are not the type of smart phone's, but the type of Telsa's. In addition, as our battery pack is inside the wheel, Blizwheel has an aluminum "shield" outside the battery, which would maintain the casing and battery safety even if it were shot with a shotgun. This technology is **completely** different than the battery packs used in hoverboards, and much safer.  

7. Is it legal in my country?  

It is so difficult questions to answer, because the regulation is different among the countries. However, generally, if any one of Electric Skateboard, Segway, Self-balance hover-board or unicycle is legal in your country, we are good.

story:
FUBi is a high-performance, customize-able, full-sized bicycle, and is foldable in 2 ways.

The FUBi patented collapsible frame is the most compact full-sized foldable bicycle in the world , that also has an other folding system and that is as fast as other full size fold-able bikes. It retains all the functionality of a normal bicycle and can be styled with our color customization. 

Bicycles have some pains and disadvantages related to it. Bicycle theft, storage, parking and transport. The quest was therefore to find new, not before explored, ways to address these pains. All this effort has finally resulted in something very unique namely:

Why FUBi?

  • FUBi is color customize-able.

  • FUBi is foldable in two ways. One fast way and one optimally compact way. 

  • FUBi  is being made of aluminium or titanium

  • FUBi is an easy “Do-It-Yourself” bicycle kit.

  • FUBi is is a bicycle where the ride is far better than most foldable bicycles. FUBi is a fast, safe and enjoyable-to-ride, full-sized bicycle.

The FUBi color customization

CHOOSE YOUR OWN COLORS AND DESIGN YOUR OWN BIKE!

With just 10 colors and 7 individual frame elements in the FUBi frame there are 10 million different combinations to choose from!  With 12 colors, there are over 35 million and with 14 colors, over 105 million combinations!

All this will make it possible for you to compose your very own, one of a kind FUBi, unlike any other FUBi or other bicycle in the whole world.

More colors to choose from and more color choose-able items, like tires, grips and handlebars, will be added in stretch goals in our campaign.  

You will be able to choose from at least 10 colors, like in this example picture, for the 7 different FUBi frame parts. After the funding is completed, you will be able to access our color configurator to complete your perk.




The FUBi® fast fold 


           FUBi stroll-able                                                   FUBi with the front wheel off

            2 FUBi folded in Volvo                                FUBi folded in a Ford Fiesta 


 The FUBi® compact fold



             FUBi compactly folded                                               FUBi in a locker

        FUBi in an office                                                   FUBi in a traveling bag    

How the compact folding works?





Our crowd funding project: To get FUBi into production

This FUBi project would include several steps.

-Start the production of FUBi. 
We have taken this vital step seriously and have therefore already established contact with a company that will handle this important part for us.

- The process of choosing and/or ordering to our specifications the most suitable parts for FUBi, the ones that will make FUBi perform well and to stand out.

FUBi single speed


Some people that use FUBi

FUBi specifications

The unique FUBi® frame

FUBi will be realized in aluminium  and titanium.  We would be able to achieve the low weight, while gaining some unique properties that make it an excellent material for bicycle frame construction.

Titanium and aluminium will not rust or corrode. And as an added advantage we can use the same methods and procedures we already have developed for steel FUBi.

The titanium FUBi will weigh about 9.5 kg!

The Aluminium FUBi will weigh about 11.5kg!

With the light materials of choice, all the unique features of FUBi will come to their full right, giving a bike that is strong, light and durable.


The FUBi fast-shift derailleur

 The patented frame of FUBi has its own new derailleur system


The narrow hubs and bearing system of FUBi

-50mm (2 inch) wide hubs and identical front and back wheels!
-Narrow frame where the wheel bearings are part of the frame (not the hubs) 
-Uses high quality deep-groove bearing with longer life-span and low rolling-resistance!


           FUBi bearing system                          FUBi wheels(left) and normal wheels(right)


FUBi Specs

FUBi will be available in two different sizes FUBi 25 and FUBi 27.

FUBi 25 geometry specs in mm:



FUBi 27 geometry specs in mm:

Frame: FUBi collapsible frame consisting of 7 different frame parts, loose free pivots to accommodate folding and an extra diagonal part for stability, quick release on chain-stay /saddle-stay connection and on diagonal stay connection.

Weight: Aluminium 11.5kg, Titanium 9.5kg

Fork: FUBi fork with integrated head-tube.

Head-tube: FUBi special and integrated with front fork by the bearing assembly.

Bottom bracket: No traditional bottom bracket cassette! The bottom bracket bearings are directly fitted in the frame, with a straight crank axis through.

Derailleur: FUBi Fast-Shift derailleur, 7 gears.

Saddle:Open

Post:Open

Handlebars: FUBi crossing and dividable handlebar.

Brakes: Rim brakes, FUBi H type brake calipers, movable on fork(s) to accommodate different sized rims.

Wheels FUBi 27: Rim 622, tire 23-622(700x23C), or rim 584, tire 35-584

Wheels FUBi 25: Rim 571, tire 23-571(so called Triathlon size), or rim 559, tire 35-559

Hubs: FUBi hubs and without moving parts, M12 R on the right side, M10L on the left side. 36 or 32 spokes.

Crank set: Open, 48t or 52t chain ring

Specifications are subject to change. Which isn't a bad thing, as we will be looking for the best workable solutions and parts in order to make FUBi into a really cool experience.

Risks and challenges 

Similar to many crowd funding projects, we face several risks and challenges in undertaking this next step in the evolution of FUBi . The primary risks for us include:

ENGINEERING
To achieve the level of functionality and simplicity in the user experience of FUBi that we have set as a goal, we have still some small engineering challenges we want to have solved in a more functional way. We have some ideas on how this can be done and we need to test them in order to find the right ones.

We have made very extensive research concerning all aspects of FUBi. Therefore we have a plan on how to go about production FUBi in both aluminum and titanium.

We have taken some key steps to ensure our engineering success:
1) We have started to form a team of engineers and designers to complement the existing ones.
2) We have set out a plan for testing the FUBi so that it will perform according to our intentions and specifications.

SUPPLY CHAIN
Many crowd-funding campaigns can encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. This includes issues like finding the right suppliers for the various parts and for the materials needed. Smooth execution is absolutely essential to overcoming such risks.
We have taken this vital step seriously and have therefore already established contact with a company that will handle this important part for us. They have through their network, contacts throughout the major regions of major suppliers of quality bicycle parts and related items.

story:
WHY WE DO THIS

Bicycle, as a health and convenient urban transportation tool, whose accidents are increasing more and more these days especially when cyclists is turning. However, the traditional taillights only have flash function and with many dead angles in visibility. That is why we want to fix this safety problem.

NOT ONLY YOU NEED IT

As you can see the chart below, the number of side impact is the most happened in bicycle accident. It's particularly when bike is taking turn. Family and Friends are the most precious people for us.

We think that this product can not only protect the biker himself, but also the one who driving behind you.

With Easy Turn, when you and your family at the intersection need to turn or change the driving way, can largely improved the safety of riding.

MORE THAN ELEGANT

Easy Turn is an eye catching device with 3D streamlined design solved the problem of having dead angles from behind. Besides technical functions, we keep improving its outward appearance, we make it more smooth and stylish. Easy Turn can become one of the most fashion accessory for your bike. The Images below present our original design drafts.

EVERYTHING CHANGES WITH EASY TURN

If you are a bike user, you must know there has many gestures to show your driving intent to others. However, most of these signals need you to lift up one hand. It’s such a dangerous move for elders and childs, even teenagers while riding in a high speed!

Furthermore, can you be positively sure those cars behind you understand what you are saying? That is the question. Now, you don’t have to worry about that anymore. Once you have Easy Turn, no longer need to make any bike signals by hand and the cars behind you can easily understand where you wanna go.



CHANGE YOUR RIDING STYLE

Here is Easy turn fabulous features


SPEC


TIMETABLE

REWARD


WHO ARE WE

We want to do something to help the world, even though most of us do not come from wealthy families, we raise money from little by little. With lots of friends’ contribution, we finally found a small basement as our company to start up our big dreams.

OUR VISION

This is the second time we launch this campaign. We confessed that our marketing and overall content organization problem. We just hoping when our family riding bike shall be secured. No more dangerous happen during bike hand signals. The first time we failed, but we are back again. We believe this revolutionary tool will present more peace and joy to our future generation.

OUR CALL FOR SUPPORT

For dream being big from small, we need your patience to accompany with us. Although Easy Turn is a well-developed product, after achieving our shipping goal this time, we have to take about 3 months to pass the formal product certification from each of your country. That shall be worthy for you to wait this marvellous equipment to be born.

We work with limited resources, it does make us slow on this project. Crowdfunding gives us opportunity to beat the curl reality, and that needs you and your friends' support indeed!!!

If you think your friends might like it, please do support us! we need your help to spread the word. Let your friends and family know about us by sharing this project through various SNS, including E-mail, Twitter, Blog, and Facebook posts.

story:
Summary

We are building an Electric Drive Indycar for Earth Day 2013. It will premier at the Long Beach Grand Prix running exhibition laps.  

Supporters of this project will either get great promo items or inexpensive adspace on the Indycar.  Based on non-podium Indycar we believe that we will generate approximately 10 million dollars worth of publicity in 2013 with the planned tour.

We are running a fixed funding campaign so we get no money unless the funding goal is met or exceded.

This is our fourteenth electric drive conversion, including three race cars and a land speed motorcycle, all of which set world records. 

The design for this car has evolved over four years of racing and includes: 
     Two-motor system that will produce over 800 hp and 200 mph 
     Megawatt battery system  
     Integrated 10,000 watt sound system for Doppler effects and concerts

 

What We Need

We will use the funds to purchase a retired Indy car chassis, two motors, batteries, custom electronics, custom fabrication and machining, and air tunnel testing.  Additional funds will go toward event expenses, repairs, and upgrades.

We can build a 200 mph Indy car and get it on the track for one event for $77,500.  We can build a 220mph+ Indy car and 5 minute charger for $162,000.

The Impact

This car represents disruptive technology and will receive disproportionate national attention. The car should set multiple electric vehicle records throughout the year. With your help, it could set a few overall records as well.  

Discovery's show "Daily Planet" has expressed interest in covering this project.

KUSI has expressed interest in doing multiple pieces on this project as it is built and on the track.

The journalist whose article on us appeared in the New York Times has expressed interest in doing a story on this project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Volunteer!  Social Media the Shaving Cream Out of this project, try the Indiegogo Share Tools.

We need a webmaster, a tweeter, a machinist, a good PR person, someone to follow up with contacts and sponsors, and many more.

story:
More range • Powerful battery • Future-proof design

  • Powerful motor and battery combined with quality suspension elevates exploration capabilities to a whole other level!
  • Z2 offers 300% more range and power than the market average! You will reach places that were off limits before!
  • Make it Safe and Long-lasting too.

 

   Our team pushed all limits of Z2 as far as we could,

just to bring you the best adventure bike.

   All the miles driven, lessons learned while developing project Z2 - everything gave foundation for quality and exciting, easy handling, that makes cruising around the city pure pleasure. But if you’re up for more fun, good news! The trails and off–roads are where Z2 really shines!

 

 

  We created ZBIKE Z2 with green sustainability in mind.

... and we definitely don‘t want you to overspend just because you want something better again. You can always upgrade your current ZBIKE and it will never get old! 

 

 

   Frame design enables endless modding of our bike so when you feel you need to keep up with ever changing technology, we will offer you a new generation tech battery pack to upgrade your bike.

 

 

 

  • We work with market leading delivery companies. We guarantee you'll get your bike to your doorstep. 
  • All shipments insured.

Arunas Gelazninkas one of the best Dakar Rally debutant, trusts our bike as his sidekick.

Year after year!

As we are trusted by Lithuania Special Operations Force (NATO) to create electrocycle prototype in cooperation with Ministry of National Defence Republic of Lithuania and 

Agency for Science, Innovation and Technology .

At the moment we can not make any further disclosures other than that this beast is in final prototype phase. 

We are happy to witness transportation market revolution from internal combustion engines to more sustainable electric vehicles. And with our vision for quality and opportunities, we wish to become a part of this snowball that is already evolving into an avalanche.

Autoevolution: www.autoevolution.com/news/zbike-z2

News Break: www.newsbreak.com/zbike

EvNerds: www.evnerds.com/zbike

ThePack: www.electricmotorcycles.news/zbike

LRT: www.lrt.lt/zbike

15min: https://www.15min.lt

Onplay: https://www.onplay.lt/zbike

And more...

Hi,

We are two family founded startup from Northern Europe, Lithuania. What started as a hobby received enormous curiosity and good reviews. So here we are - launching our first INDIEGOGO campaign!

We see INDIEGOGO as the best friend that helps to reach for electric bikes enthusiasts all over the World. Since back in our country we got such an immense interest in our bikes, our main goal became to show our ebike vision to as many people as we can. 

Launching INDIEGOGO is our  big start. We want to build a production line with funds we will gather and by doing so we will make our bikes more affordable and accessible to all of you.

  • CSO-Karolis Atkociunas
  • CEO-Rokas Zabulionis
  • PM-Romualdas Atkociunas
  • Chief Engineer-Sarunas Zabulionis

 

 

 

 

 

PRESS

All good stuff !

 

 

 

  • We will adapt our electric bikes to every region electricity system.

 

 

 

More options are always better.

Want something custom, contact us.
