story:
Français.  

 

Agile, fast, smooth and clean

The steel CroMoly Moov's frames are engineered for great ride quality and a finely tuned balance for handling. In addition to that, we choose the highest quality, low maintenance components possible:  The belt from Gates Carbon Drive is virtually maintenance free.  The Pinion gearbox is an fully sealed gear system that allows a wide range of gearing with minimal maintenance. Now you decide... (un) expected breakdowns or worry free rides!

 




 
 



 

The 161 and 213 offer the same wide array of Pinion gearbox gears, Gates Carbon belt Drive, Magura disc brakes, and a cargo-hauling rack. The main difference is that 213 runs on 20" front wheel and has a 80cm by 42cm cargo-hauling rack instead of the 50cm by 42cm cargo-hauling rack of the 161. 

Both bikes are coming muscle powered (but all Moov frames are prepared for the Neodrives Modular Drive System with internal cable routing) and are designed to be a platform for commuting, cargo-hauling, on-road (and a bit off-road urban jungle touring) and just riding to your favorite coffee bar. Our bikes features; 6 bottle cage/ or "whatever" mounts. (the mounts on the down tube (DT), seat tube (ST) and top tube (TT) allow your business logo/ name plate placement depending on your needs).

 

 

Attention cargo-hauling/ commuting nerds! Moov's + Gates + Pinion + Neodrives (pedelec) combine sensational acceleration full loaded or great lightweight advantage in a urban jungle, making the Moov's bikes agile, fast and smooth.

#FasterThanYou (FTY) Anyone who has ever ridden a Moov can tell you about the FTY moment. It’s a experience where you instantly fall in love with your Moov once you pedal your first stroke. The Pinion gearbox with Gates belt drive feels so good, it’s so powerful to ride,  it'll blow your mind.

 

 

Pinion Gearbox

Our Moov's 161 and 213 are build around the Pinion gearbox  C1.6 and C1.9xr with the new DS2 rotary shifter. That allows seamless shifting, up and down.

The Pinion C-line gearbox are a fully sealed gear system making them unaffected for any events. The only maintenance they need is a oil change every 10,000km or ones a year.  Visit FAQ or http://www.pinion.eu

  • Who? Christoph Lerman and Michael Schmitz, are the founders of Pinion.
  • Handmade? Each Pinion gearbox is designed, engineered and hand assembled in Germany. 
  • The look! There's no denying that bikes built around Pinion's gearbox are nice and clean.
  • Seamless? Shifting without pedaling, is so cool.
  • Handling​?  Mounted in the middle of our bikes frames, for a perfect balance.

 

 
 

Pinion C1.6 specs

The C1.6 is a great gearbox for urban and cargo bikes. But matched also perfect with the Pedelec Neodrives rear wheel motor that is speed limited to 25km/h. The reduced range will provide enough gearing for low speed riding.

 

6 gears - 295% range - 24.3 gear steps - 1800g

 

Pinion C1.9 specs

The C1.9xr is a wide range gearbox. Boasting a range till 568% for every urban jungle. The between steps are the same as her smaller sister here above. The larger steps are perfect for the Neodrives rear wheel motor and allowing you to accelerate faster through gears.

 

9 gears - 568% range - 24.3 gear steps - 2000g

 

 

 Gates Carbon Drive

Gates Carbon Drive Belts runs clean, quiet, smooth, light and is strong. Composed of a weather-resistant polyurethane exterior, the advanced high-performance belt features strong, stretch-free carbon fiber tensile cords. The drive system doesn’t require any grease, is lightweight and does not stretch. The belt gives you a long lasting, lower-maintenance drive, and most importantly, an unbelievably awesome ride. Visit FAQ or https://www.gatescarbondrive.com

  • Clean - Low Maintenance: No oil, no grease stains. It sheds dirt and grime and cleaning with water is easy. Just get on it and ride.
  • Quiet - Smooth: No chain is no noise. It's so quiet and smooth, that you enjoying every pedal stroke.
  • Light: Gates Carbon Drive weighs less than a chain drive. Lighter weight means higher performance.
  • Strong: The instant engagement and smooth feel is unlike anything you've experienced before. You've got to ride it to believe it.

 

 

Made in Germany

Engineering expertise, skill, ability, simplicity, durability, reliability and passion. Made in Germany is more than just an empty saying here. The majority of components and parts that we use for all our bikes are produced in Germany. Our bike parts specs is durable and sensible.....just the sort of value you expect from Urban Moov

 

  • Pinion gearbox
  • Neodrives rear motor (modular system)
  • Magura brakes

 

​

Pinion hubs / quiet and precise

The Pinion H2F and H2R hubs are the ideal combination with the Pinion gearbox. 120 engagement points make for a direct drive in every situation. The freehub body made from steel is very durable and impresses with precise, quiet running properties!

  • Quiet and precise, the rear hub H2R harmonizes perfect with Pinion gearboxes
  • New freewheeling technology 
  • 120 snap-in points provide undelayed propulsion in every situation
  • Steel body, provides long lasting durability

 

Magura  MT sport / e-ready

The Magura MT-sport with a Storm 180mm front disk and the 160mm Storm rear disk make sure the Moov stops as fast as it goes fast in any urban jungle conditions. 

  • Brakes - magura mt sport/ e-ready
  • Front disk - magura storm 180mm
  • Rear disk - magura storm 160mm
  • Lever - ergonomic 2-finger
  • Weight - Carbotecture® 245gr

 

 

Steel is real 

4130 cromoly is just one variety of steel. The number is a designation of the Society of Automotive Engineers (SAE) that indicates the metal’s components. Basic high-tensile steel is made of iron and a little carbon. By adjusting the amount of carbon and adding small but precise amounts of other metals different properties can be achieved. Adding chromium and molybdenum (cromo, get it?) yields a high strength-to-weight ratio. 

 

 

​the Moov 161

Built of 4130 CroMoly steel, heat treated (process in which the metal is brought to a specific temperature and cooled at a controlled rate to realign its atomic structure) and based on the old bakery bikes, The frame is spaced for 135mm hubs, 24" wheels and compact. The 161 is designed to be a platform for the urban jungle, commuting, and wherever you run into. It’s adept at handling rough, pot-holed streets, grass shortcuts, urban trails or back alleys.

the Moov213

The CroMoly steel 213 being able to carry about 200 pounds (90kg) of cargo. The load weight, and how it’s loaded, will affect the handling somewhat. So, plan on using all the Pinion Gearbox gears, especially as cargo weight increases. This may seem obvious, but as you get comfy with it you’ll use your full range of gears as never before.

 

 

Frame specs / bike components

 

 

 

Moov colors 

Our Moov's and Colors are closely associated with comfort and positive emotions, such as boosting mood, creating a sense of aliveness and expressiveness. To find the balance, we came up with 3 colors for 2020. 

  • Black mate  
  • Watermelon Red  
  • Urban Grey 

 

 

AND THERE IS MORE.....

 


​

Risk Management

We understand that you may be concerned with potential risks of our supply chain due to the Corona virus in the world. Please note: that URBAN MOOV operates globally, with productions partners in Europe, South America and Asia. All partners, did manufactured perfect and running prototypes. So, we think we have you covered. 

  • We are anyway analyzing continuously any possible risk which could impact our supply chain and the shipments to you, our backers. 
  • We review continuously all these risks, and define mitigation plans when needed.

​

Shipment, taxes and duties

  • Pick Up: You are always allowed to pick up your Moov bike at ZERO COST at our office in The Netherlands. The coffee is ready!!
  • The rest of the perks, we will send your Moov bike delivered to your doorstep. But that will have a cost starting at 100€ euro depending your location.
  • Prices of perks are reflecting the cost for the perk before taxes, duties and shipment, as these will need to be calculated based on your location prior to delivery. By dealing with this prior to shipping Urban Moov can be ‘delivered duty paid’ (DDP) to most countries. This allows it to clear customs smoothly on arrival which prevents hold-ups and admin charges at the border. You will be contacted prior to shipment to arrange the final balance to ensure your delivery goes as smoothly as possible.

 

What's in the box

Due to the nature of shipping bikes internationally some assembly will be required. The MOOV's arrives partly-assembled. This is one of the ways we kept the cost low.

  • We offer video instructions to make sure assembly is super easy and takes less than an hour for a first timer, or even in as little as 30 mins you are on your way. 
  • We also supply tools you need to put your Moov together - (Hex/Allen keys)   
  • If you don't feel confident with basic assembly, please go to your local bike store. It will take him about 20 min. ( Note: assembly at an additional fee for you)

 

​

 

EUH..... AND STILL NOT DONE

 

Why and who crowd-funding? 

Why: We think we got the best geared, belt driven urban/ cargo bike possible to compete with the big players in the world. With this campaign we want to put our brand name Urban Moov in the market. And see,  if there is a demand for our bikes in the rest of the world.

Besides of that, now it's the time to SUPPORT a small business like us, getting a incredible bike and ride.... when the world is a safer place.

Who: Hi there, we're Tom and Hendrik. Both born in The Netherlands. But back in 2017,  12000 km further, we started Urban Moov from a garage box located in Caballito, Argentina. It wasn't the easiest thing to do, we were faced with challenges and culture differences. But nothing could stop us. We wanted to create the best, low maintenance, belt drive cargo bike possible.  And we did!! Tom, moved back to his playgrounds in the Netherlands. But we both continued to "moov" forward and started Urban Moov Europe. Now we are here, with our first campaign and we know we going to have some challenges again. But we're ready to bring you the best geared, belt driven bikes ever.

By: Those are our collaborators and we couldn't do this without them. Amy is a very talented dancer, photographer and student of the Fontys Communication School. She loves health and not healthy food, city traveling and sniffing new cultures. Storm is doing International Business School, likes riding (and falling off) bikes, traveling and drinking beer. Bob collects vintage bikes, Vespa's, wines and is an old school bike courier. His biggest passion is; riding in the alps on his vintage bikes and drinking his own collection. 

For: Moov owners are passionate about working, riding or commuting with an Urban Moov bike. Those Moov Ambassadors post and tell stories of their life with a Moov and know the truth about our bikes more than anyone else.  Alban (France) bikepolo player, bike courier and vegan. Manu (Argentina) owner of bmba, bike courier and bike traveler. Santi (Uruguay) social builder, bike and beer lover. We look forward to welcome you, so our Moov community grows!

 

Timeline

Say hello, we're here!

 

You are important!! By sharing our story on your social media, you can give the boost we need to tell about the best geared urban/ cargo bikes ever. Don't keep it a secret, thanks thanks thanks!!

 

​

story:
Clickdrive tracks your car's performance, helps reduce your fuel bills and records a video of your drive to share with your friends.

With your support we can build the revolutionary hardware that can run all these apps and more at the same time

As seen in:

Clickdrive is a new kind of device for Connected Cars that allows you to download and run multiple driving Apps at the same time - with upgradeable hardware and Open API the possibilities are endless.

We're excited to launch Clickdrive with our Performance Bundle for car enthusiasts:
  • Custom dashboards with charting and programable safety alerts
  • Record your track day with our racing overlays
  • Measure your car's performance, track it over time
  • Reduce your car's gas bills, know your car's unique fuel consumption profile
  • Blackbox data recorder, evidence if you get into an accident
  • Your own personal cloud to store your performance data
Contribute now and share with your friends! With your help we can build the dedicated hardware we need to run these apps.

Clickdrive Referral Bonus

To thank you for spreading the word we would like to offer you a free Clickdrive. When your friends order 4 units we will give you yours free!

Just share your personal campaign link with your friends so we can track who referred whom.

What's different about Clickdrive?

Clickdrive doesn't work the same way as regular adapters. Rather than limiting you to running a single App on your mobile device, Clickdrive allows you to run many apps simultaneously - on the device, on your mobile, on aftermarket displays and on the cloud. This is the future of connected cars:

A quick comparison with other adapters on the market:

What's in The Box?

Clickdrive does not make calls, play tunes or check your mail. It is designed with one purpose - to connect your car. There is no other device on the market with the same combination of performance, reliability and security. In particular what makes Clickdrive unique:
  • Run multiple Driving Apps at the same time
  • Connect with Android/iOS/Windows mobile devices
  • Upgradable module - increase storage or add GSM connectivity
With the Clickdrive Open API, we've streamlined and simplified the process of connecting to your car so that anyone with basic skills can write a car-connected App using our technology that can outperform virtually anything on the market today.

How you can help

Today we've built the prototype, core code, demo apps but we need your support (and $$$s) to bring it onto the production line. By pre-ordering Clickdrive or selecting one of the perks you help us take the final step.


We're working on the first bundle of driving apps for enthusiasts - here are the top ones.

  • Customisable Dashboards

    • Unlock the hidden data in your car. Display it on your smartphone or tablet or stream it to our cloud servers and access it anywhere.

    Analyse the channels you want, Clickdrive is constantly monitoring your car so you can set safety limits and get alerts if anything starts to go wrong.

    Because Clickdrive supports multiple devices simultaneously you can replace your mechanical gauges with reconfigurable electronic ones.

    We're working on skinnable retro/futuristic dashboards. Watch this space...

  • Driving Recorder

    • Want to record your daily drive or your heroic lap times? How about showing your mates your awesome line?

    Use your phone camera and customisable overlays to create epic recordings of your drive, then upload and share
    By avoiding 'hard-burning' your driving data into the video you can reconfigure your overlay even after the day!

  • Fuel Saver

    • As Clickdrive monitors your car it builds a unique fuel consumption profile. The result: we can tell you exactly how you should drive in order to reduce your fuel bills.

    Too heavy with the right foot, going to fast or too slow? With a customised fuel-consumption profile and live feedback you can take your hyper-miling to the next level.

  • Performance Monitoring

    • Maybe you're only worried about fuel bills because you just spent all your cash on upgrades. We can measure your car's performance stats without an expensive trip to the Dyno. You can upload your curves to the cloud and compare the history of all the mods you've made, or just show off to your friends.
     

  • Blackbox data recorder

    • Unfortunate enough to get into an accident or get pulled over by the police? Back up your claim with your own Blackbox data recorder

    You know your position, speed, acceleration, throttle and can prove it was the other guy's fault!

And here's a look at some other Apps that are going to keep us busy in 2014...

  • Make sure your family are driving safely, receive alerts when they're home
  • Breakdown assistance with precise location and diagnostic information
  • Car locator - don't lose your car. Simple
More apps? How about car sharing, carpark space finder, driver safety analysis, navigation maps with live traffic speeds. Got a better idea of your own? Fantastic - you can bring your idea to life with the Open API.

Clickdrive really started back in 2004 with a sick Fiat Coupe. I'd blown up the engine and wanted to avoid that happening again, thought I'd connect into the engine so I could monitor it properly. Ended up building and publishing the first kit to hack into these cars.

After a few too many years working in banking I wanted to do something I could be passionate about. The great idea was to build great cloud-connected apps for car enthusiasts. But I failed.

The problem was the adapters, the physical component that connects with the car. Most existing adapters were slow, leading to unresponsive, laggy apps. Almost none had any real security built in. But the dealbreaker was they all had the same flaw, they only let a single App connect at a time. This was crazy - when is the last time you used a computer that could only run one application at at time?

The design was fundamentally broken.

I teamed up with Rishi and went back to the drawing board, taking the same engineering principles you use in high performance trading systems and to build a new platform for connected cars. We designed the hardware and the core software services to make the best design we could, called it Clickdrive.

Once we fixed the adapter it was time for the Apps. We made building connected Apps simpler - anyone with basic skills could do it. The problem was that there were too many Apps to build, so we created the Clickdrive Open Platform to allow others to build on this technology.

The problem we're having is that there are too many good ideas; Too many apps for us to possibly create! So we realised we needed to make Clickdrive an Open Platform. This means developers can use our free SDK to create and share their own apps.
  • For developers
    • We make connecting your apps to cars simple - no need to deal with the complexities of the car protocols and data formats; so you can focus on doing something cool.
    Create free or paid apps - we'll support you. This project is too big for one startup - it can only reach it's potential with you guys on board!

Yes you can buy cheap OBDII adapters - here's why you shouldn't.

The era of Connected Cars is coming. Within a few years you will be able to choose from thousands of car-connected Apps. You can't do this today because the adapters can only run one app at a time. Sometimes you even need to physically swap out the adapter to change Apps.

Most of these adapters have poor performance and generally no effective security, none that we know of can protect you from malicious Apps hacking your car. If you don't think that will be a problem, check out the vid below:

At the other end of the spectrum you have locked-down adapters which are usually very expensive and almost impossible to upgrade.

We've redesiged car connectivity from the ground up to fix these problems:

  • Multiple Apps
    • Run multiple Apps at the same time not just on Clickdrive but simultaneously on multiple connected devices.

  • Multiple Platforms
    • Because Clickdrive has the brains on the device it will be compatible with all major mobile platforms - iPhone, Android, Windows and all major web browsers.

  • Multiple Devices
    • Clickdrive is designed with an integral WiFi AP so you're not limited to one connection. This allows dedicated gauges, HUDs, external sensors and wearable technology.

  • Futureproof
    • We're packing the best hardware we can into Clickdrive so it can handle whatever we can throw at it. The external module will be upgradeable to add more memory or add new connectivity options - 4G, Zigbee.

  • Always Connected
    • We're designing Clickdrive to have server class reliability. Unlike a smartphone the device is always connected to your car and never runs out of batteries. This enables professional quality apps.

  • Secure
    • We take security very seriously indeed. Your private data will be encrypted from source to server - only you and those you choose will have any access to it. Equally important; unlike standard adapters Clickdrive's security will protect your car from hackers and malicious apps

  • Safety
    • Clickdrive is one of the very few devices that runs on a secure network - isolating your car from remote hackers. As a second level of security Clickdrive is the ONLY device with a firewall to protect your car from both hackers and malicious apps

  • Integrated
    • We design the hardware, the software and the cloud services to work together so we can offer the best performance and the smoothest plug-and-play experience.

Clickdrive plugs into your car - within the driver's compartment, usually under the steering wheel.

You access Clickdrive over WiFi with your smartphone, tablet or even laptop. We've designed it to work with pretty much any device and multiple devices simultaneously. Download the apps you want and access them from within your car or anywhere via our cloud servers.

It doesn't stop there. We plan for Clickdrive to integrate with dedicated displays, heads-up displays, smart glasses and other wearable technology. We have other cool ideas that our lawyers won't even let us publish!

We want to disrupt driving and we want all drivers to have access to this technology - not just those fortunate enough to afford high-end marques.

But that's the future, let's summarise what we can do now.
  • Works with 95% of cars on the road
  • Compatible with all major brands of phones, tablets, laptops.
  • Simple to install. Secure, Fast, Reliable
  • Open Platform allows developers to create new apps
  • Core apps to be shipped with the device

This is the Early Access Program - your chance to get in from the very beginning

It's going to take time to complete the final hardware. Waiting is dull. So we want to give supporters with Android devices something from day one. Equally important - we want supporters to drive the development of the project.

No the lite version will not have the full benefits of the full Clickdrive, and yes it will have some rough edges in the beginning. However, this is your chance in from the start - you guys will be key to driving the evolution of the platform.

From a purely pragmatic perspective this work is vital to ensure we have ironed out all the issues with the core software before we ship the final hardware. This process will ensure that the SDK is field tested and vehicle specific issues are addressed earlier rather than later.

n.b. Early access is released in phases and we will limit each release in order to make sure that we can deliver what we promise. Earlier birds get the earlier worm.

Clickdrive is not another OBDII adapter, it's what OBDII adapters want to become when they grow up.

We will finalise the specs as late as possible in order to get the latest hardware however, the current minimum specs are as follows:

  • 1Ghz CPU, 512M RAM, 2G Drive
  • Acelerometer, Compass 
  • High performance GPS 
  • WiFi - secure Access Point for your car
  • Rotating hinge: Fold Clickdrive away from legs when driving. You're welcome.

If the campaign hits it's stretch goals we'll upgrade the hardware too! More details to follow...

Clickdrive relies on the OBDII protocol to connect to your car. There's a lot of information about this on the interweb however, as a guide all cars produced in the following countries from the following dates will be compatible:

Region Engine Year of Production
United States Petrol 1996 Onwards
United States Diesel 2004 Onwards
Asia (export*) Petrol 2001 Onwards
Europe Petrol 2001 Onwards
Europe Diesel 2004 Onwards
Australia, New Zealand Petrol/Diesel 2006 Onwards
Work to support more vehicles will be an ongoing project however, we want to ensure that the standard apps will work with all the cars above.

Please bear in mind, some cars will work better than others. Older vehicles with slower protocols will not be as responsive as more modern cars. Whatever the car Clickdrive will automatically optimise the connection in order to provide the best performance for each vehicle.

* n.b. JDM (Japanese Domestic Market) cars often have limited compatability with OBDII standards - unfortunately support for these models can't be guaranteed. Please contact us for more details.

Coming up to 2 years work on this project here's where we are so far.
  • Working Clickdrive Prototype
  • Beta SDK for Web and Android
  • Demo Web, Android and Desktop Apps
  • Backed by our secure Cloud servers
Our prototype already supports up to 4 devices on different platforms simultaneously with performance gain of 500% over some commercial adapters. We have good reason to believe the final version will have even more impressive stats.

To test out our SDK front to back we have implemented Clicktrack - a secure, real-time GPS tracking app streaming data through our cloud servers.

And finally we have completed the Industrial design, initial Mechanical Engineering and Electical Engineering for the Clickdrive adapter. And this is as far as we can go without your help!

The campaign is raising cash to build the hardware. Specifically to cover the non-recurring expenses around commercialising the adapter.

We have self-funded so far but we need the cash for the next step - to get the Clickdrive adapter onto the production line. Designing and producing new hardware requires a lot of capital.

The details can be broken down to three main groups:
  • Final engineering to commercialise the adapter
  • Production tooling costs
    • (making the moulds for the casing, 'debugging' the production line)
  • Material costs for the first production run
This is why we are running an all or nothing campaign! The campaign goal is the minimum amount we need to bring Clickdrive to the market - if we don't raise the target amount we cannot launch.

We know that execution is critical. We know that anyone who pre-orders a product from Indiegogo expects to receive a quality product on the scheduled delivery date.

We also know that bringing new hardware to market is difficult and we will face challenges. We would like to reassure you that we have considered the risks and how to mitigate them
  • Firstly we have demonstrated that the technology works with a functional prototype. Even at this stage clickdrive can still outperform commercially available hardware!

  • Secondly we have partnered with award-winning design house We Are Perspective who bring their expertise in design and manufacture of hi-tech consumer electronics to the project.

  • Also... we're not exactly fresh out of college and have many years of experience in delivering global, multi-million dollar technology projects. Not to be complacent - each project has it's own challenges which should never be underestimated - but it helps.

Of course our supporters can pre-order an awesome Clickdrive and secure one of the very first units at an amazing discount to the retail price!

And for those that don't drive we have other perks.
  • Get your hands on one our exclusive stickers to shamelessly brand your favourite possessions or slow-moving pets.

  • And don't forget our classy t-shirts designed in a fetching black which is not only slimming but also effectively hides oil and grease stains.
All our supporters will get a place on our founders page and access to all discussions and project updates!

And please, please help us by spreading the word! Share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or your favoure forums. This is really, really important.
Tip: Use the share tools below!

App Developers: If you want to build car-connected Apps we would love to hear from you! Please get in touch and we'll keep you up to date with release dates for the SDK.

And of course we would love to hear your feedback! Send us messages of support, comments or ideas for Apps.

With a successful campaign ending in March we have the following milestones
Milestone Date Description
Campaign End Mar 2014 Campaign ends. Goodies ship
Clickdrive lite Apr 2014 Shipping date for Clickdrive lite to supporters
Clickdrive P1 May 2014 Prototype #1 of Clickdrive adapter produced and ready for testing
Clickdrive P2 August 2014 Prototype #2 of Clickdrive adapter produced and ready to be sent to beta testers
Clickdrive: Phase One Nov 2014 Clickdrive Phase One ready for shipping to supporters.
We know there will be a lot of challenges in bringing this product to market and we don't want to disappoint supporters by promising and not delivering. So we have been working closely with our design and engineering partners to create a conservative development timeline.

Cars are expensive toys and Clickdrive can help reduce these costs. If you can avoid a single trip to the garage whether it's for a dyno run to check your performance, turning off a check-engine-light or even avoiding a full engine rebuild it's basically paid for itself. If it helps you with your insurance claim it's paid for itself. If it cuts 10% off your fuel bill it will pay for itself in a year. Clickdrive is the only product that can allow you to monitor your engine, reduce your fuel bill and automatically record your trip all at the same time.

Clickdrive is not another OBDII adapter - it's a revolutionary product. We're taking a risk to build what we believe is the best product, rather than compromising and launching with a copycat adapter. Of course we're packing a lot of quality technology into the box. But equally important, it's a connected product, backed by our cloud servers, that will evolve and grow over time as new Apps are created and available for download.

The team have many years of experience in investment banking (no, really) - building award winning, high performance, global trading systems. They wanted to take their skills and experience and do something useful instead.

Mark produced the first kit to hack into Motronic 2.4.10 engine Electronic Control Units back in 2004 after recklessly blowing up his engine. Since then he's been annoying colleagues by delivering bulky car parts to the office, in between designing multi-million dollar, cutting-edge trading systems and perfecting his secret pizza recipe.

Rishi leads a double life; by day mild-mannered consultant optimising low-latency trading systems, by night he is the hero Clickdrive deserves, and professional King Leonidas impersonator (available for birthdays, weddings and bar mitzvahs).

  • How do I install Clickdrive?
    • Clickdrive plugs into the On-Board Diagnostics (OBDII) port. This is located within arms-reach of the driver, usually under the steering column.

  • Does Clickdrive need batteries?
    • Clickdrive is powered from the car battery. It draws a small current when the engine is on and drops into low-power mode when the engine is off to avoid battery drain

  • Doesn't Clickdrive lite work with my iPhone?
    • Sadly not the lite version at this time. The lite version of Clickdrive is based off an Android app (minimum version Honeycomb). The full version of Clickdrive will of course support Apple devices

  • Why choose Android for Clickdrive lite?
    • We're small so we had to choose a single platform for native apps. The brute fact is that there are a lot more 'Droid devices around than Apple devices

  • How do I know if my Clickdrive works with my car?
    • Easiest ways is to Google your car make + model + "OBD"! Please drop us a line and we'll help out.

  • Do you support Manufacturer's PIDs?
    • A core part of the Clickdrive Open API is the ability to support non-standard PIDs on a per-vehicle basis. However, cataloging this information is a big project which will almost certainly need help from the community; so we can't promise that there will be much support out of the box from day one.

  • How well will my car work with Clickdrive?
    • Much more difficult to find that information. For example, modern cars can provide 200 data updates a second (and much more) while older protocols may produce less than 10 data updates a second. This will affect the responsiveness (latency) of any app and potentially the number of diffferent apps that can operate simultaneously. We are working on compiling a definitive list.

  • Can I use Clickdrive to tune my car by reflashing my ECU?
    • We're not planning to support that ability with this version - in particular we don't support the SAE J2534 protocol. However we are looking at the possibility of designing a tuner version of Clickdrive.
story_txt:
Clickdrive tracks your car's performance, helps reduce your fuel bills and records a video of your drive to share with your friends.



With your support we can build the revolutionary hardware that can run all these apps and more at the same time



As seen in:




Clickdrive is a new kind of device for Connected Cars that allows you to download and run multiple driving Apps at the same time - with upgradeable hardware and Open API the possibilities are endless. 


We're excited to launch Clickdrive with our Performance Bundle for car enthusiasts:


Custom dashboards with charting and programable safety alerts
Record your track day with our racing overlays
Measure your car's performance, track it over time
Reduce your car's gas bills, know your car's unique fuel consumption profile
Blackbox data recorder, evidence if you get into an accident
Your own personal cloud to store your performance data




Contribute now and share with your friends! 
With your help we can build the dedicated hardware we need to run these apps.


Clickdrive Referral Bonus

To thank you for spreading the word we would like to offer you a free Clickdrive. When your friends order 4 units we will give you yours free!




Just share your personal campaign link with your friends so we can track who referred whom.


What's different about Clickdrive?

Clickdrive doesn't work the same way as regular adapters. Rather than limiting you to running a single App on your mobile device, Clickdrive allows you to run many apps simultaneously - on the device, on your mobile, on aftermarket displays and on the cloud. This is the future of connected cars:



A quick comparison with other adapters on the market:



What's in The Box?


Clickdrive does not make calls, play tunes or check your mail. It is designed with one purpose - to connect your car. There is no other device on the market with the same combination of performance, reliability and security. In particular what makes Clickdrive unique:

Run multiple Driving Apps at the same time
Connect with Android/iOS/Windows mobile devices
Upgradable module - increase storage or add GSM connectivity



With the Clickdrive Open API, we've streamlined and simplified the process of connecting to your car so that anyone with basic skills can write a car-connected App using our technology that can outperform virtually anything on the market today.

How you can help
Today we've built the prototype, core code, demo apps but we need your support (and $$$s) to bring it onto the production line. By pre-ordering Clickdrive or selecting one of the perks you help us take the final step.





We're working on the first bundle of driving apps for enthusiasts - here are the top ones.


Customisable Dashboards

Unlock the hidden data in your car. Display it on your smartphone or tablet or stream it to our cloud servers and access it anywhere. 

Analyse the channels you want, Clickdrive is constantly monitoring your car so you can set safety limits and get alerts if anything starts to go wrong.



Because Clickdrive supports multiple devices simultaneously you can replace your mechanical gauges with reconfigurable electronic ones.



We're working on skinnable retro/futuristic dashboards. Watch this space...


Driving Recorder
Want to record your daily drive or your heroic lap times? How about showing your mates your awesome line?

Use your phone camera and customisable overlays to create epic recordings of your drive, then upload and share




By avoiding 'hard-burning' your driving data into the video you can reconfigure your overlay even after the day!



Fuel Saver

As Clickdrive monitors your car it builds a unique fuel consumption profile. The result: we can tell you exactly how you should drive in order to reduce your fuel bills.





Too heavy with the right foot, going to fast or too slow? With a customised fuel-consumption profile and live feedback you can take your hyper-miling to the next level.

Performance Monitoring

Maybe you're only worried about fuel bills because you just spent all your cash on upgrades. We can measure your car's performance stats without an expensive trip to the Dyno. You can upload your curves to the cloud and compare the history of all the mods you've made, or just show off to your friends.
 



Blackbox data recorder
Unfortunate enough to get into an accident or get pulled over by the police? Back up your claim with your own Blackbox data recorder



You know your position, speed, acceleration, throttle and can prove it was the other guy's fault!



And here's a look at some other Apps that are going to keep us busy in 2014...


Make sure your family are driving safely, receive alerts when they're home
Breakdown assistance with precise location and diagnostic information
Car locator - don't lose your car. Simple


More apps? How about car sharing, carpark space finder, driver safety analysis, navigation maps with live traffic speeds. Got a better idea of your own? Fantastic - you can bring your idea to life with the Open API.




Clickdrive really started back in 2004 with a sick Fiat Coupe. I'd blown up the engine and wanted to avoid that happening again, thought I'd connect into the engine so I could monitor it properly. Ended up building and publishing the first kit to hack into these cars. 



After a few too many years working in banking I wanted to do something I could be passionate about. The great idea was to build great cloud-connected apps for car enthusiasts. But I failed.



The problem was the adapters, the physical component that connects with the car. Most existing adapters were slow, leading to unresponsive, laggy apps. Almost none had any real security built in. But the dealbreaker was they all had the same flaw, they only let a single App connect at a time. This was crazy - when is the last time you used a computer that could only run one application at at time?



The design was fundamentally broken.



I teamed up with Rishi and went back to the drawing board, taking the same engineering principles you use in high performance trading systems and to build a new platform for connected cars. We designed the hardware and the core software services to make the best design we could, called it Clickdrive.



Once we fixed the adapter it was time for the Apps. We made building connected Apps simpler - anyone with basic skills could do it. The problem was that there were too many Apps to build, so we created the Clickdrive Open Platform to allow others to build on this technology. 




The problem we're having is that there are too many good ideas; Too many apps for us to possibly create! So we realised we needed to make Clickdrive an Open Platform. This means developers can use our free SDK to create and share their own apps. 





For developers

We make connecting your apps to cars simple - no need to deal with the complexities of the car protocols and data formats; so you can focus on doing something cool.


Create free or paid apps - we'll support you. This project is too big for one startup - it can only reach it's potential with you guys on board! 





Yes you can buy cheap OBDII adapters - here's why you shouldn't. 




The era of Connected Cars is coming. Within a few years you will be able to choose from thousands of car-connected Apps. You can't do this today because the adapters can only run one app at a time. Sometimes you even need to physically swap out the adapter to change Apps. 



Most of these adapters have poor performance and generally no effective security, none that we know of can protect you from malicious Apps hacking your car. If you don't think that will be a problem, check out the vid below:





At the other end of the spectrum you have locked-down adapters which are usually very expensive and almost impossible to upgrade.



We've redesiged car connectivity from the ground up to fix these problems: 




Multiple Apps
Run multiple Apps at the same time not just on Clickdrive but simultaneously on multiple connected devices.




Multiple Platforms

Because Clickdrive has the brains on the device it will be compatible with all major mobile platforms - iPhone, Android, Windows and all major web browsers.




Multiple Devices

Clickdrive is designed with an integral WiFi AP so you're not limited to one connection. This allows dedicated gauges, HUDs, external sensors and wearable technology.



Futureproof

We're packing the best hardware we can into Clickdrive so it can handle whatever we can throw at it. The external module will be upgradeable to add more memory or add new connectivity options - 4G, Zigbee.



Always Connected

We're designing Clickdrive to have server class reliability. Unlike a smartphone the device is always connected to your car and never runs out of batteries. This enables professional quality apps.



Secure

We take security very seriously indeed. Your private data will be encrypted from source to server - only you and those you choose will have any access to it. Equally important; unlike standard adapters Clickdrive's security will protect your car from hackers and malicious apps



Safety

Clickdrive is one of the very few devices that runs on a secure network - isolating your car from remote hackers. As a second level of security Clickdrive is the ONLY device with a firewall to protect your car from both hackers and malicious apps



Integrated

We design the hardware, the software and the cloud services to work together so we can offer the best performance and the smoothest plug-and-play experience.

You access Clickdrive over WiFi with your smartphone, tablet or even laptop. We've designed it to work with pretty much any device and multiple devices simultaneously. Download the apps you want and access them from within your car or anywhere via our cloud servers.

We have other cool ideas that our lawyers won't even let us publish!

Compatible with all major brands of phones, tablets, laptops.

story:
The McFlys' been built to be the fastest most versatile electric bike ever produced.


 Designed for looks. Designed for performance.


We didn't like any electric bike designs offered in the market. So instead of settling we put our manufacturing backgrounds to work and set out to design the best looking, most versatile electric bike ever created. 

We wanted an electric bike that was designed with a ground up approach that would focus on synergistically combining the best of performance, versatility and handling while remaining affordable.

Introducing the McFly. 

         

An eBike Built With Components That Deliver On Power, Durability And Versatility. 

Durability and power were principal design goals when creating the McFly. We wanted to design and work with components that accomplished our goal of delivering the greatest electric bike you'd ever ride. 

The McFly is equipped for bike lanes to bike trails without a single change in components.



The McFly was built with a mid-drive motor that delivers instant power to the crankshaft through direct drive technology. As a result power is transferred instantly to the drive train, increasing torque and creating a natural rhythm when pedaling. 




POWER SYSTEMS

The McFly has two power activation systems. 

Primary engagement is pedal assist. Which works by sensing a riders pedaling motion and activating the motors drive train. Perfect for riding in cities and in groups.  

Secondary engagement is the thumb throttle. Simply push down the throttle and and like that your blasting off. Perfect for off-road riding when your focusing more on technical riding and less on pedaling.


LONGEVITY

McFly’s direct mid-drive motor increases durability exponentially compared to competing hub motors. The McFly's mid-drive motor powers the drive-train directly, while other hub motors transfer power through the bicycles wheels which stresses the bikes spokes, rims and dropouts.


MOTOR SPECS

The McFly has a nominal power rating of 750 watts for on-road usage. 

For off-road situations riders can increase the e-Gears to access 1200 watts of peak power!

  • 25+ MPH
  • 750 Nominal Watts
  • 1200 Peak Watts
  • 92% Electric Motor Efficiency 
  • 100% Awesome


BATTERY SPECS

  • 25+ Mile Range All Electric
  • 60 Mile Range Electric + Pedal
  • 10,000 Lifetime Battery Miles (Over 600+ Charge Cycles)
  • Only Costs $0.08 For A Full Charge
  • 180 Minute Charge Time

        48 Volt Lithium Cells              11.8 Ah of Capacity             

        Integrated BMS                    Thermal Cooling Design


BATTERY FEATURES

The McFly’s centrally mounted battery design keeps the weight low and grounded making for an exceptionally smooth ride.


Three unique features of the McFly's battery design

1. Intelligent-USB charger keeps your gadgets charged when your on the go. Simply plug it in and you can recharge your gear anywhere.

2. Quick-Detach allows for easy battery removal making battery swaps possible in seconds. Taking the battery inside to charge is a breeze.

3. Steel-Bolt locking mechanism. Locks the battery pack into the frame for extra ruggedness on tough terrain. A keyed entry keeps your battery safe wherever you are. 



With A 25 Mile Radius The Possibilities Are Endless

     
      

Where the power meets the pavement. Equipped with 29" wheels for non-stop action the McFly was built to move fast. 

Rocks, stairs, logs,  and curbs all become play things when under throttle. The over sized 29" wheels in conjunction with the mid-drive motor produce dirt spitting acceleration, for miles of electric grinning.


29" Tires make it easier to roll over obstacles



We understand that riders will push their bikes to the limit and need reliability.  So we experimented with different models of brakes before we settled with Tektro’s mechanical disc brakes.

'What we got was instant stopping power that performed under every condition we could put them through, from rain to mud and everything in between. '


Revolutionized Micro Maintenace

A revolutionary style of eBike maintenance, equipping riders with confidence to know we'll be there every step of the way. Bikes break it's a part of life and electric bikes are no exception. The only problem with electric bikes is that there's no way to get them serviced from a local shop. Usually riders are left with two options either tinkering with the problem themselves are spending money on expensive bike shipping fees to and from the electric bike manufacturer.

We didn't like either of these ideas and we didn't want to leave our riders stranded with a bike they couldn't ride. So we reverse engineered the problem and decided to revolutionize electric bikes by introducing micro maintenance. 

The micro maintenance idea is based off of our plug and play component system. We've integrated the components to easily separate and disassemble from one another, allowing riders to easily remove the faulty component. Riders can then ship the singular  component to our production HQ. Where are experts will fix the kink and ship it right back to the user, for an even easier re-install.

Leaving you in good hands with reliable support for miles and miles of riding. 

The First eBike Solely Designed With An Obsessive Focus On It's Center Of Gravity. 


A low and focused center of gravity is the defining mark of a great bicycle, determining  everything from a rider’s ability to transfer power to a grounded riding experience. 


We wanted to give enthusiast a timeless design that was as much fun as it was versatile. A bike that could go from office commutes to weekend adventures without a single change of components. 

And while achieving this versatility we wanted to make the McFly look as good as it performed. So we constructed the McFly's frame with 6061 aluminum and setup the drive train as a hybrid singlespeed. 

Our hybrid singlespeed drive-train uses e-Gears instead of mechanical gears allowing you to control your speed and spend more time riding and less time on maintenance.



ON ROAD

Cities within the United States were designed and built around a car commuting society. What we have is sprawl and lengthy journeys between points in cities, making bike commuting difficult. 

And while cities have increased their biking infrastructure the fact is the distance traveled is still too great.  Electric bikes  bridge this gap by increasing a riders practical range of cycling.

  • The high-performance McFly allows you to ride to work confidentially everyday
  • Owing a car is expensive with payments, gas, insurance and maintenance 
  • Owning a McFly will be the smartest commuting choice you'll have 
  • And 3x car payments later, you could saved enough for a McFly


OFF ROAD

No pavement princess here! The McFly loves getting dirty and is ready for off road trails and adventures any time. Just gear up and you'll see how much fun it is to blast through trails. 29 inch wheels and low key gearing keep those wheels spinning.


  • If the campaign meets it's goal before December 20th. We'll send out all our decals, shirts and cards early. So you can receive them just before Christmas!
  • If you select a McFly and we are able to hit our goal by December 20th, we'll be sending out signed thank you cards early as well (so there's something for Christmas.)
  • Every McFly will be built and shipped from Florida. If successfully funded our timetable is set as 8 weeks of component acquisition followed by 3 weeks of domestic assembly and 2 weeks of processing and shipping. 



TOGETHERNESS

Our goal is ambitious, but we know our product is the best and we want to get it out there. To deliver the ultimate electric bike to market we needed to take our product to Indiegogo to generate a large volume order. Crowd funding allows us to introduce the McFly to the market at an affordable price point. 

Together as partners we can accomplish the goal of funding this campaign in an effort to introduce and fill the streets of America with ultra-efficient electric bikes.


LONG TERM VISION

McFly motors has a vision that is larger than just electric bikes we believe that we can use our team, contacts and vision to create the largest reduction in CO2 ever seen through the development of electric ready technologies that borrow principles from our bikes. 


THE IMPACT

The only lazy bike is the bike in your garage.

Having an electric bike will allow and encourage you to use your bike in far more situations. Last minute grocery runs are faster and more fun. Going to work becomes an experience. Weekends to the beach turn into adventures.  Riding an electric bike will open you up to the outside world and its many nuances that are so commonly missed riding in a car.

OUR WARRANTY

We're here to stay and with the successful funding of our Indiegogo campaign we promise we'll be here for you on your electric bike journey. 

Over the last several months we have negotiated extensively with our vendors to protect our customers. 

In  doing so manufactures have agreed to pass on 'Original Equipment Manufacturers' or OEM warranties to all products that pass through McFly Motors production facility. 

McFly Motors will be your point of contact for technical support and all warranty claims. 

We got you covered!

Lifetime on Frames

12 Months On Battery Packs

24 Months On Motors

12 Months On Electrical Accessories (Screen, Kill Switch, Wiring etc.)


OUR GOAL

Our goal as a company is to empower people to make their own transportation decisions that are not limited by the price of oil or the routing of public transportation. 


RISKS & CHALLENGES

The design, suppliers and materials have all been chosen for the project and are ready to roll into production. Manufacturing and assembling electric bikes is a big deal. That’s why we are placing direct quality control over every component assembled, and producing domestically.

Our team members have dozens of years in manufacturing with core knowledge of lean, and six sigma production in addition to years of experience in international trade.

To eliminate any surprises we will be updating every week on both our Indiegogo page, as well as through email. Giving you play-by-play progress and status of McFly's production. As a partner you'll be able to see the in's and out's of our operation!

Lastly the rider is the biggest risk. This bike is fast, very fast and when geared competitively can go over 28+ mph with off-road settings engaged.  We wish and hope that all of our partners that contribute ride safely and always wear a helmet. 

If successfully funded then our production schedule will launch immediately after funding. There will be upwards of 8 weeks of component acquisition followed by 3 weeks of domestic assembly and 2 weeks of processing and shipping. Our timetable has a scheduled delivery date of late March early April. Just in time for spring riding!

story: Hello Community! We are fundraising on behalf of our friend Ash Farah’s to obtain secure transportation and housing to avoid any further street harassment for his identities. We are some of Ash’s close friends. We came up with the idea to crowdfund him some funds so he can purchase a safe reliable vehicle and pay for housing. The reason why we are asking for donation towards car purchase fund is due to the harsh reality of being an outed Black trans person. Our friend Ash has encountered numerous transphobic attacks throughout his life. Whether it is from walking, public transportation, or biking. These incidents still occur. In the LGBTQ community, safety is something that we still strive for and just want some peace of mind. To Ash owning a car not only ensures his safety and welling, but as well as restore power to his identity. For those who are learning about Ash. Ash is a young Black trans student at Augsburg University and LGBTQ activist. Those alone keep him busy but along with that, he’s also a care taker for his family. He is the oldest in his Somali immigrant household and juggles with helping out and paying his own household bills. Ash is also a loyal and dependable friend to us all. Not only has he offered his love but he has found resources for us and helped out through our own problems. His contribution to the community has been consistent and you can track it back to when he was in high school. From helping lead local to school organizations, crowdsourcing for food drives, doing encampment supply runs, mentoring queer youth, offering housing for other muslim queers and even volunteering as a protest medic during these pandemic times. For Ash, this is more than a car and support for housing. In the past he has asked friends and community members for rides for food drives, transporting supplies, and transportation. He also offers his space as a safe house for black queer youth. This is something that Ash will continue to provide. We know that Ash's network is big and loving but his financial situation says otherwise. This is due to him being selfless and always putting others ahead of him. Please help us remind Ash why he deserves this and more. 8,000 for a used car 1,000 for fees/taxes 1,000 car title/insurance 7,000 for housing fees (3000 fall, 4000 next). TOTAL: 17,000

story:
Cronic no es solo una marca, es un estilo de vida

 

 

La espera terminó, ¡Por fin puedes adquirir tu e-bike más poderosa! Nuestras bicicletas incorporan un diseño novedoso, con tan solo mirarlas podrás percibir el espíritu de nuestra marca.

La diferencia entre Cronic y el resto, está en nuestra esencia, ofrecemos productos de diseño, que se adaptan a tus necesidades diarias sin importar el terreno al que te enfrentes, pero no es solo eso, con probarlas sentirás un vehículo totalmente desconocido hasta ahora, ligero, robusto, estable, que te brindará la posibilidad de hacer ejercicio y los atascos ya no serán un problema.

Lo que nos hace especiales es nuestra perseverancia por cambiar este mundo, guiar a nuestros clientes y seguidores a mejorar su vida cotidiana, disfrutando del trabajo y relaciones sociales, incorporando una educación nutricional y ejercicios físicos para todos los niveles, con el fin de inculcar confianza y satisfacción personal.

Empresa fundada en junio de 2018 cuyo objetivo es ofrecer un medio de transporte que reduzca el impacto medioambiental y que fomente un estilo de vida saludable, nuestra política empresarial se basa exclusivamente en el cliente, resolveremos sus dudas e inquietudes lo antes posible.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Nuestro modelo Cronic Monster es la joya de la corona, ofrece un diseño agresivo y ergonómico, se adapta a todo tipo de espacios y terrenos, tanto para la ciudad como para tus aventuras más comprometedoras, en cualquiera de ellos te dará unos resultados extraordinarios.

Gracias a su función de plegado la podrás llevar en el maletero de tu coche sin apenas ocupar espacio, llévatela de camping, en el tren, en el autobús, en avión, almacénala en tu trastero o en casa sin molestias.

Deja atrás los modelos convencionales de bicicleta para ciudad y disfruta de los beneficios que este modelo te puede ofrecer con su apariencia agresiva y su fácil manejo, será tu mejor compañera en el día a día, gracias a sus dimensiones y a sus componentes no tiene nada que envidiar a ninguna E-bike.

 

 

 

   

                          

   

 

 

Cronic fixie, un modelo retro que jamás pasará de moda, hemos conseguido llevar las fixie a otro nivel, no pierdas tu estilo con nuestra nueva edición madera del 2018. Realiza tus rutas por la ciudad de manera más eficaz y satisfactoria.

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

Cronic Predator inspirada en la competición de élite, y con unas prestaciones espectaculares. Está diseñada para los campeones, con la Predator no habrá lugar al que no puedas llegar. Fiabilidad y comodidad que caracteriza nuestra marca. La mezcla perfecta entre electricidad y el cuerpo humano.

“Ligera y suave, el motor te lleva hasta donde no llegabas. ”

 

 

 


 

 

 
 
 

Nuestra misión es crear una empresa en la que puedan confiar toda clase de clientes, donde ofrezcamos los productos con los componentes de mayor calidad a un precio realmente asequible para cualquier persona y rodearnos de un equipo de confianza que pueda resolver los problemas de inmediato.

Tras estudiar el mercado de los vehículos eléctricos, hemos comprobado que este tipo de transporte ha llegado para quedarse, nuestro inexplicable afán por los vehículos, nos llevó a meternos hasta dentro en el proyecto y pretendemos hacer que los consumidores conozcan estos productos y puedan apreciar de primera mano las ventajas que les pueden ofrecer.

Nuestra visión es un futuro donde seamos líderes del sector, ver que los ciudadanos se desplazan utilizando esta clase de vehículos y aprovechan las ventajas que les ofrecemos, apreciar a simple vista el cambio que hemos contribuido a crear en la sociedad, inculcando estilos de vida saludables y favoreciendo la sostenibilidad de los núcleos urbanos disminuyendo el caos formado por los coches, los atascos, la contaminación acústica y el destrozo continúo en la atmósfera que provocan las emisiones de los vehículos tradicionales.

*Estos productos son importados de China por piezas, todos los componentes de las bicicletas han sido testados personalmente mediante pruebas de calidad tras las que sólo han quedado aquellos fabricantes que realmente nos han dado la confianza y el resultado que buscábamos.

 

 

 

Con el dinero que obtengamos queremos introducirnos de lleno en el fenómeno de las bicicletas eléctricas compartidas, hemos conseguido un software que permite a los usuarios utilizar este medio de transporte a través de una aplicación para smartphone al alcance de cualquiera, sin excluir a ningún tipo de persona ya sea turista o residente. Uno de nuestros principales objetivos es idea de beneficiar a nuestra ciudad reduciendo las emisiones de los vehículos a combustión y ser pioneros en el fenómeno de la movilidad sostenible. Estamos trabajando para implantar el proyecto en Zaragoza a final de Noviembre 2018, con una flota inicial de 80 bicicletas eléctricas.

Además, queremos crear una marca que ofrezca todo tipo de vehículos eléctricos a sus usuarios, creemos que el transporte eléctrico es el futuro y estamos dispuestos a aprovechar esta oportunidad, contribuyendo con nuestros actos a fomentar el respeto y el cuidado del medio ambiente y el planeta.

 

https://www.heraldo.es/noticias/aragon/zaragoza...

 

 

 

CAMUFLAJE GRIS

CAMUFLAJE MARINO

CAMUFLAJE NEGRO

MADERA

MARMOL BLANCO

trastero o en casa sin molestias.Deja atrás los modelos convencionales de bicicleta para ciudad y disfruta de los beneficios que este modelo te puede ofrecer con su apariencia agresiva y su fácil manejo, será tu mejor compañera en el día a día, gracias a sus dimensiones y a sus componentes no tiene nada que envidiar a ninguna E-bike.                                      Cronic fixie, un modelo retro que jamás pasará de moda, hemos conseguido llevar las fixie a otro nivel, no pierdas tu estilo con nuestra nueva edición madera del 2018. Realiza tus rutas por la ciudad de manera más eficaz y satisfactoria.        Cronic Predator inspirada en la competición de élite, y con unas prestaciones espectaculares. Está diseñada para los campeones, con la Predator no habrá lugar al que no puedas llegar. Fiabilidad y comodidad que caracteriza nuestra marca. La mezcla perfecta entre electricidad y el cuerpo humano.“Ligera y suave, el motor te lleva hasta donde no llegabas. ”   


     Nuestra misión es crear una empresa en la que puedan confiar toda clase de clientes, donde ofrezcamos los productos con los componentes de mayor calidad a un precio realmente asequible para cualquier persona y rodearnos de un equipo de confianza que pueda resolver los problemas de inmediato.Tras estudiar el mercado de los vehículos eléctricos, hemos comprobado que este tipo de transporte ha llegado para quedarse, nuestro inexplicable afán por los vehículos, nos llevó a meternos hasta dentro en el proyecto y pretendemos hacer que los consumidores conozcan estos productos y puedan apreciar de primera mano las ventajas que les pueden ofrecer.Nuestra visión es un futuro donde seamos líderes del sector, ver que los ciudadanos se desplazan utilizando esta clase de vehículos y aprovechan las ventajas que les ofrecemos, apreciar a simple vista el cambio que hemos contribuido a crear en la sociedad, inculcando estilos de vida saludables y favoreciendo la sostenibilidad de los núcleos urbanos disminuyendo el caos formado por los coches, los atascos, la contaminación acústica y el destrozo continúo en la atmósfera que provocan las emisiones de los vehículos tradicionales.*Estos productos son importados de China por piezas, todos los componentes de las bicicletas han sido testados personalmente mediante pruebas de calidad tras las que sólo han quedado aquellos fabricantes que realmente nos han dado la confianza y el resultado que buscábamos.   Con el dinero que obtengamos queremos introducirnos de lleno en el fenómeno de las bicicletas eléctricas compartidas, hemos conseguido un software que permite a los usuarios utilizar este medio de transporte a través de una aplicación para smartphone al alcance de cualquiera, sin excluir a ningún tipo de persona ya sea turista o residente. Uno de nuestros principales objetivos es idea de beneficiar a nuestra ciudad reduciendo las emisiones de los vehículos a combustión y ser pioneros en el fenómeno de la movilidad sostenible. Estamos trabajando para implantar el proyecto en Zaragoza a final de Noviembre 2018, con una flota inicial de 80 bicicletas eléctricas.Además, queremos crear una marca que ofrezca todo tipo de vehículos eléctricos a sus usuarios, creemos que el transporte eléctrico es el futuro y estamos dispuestos a aprovechar esta oportunidad, contribuyendo con nuestros actos a fomentar el respeto y el cuidado del medio ambiente y el planeta. https://www.heraldo.es/noticias/aragon/zaragoza...   CAMUFLAJE GRISCAMUFLAJE MARINOCAMUFLAJE NEGROMADERAMARMOL BLANCO

This is the new generation e-commerce platform which has more than 10k suppliers from Italy that most of them not accessable from US and other countries. 

The major differrence between other platforms and us that they can not access these suppliers without us. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Every investor will be part of this great opportunity.

story:
Why go electric?

There are a few means of moving around the city - walking, driving, using public transport and cycling

They all have pros and cons - walking is fine if you have the time. Driving is fun on an open road, but a nightmare in rush hour, plus it is expensive, stressful and harmful for the environment. Public transport could be affordable, but who likes to start the day rubbing against a stranger on an overcrowded bus, especially in 2020? Then there is cycling - often faster than anything else, affordable and green. The downside is that you may break a sweat on the way to work and make your colleagues unhappy... plus let's face it - sometimes we just want to make things the easy way. This is where electric bikes step in.

Electric bicycles have been on the rise for more than a decade, so can we offer anything new? Yes, we can!

We analyzed the needs and habits of urban commuters. Then we took the most suitable features from bicycles and scooters, we added some very distinctive touches, and we created Vinghen Ti1. This is a hybrid that combines the concept of a scooter with the size and versatility of a bicycle, allowing you to make the most out of it, whether you are on your commute during the week, or having fun in the mountains over the weekend.

 

Why Choose Vinghen?

If the contemporary design is not a good enough reason, the distinctive concept of Vinghen Ti1 comes with some neat benefits, compared to its more traditional competitors.

Compared to a bicycle, Vinghen offers:

 

Compared to a scooter, Vinghen offers:

When we designed Vinghen, we wanted to implement these advantages into an iconic design. Our goal was to make micromobility more attractive by creating a solution that compliments its owner with a design that is subtle, yet instantly recognizable.

Some of the key design features, to achieve this, include:

  • Plywood deck with exposed bolts and longboard shape.
  • Patented "split" frame that provides increased stiffness for a more engaging ride.
  • "Fat" tires for improved comfort, added versatility and cool looks. You can choose between "city" and "country" tread.
  • Concealed battery - the battery is hidden and well protected under the deck. It is protected from accidental hits by a steel plate and an external polycarbonate cover.

Specifications

We have combined the attractive looks of Vinghen Ti1 with modern e-bike tech, offering competitive specs:

More detailed information can be found on our website www.vinghen.com

Besides that, we believe in factory customization. Take cars for example - why do you have the possibility to chose between a dozen of colors when you buy a car, but you typically have two colors when it comes to bicycles? We do not like this. Therefore, we offer Vinghen Ti1 with a choice of four standard and five optional colors. There is even an exclusive Emerald Green, available only during our Indiegogo campaign!

We did borrow something else from the automotive world - the pricing. We are offering a base model with a list of available options. This allows us to reduce the starting price of Ti1. So once you have chosen your color, you can move to the add ons:

 

Founders Team

You may have noticed that we have borrowed quite a few ideas from the automotive industry. This is no coincidence - both our founders are engineers with years of experience in development for automotive giants such as Paccar, Daimler and Volkswagen.

"I am an automotive engineer and I love cars. However, I do love them on the open road and definitely not in the city where they are slow, noisy, dirty, expensive and just don't make much sense.

I am a firm believer that micro mobility is the future of individual city transportation. Therefore I decided to start Vinghen and to focus on two wheeled electric vehicles for commuting. But I also wanted to make this good fun! Hence with our first product I made certain changes to the traditional push-scooter, so that it is more engaging, more comfortable, and just more enjoyable on the city streets and bike lanes.

I also wanted to incorporate some of my own style into this product. Therefore I created a V-shaped frame that reminds me of a wave and a step that resembles a surfboard...  well, once Mariyan came on board he suggested that we make it look like a longboard and that's what we did, as it certainly suits Vinghen Ti1 better!"

"I am very excited to be part of the Vinghen Ti1 project. The minute I saw Tsvetan's concept, I realized it is an idea with huge potential, so I accepted his offer to work on the design of certain parts of the push-scooter.

With regards to climate change and traffic congestion, micro mobility is an important topic and Vinghen offers an innovative alternative to the traditional push-scooters. I have to admit that the finished product looks even better than I was imagining and I am positive that once we start series production, we will have one of the most distinctive push scooters on the market."

Why do we need your help?

And what do we want to achieve?

Creating a new product is a tough job. When you start from scratch, you need to work for years before you make your first sale. These initial sales are extremely important, when it comes to finding investors, making key hires, and preparing for the growth of your business. Indiegogo makes this a little bit easier by providing us with the opportunity to make, in essence, a pre-sale, thus financing our first production batch and spreading the word about Vinghen.

Besides this project, we are also negotiating with some commercial buyers and investor at this very moment. We expect that our efforts will lead to the start of a popular brand that offers well-engineered, distinctive, micromobility products. Our goal is to see more people use electric bicycles and scooters around the city. This leads to less traffic, significant reduction of air pollution, and happier people. 

Oh, and we did mention that you need years of hard work to get to production. Have a look at our timeline. It's a long story, but we hope it will be worth it!

 

Risks and challenges

We have already proved our concept by real world testing for nearly a year, so the risks that lay ahead have to do with manufacturing and shipping.

By far the greatest risk at the moment comes from the instability caused by the current pandemic - shortage of materials, manufacturing delays, currency fluctuations.

We have addressed all these issues in our plans - in terms of materials, we are working with multiple suppliers. We have access to several assembly facilities in Asia and Europe, so we believe that we have manufacturing covered too. Dramatic currency fluctuations could happen, but we aim at keeping all our work and expenses transparent and we are ready to issue refunds in we can not fulfill our project due to external factors.

Other Ways You Can Help

Turning this project into a reality means so much to us. Therefore, we would be grateful if you can help us reach our goal. You can do this, not only by choosing a perk, but also by sharing the project with people who may be interested in getting a Vinghen. Doing so would mean the world to us!

story:
The FanFlyer is in the prototype phase. Currently, we have built a ⅓ scale flying prototype of the aircraft and are working on a full-scale aircraft for hover testing this summer. Our ability to produce a fully functional, safe, and tested aircraft and begin full-scale production and distribution is dependent on our FanFlyer fans- just like you!

FanFlyer’s team is hard at work designing the future of personal flying. Our team is designing and building from a place of experience, knowing the aviation environment, and we are designing our craft with the future in mind. We need your help in order to change the future of flying right now.

Our mission is to get people airborne, in a safe, fun and useful way. Follow along as we create the flight of the future.

Picture being able to sightsee, commute to work, or pick up your weekly groceries by air! That is our mission!

The FanFlyer is the first of its kind. Our team is developing the special model Etana, a personal aircraft that can fit in a parking space and take off straight up. With a gasoline engine and a hybrid electric drive, the Etana hits a sweet spot between two extremes. We’re designing for over an hour of endurance and cruising speeds at 80 MPH at up to 10,000 feet of elevation. With the lightweight electric drive design and powertrain landing is as simple and comfortable as takeoff. The FanFlyer Etana model is specially designed for home and recreational use. On this machine, you are able to go anywhere!

As an MIT alumni with a background in Mechanical Engineering, I’ve been in the aviation, energy, and engineering working around and flying aircraft since 1985. I have logged countless hours working with a variety of aircraft including the F-111, F-16, PT6, Hueys, and Bell 412 helicopters for the US Department of State and several government institutions.

I had always wanted to really help turn the page and evolve human flight, so I dreamt up the idea for The FanFlyer.

While The FanFlyer team is hard at work completing the final stages of ground tests on our full-scale test rig, we still need support for finishing the project. Once fully-funded, the Etana model will be ready for public use and orders!

The FanFlyer team is looking for grassroots support from individuals and teams who want to support our vision of creating a simple, lightweight and safe personal transportation craft that changes the future of flight forever. We’re excited to build strong relationships with folks who believe in our vision and want to be part of our growth - from concept to public distribution.

The future of The FanFlyer and the future of flight looks very promising. Our dreams and aspirations of where and how we can evolve The FanFlyer are as high as the clouds themselves.

 

Are you ready?

Our team needs you! Are you ready to be part of the future of flight?
