story:
The digital speedometer for Audi B8 platform vehicles 

Eligible vehicles: 

2009 ~ 2016 8R Q5, SQ5 (up to 2017), 

2008 ~ 2016 8T: A5, S5, RS5, 8K: A4, S4, RS4

The digital speedometer dash product will feature: 

- 3.4" Dual 800 x 800 digital gauge displays with functional displays

- 4 x 1080p AHD Video input channels for front, left, right & rear view camera feeds (if vehicle equipped with, user supplied separately) 

- 1 x HDMI input (720p)

- Linux/QT/Java application execution: Speedometer, advanced real time vehicle diagnostic information display will be implemented. It will be possible to integrate  *Apple CarPlay or *Android Auto or any other compatible automotive application.(Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration will be subject to further approvals by Apple/Android and may not be possible at initial launch. This is yet to be determined)

- WIFI/BT preparation for apps 

- 1 - USB port for firmware upgrades

- 1 - switch for firmware upgrade functionality

- Automatic video switching on when left or right turn signal indicator has been activated, or reverse gear has been selected.

- compatible with factory Audi steering wheel buttons

- Customizable Advanced Diagnostic Information display: Animated Speedometer Speed (mph or km/h), Tachometer (RPM), MAF sensor reading, Boost reading, Voltage information, G-Force indicator and so on. 

- Drop in replacement: Purchasers will be required to open their factory Audi instrument cluster, remove the instrument cluster mainboard, inserts the purchased digital speedometer assembly, re-assemble their Audi instrument with the new digital speedometer cluster assembly using their original Audi factory housing. 

- Fail-Safe: The digital speedometer system is isolated from the original Audi speedometer. The factory centre informational display screen for the trip computer, digital speedometer and MMI information remains as it was provided by the factory. The factory Audi immobilizer will be maintained and will be unaffected by this change. The factory LED warning indicators such as "low tire pressure", "engine check light", "Air Bag warning" etc will be relocated but will retrain the original OEM functionality.

- Fully updatable firmware: RSNAV will provide firmware updates and functional upgrades to the software. RSNAV will work to implement the most wanted features from its customer base based on consumer feedback and feasibility to implement within the limit of the hardware support. 

 

Why don't you make full LCD speedometer replacement?

Simply, it's because of the LCD screen in the middle of the original mainboard.  The original speedometer is a key component for the vehicle security and is a part of immobilizer. It means without the original mainboard, your car won't start.  Thus it is essential to keep the original mainboard working in any circumstance. Without the centre screen, the mainboard would not work normally. It is physically not possible to place  a LCD panel above the existing LCD screen. 

A Speedometer is more than just moving needles to tell you what speed you are at now. This is primary vehicle electronic that cannot be modified, altered or copied easily.  We don't want to promise anything that is barely possible for anyone to make without huge support from Audi. 

The current concept design is the best available in terms of technical possibility and cost while keep your car drivable. 

 

How this fundraising work?(important)

If you donate money less than 650$ USD, then it is treated as donation. We did not decide what we would offer for 'donations' but we would give you discounts respect to your donation amount. By donating, you are also a backer of this project.  

If you get a perk which is priced at $650 USD, then when this project completes around this fall, we will ship you a digital instrument cluster kit. Practically you are reserving your digital instrument cluster now. 

This fundraising is 'all or nothing'. If we do get the goal amount, then we will proceed and complete this project and produce the outcome. If we do not reach the goal amount within the campaign period, then this project will be permanently discarded.  

 

The Prototype and Technical Demonstrations

General view of the original Audi instrument cluster with digital speedometer installed to show screen size and positioning within cluster. 

Functional examples

Conceptual illustrations of animations to be realized

Conceptual illustration of various camera feed functions

Actual platform testing

The system will be running an embedded version of linux with QT UI for real time response - 'zero delay'.  The projected boot up time for the speedometer and RPM gauge is under 5 seconds. 

**The platform is capable of running Apple CarPlay. However, this feature is subject to approval from respective licensors and to include the feature would require additional licensing costs. Currently, it will not be a feature of the project unless there is a strong demand and also a successful approval from Apple licensor(s).**

Administrative Details

Prospective Timeline

The actual hardware designs will take 120~200 days. (May 2021 to Sept. 2021)

The Plastic mold design and production will take 100 days. (starting in June 2021)

 

Current project status

Currently, conceptual design study, system function analysis, and material cost evaluation have been completed. 

 

Cost Analysis

The Hardware and UI development will cost about $60K CAD 

The Plastic mouldings for 5 different Audi instrument clusters will cost about $70K CAD.

 

People behind this project

"Daniel" Daehyun KIM

Chief of Operations at RSNAV.com - leading Audi aftermarket GPS device maker & distributor

The Project leader and creator of the digital speedometer for Audi B8 platform vehicles 

"Jeff" Liu

CEO at Hangrui Hechang co. ltd, an RSNAV original equipment manufacturer

2020 The most sold brand in "Automotive GPS system" in taobao.com 

The crews and the factory

 Head hardware team leader, Daniel KIM, Jeff LIU,  Operation director

 Hardware design team

Factory production floor

Without the centre screen, the mainboard would not work normally. It is physically not possible to place  a LCD panel above the existing LCD screen. A Speedometer is more than just moving needles to tell you what speed you are at now. This is primary vehicle electronic that cannot be modified, altered or copied easily.  We don't want to promise anything that is barely possible for anyone to make without huge support from Audi. The current concept design is the best available in terms of technical possibility and cost while keep your car drivable.  How this fundraising work?(important)If you donate money less than 650$ USD, then it is treated as donation. We did not decide what we would offer for 'donations' but we would give you discounts respect to your donation amount. By donating, you are also a backer of this project.  If you get a perk which is priced at $650 USD, then when this project completes around this fall, we will ship you a digital instrument cluster kit. Practically you are reserving your digital instrument cluster now. This fundraising is 'all or nothing'. If we do get the goal amount, then we will proceed and complete this project and produce the outcome. If we do not reach the goal amount within the campaign period, then this project will be permanently discarded.   The Prototype and Technical DemonstrationsGeneral view of the original Audi instrument cluster with digital speedometer installed to show screen size and positioning within cluster. Functional examplesConceptual illustrations of animations to be realizedConceptual illustration of various camera feed functions

Actual platform testing


The system will be running an embedded version of linux with QT UI for real time response - 'zero delay'.  The projected boot up time for the speedometer and RPM gauge is under 5 seconds. 
**The platform is capable of running Apple CarPlay. However, this feature is subject to approval from respective licensors and to include the feature would require additional licensing costs. Currently, it will not be a feature of the project unless there is a strong demand and also a successful approval from Apple licensor(s).**

Administrative DetailsProspective TimelineThe actual hardware designs will take 120~200 days. (May 2021 to Sept. 2021)The Plastic mold design and production will take 100 days. (starting in June 2021) Current project statusCurrently, conceptual design study, system function analysis, and material cost evaluation have been completed.  Cost AnalysisThe Hardware and UI development will cost about $60K CAD The Plastic mouldings for 5 different Audi instrument clusters will cost about $70K CAD. People behind this project"Daniel" Daehyun KIMChief of Operations at RSNAV.com - leading Audi aftermarket GPS device maker & distributorThe Project leader and creator of the digital speedometer for Audi B8 platform vehicles "Jeff" LiuCEO at Hangrui Hechang co. ltd, an RSNAV original equipment manufacturer2020 The most sold brand in "Automotive GPS system" in taobao.com The crews and the factory Head hardware team leader, Daniel KIM, Jeff LIU,  Operation director Hardware design teamFactory production floor

story:
Lizann is amazing and bike thieves suck

 

Lizann has been volunteering at UAY for years and doing great things for her community left and right. When ever there is an event Lizann is there helping, whenever a kid needs tutoring Lizann is there helping, when ever anyone needs a helping hand of any sort Lizann is there. Two weeks ago while touring a young person, for free, at the public library someone stole her bicycle. Lizann's bicycle is her main mode of transportation so this theft is especially bad. Please consider giving even just a little to support this awesome person.

Please consider giving even just a little to support this awesome person.

story:
Urban Nomad 

The Urban Nomad is a smart solution for people who want to use their bikes more often, but cannot because of distance or because they have to carry too much stuff.  With one click you can hook up the Urban Nomad to your bike and turn it into an electric bike.

The 250W brushless dc motor gives you all the power you need when you need it.  You can reach speeds up to 25 kph without breaking a sweat.  The Li-batteries inside give you a range of 25 km.

The Urban Nomad allows you to transport more stuff (up to 50 l and 30 kg) with your bike in a comfortable and robust way.  It is also very easy to use and takes the hassle out of going shopping with your bike.

It is all about riding your bike further, faster, smarter, … in style.

The story of the design:

note: images shown in pictures and clips are images of the prototype - the final product may look somewhat different

note: the Urban Nomad is not suited for transporting children, pets, ...


Powered by The Opportunity Factory

Four months ago seven enthusiastic entrepreneurs started The Opportunity Factory with two goals in mind:

  • Create opportunities for young entrepreneurs.
  • Do this by creating innovative affordable sustainable products.

Now we are launching our first product for pre-orders: the Urban Nomad.  With our own funds we will bring this product to our local market in Belgium.  But, this product should reach many more customers around the world.  And in doing so it can also create opportunities around the world.

With this campaign we want to gather enough funds to start bringing the Urban Nomad to the whole world.  Starting with Europe, but maybe even further.  Just tell us where the Urban Nomad is needed and we will do all we can to make it happen.

How it all started:


Perks


Urban Nomad enthusiast

We need enough funds to start selling the Urban Nomad internationally.  This requires that we  learn about the local needs, find local cooperative members, find ways for shipping and local manufacturing, ... .  But first we also need to find out where the hot spots of bicycle riders are around the world.  Who needs the Urban Nomad and where? 

This perk helps you to get on our radar screen.  We will put your name and location on the global Urban Nomad need map on our web site.

We will keep you informed about the international launch of the Urban Nomad and about our progress in bringing the Urban Nomad to your area.

We will also share with you sneak previews of what is cooking in our kitchen.


Exclusive The Opportunity Factory t-shirt

Check out the great t-shirt design!  We have asked the young designer, who designed our logo, to design a t-shirt exclusively for the indiegogo campaign.

She based the design on our logo and on our internal motto: will do altruism for gratitude. 

The printed t-shirts will be made by the wonderful people of suburban.be: where craftsmanship meets nature.


Euro Early Bird

From anywhere in the European Union, you can pre-order one of the first Urban Nomads.

Early bird benefits:

  • reduced price (about 50 USD)
  • free shipping (to anywhere in the EU)


Exclusive delivery

For only five people (living anywhere in the European Union): the Urban Nomad will be brought to you by one of the founding partners.  The Urban Nomad will be fitted to your bike and aligned perfectly for a perfect driving experience in style.


    Or just tell a friend

    You find this as exciting as we do, but you just can't contribute now?

    You think this is really something for one of your friends?

    You can also help us by getting the word out or by sharing this campaign with friends.

story:
ABOUT VIVID

We designed VIVID to let everyone experience the joy of riding a good eBike. A great number of quality components and smart features  bring riders the best riding experience.

VIVID is featured in…

 

 

"We are proud of VIVID BIKE for its quality, comfort, safety & price."

Quality & Comfort

VIVID is engineered to adopt the state of the art Bafang electric system, which is reputable in the field for its constant and reliable high-quality power output. With up to 20 miles/hour of power assist, VIVID is a relaxing and enjoyable way to start your day.

 

The 350W Bafang Mid/Rear drive motor provides up to 80 N.m torque. Start pedaling and feel the powerful yet silent electric boost kicking in simultaneously. Let’s beat the uphill without breaking a sweat.

 

The electric and sensor system is connected with the Bafang LCD display. You can customize your own settings including speed limit, 6 level pedal assists, and battery duration.

 

To us, bikes are an extension of the rider and shouldn’t only feel right, but look great as well. Our attention to design goes beyond function; to the materials and surfaces, which entails a zero-tolerance towards flaws. The carefully putty-treated aluminium frame finish is every bit beautiful as it is smooth to the touch. Perfection guaranteed.

 

Joy of Riding

Enjoy the 48V 10.2A detachable Samsung battery on the Spectre model, which gives you 40-50 miles of power assisted travel on a single charge.

 

Thanks to the Suntor front fork, Kenda puncture-absorption all-terrain tire, ultra-comfortable Velo saddle and Zoom seat suspension, bumpy roads are now gentle and smooth.

 

Looking to exercise and sweat it out? Simply turn off the pedal assist through the display and select from Shimano Alivio 9 speed gears. When you are tired and want to take a break, go fully electric with the throttle and enjoy the automatic drive.

 

A free phone holder is included for you to go further distance. We have selected an integrated USB charger you can juice up your mobile devices on the go.

 

Safety is the priority.

Safety is always the top priority for our riders. VIVID has an integrated lighting system which makes your ride safer and more convenient at night. The German-engineered light guarantees you a clear view without disrupting oncoming traffic. We’ve also included a laser tail light for free that looks pretty cool while enhancing your safety.

 

VIVID BIKE is equipped with the Tektro hydraulic disc brake with power cutoff function for your safety. The moment you pull the lever, the motor is cut off instantly so the bike always stays in control. It also provides powerful and reliable braking power and consistent modulation under all weather conditions.

Concerned about the thieves on the street? No worries, the battery comes with an in-built key-lock and we’ve included a secure coded lock as an accessory for your peace of mind.

 

Price

We’ve compared and tested over hundreds of different components and accessories to make the current Vivid prototype. It has been remodeled and updated 6 times in the last two years before we were finally satisfied with the combination of quality and price.

 

We have also streamlined our supply chain and optimized the manufacturing process to make our amazing prices possible.

 

“A good ebike simply should not be that expensive.”

Your VIVID comes in four colors available: Metallic Green, Shiny White, Matte Grey and Matte Black. By the way, we’ve included a free package of accessories for everyone including a laser tail light, a phone holder, and a bike tools set.

         

 

We want everyone to feel the joy of riding a good eBike. Contribute today and join the ride.

 

Elegant frame design+ Bafang electric system+ Suntour front fork + Tektro hydraulic disc brake + Samsung battery + Shimano gears + Kenda tires + Velo saddle + Free Accessory Package= VIVID BIKE starts from $899

 

 

How VIVID do you want to go? 

Tech Specs

Bafang Motor

  • Reputable Bafang brushless rear/mid hub motor
  • Power rating of 250W/350W
  • Silent yet serious performance with up to 80 N.m torque

 

Samsung Battery

  • Samsung high-quality lithium-ion battery
  • 48V/7.8Ah (375Wh) for Moonsoon offers 30-40 miles of assisted travel
  • 48V/10.2Ah (490Wh) for Spectre offers 40-50 miles of assisted travel
  • Easily removable with key lock
  • *Range estimates are contingent upon total weight, cadence, riding style, wind and terrain condition.

 

Bafang Display

  • Bafang high-contrast DP C10/C13. UART backlit LCD Display
  • Delivers important data including speed, mode, battery life etc.
  • 6 speeds from 0 (no assist) to 5 (full assist)
  • Configurable with advanced personalised settings
  • Water and dust proof
  • Built-in USB charger

 

Aluminum Frame

  • 4 colors available
  • 6061 Aluminum Alloy
  • Putty treatment

 

Hydraulic Disc Brake

  • Tektro Hydraulic Disc Brake HD-E350
  • Power cutoff – a must for your safety
  • Strong and consistent braking power
  • Dual piston and sensor controlled

 

Full Suspension

  • Suntour XCT/XCR fork
  • Air spring with manual lockout
  • Zoom integrated seat suspension SPS-C372/EN-C
  • Built to handle all kinds of adventures

 

Wheel

  • 26*1.95 Kenda All-terrain Tire
  • Extra traction for off-road riding

 

The VIVID Story

VIVID BIKE Co. was conceived by a team of 5 bike enthusiasts from different backgrounds. We’ve tried and tested all kinds of ebikes on the markets, ranging from the $4000+ Bosch Mid drive to cheaper rides on Amazon with relatively inferior components.

 

Whether you’re looking to go green or simply looking for an affordable and convenient ride, we aim to provide all bike riders high-quality, durable yet affordable ebikes. There shouldn’t be a premium on green products or convenience and we want to make quality, affordable riding a reality. We want everyone to embrace the joy of riding a good ebike and aim to promote bicycles as a way of life.

 

Real Time Production Monitoring

We've built a robust and trustworthy supply chain management system in the past two years. We are confident to create an order tracking chart for you to monitor the most updated information about your Vivid. 

Referral Contest

Please refer to the Indiegogo referral contest rules for details to participate. 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

 

General

Are trial rides available?

We are currently holding trial rides in London, please email service@vividbike.com to arrange a session. We are also filming trial ride videos recently and will be putting them on social media soon. We hope to be able to offer trial rides and demonstrations in other countries in the near future.

 

How does down payment work?

If you contribute now with the down payment perk for $299, your early bird price is guaranteed. The rest of payment is completed by transferring to our bank account. And we won’t deliver your vivid until we receive your full payment. Refund for down payment is only available during the campaign, which lasts for 45-60 days.

 

I'm not sure if the bikes are suitable for my height or weight, can I ride them?

We've done testing to show that the universal frame fits well for riders from 5'3” to 6'4” / 160cm to 193cm. Plus, VIVID is well built to accommodate riders up to 275lbs/125 kg. The saddle can be easily adjusted to fit your height.

 

Are you hiring?

Yes! Please refer to our website for more information.

 

Is there a warranty?

Yes. We promise to use high quality components and we aim to keep building great ebikes for you in the long term, so a comprehensive warranty is included with every purchase. All VIVID BIKEs are protected by a one year warranty and any parts that are broken or found to be defective are covered. Additionally, we will ship replacement parts free of charge if there’s an existing problem when you receive it.

 

Please note that the warranty does not include rider and shipping damage of any kind. As many components of a bike may get damaged due to normal cycling use and natural ware, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, chain, brake pads, etc. 

 

Where can a VIVID BIKE be serviced?

VIVID BIKEs are like most ebikes or regular bikes with an additional electric system, so any reputable bike shop will be able to get VIVID serviced. We will also provide guide videos of assembly and replacement.

 

How can VIVID be so affordable compared to other ebikes on the market?

We’re selling VIVID at a significant promotional discount of up to 40% to start production. After the campaign, we will resume our normal pricing, which will still be relatively lower compared to the ebikes of similar components on the market.

 

To make this possible, we have worked with our partner factory to optimize component sourcing and streamline our supply chain in the last two years, so we can offer VIVID at a much lower price than others can. 

 

Lastly through our direct sales channel, there are no other intermediaries like local bike stores who mark prices up, so we can keep the price low.

 

How is the bike delivered?

The VIVID BIKE is delivered almost fully assembled. An easy-to-follow guide video will be provided.

 

Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?

VIVID is still in its prototype stage and we reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your VIVID BIKE even better. While we do not compromise on quality, there may be minor modifications essential to improving performance. 

 

Technical

How much do the bikes weigh?

VIVID BIKEs are relatively lightweight given the technology we use. The weight including the battery will be around 22kg/48 lbs. The Samsung battery weighs about 3kg/6.6 lbs.

 

What is pedal assist and how do I use the throttle?

Pedal assist allows you to choose between 6 levels of thrust from 0-5. The electric pedal assist kicks in as soon as you start pedaling, making your ride smoother and more effortless. The throttle (only featured on the US model) allows you to go fully electric when the throttle is pushed. The thumb throttle is not permitted in the EU due to regulation, hence it’s exclusion on the EU models. 

 

How do you charge the battery and how long does it take?

The  battery can be charged after you detach it from the bike. It takes around 4-5 hours per charge and the cell has about 1000 full charge cycles.

 

How much maintenance does the e-bike require?

Similar to regular bicycles, in addition to normal cleaning and lubricating, no other maintenance is required. However, we recommend you to pay attention to your brake and tire condition regularly. The electric system is very durable under normal riding conditions. Bafang maintains strict quality measurements through rigourous testing before coming out of the factory.

 

Legal


Is VIVID BIKE legal in my country?

Our EU models come with a 250W motor and are limited to a top speed of 25km/h, in compliance with stricter EU regulations according to EN15194. Please note that there’s no throttle for the EU models due to regulation.

 

For our US models, the speed is limited to 32km/h and throttle is allowed in most US cities. For most of the other countries, motors up to 250w nominal power are legal. Please check with your local laws and regulations before backing us.

 

However, you can reset the speed limit through the display and remove the throttle easily to comply with your local laws.

 

Do I need a special license to operate it?

VIVID BIKEs are street legal and classified as an electric bike almost everywhere in the world, so you don't need a special license to ride it. There are a few jurisdictions with more specific laws and we recommend to check your local regulations. However, we do not recommend anyone under 18 years old or over 65 years old to use it.

 

Do I need to wear a helmet?

They are required by law in some places. We do recommend you wear a helmet.

 

 

Shipping

How much is shipping?

$100 for US, and $150 for EU and UK, $300 for the rest of the world. 

 

When does it ship?

In around December 2018. We will constantly update the latest news about your VIVID’s production process through videos and pictures.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties and VAT?

The backer is responsible. So far the U.S is tax free for our product while the EU customers have to cover a 25% VAT and 6% duty due to the anti-dumping policy. The tax payment will be through personal bank transfer to our company account. Once we confirm your tax payment, we will start to work on your VIVID BIKE!!

 

Can I get a refund?

Please check out Indiegogo's policy here.

An easy-to-follow guide video will be provided. Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?VIVID is still in its prototype stage and we reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your VIVID BIKE even better. While we do not compromise on quality, there may be minor modifications essential to improving performance.  Technical How much do the bikes weigh?VIVID BIKEs are relatively lightweight given the technology we use. The weight including the battery will be around 22kg/48 lbs. The Samsung battery weighs about 3kg/6.6 lbs. What is pedal assist and how do I use the throttle?Pedal assist allows you to choose between 6 levels of thrust from 0-5. The electric pedal assist kicks in as soon as you start pedaling, making your ride smoother and more effortless. The throttle (only featured on the US model) allows you to go fully electric when the throttle is pushed. The thumb throttle is not permitted in the EU due to regulation, hence it’s exclusion on the EU models.  How do you charge the battery and how long does it take?The  battery can be charged after you detach it from the bike. It takes around 4-5 hours per charge and the cell has about 1000 full charge cycles. How much maintenance does the e-bike require?Similar to regular bicycles, in addition to normal cleaning and lubricating, no other maintenance is required. However, we recommend you to pay attention to your brake and tire condition regularly. The electric system is very durable under normal riding conditions. Bafang maintains strict quality measurements through rigourous testing before coming out of the factory. Legal Is VIVID BIKE legal in my country?Our EU models come with a 250W motor and are limited to a top speed of 25km/h, in compliance with stricter EU regulations according to EN15194. Please note that there’s no throttle for the EU models due to regulation. For our US models, the speed is limited to 32km/h and throttle is allowed in most US cities. For most of the other countries, motors up to 250w nominal power are legal. Please check with your local laws and regulations before backing us. However, you can reset the speed limit through the display and remove the throttle easily to comply with your local laws. Do I need a special license to operate it?VIVID BIKEs are street legal and classified as an electric bike almost everywhere in the world, so you don't need a special license to ride it. There are a few jurisdictions with more specific laws and we recommend to check your local regulations. However, we do not recommend anyone under 18 years old or over 65 years old to use it. Do I need to wear a helmet?They are required by law in some places. We do recommend you wear a helmet.  ShippingHow much is shipping?$100 for US, and $150 for EU and UK, $300 for the rest of the world.  When does it ship?In around December 2018. We will constantly update the latest news about your VIVID’s production process through videos and pictures. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties and VAT?The backer is responsible. So far the U.S is tax free for our product while the EU customers have to cover a 25% VAT and 6% duty due to the anti-dumping policy. The tax payment will be through personal bank transfer to our company account. Once we confirm your tax payment, we will start to work on your VIVID BIKE!! Can I get a refund?Please check out Indiegogo's policy here.

story:
I love space. I love space travel. I love the idea of my dead body - instead of mouldering and turning to dust in the ground here on our home planet of Earth - rocketing to the farthest edge of our galaxy, and (most likely) orbiting it until the literal end of time.

And now, with the arrival of companies such as Blue Origin and SpaceX (Hi, Jeff! Hi, Elon! : ), my dream of one day getting literally as far away from all of you as humanly possible is finally a reality.

I've been talking with a friend in the industry "whom knows about this stuff", and they have said that, despite the non-negligible plausibility of my goal, because reasons*, the cost of this enterprise is impossible to project. However, the most recent craft to achieve solar escape velocity (New Horizons, 2006) cost $153 million to launch. Hopefully, I won't need to be taking this step for at least 20 more years or so, by which point I'm guesstimating it will be an order of magnitude or so cheaper; hence my $10,000,000 fundraising goal. This is a sum that I obviously could never achieve on my own / without your help, so thank you!

I'm still figuring out what the legal / financial / logistical mechanism(s) to make all this happen after my death are going to look like, ha... But, essentially, I need a contract in place (which can legally be executed post mortem) with a private space travel company (such as Blue Origin or SpaceX) to, upon my death, build and launch some sort of rocket that will get my mortal coil free of the gravity of our Sun. After that, my space coffin (essentially) will carry my soul case to the edge of the Milky Way. Getting my craft to escape our galaxy's gravity is probably out of the question (but things might be different by the time I die.)

The other piece is that I need to have another contract in place with some sort of crack team that will be legally willing & able to retrieve from - potentially - anywhere on Earth, secure, and deliver my dead body to the contracted space flight company.

In order for the crack team to do their job, I’ll have to get a short, clear set of instructions tattooed in some unmissable (by medical professionals) place on my body explaining what to do with it (and, more importantly, what NOT to do with it) in the event of my death.

I will need another contract with a tattoo artist, or perhaps a small group of them, who will be legally able & willing to tattoo my dead body. I should hope the best group of tattoo artists then available, representing all parts of the globe and all traditions in the art form, could comprise those chosen, as the canvas of my skin will be the one representation of that art form to leave our Solar System.

Oh, and my friend "whom knows about this stuff" also mentioned I should probably have myself freeze dried in order to cut down on weight (as lbs = £s), so I’ll need yet another contract with someone(s) legally able & willing to do that to me, lol.. (Unless, of course, the consensus on the part of experts is that it would be better, for whatever reason, that my remains should be preserved undessicated.)

Another expense is going to be all the lawyer hours behind setting up the above… Hm, I’m starting to think I should be asking for /much/ more than $10 million. *crying laughing emoji*

Luckily, because these funds are going to go into some sort of trust that won’t (except for the attorney hours) be invoked until my death, we have (Inshallah!) some time for compound interest to do its thing. *smiling sunglasses emoji*

In regards to the obvious question of “Why on Earth are you doing this?!”, the truest, fullest answer is long and complex, but a lot of the main reasons are:

- Why not do something cool, fun, & outrageous with my cadaver / death? I only get one of each!  : D

- I love Science.

- What better tribute could there be to the defining attribute of Humanity (namely, our ability to reason), and what the application of such has been able to create for and by us (namely, Physics, and thereby, space travel), than getting a complete example of one of us out into the larger Universe, far, far beyond our home planet (not to mention the existence of any trace of our entire species / civilization, should we fail to survive long enough to colonize other parts of space)?

- I am ridiculous and love attention.  : )

- Being buried or cremated, or set adrift on a wooden pyre which is then ignited from the shore with flaming arrows, or left in the woods to rot or be eaten all sound so passé… I mean, everything on Earth has been SO done already!

- Hopefully, some alien species will find me at some point far in the future, and their minds will be blown.  : P

- I’ve always wanted to get a tattoo.

- Because it’s there.

- Because we can.

- Because no one else has thought of it yet (at least, out loud and that I’m aware of : ), and likely very, very few of us would want to do it / have it done to their carcass.)

- I was hoping to also get some updated version of the Arecibo message / the Voyager Golden Records tattooed onto my body; I’m actually suuuper stoked about what we could collectively come up with along those lines these days… *smirking emoji* *rocket emoji* *Starman emoji*

- Is this enough reasons yet for you to realize that I’m being totally serious about this, World?!… : )

Thanks again, everyone, for checking out my Indiegogo, and taking it and me and this dream of mine seriously, and for giving me your support of love, encouragement, sharing with others, and (hopefully) financial backing of any amount! (Everything counts, and we’ll only do this with the help of many, many of us working together.  : )

Thanks Again,

With Love & In All Sincerity,

Graham Arthur Mackenzie 

(click here to learn all about me : )

ps, If any corporations out there want to foot the bill for this entire project, we can put just one big tattoo of your company's logo on my body instead of one each from my Indiegogo backers. Just imagine! Your company's brand, orbiting our galaxy until the end of time! Surely that's worth $10 million?  : D

pps, If the above happens, I'm going to use whatever funds I raise through Indiegogo to take a trip to space while I'm still living.

ppps, Yes, I'm being 100% completely serious.

* Videlicet, the novelty of the proposition, the paucity of relevant data points, the custom nature of my vehicle, the lack of other participants who might potentially lower costs, and the un-straightforward nature of delta-v, inter alia.

story:
Sexy, Stylish and Sleek!

The wait is over. The ROOBSTER is here! We made the bold decision to redesign the conventional e-scooter and make it even better. Check it out for yourself!

 

Oops...No Handle-Bar

Yep, that's right. We got rid of the handlebar. It doesn't make it easier to ride, but a lot more fun! Are you ready for a true #citysurfing experience?

 

What you can achieve is up to you.

 

Performance

 

But don't take our word for it...

 

See what E-sk8 legend Fabi has to say about the ROOBSTER.

 

Intelligent Technology

All e-vehicles were not created equal — and ROOBSTER rises above the rest with four ingenious technological features. 

1. Hands-Free Steering Mechanism

Our patented front-wheel steering allows you to balance and steer by using natural body movements. Honestly, riding the ROOBSTER will make you wish you were this graceful on the dance floor. 

 

2. Hands-Free or Joystick Speed Control

ROOBSTER can be controlled completely hands-free. You’ll be able to easily and smoothly shift between speeds by using the weight sensors embedded within the board. Marked by a plus for acceleration and minus for deceleration, navigating feels like second nature from the first ride.

Optional you can also buy our joystick for more conventional speed control.

 

 

3. Bluetooth Technology

We’re excited to announce the newest upgrade to ROOBSTER: Bluetooth tech. Download the app to control everything — from locking your ROOBSTER, to checking your #CitySurfing stats, to updating it with the newest upgrades — this feature does it all. 

 

4. Mudguard

The detachable snap-on mudguard protects you from splashes from puddles or dirt.

 

Compact and Portable

This was one of our founding principles. Our CEO, Daniel, took a look at all the e-scooters on the market and saw that they were too bulky and clumsy.

We were able to make ROOBSTER 16 pounds, making it one of the lightest e-scooters out there so you can easily integrate it into your daily commute. Or even your next hot date.

 

 

What people say about the ROOBSTER

 

 

Get your first generation ROOBSTER NOW

Finally, your opportunity has come to be a trendsetter around town. You can order your first-generation ROOBSTER right now and be ahead of the game. You'll also have access to an exclusive limited-time discount. But this is an early bird special, so act fast! 

 

Upgrade your ROOBSTER

Yes, you can shred on a ROOBSTER. We created a kick-plate that you can easily attach to the back of your ROOBSTER. Make sure to tag us in your videos at @roobster.io on Instagram — we would love to see what tricks you've got up your sleeve!

 

Help Us Bring ROOBSTER to Market

After developing a fully-functioning prototype we’re now asking you, our community, to help us bring ROOBSTER to the market. We're making some final tweaks so that they're ready to ship in November 2020.

Our funding goal is $30,000 which is enough to get us into the next phase: the production.

We're excited to grow the ROOBSTER community and we'd be thrilled to have you be a part of this fast-growing movement. The journey has just begun — are you in?

 

Team ROOBSTER

Call them nerds, call them geniuses — call them nerd geniuses. You can feel confident in ROOBSTER because of the robust team that’s worked day-and-night to create this state-of-the-art product.

Our CEO, Daniel, studied Robotics and Microtechnology and used to engineer high-end coffee machines before creating an e-scooter.

Then there's our Head of Marketing, Pascal, who discovered his passion for startups and new technology during his time working in Silicon Valley.

Next up is Felix, our Co-Founder, who worked as a battery pack developer for 15 years...

And David — Head of Branding, Communication, and Marketing Campaigns — who coached and worked with start-ups and international brands, like Tesla, for over 15 years.

Hana, our master wordsmith, whose copy mastery is found in our marketing and newsletter campaigns. 

Last but most definitely not least is Karine, partner, backbone and the team's #1 cheerleader: a.k.a. Mrs. ROOBSTER.

 

Swiss Pride, Swiss Quality

In Switzerland, we're all about making things unique and practical, while also maintaining the utmost quality. With our names on this product and a strong vision for changing the future, keeping those core values just makes sense to us.

 

Safety

We've spent a lot of time developing and perfecting the ROOBSTER, but you have to keep in mind that it's a powerful machine and an exciting ride! That means you can still fall and potentially hurt yourself or others. It's better to be safe than sorry, therefore we recommend that you wear a helmet, don't ride beyond your limits and learn to ride the ROOBSTER in a safe environment.

Legality

Street-legality regarding electric vehicles, and electric skateboards, vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the legal status of this product before you ride it.

The first generation ROOBSTER will comply with UL regulations regarding electric propelled scooters. Certifications outside the US will not be regarded.

 

Shipping

We include free delivery within the US (excluding, Hawaii and Alaska) for purchases via Indiegogo. Due to the lithium ion batteries and restrictions on shipping methods, we will require international backers to cover the cost of shipping. We will contact you after you back our project with a purchase to arrange shipping. International backers will also be responsible for all duties, customs fees, and taxes for their orders.  

 

Are You Ready to Ride?

There's still so much to discover about this new wave of transportation and we're stoked that you're coming along for the #CitySurfing ride.

We have many more plans for the future and many more things to learn along the way, too.

So that's why it's important for us to hear from you guys — our loyal supporters who are making all of this possible.

So now it's your time to show off — bust out some tricks, have races, create challenges. It's time to get creative and help form the passionate and progressive ROOBSTER community.

story:
Collins Family Cycle & Sidecar Campaign

My name is John Collins. For the past five years I have lived with wife, Sue and son, Christian near Chiang Mai, Thailand. We have been ministering as missionary volunteers with McKean Senior Center, just south of Chiang Mai. Primarily, our work has been with elder care at Dok Kaew Gardens, an assisted care facility on the grounds of McKean.  Sue is a nurse and develops care plans for the residents, while I, John, assist in a social service capacity. We both minister in long-term and hospice care roles.  Traveling into town and on extended trips is not possible with a single motorcycle. Therefore, we feel the best and most economical means to achieve this, is by cycle with attached sidecar!  ( See images above)  This is where YOU come in.  Your contribution to this Campaign can make our Dream.....a REALITY!

Rewards & Perks

We have entered this Campaign with a goal in mind.  We aim to raise $ 2,000 (USD) toward funding our CYCLE/SIDECAR.  As a contributor toward our goal, you will be eligible to receive special REWARDS!  Sue produces unique, one-of-a-kind, HANDCRAFTED Wire Jewelry.  These bracelets, necklaces, rings, earrings and pendants-- are not only special....they will add P!ZAZZ to any collection!  Additionally, donors may qualify to receive one of my Photo-Prints of Thai Life & Culture. These splendid images show the The Thai Way and what is Uniquely Thai in Rich Prints, bursting with color.  Truly keepsakes of a culture steeped in tradition;  SIAM.....Land of Enchantment!

YOUR gift Today can have a Lasting IMPACT on the Future of Our Family and our MINISTRY here in Thailand.  Understandably, there may be some risks involved in giving.  It is our hope and more importantly, our BELIEF, that the BENEFITS....Far Outweigh the risks.  Life is Too SHORT!  Over the years,  I have come to understand that GIVING BACK can become a "Way of LIFE."  Our hope is that YOU will "invest" in this important Campaign and make a difference TODAY!  Thank You for INVESTING in Us to make Our Dream a REALITY.....and may God Bless You  today and long into the future!

YOUR gift Today can have a Lasting IMPACT on the Future of Our Family and our MINISTRY here in Thailand.  Understandably, there may be some risks involved in giving.  It is our hope and more importantly, our BELIEF, that the BENEFITS....Far Outweigh the risks.  Life is Too SHORT!  Over the years,  I have come to understand that GIVING BACK can become a "Way of LIFE."  Our hope is that YOU will "invest" in this important Campaign and make a difference TODAY!  Thank You for INVESTING in Us to make Our Dream a REALITY.....and may God Bless You  today and long into the future!

story:
Short Summary

We (Jurre, Norman and Gerrit-Jan) teamed up after a rough but meaningful ride from designing to developing and eventually producing the zero series of BAZZKET. It took us about two years to make it to this point. BAZZKET was tested very intensive and proves to be exactly wat we wanted it to be from start.

  • A lot has happened since our zero series of BAZZKET was ready for testing. Now the road is free to introduce it to the world.
  • Looking for the world to be a better place, not only in  design but also environmentally, Bazzket is for us a major step in that direction. With your help we are looking forward to a great leap into a future of CO2 neutral transportation.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The goal is to raise €30.000, so BAZZKET can be produced in quantities that keep the price right with a high standard in quality.

  • When we hit our funding goal properly, the production of BAZZKET will start. Prototyping has been done and BAZZKET also has been tested intensively. So our team is ready and set to take BAZZKET to the next level. We strive to remain the fair retail-price of €95,00 for the colors black, white and silver. The first 100 backers will get an even better price!! This is why our first edition should sell at least 500 units.

  • Check the perks for early adopters!!

Risks & Challenges

Time and effort have already been invested in the designing, developing, prototyping and testing BAZZKET. By having done all that, risk level is reduced to a minimum. 

The factory, responsible for the production of our zero-series, has proved to be a confident partner by making prototypes of excellent quality.

So we are ready for manufacturing and powder coating BAZZKET in large numbers.

Deliverable on time in standard colors; black, white and silver. 
Custom colors can be delivered on request.

With your help, BAZZKET will be soon on every cyclist's wishlist.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help us in other ways, we're also very grateful.

Please like us on Facebook and spread the word!!

story:
EMWIN Receiver

I have been a weather nut for as long as I can remember.  Why I didn't major in meteorology, I don't know.  I am also very active in emergency response and emergency communications.  Quite often, these two worlds crash together violently.
 
The Internet has become an excellent source of weather data, forecasts, and warnings.  But what if you are in the large areas of the United States that are not serviced by allways-on broadand internet?  How do you get up-to-the-minute data and warnings? The answer is satellite.
 
NOAA transmits a low-rate data service called EMWIN (Emergency Managers Weather Information Network) via their GOES satellite system.  In this data stream are all of the warnings that are issued by the NWS and NHC, along with forecasts, and simple low-resolution imagery.
 
Commercial systems exist to receive these systems, but they are expensive.  A base system that connects to a Windows system costs $2000, and that is without the cost of the actual computer system.  My aim is to deliver a similar system in the $200-300 range or less while delivering extra functionality.

What do I need funding for?

First of all, I need an antenna system.  I also need to purchase the components to breadboard the first generation of receiver.  Finally, once the design is verified, I will need to order the first batch of PCBs and components to build the first production receivers.

Why am I doing this?

I am designing this system to put the information within the reach of even the most basic of weather hobbyists as well as any emergency operations origanization that doesn't have a huge budget.

story:
FlowDot is a new product line of MYATU. 

We decided to build this new brand to show the customer our new design directly through the retail market. We believe its uniqueness would be attractive to people who dare to change and want to lead the newest fashion in the eBike industry. 

We have factories in Europe and China, and we've never sold FlowDot eBike on other platforms before. The price on the Indiegogo platform is factory retail price, which is ONLY for our Early Backers. 

 

Here you are, the First Glow-In-The-Dark, One-Piece Magnesium Alloy Frame eBike! With the Bafang Motor, 7-speed gearing Shimano, 6-speed boost, Tektro Disc Brake and up to 38 miles of Battery Range, you’ll never break a sweat from your bike commuting to work again! Weighing merely 41Lbs means you’ll never struggle on carrying it through stairs! Cycling with security even during the darkest nights: FlowDot eBike's body includes a central warning ring that glows in the dark - keep you safe and noticed. 

✅ One-Piece Magnesium Alloy Frame

✅ Light Ring for Safer Riding

✅ 250W Bafang Motor, 36V 7.2Ah Panasonic Battery, Range Up To 38 Miles

✅ Shimano 7-Speed Transmissions, TEKTRO Mechanic Disc Brake

✅ Works As A Variable-Speed Bike When It's Out Of Battery

Review Video By ElectrifiedReviews

 

FlowDot applies high-qualified AM60b Magnesium Alloy Frame that contributes to the characteristics of damping and durability. This material has made the structure of the eBike integrated without welding joints that eBikes made of aluminium alloy frame typically have. This integrated magnesium alloy structure is one of our patented features.

 

 

Following is what makes our FlowDot EBike standing out from all of the other similar eBikes.

 

Luminous Ring: Just one click on the LCD screen, the blue light warning ring will be on. With the added-on light in the middle, others can notice you in the dark. The outstanding appearance reinforces your safety when cycling at nights. 

 

Revolutionary 360 Night View Visualization 

FlowDot Urban Bike employs a central warning light in the middle to reinforce people’s safety while cycling at nights.

 

FlowDot applies one-piece magnesium alloy frame. Compared with MATE's structure on the right, FlowDot's structure is more sleeky without all of the welding points marked on the picture. Based on the vibration test we've done for the one-piece magnesium alloy frame, it's capable of vibrating 100,000 times in general. 

 

 

With 250 Watt high speed and the brushless feature, the motor has a 95% conversion rate, which contributes to a 30% higher performance than conventional engines. Motors with this high efficiency can extend the length of riding distance and reduce energy consumption to a large extent. FlowDot applies Myatu Motor with FlowDot eBike while Bafang Motor with FlowDot Pro eBike. BAFANG Motor is lighter than conventional motors, and it is within the high-quality range.

 

FlowDot eBike uses Myatu Battery, while the FlowDot Pro eBike applies Panasonic battery. Both of the FlowDot eBike and the FlowDot Pro eBike are with the range up to 38 miles. 

 

Both of the FlowDot eBike and the FlowDot Pro eBike can be fully charged in 2-3hours. 

 

Where Is The Battery？

Batteries are hidden in the appearance of eBikes. In terms of FlowDot, the transom of the bike conceals the battery. It can be easily disassembled when needed to be charged. 

 

FlowDot applies rear suspension to make the eBike comfortable and to prolong the cycling period. The rear suspension within the type of structure is one of our patented features.

 

FlowDot eBike is rain-proof. The material of FlowDot eBike is Magnesium Alloy Frame, and all the wires are under the frame without being exposed to the external environment. Therefore, the eBike is safe no matter being applied under sunshine or in raindrops. 

 

FLOWDOT designs its products with flexibility in mind. You can ride it like a regular bike using the 7-speed Shimano gear system or take advantage of its powerful electrical system. Enjoy up to 250 Watt* of electric motor power, which can take you from 0 to 25 kmh/15.5 mph in a matter of seconds.

 

Bike Size

FlowDot eBikes are currently under production! We've done first small serial production in July and we've been doing testing since this March in 2019! 

 

Come and get the first Glow-In-The-Dark eBike with the most affordable price!

 

 

We are continuously improving both the eBike and our own performance.

 

We respect and listen to your opinions, giving constant feedback in our Facebook Group and we truly develop this eBike based on your opinion!

In short, this bike is made by each one of you!  

By doing this, we hope to make the BEST eBike for Everyone! 

 

 

Our manufactory team is from Poland in Europe and Guangzhou Province in China. We are here producing and assembling your FlowDot eBike!

Apart from them,  our technological team had done the testing and prototyping of your FlowDot eBike and our supporting team is here for any problem you may have with this bike!

 

We‘d love to hear from you! Come and join us!

story:
The innovative design of BikerTop® allows instant opening and closing – very similar to the functionality of an umbrella. Within a few moments and simple movements, cyclists can quickly protect themselves from adverse weather. Our Research and Development team have engineered BikerTop® to ensure that cyclists are protected.

 

Features

 

BikerTop®’s weigh is 3 kg (6,6 lb). 

 

BikerTop® bag measures 50 cm x 30 cm x 10cm. (19,6 in x 11,8 in x 3,9 in)

 

BikerTop® remains on the bicycle and can be secured with a key and kept protected from theft.

BikerTop® does not fear the adverse conditions, the materials are durable and resistant. 

Nylon 210
Polyamide 100% with coating PU – Poliurethane 

Transparent windshield: Polyiurethane thickness 200 my 

Side Wings:Mesh PVC/PES
lightweight mesh elasticized jersey armor 

Polyester belt 15-20 mm. 

Polypropylene belt 30 mm. 

Velcro loop polyamide 20-25 mm. 

Zipper nylon with polyurethane film tape 

Reflective belt glass micro beads 

When it rains the transparent windshield visibility is similar to that of a scooter or a vespa windshield. Windshield wipers are not used on BikerTop®, just like they are not used on most scooter windshields. Hoods from ponchos or umbrellas can limit the rider’s visibility and often create dangerous situations. By shielding the face (and glasses) of the rider, BikerTop® creates a safer riding experience with better visibility while allowing the rider to move quickly in every weather condition.

BikerTop® is extremely solid and is built to withstand the wind. From our tests on the streets and in labs we have noticed how the wind has no particular impact on the stability of the bicycle.

 

they can be stored up to 4 kg (8,8 lb), keeping your items out of the rain.

BikerTop® keeps the bike light running, to let you enjoy the city without risks.

The BikerTop® came out as an idea from a group of friends in Italy, who started developing it in a garage 5 years ago.

The idea took form passing through different concepts and stages. The design and also the technical solutions were refined during different tests in laboratories and on the streets.

We founded a startup company in Italy called Smart Mobility Solutions, based in the Alps region, to develop the project.

The BikerTop® was presented at some important events such as the EUROBIKE trade fair in Germany and the Maker-Fair in Rome in order to get valuable feedback from experts and potential customers.

This feedback helped us to refine the product and to arrive at the final version.

We passed through difficult moments during the development process. The last one was the Coronavirus emergency in Italy exactly when we expected to launch our product.

We’ve never given up and we’ve continued to believe in our project and in our dream to bring this innovative solution to light.

This innovative technical solution has been recently patented.

Other types of covers already exist in the marketplace, released in the past few years, but this is the only system that allows instant opening and closing. Just like what we do when we walk down the street and it starts to rain, we take out our umbrella, open it and when it stops raining we close it. This is all done with few and simple movements.

 

Our Team

story:
Not just another e-bike conversion kit!

A tool built for carrying cargo. Easily carry 30 kg/66 lbs for up to 60 km/37 mi.

No need to buy an expensive cargo bike. Use your existing bicycle instead. 

What is the CargoDrive?

The CargoDrive comes as a complete package that can easily transform your bicycle into an electric cargo bike.

It is designed to carry things, such as bulky packages, bags, groceries, toolboxes or anything up to 30kg. 

How it works

1. It mounts on your bicycle by removing your front wheel, then installing your bike into the CargoDrive using the fork dropouts as locators. 

2. Secure the CargoDrive by tightening the universal clamps.

3. Connect the loading surface, display and other cables and you are ready to ride.

 

Technical Specification

Power - 250 Watt Brushless Motor

Cargo Load Capacity - 30 kg/66 lbs (For best handling)

Cargo Volume - 45 x 45 x 60 cm (L x W x H)

Frame Material - 6060 Aluminium

Top Speed Pedal-Assisted - 25km/h (15mph)

Top Speed with Throttle - 32km/h (20mph)

Battery - Lithium-Ion 36V 10.4 Ah

Range - Up to 60km (37mi)

Charging Time - 3hrs 0-100% (220V)

Rated Battery Life - 1000 Cycles to 90% original capacity

Warranty - 2 Years Warranty

 

Why did we make the CargoDrive?

We are an international team who met in Copenhagen, a land well known for the use of bicycles in everyday life. The benefits of this means of transportation really hit home after living here a few years but we couldn't help trying to do more with our bikes.

We started this project to help you get more from your bicycle. With this easy to install addition to your bicycle, we believe you will find your bike more useful than ever before.

The simple combination of a strong cargo rack with an integrated electric system in an easy to install package will make your bicycle a very appealing choice of transportation for many applications.

Why are we crowdfunding and what does your contribution mean to us?

We started this crowdfunding campaign as we are a small startup and we need more funding to start production at a more accessible price and make it available on an international scale. 

In addition to getting production up and running, this campaign will help us develop more accessories to make the CargoDrive even more useful and grow our team to prepare the CargoDrives for you.

Our Goal

We have set a fixed target of 400 CargoDrives sold to ensure that we can deliver the product in a time and quality which we will be proud of. If this goal is not met, all backers will receive their funds back into their account and we will not be able to go into production.

The Perks

For the brave amongst you, we are offering the first 100 CargoDrives at a significant discount. The following 100 CargoDrive backers will also receive a discount. The following CargoDrive backers will still receive a small discount.

Stretch Goals

The more backers support us will mean the more we can offer all CargoDrive backers. If we reach 500 CargoDrives sold we will include a pair of HUSKY Bike Tech Dual Action G-hooks. If we reach 1000 CargoDrives sold we will be able to offer wireless PAS systems for all backers. 

The Impact

This campaign helps us realise our goal of helping you get more done with your bike. We believe that making cycling more practical and appealing will bring great benefits to you financially and your wellbeing but also to society at large.

Fewer people driving means less congestion and less pollution. More people cycling means fewer hospital visits and stress on the health care system. This device allows you to make your contribution. 

Risks & Challenges

To mitigate risks with supplier shortages and shipping delays we have taken the following measures: 

- All electronic parts have been specified and prepared with our supplier before the campaign. The design is also compatible with multiple suppliers should our preferred supplier face difficulty in delivering the product.

- The structural elements will be produced in Europe due to reduced shipping time and reduced pollution associated with shipping. 

- Final assembly will be conducted in house to ensure the highest level of quality of what is fundamentally a new product with no existing standard practices. 

On top of all this, we have a strong team of experienced people both in-house and who we work with already. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that for many this product may seem like a great idea but it doesn't suit your needs or situation. 

If you would like to help our cause it would be extremely valuable for us if you share this campaign with others. You can see the social media links at the top of the page.

Thank you for taking the time to hear our story and see what we have to share with you.

From the HUSKY Bike Team,

Keep on rolling!

The simple combination of a strong cargo rack with an integrated electric system in an easy to install package will make your bicycle a very appealing choice of transportation for many applications.
Why are we crowdfunding and what does your contribution mean to us?

We started this crowdfunding campaign as we are a small startup and we need more funding to start production at a more accessible price and make it available on an international scale. 
In addition to getting production up and running, this campaign will help us develop more accessories to make the CargoDrive even more useful and grow our team to prepare the CargoDrives for you.
Our Goal
We have set a fixed target of 400 CargoDrives sold to ensure that we can deliver the product in a time and quality which we will be proud of. If this goal is not met, all backers will receive their funds back into their account and we will not be able to go into production.
The Perks
For the brave amongst you, we are offering the first 100 CargoDrives at a significant discount. The following 100 CargoDrive backers will also receive a discount. The following CargoDrive backers will still receive a small discount.
Stretch Goals
The more backers support us will mean the more we can offer all CargoDrive backers. If we reach 500 CargoDrives sold we will include a pair of HUSKY Bike Tech Dual Action G-hooks. If we reach 1000 CargoDrives sold we will be able to offer wireless PAS systems for all backers. 

The Impact
This campaign helps us realise our goal of helping you get more done with your bike. We believe that making cycling more practical and appealing will bring great benefits to you financially and your wellbeing but also to society at large.
Fewer people driving means less congestion and less pollution. More people cycling means fewer hospital visits and stress on the health care system. This device allows you to make your contribution. 

Risks & Challenges
To mitigate risks with supplier shortages and shipping delays we have taken the following measures: 
- All electronic parts have been specified and prepared with our supplier before the campaign. The design is also compatible with multiple suppliers should our preferred supplier face difficulty in delivering the product.
- The structural elements will be produced in Europe due to reduced shipping time and reduced pollution associated with shipping. 
- Final assembly will be conducted in house to ensure the highest level of quality of what is fundamentally a new product with no existing standard practices. 
On top of all this, we have a strong team of experienced people both in-house and who we work with already. 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that for many this product may seem like a great idea but it doesn't suit your needs or situation. 
If you would like to help our cause it would be extremely valuable for us if you share this campaign with others. You can see the social media links at the top of the page.
Thank you for taking the time to hear our story and see what we have to share with you.
From the HUSKY Bike Team,
Keep on rolling!

story:
Tideline has been operating a commuter ferry service between the Berkeley Marina and Pier 1.5 since March 2017.

We have received many requests to extend our service to other location in San Francisco.  Our riders have described our service as....

"a life changing experience"

"a favorite part of the day"

"refreshing and invigorating" 

Tideline would like more people to experience a friendly, fast and affordable commute, that is why we are crowdfunding more lines of service between Berkeley and San Francisco

We are pre-selling monthly passes at $325 and one Roundtrip Tickets at $9.  We need $7,000 to launch, but more importantly we need committed riders to keep the service going.

Here is the proposed schedule:

Berkeley Departures:                                                     San Francisco Departures:

7:45am and 8:45am                                                                   8:15am and 9:15am

4:15pm and 5:15pm                                                                   4:45pm and 5:45pm

 

Each one-way trip takes 25-30 minutes between the Berkeley Marina and Pier 40, South Beach District of San Francisco (including boarding and disembarking). Riders board at the K Dock at Berkeley Marina in front of Harbormaster’s office (next to Hana Japan Restaurant). The Berkeley Marina is on bus line 81, which goes to UC Berkeley, BART, and the Berkeley Capitol Corridor Amtrak Station. Our riders are also permitted to park for free across the street in the South Sailing Basin gravel parking lot near the UC Aquatic Center.

We have been so lucky to receive so much support for our service.  Tideline appreciates you sharing our campaign on social outlets like Facebook, Twitter and even Next Door.  Everybody deserves a great commute.

story:
Forteon is seeking funding from multiple sources to bring a fully functional prototype to the crash testing stage. We are seeking funding from crowdfunding platforms and traditional investors as well as using our own funds to make this happen. We are in talks with equity investors and we are also using our own personal funds to support the project.

According to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, motorcycle riders are 28 times more likely to die in a crash than occupants of passenger vehicles. It's no surprise that motorcyclists are often referred to as "organ donors" or "donor-cyclers" in hospital emergency rooms. 

As motorcycle riders ourselves, we understand the risks that we take stepping onto our bikes. No matter how safe that you try to be, you can't control those around you. Our goal is to save lives and reduce debilitating injuries for riders.  

This technology has the potential to save lives. There is a high probability that each of you has had a friend or family member hurt in a motorcycle crash. Let's put an end to this! Please help us make the road a safer place for motorcycle riders.

Every dollar counts!

 

What others are saying about Airbag for Bike:

"2 years ago I had such a crash. Now I am partially paralyzed from waist down. This would have saved me."  

"If this could save even one life, it would be worth it! It's not a matter of IF you fall, it's a matter of WHEN!" 

"All bikers need this. They never know when their time may come. Too many dying on the roads these days."

 

The Concept

What is Airbag for Bike by Forteon?

Airbag for Bike is a revolutionary motorcycle safety system which deploys an airbag that surrounds the rider. 

The motorcycle ejection airbag incorporates a belt system that is designed to be less intrusive than a seatbelt in a car. There's no need for a special jacket or complicated gear. The rider simply attaches the lap belt on the motorcycle and is ready to ride safely. Using smart electromagnetic technology, the buckles on the rider automatically release if the rider wants to jump off of the motorcycle in a low risk scenario. The motorcycle ejection airbag system also knows not to deploy if the rider is not in serious danger. 

The buckle does not strap the rider to the seat, but rather, incase of an accident, the straps gently hold the airbag to the rider while it forms a protective cocoon around him. 

The airbag stays inflated for a couple of seconds after the accident and then deflates to allow the passenger to move to a safe location.

We are currently in the prototyping phase and need funding to create our first fully functional demo prototype.

 

Prototype: Work in Progress

Our prototyping is currently in the preliminary phase and we have so far developed a prototype with sensors, a preliminary inflation system and rudimentary airbags. The early prototype uses CO2 canisters whereas the fully functional prototype will use a solid propellant or hybrid system. 

 

The shape of the final airbags will encompass the entire body of the rider.

 

Please view our patent in .pdf file below. 

https://patentimages.storage.googleapis.com/2d/...

US patent: #9622520

European: #2958795

 

The funding received will go towards developing the prototype.  Funding above our goal will go towards the development, crash testing, and licensing and production of the airbag.

 

For more information please visit:

forteon.com

airbagforbike.com

or contact us at:

info@forteon.com

info@airbagforbike.com

 

Notice: Our goal is to support as many bike models as possible, but due to each unique motorcycle design, not all makes/models will be supported. Perks are non-refundable contributions and do not guarantee that supporter will be able to purchase airbag.
