story:
"Know your dream of ultra - light electric skateboard" - ABC

"I'm really shocked, it's how light" - JACK

"We took a new Eagle hunting wind spin, which was amazing! - Tianying Tech

"An impressive technology" -  Tianying Technology

"With impressive specs like a 22 mile range and navigation capabilities, the [Eagle hunting wind] Travel board just may be a board like no other."- Tianying, Tech on a Budget

“It’s fast. These hills are big. If they can handle these hills, they can handle anything. It’s too easy.”- DAVID

“This is the board you’re looking for!…It doesn’t feel cheap, and it’s definitely not a toy. Even if your battery dies, you can use it as a traditional skateboard. Practically weightless compared to other e-skateboards that can weigh up to 30lbs."- Ruifeng, Tech on a Budget

Lean Forward to Go. Lean Back to Stop.

After your first ride, you'll realize that there is nothing else in the world quite like it! Even if you've never ridden a skateboard before, the Eagle hunting wind’s intuitive control will have you carving in no time with its weight-sensing foot pads. Speed control is completely variable – cruise at walking speed or race to its top speed of 20 miles per hour.

Leaning back kicks in regenerative braking, meaning you can safely descend hills while also recharging the battery.

Eagle hunting wind | The World's Most Portable & Intelligent eBoard

Eagle hunting wind is the first and only eBoard with an ever-learning ABS braking, and interactive app control.

With built-in pressure and gyro sensors, Eagle hunting wind learns your body's movements and riding style for a revolutionary ride.

Eagle hunting wind's electric skateboards have great range and grade capabilities, AND are affordable. Everything you want in one incredible board.

Eagle hunting wind: Interest and Sport

The Eagle hunting wind comes in two models:

the Interest Edition (16 miles/charge, 7.6KG.) and Sport Edition (25 miles/charge, 7.9KG.).

With a range that is two, three, or even four times the range of other electric skateboards on the market, the Eagle hunting wind will have you riding without any concern of running out of juice.

Eagle hunting wind’s innovations in adjustable acceleration are an industry first.

Choose from 0-100% in the Eagle hunting wind for a tailored riding experience.

Brushless Motor, Natural Coasting

Our Sport Edition new 500W brushless motor is faster, more powerful, and more efficient than previous Eagle hunting wind motors. The brushless design allows for more natural coasting, allowing you to push the Eagle hunting wind when the battery expires or is turned off.

Battery Meter and Speed Charger

The Eagle hunting wind’s power button is surrounded by a multi-color LED ring that changes colors as the battery diminishes.

Eagle hunting wind’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control puts power in the palm of your hand.

Tackle tough climbs with Eagle hunting wind's impressive grade capabilities.

Eagle hunting wind’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control gives you the power at your fingertips.

Grab and Go Anywhere: Lightweight and Splashproof

By using waterproof connectors the Eagle hunting wind can be ridden on wet surfaces without fear of damage to the electronics. Though the board mechanically can handle water exposure, we do not recommend riding in the rain due to potential rusting of components and loss of traction.

Featuring a lightweight 100kg design and two integrated handles,Eagle hunting wind’s ergonomic design makes it easy to pick up, carry, and store. Speed up your commute, forget about parking, & enjoy running errands with the most portable electric vehicle on the market!

With the Eagle hunting wind Travel Board, ride in style with 7 customizable undercarriage lights.

Navigate traffic safely with ease with Eagle hunting wind front and rear LED lights, brake lights, and turn signals.

See and Be Seen

The Eagle hunting wind’s LED headlights and taillights are the brightest integrated lights of any personal electric vehicle. These hi-power LEDs have three modes – on, off and blinking – which the rider can choose depending on the situation.  You’ll turn heads as these LEDs make it easier for you to see the road and for the road to see you.

Using high-quality, industry-grade materials, Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards are built to last and keep you safe. CE&ROHS certification pending.

Our Eagle hunting windr Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. For the Travel & Racer only.

Eagle hunting wind’s charger recharges from 0-100% in approximately 90 minutes. It is 110v - 240v ready and will work in the US, Asia, Europe, Australia, and more.

With 3 easy steps, the product is simple to set up and intuitive to use.

Quality. Safety. Durability. Eagle hunting wind electric skateboard motors are IPX6 waterproof rated so you can ride with confidence.

Quality

From the trucks, to motors, batteries and control boards, every piece of the Eagle hunting wind board went through countless revisions to strengthen and fine tune. Our maple/bamboo deck was designed with a high level of flex ( a  boards  natural suspension) to deliver a smooth cruising experience.

After over a year of development, we are extremely pleased with what Eagle hunting wind has become today. 

Components and parts are readily available and have been designed as user replaceable to ensure your board is always rockin.

Affordable

This was the driving factor that kept us focused while creating Eagle hunting wind. There was yet to be a quality board available at an affordable price.

We kept our team small, our overhead low. Removed unnecessary and cost bloating features such as flashy lights and carbon fiber decks.

We kept the design pure and crafted an exceptional riding experience.

Highly Weather Resistant

Born and raised in Hong Kong, you learn to adapt to the ever-changing weather. Eagle hunting wind is no exception :).

A board that couldn't handle a little water, or a mid-day shower didn't really work for us.

For this reason, we sealed the motors inside the wheels and sealed up all the edges.

You won't want to take your board swimming, but it CAN handle a lot. We battle tested the Eagle hunting wind board in the harsh conditions of Hong Kong taking on puddles, slush, and even snow.

Similar though to a regular skateboard, if you do get your components wet, you will want to dry them off when you are done riding to avoid rust and damaging bearings ;)

Urban Commuting Just Got Easier

The Eagle hunting wind's compact deck and handles make it easy bring on a train or to throw into the trunk of an Uber. The large, soft wheels make the board perfect for poor city pavement. And lastly, the inclusion of headlights and tail lights will help other drivers, pedestrians, and bicyclists see you at busy intersections at low light.

Traveling? Bring your Riptide

The Eagle hunting wind comes with a precisely engineered battery capacity that is within the range of TSA guidelines. Once you're past security the small size and handles make the Eagle hunting wind a breeze to transport through the terminal or to check into the overhead compartment.

The Perfect Addition to Your Electric Skateboard Quiver

Everyone who rides an electric skateboard knows it more fun to ride with friends (or your wife / husband / kid / grandma / etc). With a Riptide as your second board now you've got something they can ride at a competitive price that can actually keep up with more premium boards.

A Serious Drive Train

The Eagle hunting wind's 2500W dual belt drive train means it can scream off the line up to the top speed of 35 mph and power up hills unlike any other board its size.

Unrivaled Portability

At only 7.6KG with a After folding 500MM deck, dual handles, and an airline-friendly, and <120Wh battery, you can easily bring the Eagle hunting wind wherever your travels take you.

Premium Longboard Components

With the Eagle hunting wind our goal was a fast, fun ride while maintaining portability and we didn't mind adding a pound or two getting there. Thus the board has 275mm wide trucks and comes with the large diameter.

Ride for Miles and Miles

With up-to-an 25 miles of range in real world conditions and an optional fast charger that recharges the board in just 120 mins, you'll be able to park your car for the weekend and not touch it til Monday.

Ride All Night

Optional Headlights and Tail Lights provided by Shredlights can be set to "On," "Blink," or "High Beam," meaning you can ride all night and be seen by everyone around you.

About us

Based in hongkong, our team is made up of electrical, mechanical, and manufacturing engineers who share a love for extreme sports. We are incredibly excited to implement  the Eagle hunting wind. Funds from this project will go towards finalizing design, tooling, testing, and more. We are excited to have you as a customer and we can’t wait to get you riding the Eagle hunting wind: The Most Advanced Electric Skateboard ever!

Feel free to reach out with any questions to tiany_tech@163.com

 

 

What is it?

Eagle hunting wind Tech offers the most innovative, powerful, and affordable electric skateboard models available on the market.

Who created it?

Eagle hunting wind Tech, a startup based in Hong Kong, providing world class technology to power smart electric mobility products that are efficient, durable, and affordable.

Why should we use it?

Cut traffic and get to work *that* much easier. Pure joy, adrenaline, and enjoyment.

Travel faster, ride farther, and spend less money than with anything else on the market!

Where can we buy it?

Right here, right now on Indiegogo.

What do we get when we order?

Electric Skateboard of Your Choice, Bluetooth Remote Control, , Charger with Detachable Cord, T-Tool, Micro USB Cable, User's Manual, Advanced User Bushings (Travel & Racer only).

Why are you crowdfunding?

To offer our earliest supporters the best prices possible. We're excited to bring Eagle hunting wind's technology to Indiegogo and beyond!

 

What features are available?     

Interest: An iconic look with a modern upgrade. For the traditionalist who enjoys a boost.

Single hub motor and an IPX6 waterproof rating

Minimal resistance from motor, allowing riders to push the board like a normal skateboard

Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning

15-mile range with top speeds reaching 18 mph

Battery recharges in 2-2.5 hours

 

Sport: Cutting-edge tech and efficiency in one durable board with industry-leading range. The all-around solution for the modern commuter who needs some speed.

Dual hub motors with an IPX6 waterproof rating

Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning, top deck LED lights for GPS navigation and under carriage lights available in 7 colors

25-mile range on up to a 20% incline with top speeds reaching 35 mph

Removable battery that recharges in 2-3 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

What sizes do you offer?     

Interest:

Measurements:

862 x 265 x 150 in size.

500 x 275 x 150 in Folding.

7.6KG in weight 

 

Sport:

Measurements:

862 x 275 x 150 in size.

500 x 275 x 170 in Folding.

7.9KG in weight 

How does the Handheld Bluetooth Remote work?      

Eagle hunting wind Bluetooth Remotes are easily re-pairable within seconds. This means you can use any of our bluetooth remotes for any of our boards, at any time.

How does the Quick Swap Battery work?      

Our Eagle hunting wind Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. Power down the Eagle hunting wind electric skateboard first, remove the thumb screw to remove the battery door, disconnect the existing battery and swap it out with the charged battery. Place the door back on and lock down with thumb screw. You're ready to get rolling again! Travel & Racer board batteries are interchangeable between the two boards. *For Travel & Racer boards only.

What is the hardness rating of the wheels?

Eagle hunting wind wheels are rated 86A Durometer.

Which option is best for me?  

The most popular board is the Sport Board. For all you longboarders out there, you'll love the interest Board. If you feel the need to do an ollie, the interest Board is for you.

 

what is the uniqueness of the technology?

Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards are faster, far more affordable, and much more powerful than competitor models.

It includes the best of everything in an electric skateboard--in three great models. Eagle hunting wind quick swap batteries also get you back on the road in under 60 seconds. Industry-leading torque control. IPX6 Waterproof Motors. Durable materials. Powerful hub motors. Designed with safety in mind.

How far can I go before recharging the battery? How to charge?   

Interest: 15-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Sport: 25-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-3 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards come with a charger and detachable cord.

How does it work?

Eagle hunting wind's hub motor(s) are controlled by a handheld bluetooth remote control.

What kind of sensors are you using?

Gyroscope sensors control Eagle hunting wind's lights. Sensors in the hub motors that is programmed through complex software.

Will there be updates to it in the future?

Over-the-air (OTA) updates will be continual to improve the product.

What kind of braking system do Eagle hunting wind boards have?    

Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards feature hub motors with regenerative braking. This helps to conserve battery life and gives you a bit more distance when riding. Also, while traveling downhill and braking, you'll get some energy back into the battery.

Is it waterproof?   

Eagle hunting wind's IPX6 waterproof rating enable riders to stay safe, even in less-than-ideal riding conditions. Eagle hunting wind encourages all riders to always wear a helmet.

Where is it manufactured?    

Manufacturing: Shenzhen, China. R&D, refinement, testing: HONGKONG.

 

How do I set it up?      

Turn on your board, turn on remote, and go! Board can pair with smart device, with bluetooth enabled.

How do I turn it on and off?

Use the power button on both the electric skateboard and remote.

How do I control it?    

The handheld bluetooth remote control.

What is the care and cleaning of it?      

Board doesn't require much cleaning. Remote can be cleaned with cloth towel and mild soap & water.

Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable?    

No.

Does it have an expiry date?      

No.

 

What are the recommend ages?

Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards are for 16+ is the minimum age. Young adults or older.

Where can I use it?      

Ride Eagle hunting wind outdooors, along streets, sidewalks, or smooth flat roads.

Is it safe?

Yes, but Eagle hunting wind boards require safety attention and learning to control. Eagle hunting wind encourages all riders to wear a helmet at all times.

What certifications do you have?

US:  FCC EU: CE Common: ROHS

How durable is it?

Eagle hunting wind boards are made with Canadian Maple Wood and are IPX6 waterproof-rated for the motors. Metal battery case.

 

When does shipping begin?

November 2017.

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?   

November 2017.

Where does it ship?    

Worldwide.

How much is shipping?

Free US shipping. $99 worldwide.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

Fantastic! Please reach out at Tiany_tech@163.com

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?     

VAT & GST are not included in purchase price.

 

What is your refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return / exchange policy?   

If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.

How do I choose more than one reward?

To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.

Why do I have to wait longer than usual?   

This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build Eagle hunting wind, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.

If I have other questions, who should I contact? 

for any additional Customer Service needs, please contact Tiany_tech@163.com  (available 9AM to 6PM M-F PST).

 

Q: What is the width of each board?

A: Eagle hunting wind: 265MM 

 

Q: What is the speed mode in the app specific mean?

A: you can switch 3 different speed mode, basically, only the Top Speed is different. Beginner: ~ 18 mph   Sport: ~ 28 mph   Pro：~ 38 mph * 

 

Q: Is the Eagle hunting wind waterproof?

A: All Eagle hunting wind models are weather/water resistant, but do not fully submerge any board.

 

Q: What could I do if my Eagle hunting wind runs out of battery?

A: Because all Eagle hunting wind models use in-hub motor systems, you can easily ride them just like a regular skateboard when the battery runs out, without feeling any resistance from hub motors.

If you ride long enough, the Regenerative Braking technology will recharge your Eagle hunting wind.

 

Q. Can I bring the Eagle hunting wind on airplanes or check-in?

A: Eagle hunting wind's battery is within 120wh, which is the international limitation of battery products in airplane and it should be a carry-on.

It also depends on the policy of local airports. Normally, domestic flights allow bringing such an electric product with motors while some of international flights do not.

Please check with the airport and airline before you fly with Eagle hunting wind.

 

Q. Do I have to wear a helmet when I ride Eagle hunting wind?

A: We would really recommend wearing a helmet, even if your state or country laws does not require it.

Like we always insist, safety comes first!

 

Q. Is there any other color could I pick?

A: If you are talking about Eagle hunting wind, we have the Interest Edition and Sport Edition，With wases yellow and flame red can be selected。

 

Q. Can I pay by installments?

A: Sorry, we do not accept installments at the current stage in production.

 

Q. Where can I find the tech support if there is any issue with my Eagle hunting wind ?

A: You can always contact us in email: Tiany_tech@163.com

 

*Customers are responsible for shipping costs for all return claims and are subject to restocking fee of 50% if the board has been ridden or are not in store bought condition with packaging in new, sellable form.

"We took a new Eagle hunting wind spin, which was amazing! - Tianying Tech
"An impressive technology" -  Tianying Technology
"With impressive specs like a 22 mile range and navigation capabilities, the [Eagle hunting wind] Travel board just may be a board like no other."- Tianying, Tech on a Budget
“It’s fast. These hills are big. If they can handle these hills, they can handle anything. It’s too easy.”- DAVID
“This is the board you’re looking for!…It doesn’t feel cheap, and it’s definitely not a toy. Even if your battery dies, you can use it as a traditional skateboard. Practically weightless compared to other e-skateboards that can weigh up to 30lbs."- Ruifeng, Tech on a Budget


Lean Forward to Go. Lean Back to Stop.
After your first ride, you'll realize that there is nothing else in the world quite like it! Even if you've never ridden a skateboard before, the Eagle hunting wind’s intuitive control will have you carving in no time with its weight-sensing foot pads. Speed control is completely variable – cruise at walking speed or race to its top speed of 20 miles per hour.
Leaning back kicks in regenerative braking, meaning you can safely descend hills while also recharging the battery.


Eagle hunting wind | The World's Most Portable & Intelligent eBoard
Eagle hunting wind is the first and only eBoard with an ever-learning ABS braking, and interactive app control.
With built-in pressure and gyro sensors, Eagle hunting wind learns your body's movements and riding style for a revolutionary ride.

Eagle hunting wind's electric skateboards have great range and grade capabilities, AND are affordable. Everything you want in one incredible board.

Eagle hunting wind: Interest and Sport
The Eagle hunting wind comes in two models:
the Interest Edition (16 miles/charge, 7.6KG.) and Sport Edition (25 miles/charge, 7.9KG.).
With a range that is two, three, or even four times the range of other electric skateboards on the market, the Eagle hunting wind will have you riding without any concern of running out of juice.


Eagle hunting wind’s innovations in adjustable acceleration are an industry first.
Choose from 0-100% in the Eagle hunting wind for a tailored riding experience.

Brushless Motor, Natural Coasting
Our Sport Edition new 500W brushless motor is faster, more powerful, and more efficient than previous Eagle hunting wind motors. The brushless design allows for more natural coasting, allowing you to push the Eagle hunting wind when the battery expires or is turned off.

Battery Meter and Speed Charger
The Eagle hunting wind’s power button is surrounded by a multi-color LED ring that changes colors as the battery diminishes.

Eagle hunting wind’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control puts power in the palm of your hand.

Tackle tough climbs with Eagle hunting wind's impressive grade capabilities.
Eagle hunting wind’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control gives you the power at your fingertips.

Grab and Go Anywhere: Lightweight and Splashproof
By using waterproof connectors the Eagle hunting wind can be ridden on wet surfaces without fear of damage to the electronics. Though the board mechanically can handle water exposure, we do not recommend riding in the rain due to potential rusting of components and loss of traction.
Featuring a lightweight 100kg design and two integrated handles,Eagle hunting wind’s ergonomic design makes it easy to pick up, carry, and store. Speed up your commute, forget about parking, & enjoy running errands with the most portable electric vehicle on the market!

With the Eagle hunting wind Travel Board, ride in style with 7 customizable undercarriage lights.
Navigate traffic safely with ease with Eagle hunting wind front and rear LED lights, brake lights, and turn signals.


See and Be Seen
The Eagle hunting wind’s LED headlights and taillights are the brightest integrated lights of any personal electric vehicle. These hi-power LEDs have three modes – on, off and blinking – which the rider can choose depending on the situation.  You’ll turn heads as these LEDs make it easier for you to see the road and for the road to see you.


Using high-quality, industry-grade materials, Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards are built to last and keep you safe. CE&ROHS certification pending.

Our Eagle hunting windr Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. For the Travel & Racer only.

Eagle hunting wind’s charger recharges from 0-100% in approximately 90 minutes. It is 110v - 240v ready and will work in the US, Asia, Europe, Australia, and more.


With 3 easy steps, the product is simple to set up and intuitive to use.


Quality. Safety. Durability. Eagle hunting wind electric skateboard motors are IPX6 waterproof rated so you can ride with confidence.

Quality
From the trucks, to motors, batteries and control boards, every piece of the Eagle hunting wind board went through countless revisions to strengthen and fine tune. Our maple/bamboo deck was designed with a high level of flex ( a  boards  natural suspension) to deliver a smooth cruising experience.
After over a year of development, we are extremely pleased with what Eagle hunting wind has become today. 
Components and parts are readily available and have been designed as user replaceable to ensure your board is always rockin.

Affordable
This was the driving factor that kept us focused while creating Eagle hunting wind. There was yet to be a quality board available at an affordable price.
We kept our team small, our overhead low. Removed unnecessary and cost bloating features such as flashy lights and carbon fiber decks.
We kept the design pure and crafted an exceptional riding experience.


Highly Weather Resistant
Born and raised in Hong Kong, you learn to adapt to the ever-changing weather. Eagle hunting wind is no exception :).
A board that couldn't handle a little water, or a mid-day shower didn't really work for us.
For this reason, we sealed the motors inside the wheels and sealed up all the edges.
You won't want to take your board swimming, but it CAN handle a lot. We battle tested the Eagle hunting wind board in the harsh conditions of Hong Kong taking on puddles, slush, and even snow.
Similar though to a regular skateboard, if you do get your components wet, you will want to dry them off when you are done riding to avoid rust and damaging bearings ;)

Urban Commuting Just Got Easier
The Eagle hunting wind's compact deck and handles make it easy bring on a train or to throw into the trunk of an Uber. The large, soft wheels make the board perfect for poor city pavement. And lastly, the inclusion of headlights and tail lights will help other drivers, pedestrians, and bicyclists see you at busy intersections at low light.
Traveling? Bring your Riptide
The Eagle hunting wind comes with a precisely engineered battery capacity that is within the range of TSA guidelines. Once you're past security the small size and handles make the Eagle hunting wind a breeze to transport through the terminal or to check into the overhead compartment.
The Perfect Addition to Your Electric Skateboard Quiver
Everyone who rides an electric skateboard knows it more fun to ride with friends (or your wife / husband / kid / grandma / etc). With a Riptide as your second board now you've got something they can ride at a competitive price that can actually keep up with more premium boards.

A Serious Drive Train
The Eagle hunting wind's 2500W dual belt drive train means it can scream off the line up to the top speed of 35 mph and power up hills unlike any other board its size.
Unrivaled Portability
At only 7.6KG with a After folding 500MM deck, dual handles, and an airline-friendly, and <120Wh battery, you can easily bring the Eagle hunting wind wherever your travels take you.
Premium Longboard Components
With the Eagle hunting wind our goal was a fast, fun ride while maintaining portability and we didn't mind adding a pound or two getting there. Thus the board has 275mm wide trucks and comes with the large diameter.
Ride for Miles and Miles
With up-to-an 25 miles of range in real world conditions and an optional fast charger that recharges the board in just 120 mins, you'll be able to park your car for the weekend and not touch it til Monday.
Ride All Night
Optional Headlights and Tail Lights provided by Shredlights can be set to "On," "Blink," or "High Beam," meaning you can ride all night and be seen by everyone around you.

About us
Based in hongkong, our team is made up of electrical, mechanical, and manufacturing engineers who share a love for extreme sports. We are incredibly excited to implement  the Eagle hunting wind. Funds from this project will go towards finalizing design, tooling, testing, and more. We are excited to have you as a customer and we can’t wait to get you riding the Eagle hunting wind: The Most Advanced Electric Skateboard ever!
Feel free to reach out with any questions to tiany_tech@163.com
 


 



What is it?
Eagle hunting wind Tech offers the most innovative, powerful, and affordable electric skateboard models available on the market.


Who created it?
Eagle hunting wind Tech, a startup based in Hong Kong, providing world class technology to power smart electric mobility products that are efficient, durable, and affordable.


Why should we use it?

Cut traffic and get to work *that* much easier. Pure joy, adrenaline, and enjoyment.
Travel faster, ride farther, and spend less money than with anything else on the market!



Where can we buy it?
Right here, right now on Indiegogo.


What do we get when we order?
Electric Skateboard of Your Choice, Bluetooth Remote Control, , Charger with Detachable Cord, T-Tool, Micro USB Cable, User's Manual, Advanced User Bushings (Travel & Racer only).


Why are you crowdfunding?
To offer our earliest supporters the best prices possible. We're excited to bring Eagle hunting wind's technology to Indiegogo and beyond!


 



What features are available?     

Interest: An iconic look with a modern upgrade. For the traditionalist who enjoys a boost.
Single hub motor and an IPX6 waterproof rating
Minimal resistance from motor, allowing riders to push the board like a normal skateboard
Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning
15-mile range with top speeds reaching 18 mph
Battery recharges in 2-2.5 hours
 
Sport: Cutting-edge tech and efficiency in one durable board with industry-leading range. The all-around solution for the modern commuter who needs some speed.
Dual hub motors with an IPX6 waterproof rating
Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning, top deck LED lights for GPS navigation and under carriage lights available in 7 colors
25-mile range on up to a 20% incline with top speeds reaching 35 mph
Removable battery that recharges in 2-3 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools



What sizes do you offer?     

Interest:
Measurements:
862 x 265 x 150 in size.
500 x 275 x 150 in Folding.
7.6KG in weight 
 
Sport:
Measurements:
862 x 275 x 150 in size.
500 x 275 x 170 in Folding.
7.9KG in weight 



How does the Handheld Bluetooth Remote work?      
Eagle hunting wind Bluetooth Remotes are easily re-pairable within seconds. This means you can use any of our bluetooth remotes for any of our boards, at any time.


How does the Quick Swap Battery work?      
Our Eagle hunting wind Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. Power down the Eagle hunting wind electric skateboard first, remove the thumb screw to remove the battery door, disconnect the existing battery and swap it out with the charged battery. Place the door back on and lock down with thumb screw. You're ready to get rolling again! Travel & Racer board batteries are interchangeable between the two boards. *For Travel & Racer boards only.


What is the hardness rating of the wheels?
Eagle hunting wind wheels are rated 86A Durometer.


Which option is best for me?  
The most popular board is the Sport Board. For all you longboarders out there, you'll love the interest Board. If you feel the need to do an ollie, the interest Board is for you.


 



what is the uniqueness of the technology?

Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards are faster, far more affordable, and much more powerful than competitor models.
It includes the best of everything in an electric skateboard--in three great models. Eagle hunting wind quick swap batteries also get you back on the road in under 60 seconds. Industry-leading torque control. IPX6 Waterproof Motors. Durable materials. Powerful hub motors. Designed with safety in mind.



How far can I go before recharging the battery? How to charge?   

Interest: 15-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools
Sport: 25-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-3 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools
Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards come with a charger and detachable cord.



How does it work?
Eagle hunting wind's hub motor(s) are controlled by a handheld bluetooth remote control.


What kind of sensors are you using?
Gyroscope sensors control Eagle hunting wind's lights. Sensors in the hub motors that is programmed through complex software.


Will there be updates to it in the future?
Over-the-air (OTA) updates will be continual to improve the product.


What kind of braking system do Eagle hunting wind boards have?    
Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards feature hub motors with regenerative braking. This helps to conserve battery life and gives you a bit more distance when riding. Also, while traveling downhill and braking, you'll get some energy back into the battery.


Is it waterproof?   
Eagle hunting wind's IPX6 waterproof rating enable riders to stay safe, even in less-than-ideal riding conditions. Eagle hunting wind encourages all riders to always wear a helmet.


Where is it manufactured?    
Manufacturing: Shenzhen, China. R&D, refinement, testing: HONGKONG.


 



How do I set it up?      
Turn on your board, turn on remote, and go! Board can pair with smart device, with bluetooth enabled.


How do I turn it on and off?
Use the power button on both the electric skateboard and remote.


How do I control it?    
The handheld bluetooth remote control.


What is the care and cleaning of it?      
Board doesn't require much cleaning. Remote can be cleaned with cloth towel and mild soap & water.


Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable?    
No.


Does it have an expiry date?      
No.


 



What are the recommend ages?
Eagle hunting wind electric skateboards are for 16+ is the minimum age. Young adults or older.


Where can I use it?      
Ride Eagle hunting wind outdooors, along streets, sidewalks, or smooth flat roads.


Is it safe?
Yes, but Eagle hunting wind boards require safety attention and learning to control. Eagle hunting wind encourages all riders to wear a helmet at all times.


What certifications do you have?
US:  FCC EU: CE Common: ROHS


How durable is it?
Eagle hunting wind boards are made with Canadian Maple Wood and are IPX6 waterproof-rated for the motors. Metal battery case.


 



When does shipping begin?
November 2017.


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?   
November 2017.


Where does it ship?    
Worldwide.


How much is shipping?

Free US shipping. $99 worldwide.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Fantastic! Please reach out at Tiany_tech@163.com



Do I have to pay VAT / GST?     
VAT & GST are not included in purchase price.


 



What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.


What is your return / exchange policy?   
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.


How do I choose more than one reward?
To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?   
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build Eagle hunting wind, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact? 
for any additional Customer Service needs, please contact Tiany_tech@163.com  (available 9AM to 6PM M-F PST).


 

Q: What is the width of each board?
A: Eagle hunting wind: 265MM 
 
Q: What is the speed mode in the app specific mean?
A: you can switch 3 different speed mode, basically, only the Top Speed is different. Beginner: ~ 18 mph   Sport: ~ 28 mph   Pro：~ 38 mph * 
 
Q: Is the Eagle hunting wind waterproof?
A: All Eagle hunting wind models are weather/water resistant, but do not fully submerge any board.
 
Q: What could I do if my Eagle hunting wind runs out of battery?
A: Because all Eagle hunting wind models use in-hub motor systems, you can easily ride them just like a regular skateboard when the battery runs out, without feeling any resistance from hub motors.
If you ride long enough, the Regenerative Braking technology will recharge your Eagle hunting wind.
 
Q. Can I bring the Eagle hunting wind on airplanes or check-in?
A: Eagle hunting wind's battery is within 120wh, which is the international limitation of battery products in airplane and it should be a carry-on.
It also depends on the policy of local airports. Normally, domestic flights allow bringing such an electric product with motors while some of international flights do not.
Please check with the airport and airline before you fly with Eagle hunting wind.
 
Q. Do I have to wear a helmet when I ride Eagle hunting wind?
A: We would really recommend wearing a helmet, even if your state or country laws does not require it.
Like we always insist, safety comes first!
 
Q. Is there any other color could I pick?
A: If you are talking about Eagle hunting wind, we have the Interest Edition and Sport Edition，With wases yellow and flame red can be selected。
 
Q. Can I pay by installments?
A: Sorry, we do not accept installments at the current stage in production.
 
Q. Where can I find the tech support if there is any issue with my Eagle hunting wind ?
A: You can always contact us in email: Tiany_tech@163.com
 
*Customers are responsible for shipping costs for all return claims and are subject to restocking fee of 50% if the board has been ridden or are not in store bought condition with packaging in new, sellable form.

story:
About us

Formula Student Cantabria is a students' team from multiple engineering degrees of the University of Cantabria, in the city of Santander in the north of Spain. Our goal is to compete with an electric single-seater in the Spanish event of Formula Student to celebrate in the Circuit of Catalunya (Montmeló) in August 2015.

Formula Student or Formula SAE is an international competition between universities around the world. In this championship each team has to design, construct and develop a complete single-seater car, which will be driven by some members of the team.

First of all, the team has to submit their design and a business case. Then, after a technical inspection, the track events starts. Acceleration, cornering ability, stability, efficiency and endurance are tested.

The competition and the university teams are sponsored by big companies such like Porsche, SEAT, Red Bull, Mathworks, Bosch and many more. Is also followed by F1 people looking for new talents or ideas.

"What I find most appealing about Formula Student is the innovation that it encourages, as the competition rules give the entrants a lot of design freedom. This results in many different solutions to the same issues... "

“There are only two innovative types of motorsport left: Formula 1 and Formula Student.”

-Ross Brawn

The Proyect

Our final design is a vehicle under 300 kg of weight and 40 kW (55 HP) of power distributed in 4 motors conected to the rear wheels. It will provide a 0-100 kph acceleration of about 3.5 seconds. The car will reach half an hour of battery life to complete the endurance test. We are developing a KERS system which would give us a huge amount of extra power and an important reduction in the battery weight and cost.
This is a concept of the bodywork, the final version will have several improvements:

The economical requirements of this project are the following:

Chassis: 1000€

Brakes System: 1600€

Bodywork: 1050€

Motor and Battery Systems: 8000€

Steering and Suspension Systems: 5800€

Cockpit: 545€

Drivers clothes and helmets: 735€

Shipping, Tools and Unexpected Occurs: 3900€

Registration Payments: 1800€

TOTAL: 24.430€ 

As of today, thanks to our sponsors we just need a small fraction of the total budget.

We need your help to achieve our goals.

Open Source Electric Formula SAE

In addition to our competition project we want anybody to have the choice to build its own formula electric car. That's why we want to make our designs public, and update them every year with the new improvements designed.

In fact, thanks to our open source project, you will be able to use our designs with commercial purposes.

Our Sponsors

They trust in our project, join us!

Other ways you can help

You can help us by sharing our project and telling your friends.

The different areas of sponsorship mentioned in the rewards

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

¿Quiénes somos?

Formula Student Cantabria es un grupo formado por estudiantes de distintos grados que se imparten en la Universidad de Cantabria, situada en la ciudad de Santander al norte de España. La intención del equipo es competir con un monoplaza eléctrico en el evento de Formula Student Spain celebrado en el Circuit de Catalunya (Montmeló) en Agosto de 2015.

La Formula Student o Formula SAE es una competición a nivel internacional en la que se citan equipos de diferentes universidades. Dicho campeonato promueve la excelencia en ingeniería mediante el diseño, construcción y prueba en circuito de un monoplaza.

En el diseño priman no sólo el trabajo técnico si no también el plan productivo del vehículo, por lo que se requiere crear un plan de producción que se ajuste adecuadamente a un mercado competitivo pero que a la vez cumpla con las necesidades de un piloto.

Además, el vehículo debe competir en pista contra los monoplazas de otras universidades.

La competición está patrocinada por SEAT, Endesa, Bosch, Audi, Porsche, Mathworks, BMW y muchas otras empresas, algunas de las cuales también apoyan a equipos de varias universidades. Otras importantes empresas que apoyan a equipos son Red Bull, Mercedes-Benz y Banco Santander.

Uno de los mayores impulsores de la competición en los últimos años ha sido Ross Brawn, ex-director del equipo de varios equipos de Formula 1.

“Nunca dejo de sentirme impresionado cada año por la cantidad de talento mostrado por los competidores de Formula Student. Cuando se trata de dar a la generación de jóvenes ingenieros la oportunidad de demostrar sus habilidades, realmente no hay nada como la Formula Student.”

"Solo quedan dos deportes de motor realmente innovadores, Formula 1 y Formula Student"

-Ross Brawn


Proyecto

Después de más de un año de trabajo, el diseño final cuenta con una potencia total de unos 40kW (55 cv.) en menos de 300 kg, repartidos en cuatro motores para una tracción trasera que nos proporcione aceleraciones de unos 3,5 segundos en el 0-100 km/h. Además estamos trabajando en un revolucionario sistema KERS que podría entregar una potencia varias veces superior a la nominal. Las baterías contendrán una energía de unos 3 kWh lo que nos otorgará plena potencia durante la media hora que dura la prueba de resistencia en competición.

Nuestro último prototipo de la carrocería antes de la versión definitiva.

El coste del proyecto es aproximadamente el siguiente:

Chasis: 1000€

Frenos: 1600€

Carrocería: 1050€

Motor, Transmisión y Baterías: 8000€

Dirección y Suspensión: 5800€

Cockpit: 545€

Equipación de los 2 pilotos: 735€

Transporte, herramientas y otros: 3900€

Inscripciones: 1800€

TOTAL APROXIMADO: 24.430€ 

A día de hoy y gracias a diferentes patrocinadores y proveedores ya solo nos es necesaria una pequeña parte de la financiación.
Necesitamos de tu ayuda para finalizar el proyecto.

Open Source Electric Formula SAE

A la par de nuestro proyecto de competición queremos que todo el mundo tenga la opción de tener su propio formula eléctrico, para ello, queremos liberar los diseños de forma pública.

No solo eso, sino que cualquiera podrá utilizar los diseños incluso con fines comerciales.

Nuestros patrocinadores

Ellos ya han confiado en el proyecto, ¡únete tu también!

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Otra forma de ayudar, es difundiendo nuestro proyecto con el fin de que más gente se interese por la competición ya que también es un proyecto de aprendizaje e investigación.


Estas son las diferentes zonas a las que se hace referencia en las recompensas.

A la par de nuestro proyecto de competición queremos que todo el mundo tenga la opción de tener su propio formula eléctrico, para ello, queremos liberar los diseños de forma pública.No solo eso, sino que cualquiera podrá utilizar los diseños incluso con fines comerciales.Nuestros patrocinadoresEllos ya han confiado en el proyecto, ¡únete tu también!Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar
Otra forma de ayudar, es difundiendo nuestro proyecto con el fin de que más gente se interese por la competición ya que también es un proyecto de aprendizaje e investigación.


Estas son las diferentes zonas a las que se hace referencia en las recompensas.

story:
Felt like you are limited to the amount of time you have? Everyone only has 24 hours a day, and an average person will spend 10 years of their life time waiting either for the traffic, in a jam or waiting for a bus, their taxi to arrive in line to board a tram. Wasted just waiting for something out of our control. 

We created Stride to empower you. To change your lifestyle and view of taking control of the little things in your life.

Stride E-bike is an all-rounder, simplistic and the only e-bike that you will need to take care of yourself, your loved ones and the future of the environment.

 

Have you been look for an E-Bike but don’t fancy the prices?

The retail prices of an E-Bike can be damaging to your wallet. They may look great, have great functions but do you really need such complications? If you are someone that wants practical simplicity, Stride is the one for you.

A simple E-Bike with reasonable price, to go through your daily routines with. That’s Stride.

As consumers ourselves, we found ourselves lacking the middle ground with excessive mark ups for profit in our daily purchases driving consumerism. Our Stride team strives to create with affordability, practicality, durability and simplicity.  Thoughtfully creating Stride to serve you.

With these key concepts:

  • Serving your health
  • Improving your daily efficiency
  • Easing your daily choice to promote the environmental well being for the future

You will spend an average €700 monthly to maintain your vehicle,  €300 monthly if you are on public transportation. With Stride at only €65 monthly, savings are to 90%!

 

With the current hectic lifestyle we live in, it is getting increasingly harder to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Do you really have to pay €550 (US $650) annually to get a simple fitness routine in? That gym membership that you are paying are at the expense of something or someone else. Should taking care of our health come at such cost?
 
Getting to your gym or Zumba routine may take another 30 minutes of waiting for the bus or driving through the jam.
 

Clock a 30-minute anaerobic exercise or burn an expected 200 calories just by making your way to that Zumba class. Or simply do away with the expensive exercise routines that doesn't serve you anymore and take Stride for a ride (switch the power-assist off); explore the hills, enjoy the greens or simply take a longer route home to get your heart pumping! 


 

Why spend 10 years of your life getting through the jams or waiting for the bus and tram when Stride can bring you up to 40 miles (60km) per full charge. Cycling with an E-bike is easy with every pedal cycle pushing power into your wheels. It will be a breeze (literally) getting anywhere at 15mph.

Carefully calibrated at the speed where safety isn't compromised and efficiency is maximized. Spending 30 minutes to commute a 5 mile distance? Stride brings you there in 15 minutes.

 

Have you counted your carbon footprints?

According to European Environment Agency (EEA), the largest transport greenhouse gas emission amongst transportation is Road Transportation, going at an alarming percentage of 71.7%.

Vehicle exhaust accounts for 55% of nitrogen oxides, and 60% of carbon monoxide emissions. The main culprit that hurts our environment and for those living with asthma, this is bad news. 

A short, four-mile round trip by bicycle keeps about 15 pounds of pollutants out of the air we breathe. Do that daily and that's 5,475 pounds less pollutants per person.

With Stride, a small and smarter decision means a cleaner and healthier environment for our children.

 

 

We chose Stride to be made of high strength aluminum frame, tested and proven to enhance the durability of the e-bike. Thoughtfully designed to adopt a modern step through frame, for ease of mounting and dismounting for all dressed occasions. 

Equipped with 20″ wheels with 3-cross spokes rims; she balances the stability through your ride at 15mph.

We also installed a drum rear brakes for safety braking feature. Drum rear brakes will amplify the braking power when you need it on top of the front caliper brakes distributing the braking power to the rear to prevent the rider from falling forward during emergency braking. 

Stride is also equipped with safety features: key lock feature for both the ignition and battery; front, rear and breaking light, and electronic horn. In addition, the chain guard is a meticulous addition to prevent loose clothing from entangling into the chain.

Smart LCD screen will give you a quick indication of your battery life, current speed and total trip mileage for reference.

 

Both the ignition and battery are anti-theft designed with quick-indicators on battery life. Stride presents two options for charging: direct charging and off-site charging.

story:
We are a young design team with a passion for design, cycling and nature. We are devoted to the design of cycling accessories, with an ultimate goal of endowing cycling accessories with unique characteristics of animals.

Pelephant is a bicycle pedal but not just a pedal.

Besides pedaling, Pelephant provides temp support & be a rest for the bike. 

You can easily figure out Left and Right side by their name: Lucas & Ron

Since the birth of bicycles in the 17th century, the pedal is one of the important accessories. Moving with the times, people started to pursue greater functionality of pedals. They believe that the functions that a pedal can offer to users should not be limited to getting a bicycle moving. Such thought has ignited creativity in pedal design. Therefore, we begin to see lots of interesting and innovative pedal products in the market, for example some pedals can be converted into bike locks, or treadles, or can even connect to WIFI and GPS.

It is ZOO GEAR’s strong belief that design should keep pace with the times. We therefore started to think: 

What kind of pedals do people need in the 21st century?

We are living in an era in which the Internet and social media are popular. We enjoy sharing moments of our lives and cycling is no exception – with magnificent scenery, taking a few beautiful pictures of our bikes to show our unique taste and what we see.

However, to take a cool and enviable picture, we often need the help of many tools, for example, leaning on the tree, using props like helmets, stones, cans, or even assistance from others.

What we are thinking is that why isn’t there a simpler and cooler way? Taking photos as we wish, anytime anywhere without people’s help or garbage picking in the street! Imagine you can fix your bike, take a couple of pictures and share, and then leave for your next destination within one minute.

This is the motive for our design:

Enjoy pedaling; Sharing the coolest photo of your bike by using Pelephant

Step 1: Press down the pedal stand

Step 2: Take a photo 

Step 3: Kick back the stand and leave 

Using kickstand, you can:

Keep the bike self standing stably and  take a rest anytime as you like.

Using Pelephant, you can:

Show the beauty of your bike which perfectly upright, share on social medias, leave for your next destination within one minute. 

What is your choice?

To prevent users accidentally press down the pedal stand while pedaling, we did a lots of work to make sure it won't fall off by accident.

Magnet

Two magnets strongly attracted to each other (Ferromagnetic).

Secured Magnet Mount

"Ground" End Cover

The “ground” end is covered with a rubber foot.

You can simply use measuring tape to find out what size is suitable for your bike.

In this stage, we provide dark grey colour only. We will release two more colours for selection once the campaign successfully funded. Make it happen, backers!

Zoo Gear always want to make effort on saving the animals, saving the wildlife. We hope both human and animals can live in a better world. Once this campaign successfully funded, we will donate 10% of funding (costs deducted)  to The World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF), help protect the planet's most threatened species and habitats.

The World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) is an international non-governmental organization founded in 1961, working in the field of the wilderness preservation, and the reduction of humanity's footprint on theenvironment.

How can i choose the color & size of Pelephant?​

A fine question! When the campaign ends on Sept 30, we will send you an email to confirm what style and pedal size you'd like. We'll then update your order accordingly.

Can i use Pelephant on fixed gear?

Currently not. We will open the special perk after receiving an amount of orders.

Can i use the photo friendly stand on both side?

Yes. Both Ron & Lucas have this feature.

Will the pedals swing unstably while parking the bike?

No. The mechanism of Pelephant is designed to rotate in one direction only, it makes the bike more stable while parking. But don't worry, this mechanism won't affect your cycling.

Can my bike against strong wind while using the stand?

It depends. Pelephant is not a kickstand, the bike will fall down under strong wind. However, if you use Ron or Lucas in a right direction, it maybe stand against this condition.

Forecasting Risk

Over the 8 past years Zoo Gear team members have learned a great deal. Using this experience, Zoo Gear has created a plan that will meet both demand and production needs. However, sometimes even after the most meticulous planning, forecasts aren’t always accurate. In the unlikely event that we miss our projections, we will inform our support the minute it happens.

Supply Chain Risk

Zoo Gear members has been built over 50 type of products. Yet no matter how prepared we are, component delays and unforeseen shortages can always occur. If this happens, you have our assurances that we will keep you informed and work to quickly resolve any problems that might arise.

Terms and Conditions

All products of Zoo Gear are assembled and shipped from Shenzhen, China. Any customs, duties or any other associated taxes/charges fall within the responsibility of our supporters.
