story: -

Please do not support this campaign. We are not looking for funds anymore. It is not possible to take the campaign offline before it ends. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

############

Drive a MODEL S® automobile

The Tesla MODEL S® is better to understand if you see this vehicle as an iPhone on wheels. vukee will create a platform that will allow qualified individuals to have rental access to Tesla. Using this platform, renting a Tesla will be as easy as renting a DVD from Redbox. The pickup and drop off has to be at restricted charger stations near you. These software-controlled vehicle rentals will be available in remote locations at anytime without visiting a counter or office (store). vukee is developing a backend and frontend software system that interfaces with Tesla’s cars that will include high safety standards to regulate rental restriction routes.

What is vukee Car Service?

vukee Car is an all electric car sharing service based on Tesla Motors, Inc. latest, MODEL S® vehicle. It drives up to 265 miles with just one charge. We have built the technology to easily rent these cars conveniently at a near by charging station. All you need is our vukee Car app. After a hassle free registration, you can drive the Tesla in less than a minute. vukee Car has no membership fees.  You pay as you go. Choose the nearest available Tesla, and enjoy the ease of booking. After scanning your drivers license ID and credit card, you are ready to enjoy your ride. If you like, your driving experience can be automatically posted to your facebook account.

It’s your Car

All cars are wrap designed with names of the Donators. Make a vukee Car your car! If you wish, we will add your name onto one of the vukee Cars in your city. The size of your name depends of the amount you pledged. Bigger pledges get bigger names. The hood and the roof is used to add your names.  Also you’re allowed to see where your car is driving in real time and view updates to the driver’s posts from the diary of that car. If you’re in the vicinity of “your” car, you can do some funny things with the car for free, i.e. turn on the flashlights.

vukee Car Promises

We will provide user experience with “WOW-effects“ by:

-  The simplicity of using

-  The affordability of driving a luxury car

-  The personalized guiding (24/7) experience during use

-  The use of real-time application from vukee-Car

-  The hassle free car driving experience

24/7 vukee Car team is there for you.

·  Easily connect with us from vukee Car App for any questions or concerns we can address.

·  vukee Car app provides a customer support number should you need us.

·  You have roadside service protection when you need it.

·  Our maintenance crew is automatically notified when you return the car to a charging station.

·  You can find nearby charging stations at the touch of a screen.

No more concerns about insurance?

When you rent a vukee Car, all insurance is already included in the fee. You will never again need to be concerned with having the right insurance and/or being upsold, adding more additional fees, as with other rental agencies.

No more rental office visits?

Downloading the app lets you create an account,making you a member of vukee Car which provides you the information you need to rent available Teslas.  There are NO membership fees and no longterm commitment contracts.  Simply pay as you go.  

Download the app and create an account. After that, every time you rent a car, the process takes less than a minute and you are on your way to new adventures!  

What are the Renter Requirements

•  Legally Active U.S. or International Driver's Licenses

•  Credit Card

•  Smart Mobile Device with Internet

The first activation needs about 90 seconds and some clicks to open your vukee Car Account. After your first rental check-In you can save the data. So your next trip goes faster than ever.

Check-In to your Tesla

vukee Car app is simple to use. This user friendly technology makes the renting experience effortless and enjoyable.  Steps you will experience in the process are:

•  Open vukee Car App

•  Choose booking location from map

•  Select an available car

•  Reserve the car

•  Arrive at the charging location

•  Press unlock on your app 

•  Drive away

It's that easy!  


Really? No more Gasoline?

Not with this Green Machine! You will never again need to pay for gasoline when renting a Tesla from vukee Car. And the best part is, all charging is already included in the rent; even when you need to recharge in the middle of your rental premium time. You have access to all the Charge Point, Blink and TESLA Superchargers, where you can charge 200 miles of range in about 30 minutes. You will  find a map of the charging stations in our application. Further, your renting time is interrupted while the car is charging until it is charged at least 80%. Thats why you are not charged during loading the car.

How can I make my own business with vukee Cars on Teslas?

RANGERS: Rangers are our roaming team members. Rangers are responsible for the current fleet in their home-zone (city). With the high growth of vukee Car Service and the demand on Tesla Motors® Cars, you can get the chance to open your own Ranger business and work with our great car service. As a ranger you head the services stations, where we provide high-power chargers. We support you with choosing the right locations and the initial facility fittings.

Do you think you have what it takes to be a Ranger?  Rangers are Self Service Car Managers that are always on the go. These remote travelers use laptops to track returned cars at charge station points, perform mobile car cleaning services and mobile mechanic maintenance work. They have the great customer service attitudes in communicating visuals via phone and laptops with our on-line customer service team and in some remote possibilities, communicating directly with vukee car customers. Great news! No oil changes on electric cars. You will have an assigned territory and be on duty for your entire shift for cars that need checking after returned drop off points.  Because the car is electric, the maintenance is easy.  And for those items you can’t easily maintain or fix, you would be the one to manage, arrange servicing, and drive the vehicles to the dealerships. 

Contact us to learn what we expect from you and what you can earn with vukee Car.


What Tesla can I ride?

Latest MODEL S® with 85 kWh Battery Type with following specifications:

  • 265 miles range (EPA)
  • 362 horse power
  • 5.4 seconds 0-60mph
  • 125 mph top speed
  • Onboard maps and navigation for North America
  • LED Lights
  • Keyless Entry
  • Memory seats, mirrors and driver profile


Who is vukee? 

vukee is the Master Brand for a modern Application Business model that is mostly held on iOS and Android. More than 20 million smartphones have installed one or more vukee application(s). vukee Car is the fifth division of this brand with more than 250.000 friends on facebook. With vukee Car, we are building businesses where the team is first focused on app that will drive the business and then will include the massive hardware (Tesla MODEL S®) that places the business on the map. Some Details about vukee Apps:

vukee Print - personal Print products in your hand: whether you need a photo book, photo calendar or postcard: we will print it for you and send it world wide. www.myvukee.com

vukee Games – let the Games begin: sail the waters of vukee G and play the games of real pirates! www.vukee-games.com

vukee Apps – looking for cool photo apps? We offer you a wide range for photo effects and montages– take what you need!

vukee M – make Money … take pics: upload your photos to vukee M and sell them to newspapers, advertising agencies and freelance graphic designers. We are always looking for your smartphone pics! www.vukee-m.com/

For more informations please checkout our website: 

http://vukee.com/companies/?lang=en


vukee Car team is always available to help you

•  Accident / Damage? Contact our “on call” customer support team for assistance, either from the console or from the phone number on the vukee Car Service app.

•  Road side assistance:  From the app, contact our “on call” customer support team for assistance.  They can remain with you on the phone until help arrives.  Just one more way to keep you smiling and safe.

•  Next available Parking Lot? There is modern navigation on board and with vukee Car App we assist you to next available spot.

Personalize your driving experience and share in your car's history.

Each individual car has the unique ability to easily record and share your driving experience with your family and friends on social media sites. Make them jealous of your adventure, or surprise your long lost friend with a drive up to see them in your Tesla.

The recorded diary creates an “if this car could talk” memory of where the car has been and all the people she has met and shared in her driving days. We understand some people would like to keep their times private, but for those that would like to share briefly in the car's experience, these are enjoyable moments for both the car and his riders.  

vukee Car App compatibility

vukee Car apps can be found on iOS, Android platforms and Windows Mobile.  It can be used with any smart device. The Application has three main functions which include:

Booking: Looking for free cars in your area. The booking process can also be done on regular computers by secured Website address, including access to you vukee Car Account.

Check-In: Activation of vukee Car Account, Validate the access code and open the car. For the time of renting you can use the special access key in the car for more comfort of using the car.

On Road Service: Access to Service Center for any Assistant




What is included in vukee Car:

• Dues free membership

• No lengthy contracts

• Paperless agreements

• Insurance coverage

• Fully charged vehicles at no additional cost from the rental price

• Free charing at public charging stations and all Tesla Superchargers

• Clean and ready to go vehicles reserved for you 

• An Adventure

Inspiration -

We never forgot our first experiences riding a Tesla. Being a sports car enthusiasts ourselves, we found the Tesla driving experience to be unlike any car we had ever driven before. A whole new world of driving excitement had just been unleashed with the shear power of green energy! It is the ride of tomorrow, today. We felt compelled to share this green energy driving experience with the world, and the way to make that happen was to make it affordable for everyone.  

We were inspired by other car sharing operators and businesses that allow people to rent out their cars by the hour while they normally would just be collecting dust. But, when we searched in our area to rent a Tesla, we found ourselves completely out of luck. We brainstormed different ideas and we developed vukee Car Service. The future of car sharing is here; and we have incorporated all the very best of the car sharing experience for you, right now! 

App Integration Specifications

•  Downloadable app for Android, iOS or Windows Phone

•  Integration with on board vukee Car computer

•  Insurance logistics integration

•  24/7 vukee team coordination feature integration

•  24/7 roadside assistance service feature integration

•  Service maintenance coordination alerting features integration

•  Integration of your phone with the vukee Car computer system to

   allow hands free phone service from the car while driving 

•  Bluetooth wifi compatible

Why did we create vukee Car?  

For the sheer fun of it! vukee Car turns every Tesla into unique vehicle beings complete with memories and shared joys of old friends and past driving adventures.  Every vukee Car has a unique ID that can be traced back to find out where life has taken her.  

Why Indiegogo? 

We need you to make this happen. We need your help to find out which major cities across the nation should be the first starting point. And, we need your help to finance the first 25 cars. You can pledge to drive the car in your city. You tell us where to start by the concentration of pledges that will come in of a given region. The pledges will help us create a roadmap and determine in what cities to start first and then connect all the city points in the next steps.  Adding cities as we grow widens the convenience of drop off charge points allowing for greater renter flexibility until we have stretched across America.  

Pledges for your (West Coast) City:





Please pledge for the area you want to rent a vukee Car. If you later decide to rent one of the cars in another area, you always can, your pledge will be valid in all areas. 

Where we're at!

We’ve been working on the concept for many months. We have built an amazing app coupled with an amazing team and we are ready to travel down the road of tomorrow.  

With your support, we can bring the affordable green driving experience of the high end luxury Tesla MODEL S® to the market - worldwide; and help change the way we view and use transportation today. While we're close to going live, your contribution will help:

•  Fund the first 25 vehicles of the vukee Car fleet

•  Choose which city and region to start our fleet by what makes the most sense in the west coast

Production & Delivery Plan

May 2013: Our Prototype has delivered and start with different scenarios to make our idea happen. At this time we focused to use specific interface on Tesla Cars and starting to develop the specific white paper

August 2013: Tesla response vukee Car Whitepaper not good enough for partnership. They limit the minimum order of cars to 100 units.

September 2013: First tests with external hardware (3G connected unit in the car) which communicates to vukee Car Backend Server

April 2014: Going to deposit $62.500 at Tesla Motors, Inc. for delivery of 25 Tesla MODELS® cars

June 2014: Delivery of first 10 Tesla MODEL S® cars

Rewards

•  Sponsor gets name wrapped on a vukee Car Tesla in their city (Only pledge: "Your name on a TESLA").

•  Sponsor receives earned time to drive the Tesla and experience the ride for him/herself.  

•  Sponsor gets updates on vukee Car rental experiences by a small donation.

Our Vision:

vukee is the fleet leasing brand that will bring the Tesla MODEL S® to the general public. Tesla users are enthusiastic motorists who want to experience today’s state of the art vehicle technology first hand and at their leisure by leasing time with their favorite cars. After the launch, the pricing for renting a Tesla is based on an algorithm of availability, duration, location option, prepayment, and special routes. We will start with 25 vehicles centered inside the viewable "home zones".  Every quarter after, we will add more Tesla's to the fleet. Expansion of the geographical areas in 2014 and 2015 will eventually cover the U.S. from West to East Coast. European expansion will begin with the availability of Supercharger stations.

Special thanks

We would like to thank all the people who helped and supported us along the way. Without you we wouldn't be here. 

In no special order:  Meik and Agneta Lindberg, Celine, Melina and Leonardo as the Lindberg Family, Steve Clark, Rick Valantine, Jaycee Clark, Andrew Schauwecker, Jim Ness for recording in his amazing Man-Cave and Tracey Claxton as best supporting actors, Chris Mckechnie, director at digitalcinemaguy.com and his assistants Ryan Amaradio. Thank you very much!


Risks and challenges

From a risk management perspective, there are many "what-if" scenarios that haven't played out yet. There is also risk of oversimplification in a polarized political atmosphere, conflating legitimate policy goals with indefensible rent-seeking by incumbents.  The "cab wars" currently being fought in major cities are a classic example: Everybody claims to be pro-consumer, but it's just as tempting for those on one side (medallion owners) to cite issues like safety as pretext for protectionism as it is for others to cite entrenchment as a pretext to overstate ideologically driven total deregulation of business. Finally, we need seed business to find out the potential cities, getting first cars rent before we start with Indiegogo.

All trademarks used are properties of their respective owners. 

MODEL S® and TESLA MOTORS® are registered trademarks of Tesla Motors, Inc. 

vukee Car is not made, sponsored, or licensed by Tesla Motors, Inc. and Scrambled Brains Tech, LLC. is not affiliated with Tesla Motors, Inc.
story_txt:
Please do not support this campaign. We are not looking for funds anymore. It is not possible to take the campaign offline before it ends. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

############

Drive a MODEL S® automobile
The Tesla MODEL S® is better to
understand if you see this vehicle as an iPhone on wheels. vukee will create a platform that will allow qualified individuals to have rental access to Tesla. Using this platform, renting a Tesla will be as easy as renting a DVD from Redbox. The pickup and drop off has to be at restricted charger
stations near you. These software-controlled vehicle rentals will be available
in remote locations at anytime without visiting a counter or office (store).
vukee is developing a backend and frontend software system that interfaces with
Tesla’s cars that will include high safety standards to regulate rental
restriction routes.
What is vukee Car
Service?
vukee Car is an all electric car
sharing service based on Tesla Motors, Inc. latest, MODEL S® vehicle. It drives up to 265 miles
with just one charge. We have built the technology to easily rent these cars
conveniently at a near by charging station. All you need is our vukee Car app.
After a hassle free registration, you can drive the Tesla in less than a minute. vukee
Car has no membership fees.  You pay as you go. Choose the nearest
available Tesla, and enjoy the ease of booking. After scanning your drivers license ID and
credit card, you are ready to enjoy your ride. If you like, your driving experience can be
automatically posted to your facebook account.




It’s your Car


All cars are wrap designed with
names of the Donators. Make a vukee Car your car! If you wish, we will add your
name onto one of the vukee Cars in your city. The size of your name depends of
the amount you pledged. Bigger pledges get bigger names. The hood and the roof
is used to add your names.  Also you’re
allowed to see where your car is driving in real time and view updates to the
driver’s posts from the diary of that car. If you’re in the vicinity of “your”
car, you can do some funny things with the car for free, i.e. turn on the
flashlights.




 
vukee Car Promises

We will provide user experience
with “WOW-effects“ by:
-  The simplicity of using
-  The affordability of driving a luxury car
-  The personalized guiding (24/7) experience during use
-  The use of real-time application from vukee-Car
-  The hassle free car driving experience
24/7 vukee Car team is
there for you.
· 
Easily connect with us
from vukee Car App for any questions or concerns we can address.
·  vukee Car app provides a customer support number should you need us.
· 
You have roadside service
protection when you need it.
· 
Our maintenance crew
is automatically notified when you return the car to a charging station.
· 
You can find nearby
charging stations at the touch of a screen.
No more concerns about
insurance?
When you rent a vukee Car, all
insurance is already included in the fee. You will never again need to be
concerned with having the right insurance and/or being upsold, adding more
additional fees, as with other rental agencies. 
No more rental office
visits?
Downloading the app lets you
create an account,making you a member of vukee Car which provides you the information
you need to rent available Teslas.  There
are NO membership fees and no
longterm commitment contracts.  Simply pay as you go.  
Download the app and create an
account. After that, every time you rent a car, the process takes less than a
minute and you are on your way to new adventures!  
What are the Renter
Requirements
•  Legally Active U.S. or International Driver's Licenses
•  Credit Card
•  Smart Mobile Device with Internet 
The first activation needs about 90 seconds and some clicks to open your vukee Car Account. After your first
rental check-In you can save the data. So your next trip goes faster than ever.
Check-In to your Tesla
vukee Car app is simple to use. This
user friendly technology makes the renting experience effortless and enjoyable.
 Steps you will experience in the process are:
• 
Open vukee Car App
• 
Choose booking
location from map
• 
Select an available
car
• 
Reserve the car
• 
Arrive at the charging location
• 
Press unlock on your
app 
• 
Drive away

It's that easy!  




Really? No more
Gasoline?
Not with this Green Machine! You
will never again need to pay for gasoline when renting a Tesla from vukee Car.
And the best part is, all charging is already included in the rent; even when
you need to recharge in the middle of your rental premium time. You have access
to all the Charge Point, Blink and TESLA Superchargers, where you
can charge 200 miles of range in about 30 minutes. You will  find a map of the charging stations in our application.
Further, your renting time is interrupted while the car is charging until it is charged at least 80%. Thats why you are not charged during loading the car.

How can I make my own
business with vukee Cars on Teslas?

RANGERS: Rangers are our roaming
team members. Rangers are responsible for
the current fleet in their home-zone (city). With the high growth of vukee Car
Service and the demand on Tesla Motors® Cars, you can get the chance to open your own Ranger
business and work with our great car service. As a ranger you head the services stations, where we provide high-power chargers. We support you with choosing the right locations and the initial facility fittings.
Do you think you have what it
takes to be a Ranger?  Rangers are Self
Service Car Managers that are always on the go. These remote travelers use
laptops to track returned cars at charge station points, perform mobile car
cleaning services and mobile mechanic maintenance work. They have the great
customer service attitudes in communicating visuals via phone and laptops with
our on-line customer service team and in some remote possibilities,
communicating directly with vukee car customers. Great news! No oil changes on
electric cars. You will have an assigned territory and be on duty for your
entire shift for cars that need checking after returned drop off points.  Because the car is electric, the maintenance
is easy.  And for those items you can’t easily
maintain or fix, you would be the one to manage, arrange servicing, and
drive the vehicles to the dealerships. 
Contact us to learn what we expect from you and what you can earn with vukee Car.


What Tesla can I ride?
Latest MODEL S® with 85 kWh Battery
Type with following specifications:



265 miles range (EPA)


362 horse power


5.4 seconds 0-60mph


125 mph top speed


Onboard maps and navigation for
North America


LED Lights


Keyless Entry

Memory seats, mirrors and driver
profile







Who is vukee?  
vukee is the Master Brand for a modern
Application Business model that is mostly held on iOS and Android. More than 20
million smartphones have installed one or more vukee application(s). vukee Car
is the fifth division of this brand with more than 250.000 friends on facebook.
With vukee Car, we are building businesses where the team is first focused on
app that will drive the business and then will include the massive hardware
(Tesla MODEL S®) that places the business on the map. Some Details about vukee Apps:
vukee Print - personal Print
products in your hand: whether you need a photo book, photo calendar or
postcard: we will print it for you and send it world wide. www.myvukee.com
vukee Games – let the Games begin:
sail the waters of vukee G and play the games of real pirates!
www.vukee-games.com
vukee Apps – looking for cool
photo apps? We offer you a wide range for photo effects and montages– take what
you need!
vukee M – make Money … take pics:
upload your photos to vukee M and sell them to newspapers, advertising agencies
and freelance graphic designers. We are always looking for your smartphone
pics! www.vukee-m.com/
For more informations please
checkout our website: 
http://vukee.com/companies/?lang=en



vukee Car team is
always available to help you
• 
Accident / Damage? Contact
our “on call” customer support team for assistance, either from the console or
from the phone number on the vukee Car Service app.
• 
Road side
assistance:  From the app, contact
our “on call” customer support team for assistance.  They can remain with you on the phone until
help arrives.  Just one more way to keep
you smiling and safe.
•  Next available Parking Lot? There is modern navigation on board and with
vukee Car App we assist you to next available spot. 
Personalize your
driving experience and share in your car's history.
Each individual car has the unique
ability to easily record and share your driving experience with your family and
friends on social media sites. Make them jealous of your adventure, or surprise
your long lost friend with a drive up to see them in your Tesla. 
The recorded diary creates an “if
this car could talk” memory of where the car has been and all the people she has
met and shared in her driving days. We understand some people would like to
keep their times private, but for those that would like to share briefly in the
car's experience, these are enjoyable moments for both the car and his riders.  
vukee Car App
compatibility
vukee Car apps can be found on iOS,
Android platforms and Windows Mobile.  It
can be used with any smart device. The Application has three main functions which include:
Booking: Looking for free cars in
your area. The booking process can also be done on regular computers by secured Website address, including access to you vukee
Car Account.
Check-In: Activation of vukee Car
Account, Validate the access code and open the car. For the time of renting you
can use the special access key in the car for more comfort of using the car.
On Road Service: Access to Service
Center for any Assistant












What is included in vukee
Car:
• Dues free membership
• No lengthy contracts
• Paperless agreements
• Insurance coverage
• Fully charged vehicles at no additional cost from the rental price
• Free charing at public charging stations and all Tesla Superchargers
• Clean and ready to go vehicles reserved for you 
• An Adventure
Inspiration -


We never forgot our first
experiences riding a Tesla. Being a sports car enthusiasts ourselves, we
found the Tesla driving experience to be unlike any car we had ever driven
before. A whole new world of driving excitement had just been unleashed with the shear power of green energy! It is the ride of tomorrow, today. We
felt compelled to share this green energy driving experience with the world, and the way to make that happen was to make it affordable for everyone.  
We were inspired by other car
sharing operators and businesses that allow people to rent out their cars by the
hour while they normally would just be collecting dust. But, when we searched
in our area to rent a Tesla, we found ourselves completely out of luck. We brainstormed different ideas and we developed vukee Car Service. The
future of car sharing is here; and we have incorporated all the very best of
the car sharing experience for you, right now! 
App Integration
Specifications
•  Downloadable app for Android, iOS or Windows Phone
•  Integration with on board vukee Car computer
•  Insurance logistics integration
•  24/7 vukee team coordination feature integration
•  24/7 roadside assistance service feature integration
•  Service maintenance coordination alerting features integration
•  Integration of your phone with the vukee Car computer system to
   allow hands
free phone service from the car while driving 
•  Bluetooth wifi compatible
Why did we create
vukee Car?  
For the sheer fun of it! vukee Car turns every Tesla into unique vehicle beings complete with memories and shared joys of old friends and past driving adventures.
 Every vukee Car has a unique ID that can be traced back to find out where
life has taken her.

be the first starting point. And, we need your help to finance the first
25 cars. You can pledge to drive the car in your city. You tell us where

start first and then connect all the city points in the next steps.
 Adding cities as we grow widens the convenience of drop off charge points
allowing for greater renter flexibility until we have stretched across America.

Coast) City:

story:
The new Flat Dustpan is an innovative compact dustpan made out of a single piece of polypropylene which convieniently folds flat for easy storage. This award-winning design dustpan not only looks like a modern sculpture, but is a remarkable tool  for cleanning. Additionally, it's ideal for small spaces.

Compared to ordinary dustpans, the Flat Dustpan saves up to 99.5% of space while in storage! The amazing Flat Dustpan is designed for easy storage equipt with a modern, compact look ordinary dustpan don't have.

 

 

Polypropylene is found everywhere in everyday life. This durable material was chosen for the  Flat Dustpan for one significant reason.  It is among the lightest plastic material and is extremely resistant to mechanical stress and chemical agents. The weight of Flat Dustpan is only 97grams but it holds up to 2kg(I can't find 2kg dust so I used water as an example).

 

And yes, it's washable!

Unlike ordinary dustpans made of ordinary plastic, the Flat Dustpan has a longer lifespan due to it's construction of polypropylene. The Flat Dustpan is extremely strong, we guarantee it!

 

 

 

Our company loves to improve products to help life become easier! We also appreciate products that are simple, sustainable and flexible. Our dustpan combines all of these traits, and even comes in an easy-to-storage solution. Handy!

This award-winning dustpan has been in development for two years. At present the Flat Dustpan exists as a series of fully working prototypes, obtained by temporary molds, however, with your help we can make the needed efforts to make Flat Dustpan a reality!

 

 

 

or you can download all the pictures here

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/65451068/du...

story:
We've invented EnergyBuddy™ ...

a small, affordable and easy-to-use but stylish electronic gadget that will help you monitor, manage and see how your family uses electricity around the home.

EnergyBuddy's clever technology simply makes your electricity consumption visible - putting you firmly in control of your utility bill.

All this - and loads more - from a neat little box less than 4" square!

With EnergyBuddy you'll be able to:

  • Save Electricity: 'see the difference' - make your electricity consumption visible and take control ...
  • Save Money: 'feel the difference' - reduce your electricity bill as you learn where it goes ...
  • Save the Planet: 'make a difference' - change your energy usage patterns, reduce your carbon footprint, involve the kids & feel good!

Bringing your electricity to life ...

With a unique glowing 'red, yellow, green' translucent top, EnergyBuddy tells you at a glance whether your consumption is over or under-budget.

It also brings your electricity use to life in far more detail with colorful dashboards showing dials, gizmos, graphs and other neat stuff so that you know exactly where your home's electricity is being used and what you can do to reduce it.

There's also remote on/off control if you've got one or more of our EnergyBuddy SmartPlugs!

And you can get info and control on your iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone or computer screen. As it happens. And get totally secure access from anywhere on the net.

Now that's cooOol!

So far, we've done the R&D and developed fully working pre-production Buddies ...

We're currently totally self-funded and have already developed everything needed to make EnergyBuddy work.

We have been working hard with our manufacturing partner in China since September last year. Injection mold tooling has been fabricated and is undergoing final adjustments. Printed circuit boards have been revised and are now final. And we are just putting the finishing touches to our firmware, cloud software and mobile apps.

The first 100 production samples are being built and we are already working with the first few units from this batch (see our update page for the latest production photos).

PLUS - we've had great feedback since we demonstrated our pre-production Buddies at this year's International Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas back in January and at other recent events.

AND - our heartfelt thanks to Sarah and Joseph from Engadget (http://www.engadget.com) for stopping by while we were setting up the EnergyBuddy stand at the CEA Line Show in New York just before the show opened.

Read what they had to say, see some great pictures and check out their short video of EnergyBuddy here: http://www.engadget.com/2012/06/26/futuredash-energybuddy-hands-on

And now we need your help!

BUT - to make our dream come true and to get EnergyBuddy into as many homes as possible we need to raise enough commitment to place a volume production order and get EnergyBuddy manufactured at a reasonable cost.

That's where YOU can become a part of this!

We need your contributions for us to place our first production order.

And - we'd love your longer-term involvement and feedback once you've received your EnergyBuddy to help us make it even better!

What will we spend your money on?

Your contribution will effectively be a pre-order. We're offering various combinations of EnergyBuddy options - just take a look at the perks list!

Then - if we hit our project goal - the funding will be used for us to complete regulatory approvals, start volume manufacturing and launch the home energy monitoring revolution!

We expect (if everything goes according to plan) to start shipping the perk Buddies by early November.

Key Technical Specs

  • EnergyBuddy gateway connects to your home LAN via Ethernet or 802.11 WiFi. External AC adapter included.
  • Current transformer clamps for standard U.S. residential main circuit panels, with battery
  • operated wireless transmitter.
  • SmartPlug for standard U.S. 3-prong outlets, rated to 15A.
  • iPhone and iPad apps will be available for free download in the Apple App Store.
  • Android app
  • Browser dashboards viewable in any common computer browser: Internet Explorer, Safari, Firefox, Chrome.

FAQ

We've been asked a bunch of questions since this campaign launched - we hope the answers help. We'll add to this list as it grows - if you have a question that isn't on the list below then simply contact us and we'll get you the answer!

  • [Q] "How many current transformer clamps are included in the Home Kits?"
    • Home Kits come with 2 CT (current transformer) clamps and one transmitter.  This is for dual 120V conductors (as is typical in the U.S./ Canada).
  • [Q] "How long is the battery assumed to last in the (current transfomer) transmitter?"
    • About 9 months, and we expect longer with better quality batteries.
  • [Q] "What’s the maximum number of SmartPlugs that can be supported by a single EnergyBuddy?"
    • Theoretically there is no limit that our software can support.  Any limitation will come from the wireless link being used with the sensors and SmartPlugs.
    • We are using a proprietary 433MHz radio link with our CT clamp transmitter and SmartPlugs, and we are confidently testing with 10 SmartPlugs simultaneously at the moment.
    • If you need to manage a larger amount of devices, power strips and appliances then we recommend that you use the ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy that will be available later in the year. ZigBee will also be available as an optional upgrade to the initial 433MHz EnergyBuddy via a ZigBee USB dongle that we plan to offer. We will also be recommending, or possibly offering directly, ZigBee enabled SmartPlugs.
  • [Q] "What support are you offering for International versions of EnergyBuddy?"
    • Certified international versions of EnergyBuddy will start to be available, probably by the end of the year. The AC adapter for the gateway is easily swapped for one with the correct plug (they are all universal AC voltage input already). Our CT clamp wireless transmitter supports up to three plug-in CT clamps, so can be used with one clamp for 220V-240V single phase, single conductor supply, two clamps for dual 120V conductors (as is typical in the U.S./ Canada), and three clamps for 3-phase. There will be 3 different sizes of CT clamp available that can support maximum conductor diameters of 15mm, 18mm and 25mm. AC voltage used for power calculations is programmable in our setup app. And a 220V – 240V version of the SmartPlugs already exists, that has options for several of the common plug types, including Schuko. It’s mostly a matter of getting everything certified for the specific countries or regions, and language localization of the software, and as a startup it comes down to cost and time. We are trying to get there as fast as we can, though please bear with us!
    • In the meantime, our basic Home Kit could be used internationally. The AC adapter for the gateway has universal AC voltage input and would just need an appropriate plug adapter. Although two CT clamps are provided, they are plug in, and so for 220V-240V single phase, single conductor AC supply, like in most of Europe, only one would need to be used. And the AC voltage used for power calculations is programmable in our setup app. Hence as long as the CT clamp will physically fit (maximum conductor size is 18mm for the standard Home Kit), then EnergyBuddy Home Kit (no SmartPlugs) should be useable. Language in the apps and browser dashboards will be U.S. English.  We have added options for international shipping.  However, such international orders will need to be at your own risk and liability, and with the understanding that the product will probably not yet have passed safety and electro-magnetic compatibility certifications for your country (other than the AC adapter). We will do our best to support your installation, and will support a return if it will not work, however we will not be able to cover return shipping costs.
    • We will also support kits with SmartPlugs for international use in countries with 120V supply, under the same conditions as above. This will include Canada, Mexico and other countries that we will be announcing in due course.
    • The EnergyBuddy kits will have passed UL or ETL safety certification for the U.S., and FCC Part 15 electro-magnetic compatibility testing.
  • [Q] "What Support does EnergyBuddy offer for 3-phase?"
    • Our CT clamp wireless transmitter supports up to three plug-in CT clamps, so with three clamps can support 3-phase. This gives the total power on all three phases and does not break out power on each phase. There will be 3 different sizes of CT clamp available that can support maximum conductor diameters of 15mm, 18mm and 25mm. AC voltage is programmable in our setup app.
    • We will setup sales for optional additional CT clamps later on our EnergyBuddy website.
  • [Q] "Do you offer support for second or more electrical panels"
    • Additional electrical panels can be supported with optional add-on sets of CT clamps plus wireless transmitter, which we will make available via the EnergyBuddy website later.  This will also require a cloud software update to be able to designate multiple panels.
  • [Q] "Support for PV/solar and other renewable energy generation"
    • Support for PV and other power generation will be added in a later cloud software update, which will also include support for feed-in tariffs if appropriate. A second set of CT clamps and wireless transmitter, for the output of your inverter, will be required to monitor generation. The CT clamps will be available as an optional add-on, so you can get initially started with an EnergyBuddy kit for monitoring consumption, and add the generation monitoring later.
  • [Q] "Is there a ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy?"
    • The initial version of EnergyBuddy available for pre-ordering uses a proprietary 433MHz wireless link to the CT clamp transmitter and SmartPlugs, and does not include a ZigBee radio.
    • The ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy will be available later in the year and will also have options to support ZigBee Home Automation Profile, ZigBee Smart Energy Profile or both. And it will be able to support other ZigBee enabled devices compatible with the appropriate Profile. There are already some third party ZigBee smart plugs and other energy sensors / controls that we support and we will announce details of these later. If a specific ZigBee device requires a new dashboard, for example a ZigBee programmable thermostat, then new dashboards can be added via a cloud software and mobile apps update.
    • For those pre-ordering an EnergyBuddy, we will also later offer a ZigBee upgrade via an optional ZigBee USB dongle.
  • [Q] "Can the initial version of EnergyBuddy be upgraded to support ZigBee later?"
    • For those pre-ordering an EnergyBuddy, we will also later offer a ZigBee upgrade via an optional ZigBee USB dongle.
  • [Q] "How can I monitor hard-wired appliances, such as HVAC, and lighting?"
    • For monitoring hard-wired appliances such as split A/C, electric ovens, lighting etc., there is a third party multi-circuit monitor that we support with the ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy that requires professional installation at the main electrical panel.  We will provide more details on this later.
    • However, even with our basic Home Kit, it’s easy to get a good idea of the incremental cost of each device or appliance as you switch it on or off, via our mobile apps and browser dashboards.
  • [Q] "Does EnergyBuddy offer support for tiered, TOU and utility specific tariff rates?"
    • General TOU tariffs will be supported in the initial version, though the user will need to manually enter the start and end of each time period and the corresponding rate. In a later cloud software update, we plan to offer the ability for the user to select their appropriate TOU tariff without having to make any manual entries.
    • For tiered tariffs it is not easy to provide a general way to enter a scheme that will cover the myriad and complexity of tiered tariffs available from the more than 3,000 utility companies in the U.S., and the fact that those schemes may change on a monthly or seasonal basis in some cases. Our recommendation for tiered tariffs is either to set a fixed average rate (cents per kWh) that represents your average rate (usually shown on your utility bill), or to set a fixed rate that represents the cost of the tier that you generally end up in by the end of the billing cycle. The latter at least tells you the rate at which you will be saving if you reduce your usage, until the point that you save enough to drop in to the next lower tier.
    • We will later have a cloud software update that will add Green Button support (download of your utility data), that will add the ability to sync costs with your utility when a tiered tariff is in use. And once we release the ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy that will communicate with compatible smart meters (should include PG&E), then support for tiered tariffs will be automatic if the utility offers cost and tariff data via their smart meter ZigBee communications.
  • [Q] "Is EnergyBuddy compatible with Green Button?"
    • We will later have a cloud software update that will add Green Button support (download of your utility data), that will add the ability to sync costs and consumption with your utility.
  • [Q] "What's the product warranty?"
    • 12 months.

 

Any Further Questions?

IMPORTANT! INTERNATIONAL VERSIONS: Our basic Home Kit could be used internationally. See FAQ question for technical details. We have added options for international shipping.  However, such international orders will need to be at your own risk and liability, and with the understanding that the product will probably not yet have passed safety and electro-magnetic compatibility certifications for your country (other than the AC adapter). We will do our best to support your installation, and will support a return if it will not work, however we will not be able to cover return shipping costs.

If you are outside the U.S.A. and would prefer to wait for our certified international versions, please contact us to let us know your interest, and country of residence, and we'll keep you posted.

If you'd like to know more about EnergyBuddy or if you've got a question, then we'd love to hear from you!

Contact us whatever way is easiest - via Indiegogo, our website www.energy-buddy.com or via Facebook. We hope to hear from you soon!

story_txt:
We've invented EnergyBuddy™ ...
a small, affordable and easy-to-use but stylish electronic gadget that will help you monitor, manage and see how your family uses electricity around the home.

EnergyBuddy's clever technology simply makes your electricity consumption visible - putting you firmly in control of your utility bill.
All this - and loads more - from a neat little box less than 4" square!
With EnergyBuddy you'll be able to:


Save Electricity: 'see the difference' - make your electricity consumption visible and take control ...

Save Money: 'feel the difference' - reduce your electricity bill as you learn where it goes ...

Save the Planet: 'make a difference' - change your energy usage patterns, reduce your carbon footprint, involve the kids & feel good!
Bringing your electricity to life ...
With a unique glowing 'red, yellow, green' translucent top, EnergyBuddy tells you at a glance whether your consumption is over or under-budget.

It also brings your electricity use to life in far more detail with colorful dashboards showing dials, gizmos, graphs and other neat stuff so that you know exactly where your home's electricity is being used and what you can do to reduce it.

There's also remote on/off control if you've got one or more of our EnergyBuddy SmartPlugs!
And you can get info and control on your iPhone, iPad, Android smartphone or computer screen. As it happens. And get totally secure access from anywhere on the net.

Now that's cooOol!

So far, we've done the R&D and developed fully working pre-production Buddies ...
We're currently totally self-funded and have already developed everything needed to make EnergyBuddy work.
We have been working hard with our manufacturing partner in China since September last year. Injection mold tooling has been fabricated and is undergoing final adjustments. Printed circuit boards have been revised and are now final. And we are just putting the finishing touches to our firmware, cloud software and mobile apps.
The first 100 production samples are being built and we are already working with the first few units from this batch (see our update page for the latest production photos).
PLUS - we've had great feedback since we demonstrated our pre-production Buddies at this year's International Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas back in January and at other recent events.
AND - our heartfelt thanks to Sarah and Joseph from Engadget (http://www.engadget.com) for stopping by while we were setting up the EnergyBuddy stand at the CEA Line Show in New York just before the show opened.
Read what they had to say, see some great pictures and check out their short video of EnergyBuddy here: http://www.engadget.com/2012/06/26/futuredash-energybuddy-hands-on
And now we need your help!
BUT - to make our dream come true and to get EnergyBuddy into as many homes as possible we need to raise enough commitment to place a volume production order and get EnergyBuddy manufactured at a reasonable cost.
That's where YOU can become a part of this!
We need your contributions for us to place our first production order.
And - we'd love your longer-term involvement and feedback once you've received your EnergyBuddy to help us make it even better!
What will we spend your money on?
Your contribution will effectively be a pre-order. We're offering various combinations of EnergyBuddy options - just take a look at the perks list!
Then - if we hit our project goal - the funding will be used for us to complete regulatory approvals, start volume manufacturing and launch the home energy monitoring revolution!
We expect (if everything goes according to plan) to start shipping the perk Buddies by early November.
Key Technical Specs


EnergyBuddy gateway connects to your home LAN via Ethernet or 802.11 WiFi. External AC adapter included.

Current transformer clamps for standard U.S. residential main circuit panels, with battery
operated wireless transmitter.

SmartPlug for standard U.S. 3-prong outlets, rated to 15A.

iPhone and iPad apps will be available for free download in the Apple App Store.
Android app

Browser dashboards viewable in any common computer browser: Internet Explorer, Safari, Firefox, Chrome.
FAQ
We've been asked a bunch of questions since this campaign launched - we hope the answers help. We'll add to this list as it grows - if you have a question that isn't on the list below then simply contact us and we'll get you the answer!


[Q] "How many current transformer clamps are included in the Home Kits?"


Home Kits come with 2 CT (current transformer) clamps and one transmitter.  This is for dual 120V conductors (as is typical in the U.S./ Canada).



[Q] "How long is the battery assumed to last in the (current transfomer) transmitter?"
About 9 months, and we expect longer with better quality batteries.



[Q] "What’s the maximum number of SmartPlugs that can be supported by a single EnergyBuddy?"
Theoretically there is no limit that our software can support.  Any limitation will come from the wireless link being used with the sensors and SmartPlugs.
We are using a proprietary 433MHz radio link with our CT clamp transmitter and SmartPlugs, and we are confidently testing with 10 SmartPlugs simultaneously at the moment.
If you need to manage a larger amount of devices, power strips and appliances then we recommend that you use the ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy that will be available later in the year. ZigBee will also be available as an optional upgrade to the initial 433MHz EnergyBuddy via a ZigBee USB dongle that we plan to offer. We will also be recommending, or possibly offering directly, ZigBee enabled SmartPlugs.




[Q] "What support are you offering for International versions of EnergyBuddy?"

Certified international versions of EnergyBuddy will start to be available, probably by the end of the year. The AC adapter for the gateway is easily swapped for one with the correct plug (they are all universal AC voltage input already). Our CT clamp wireless transmitter supports up to three plug-in CT clamps, so can be used with one clamp for 220V-240V single phase, single conductor supply, two clamps for dual 120V conductors (as is typical in the U.S./ Canada), and three clamps for 3-phase. There will be 3 different sizes of CT clamp available that can support maximum conductor diameters of 15mm, 18mm and 25mm. AC voltage used for power calculations is programmable in our setup app. And a 220V – 240V version of the SmartPlugs already exists, that has options for several of the common plug types, including Schuko. It’s mostly a matter of getting everything certified for the specific countries or regions, and language localization of the software, and as a startup it comes down to cost and time. We are trying to get there as fast as we can, though please bear with us!
In the meantime, our basic Home Kit could be used internationally. The AC adapter for the gateway has universal AC voltage input and would just need an appropriate plug adapter. Although two CT clamps are provided, they are plug in, and so for 220V-240V single phase, single conductor AC supply, like in most of Europe, only one would need to be used. And the AC voltage used for power calculations is programmable in our setup app. Hence as long as the CT clamp will physically fit (maximum conductor size is 18mm for the standard Home Kit), then EnergyBuddy Home Kit (no SmartPlugs) should be useable. Language in the apps and browser dashboards will be U.S. English.  We have added options for international shipping.  However, such international orders will need to be at your own risk and liability, and with the understanding that the product will probably not yet have passed safety and electro-magnetic compatibility certifications for your country (other than the AC adapter). We will do our best to support your installation, and will support a return if it will not work, however we will not be able to cover return shipping costs.
We will also support kits with SmartPlugs for international use in countries with 120V supply, under the same conditions as above. This will include Canada, Mexico and other countries that we will be announcing in due course.
The EnergyBuddy kits will have passed UL or ETL safety certification for the U.S., and FCC Part 15 electro-magnetic compatibility testing.



[Q] "What Support does EnergyBuddy offer for 3-phase?"

Our CT clamp wireless transmitter supports up to three plug-in CT clamps, so with three clamps can support 3-phase. This gives the total power on all three phases and does not break out power on each phase. There will be 3 different sizes of CT clamp available that can support maximum conductor diameters of 15mm, 18mm and 25mm. AC voltage is programmable in our setup app.
We will setup sales for optional additional CT clamps later on our EnergyBuddy website.



[Q] "Do you offer support for second or more electrical panels"

Additional electrical panels can be supported with optional add-on sets of CT clamps plus wireless transmitter, which we will make available via the EnergyBuddy website later.  This will also require a cloud software update to be able to designate multiple panels.



[Q] "Support for PV/solar and other renewable energy generation"

Support for PV and other power generation will be added in a later cloud software update, which will also include support for feed-in tariffs if appropriate. A second set of CT clamps and wireless transmitter, for the output of your inverter, will be required to monitor generation. The CT clamps will be available as an optional add-on, so you can get initially started with an EnergyBuddy kit for monitoring consumption, and add the generation monitoring later.



[Q] "Is there a ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy?"

The initial version of EnergyBuddy available for pre-ordering uses a proprietary 433MHz wireless link to the CT clamp transmitter and SmartPlugs, and does not include a ZigBee radio.
The ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy will be available later in the year and will also have options to support ZigBee Home Automation Profile, ZigBee Smart Energy Profile or both. And it will be able to support other ZigBee enabled devices compatible with the appropriate Profile. There are already some third party ZigBee smart plugs and other energy sensors / controls that we support and we will announce details of these later. If a specific ZigBee device requires a new dashboard, for example a ZigBee programmable thermostat, then new dashboards can be added via a cloud software and mobile apps update.
For those pre-ordering an EnergyBuddy, we will also later offer a ZigBee upgrade via an optional ZigBee USB dongle.



[Q] "Can the initial version of EnergyBuddy be upgraded to support ZigBee later?"
For those pre-ordering an EnergyBuddy, we will also later offer a ZigBee upgrade via an optional ZigBee USB dongle.



[Q] "How can I monitor hard-wired appliances, such as HVAC, and lighting?"

For monitoring hard-wired appliances such as split A/C, electric ovens, lighting etc., there is a third party multi-circuit monitor that we support with the ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy that requires professional installation at the main electrical panel.  We will provide more details on this later.

However, even with our basic Home Kit, it’s easy to get a good idea of the incremental cost of each device or appliance as you switch it on or off, via our mobile apps and browser dashboards.



[Q] "Does EnergyBuddy offer support for tiered, TOU and utility specific tariff rates?"
General TOU tariffs will be supported in the initial version, though the user will need to manually enter the start and end of each time period and the corresponding rate. In a later cloud software update, we plan to offer the ability for the user to select their appropriate TOU tariff without having to make any manual entries.

For tiered tariffs it is not easy to provide a general way to enter a scheme that will cover the myriad and complexity of tiered tariffs available from the more than 3,000 utility companies in the U.S., and the fact that those schemes may change on a monthly or seasonal basis in some cases. Our recommendation for tiered tariffs is either to set a fixed average rate (cents per kWh) that represents your average rate (usually shown on your utility bill), or to set a fixed rate that represents the cost of the tier that you generally end up in by the end of the billing cycle. The latter at least tells you the rate at which you will be saving if you reduce your usage, until the point that you save enough to drop in to the next lower tier.
We will later have a cloud software update that will add Green Button support (download of your utility data), that will add the ability to sync costs with your utility when a tiered tariff is in use. And once we release the ZigBee version of EnergyBuddy that will communicate with compatible smart meters (should include PG&E), then support for tiered tariffs will be automatic if the utility offers cost and tariff data via their smart meter ZigBee communications.



[Q] "Is EnergyBuddy compatible with Green Button?"
We will later have a cloud software update that will add Green Button support (download of your utility data), that will add the ability to sync costs and consumption with your utility.




[Q] "What's the product warranty?"
12 months.



 
Any Further Questions?
IMPORTANT! INTERNATIONAL VERSIONS: Our basic Home Kit could be used internationally. See FAQ question for technical details. We have added options for international shipping.  However, such international orders will need to be at your own risk and liability, and with the understanding that the product will probably not yet have passed safety and electro-magnetic compatibility certifications for your country (other than the AC adapter). We will do our best to support your installation, and will support a return if it will not work, however we will not be able to cover return shipping costs.
If you are outside the U.S.A. and would prefer to wait for our certified international versions, please contact us to let us know your interest, and country of residence, and we'll keep you posted.
If you'd like to know more about EnergyBuddy or if you've got a question, then we'd love to hear from you!
Contact us whatever way is easiest - via Indiegogo, our website www.energy-buddy.com or via Facebook. We hope to hear from you soon!

story:
A2ESK8 Squad

CARVON V1, V2/2.5 and V3 Dual Direct Drive Motors

 

CARVON has been at the forefront of the Electric Skateboard and Longboard revolution. Our Hub Motors kit have long been popular with the Electric Skateboard DIY crowd, like the A2ESK8 Squad pictured above. We have a lot of positive feedbacks from the internet forums. One of our best riders, Rik of runplayback.com, has a video of him reaching 31 mph on his Single V2 Hub Motor. 

 

 

V3/V4 SpeedDrive -- Not Hub or InWheel Motors

V3 SpeedDrive Motors

Our new CARVON SpeedDrive Dual Direct Drive Motors are not hub motors. They are not positioned inside the wheels. They are positioned next to the wheels, so that the whole structure of the wheel is maintained. Experience has taught us that having full and thick wheels is better in terms of the ride quality and long-term durability of the motors.  Just say "NO" to thin urethane!

The motors also do not carry the load of the rider, they are just there to spin the wheel. They are locked on with additional fasteners, not just by the axle lock nuts, which makes them very secure and they will not move no matter how much acceleration and brake forces there are. And yet, because we use fasteners and not permanent epoxy, the motors can be easily removed and serviced.

V4 SpeedDrive Motors with MBS 100mm Wheels

New CARVON EVO perk will come with V4 SpeedDrive that allows the use of multiple wheels. It can be mounted with original ABEC 11 90mm/97mm Flywheels, blank 90mm/97mm wheels (which comes in different colors), or MBS A/T Longboard 100mm wheels.

 

 

CARVON EVO -- The Longboarder's Premium Electric Board

CARVON EVO with Landyachtz Evo Deck

This is the CARVON EVO with V4 SpeedDrive motors, a Landyachtz Evo drop-down deck and ability to use multiple full-urethane wheels for an unparalleled riding experience. The V4 SD motors can rocket the EVO and its rider past 35 mph. By having no belts, the V4 has almost no drag and can coast really, really far--just like hub motors. The use of full-urethane wheels means the motors are not affected by constant road shocks and you can rotate all four wheels, just like car tires, for an even wear. It also means that the EVO looks super-stealthy and can easily be mistaken as a regular longboard. 

The CARVON EVO is the Electric Longboard that feels and rides closest to a regular, non-powered Longboard. It is the natural "EVOlution" of the Electric Skateboard/Longboard. If you like E-boards, but feel they are too mechanized and does not ride smoothly, this is the one for you. If you like bombing hills but live on flat terrain, this is the one for you. If you like coasting but do not like riding with thin-urethane wheels, this is the one for you.

 

CARVON EVO Tech Specs:

V4 SpeedDrive Sensored Motors with 5000w Combined Power

12s3p Samsung 30Q Battery Pack

90mm ABEC 11 Flywheels

Landyachtz EVO Deck

Surf-rodz 200mm RKP front truck

ShredLights Set

35+ mph top speed and up to 15% hill climb ability

Range of up to 20 miles

story:
Help take us from prototype to reality!

 

We bring you Go’n Toxic, and we promise this will bring hours of enjoyment to your kids.

Remember the days where you use to stick pegs, plastic, even cans on your push bike to give it the sound of a motor bike? I’m sure most of us at some stage in our life tried it.
Well we wanted to take this idea into the 21st century and give children the realism they were looking for.
With our product, your child can simply choose what type of motorbike, they wish to simulate.  Eg.. Harley Davidson, Dirt Bike, or other sound effects like UFO. 

The attached exhaust then plays real audio recordings of that bike. It increases and decreases in pitch and tempo as the bike changes its speed. It really does sound like you’re riding a real motorbike! No cheesy digital audio, just the real thing.
Your child can ride in style!

 

Latest Prototype

 

Before starting this campaign we have been working tirelessly to make sure that everything is in pace as soon as the money has been raised. So far we now have a provisionary patent on Go’n Toxic as well as other security measures in place.



Early Preliminary Design Stages

CREATIVE AIDED DESIGN
Much CAD work has been done and tested for us to give you the best first release of this product. Here is a sample of the levers used for supporting the toy.

 

REWARDS

 

 

Thank you for helping to make this a great product. We appreciate even the smallest amount given. It all helps, and please spread the word!

All the best from the Go'n Toxic Team

story:
Light Up and Ready!

Introducing the world's safest and most advanced pedal.

If you are an avid bicyclist, you are probably well-aware of the dangers that are posed when driving with cars.
Helmets and other protective gear are suggested to keep you safe, but now, there is a new item that will revolutionize how bicyclists share the road with everyone else. The SmartPedal is a bicycle pedal designed using Bluetooth technology so that it will sync with your smartphone. Using touch or voice commands, you can tell the SmartPedal whether you will be turning left or right, allowing traffic to know when and where you will be turning.
This is the latest innovation in bicycle pedal technology that will keep you safe and everyone around you informed.

SmartPedal is ready to change the bicycle riding performance inside urban traffic using incorporated modern technology inside a bycicle pedal.

Turn your bicycle into a smart vehicle!

                     


You can easily install the SmartPedals in your bicycle and connect them to your Smartphone using a Bluetooth connection,

It allows you to show to the surrounding traffic your intent to make a turn with a simple voice command or touch gesture (depending whether you start the application with voice or touch mode), activating a blinking light sequence every time you want to signal a turn. The application will be IOS and Android compatible, allowing the user to share and review it's performance along with many other useful and interactive options. 
            


While riding the bicycle a red light is allways displayed in the back and a white light in the front regardless of the pedal orientation thanks to a position sensor integrated inside the pedal. The dual light emission system along with the light guide technology, creates a very good visibility from all traffic angles and the reflector included in the body reinforces the security provided by the SmartPedal in terms of visibility.


It is made out of highly durable materials!

The main body is made out of high resistance high gloss finished polyamide,  with the exception of the wavy area which has a grainy texture to allow a better surface grip.
The axle is made of high durability stainless steel and uses the latest internal technology to improve the pedal performance and comfort factor. It has a standard based thread, which means it is compatible with most bicycles.

The application is easy to use and allows GPS tracking. The pedals require no special mechanical skills to mount and each one uses an internal rechargeable battery as power source.


Tech Specs


Project Timeline

Spread the word!!




FAQ's


What if I run out of battery in my Smartphone?

Even if you run out of battery in you Smartphone the pedal will keep working with it's basic function of light emission (red backward and white forward all the time). Of course you won't be able to control it via Smartphone and activate the turn indicator sequence (blinking sequence).


Does it have any kind of anti-theft incorporated system?

Altough the pedal itself is a project mainly specialized in safety while riding in urban traffic it does have GPS tracking inside the application, which will allow you to track your position/routes via Smartphone. Beside this we are expecting to include a GPS sensor inside the SmartPedal itself to allow the user to track the position of the bicycle while the SmartPedals are on.


How much can the body withstand?

The SmartPedal body was built to withstand regular use and common abuses over the body structure. The top and bottom surfaces are internally reinforced to support the loads generated by the rider and the screen is designed to resist abuses like common impacts or misuse.


What is the weight of a pair of SmartPedals?

A pair of SmartPedals weights approximately 445 grams/0.98 pounds.


How intense is the light emission?

We have not made a prototype of the internal light guide and consequently the prototype body that you see in the video has a much lower light emission than the finished product and only serves for simulation purposes. Prototyping is allways limited by technology development. In our case, we ensure you that the finished product (including the final lightguide technology) will have 2 to 3 times more light emission intensity and will allow a visibility from at least 20 meters/65 feet away.



How can I charge the internal battery?

The final product package will include a charger with USB connectivity, allowing you to charge the batteries using a regular household plug or a USB plug. 


Why isn't the system self sustaining/self recharging?

Self sustaining/recharging systems require a certain amount of constant outside energy input in order to work properly. The  SmartPedal's internal system packs a great load of integrated technology. We have runned various studies analysing the possibilities to implement a self sustaining system and concluded that it would compromise the user's comfort and the pedal size more than expected. We want SmartPedal to be a product that simplifies the user's life, offering security and freedom on the road and not a product that restricts and complexifies the user's possibilities. Although all of this is true, we are still working and will keep working towards this goal.


Why we need Crowdfunding?

The SmartPedal Team has set a goal that includes the full process of mass production of the SmartPedal while maintaining a high quality final product and for that we need your help. We want to bring the best to you!


Costumer Feedback/Questions

The SmartPedal Team is allways in the lookout for costumer satisfaction and/or feedback. Contact us if you have any questions related to the project, we assure you a 24 hours response.
story_txt:
Light Up and Ready!Introducing the world's safest and most advanced pedal.If you are an avid bicyclist, you are 
probably well-aware of the dangers that are posed when driving with 
cars. Helmets and other protective gear are suggested to keep you safe, 
but now, there is a new item that will revolutionize how bicyclists 
share the road with everyone else. The SmartPedal 
is a bicycle pedal designed using Bluetooth technology so that it will 
sync with your smartphone. Using touch or voice commands, you can tell 
the SmartPedal whether you will be turning left or right, allowing 
traffic to know when and where you will be turning. This is the latest 
innovation in bicycle pedal technology that will keep you safe and everyone around you informed.
SmartPedal is ready to change the bicycle riding performance inside urban traffic using incorporated modern technology inside a bycicle pedal.Turn your bicycle into a smart vehicle!                     You can easily install the SmartPedals in your bicycle and connect them to your Smartphone using a Bluetooth connection,

It allows you to show to the surrounding traffic your intent to make a turn with a simple voice command or touch gesture (depending whether you start the application with voice or touch mode), activating a blinking light sequence every time you want to signal a turn. The application will be IOS and Android compatible, allowing the user to share and review it's performance along with many other useful and interactive options. 
            

While riding the bicycle a red light is allways displayed in the back and a white light in the front regardless of the pedal orientation thanks to a position sensor integrated inside the pedal. The dual light emission system along with the light guide technology, creates a very good visibility from all traffic angles and the reflector included in the body reinforces the security provided by the SmartPedal in terms of visibility.


It is made out of  highly durable materials!The main body is made out of high resistance high gloss finished polyamide,  with the exception of the wavy area which has a grainy texture to allow a better surface grip.
The axle is made of high durability stainless steel and uses the latest internal technology to improve the pedal performance and comfort factor. It has a standard based thread, which means it is compatible with most bicycles.

The application is easy to use and allows GPS tracking. The pedals require no special mechanical skills to mount and each one uses an internal rechargeable battery as power source.Tech Specs



Project Timeline




Spread the word!!






FAQ's

Although all of this is true, we are still working and will keep working towards this goal.

The SmartPedal Team has set a goal that includes the full process of mass production of the SmartPedal while maintaining a high quality final product and for that we need your help. We want to bring the best to you!
