story:
Movea - The new hi-tech designer e-bike

 

All around the world bikes are becoming ever more integrated into urban mobility and we at Movea see the e-bike as a key player in this. However, we could not find a bike that united our core values; simplicity, ease of use and minimalistic Scandinavian design. So we built it. 

With the new Movea you get a bike that is beautifully designed for urban riding with easy of use, minimal styling, performance and high quality. All whilst retaining affordability. 

Our aim is to keep Movea bikes clean and simple but also highly functional. To do this we’ve incorporated practical features like our oil/stain free carbon belt drive and an elegant secure rack for your urban cargo. Power is supplied when you need it by the reliable proven Zehus e-hub. Packed into the beautifully light hub is the motor, self-charging battery and all the smarts that enable you to monitor and control your bike using your mobile phone. 

Movea is designed by the Danish designer Anders Hermansen, formerly designer at Bang & Olufsen. He worked with us to create a bicycle that perfectly balances comfort, style, performance, quality and affordability.

Movea 24" Mens 

Movea 20" Womens

Movea 20" Womens

Womens bikes will be delivered in Rubin Metallic. Mens bikes will be delivered in black.

Smartphone Control

Bluetooth connectivity allows you to connect your smartphone (both iOS and Android are supported) to your Movea to select your favourite power mode, manage your trip and even lock the bike. 

Motor and Battery

Movea is mounted with the Italian-made Zehus Bike system – a 250W electric motor and 30V lithium ion 160Wh battery in an elegant aluminium hub. Sensors are embedded within the hub to determine how much power assistance to give you (eAssist).

Enjoy eAssist  up to 25 km/h (U.S. 15 MPH) with a range of up to 100 km (60 miles). The Zehus Hub self-charges; your bike automatically recharges when you coast downhill or pedal backwards. You also have the possibility to charge it by plugging it in using the included charger - it only takes  3 hours from empty. It adapts completely to your needs.

Your MOVEA comes with a proven carbon belt drive. No need to maintenance

One great advantage of this carbon belt is that it is oil free; you will not have any oil stains on you or if you transport it in your car.

Beautiful Scandinavian design, mounted with our practical Movea front rack as a cargo solution

 
The front cargo solution is ideal for keeping an eye on your stuff when you are riding in town.
 

 

 

 
 

Smaller wheels but with the geometry of a standard bike

The size of our bike is designed to match a normal city bike when you compare it at wheelbase and saddle – handlebar. The Movea is specially tailored for riding in traffic and urban areas - more compact smaller wheels give enhanced manouvreability and easier start/stopping.

Sizing Guide

Both mens and womens bikes are available in two sizes:

20" wheels for riders 150-185cm tall
24" wheels for riders 160-195+ cm tall


Technical Details

All Movea bikes come with a beautiful matching aluminium set of mudguards and the charger for the eHub in case you want to plug it in. 

We bring 25 years of knowledge and experience in the bicycle business to guarantee you the finest quality, comfort and stylish design.

Warranty:

  • 5-year warranty on frame and forks
  • 2-year warranty on the eHub from the day you register it

There are service center-partners for the Zehus eHub set up worldwide. Your eHub can even send diagnostic information to support representatives so that they can quickly and easily assess any faults or maintenance that it requires. 

 

We're up for some awards...

 

About Us

 

Press about Movea

 

"Only the highest quality components are used for the Movea E-Bike"
(Pedelecs & E-Bikes)

"It fits the motor, the complete electronics and the battery into the housing of the rear wheel hub - and relies on recuperation (i.e. energy recovery) of the battery."
(Radmarkt)

"The absolute highlight, however, is the fact that the battery no longer needs to be removed for charging and connected to the mains."
(Turn On - Das SATURN Magazin)

"Movea is a new e-bike on the market that impressively combines simple design with the latest technology and functionality. A handy and stylish bike designed specifically for urban use, a real alternative to busy public transport and traffic jams, nominated for the Cyclingworld Award in the "Best Design" and "Best E-Bike" categories even before its official launch."
(VeloTotal)

"MOVEA - E-bike with fun factor. Two Danes have created an E-bike that is out of the ordinary in terms of design."
(Elektrobike)

"...perfect balance of comfort, style, performance, quality and affordability."
(Electricbikes)

"Ordinary bicycles or e-bikes severely restrict freedom of movement in an urban environment simply due to their size and bulky design. Movea offers shapely, handy and solution-oriented design paired with high quality and the latest technology."
(Designbote)

 
 

Frequently Asked Questions

Where is the battery? You don't see it.

The battery is integrated into the hub situated in the back wheel together with the motor and the electronics (all-in-one integrated system). 

How do you control the electric bike?

Via an mobile phone app (iOS and Android). You can decide how much assist you really want.  When you don’t need it, it’s not there and the hub is conserving energy and charging. It’s a one speed electrical bicycle, it has no gears. You just jump on your Movea and go.

What is the turbo mode?

The turbo mode is the power mode that you will find on a regular pedelec (Electric Pedal Assisted Bicycle). The motor assists up to a speed of 25km/h.

What kind of app does it use to connect to the hub?

The Bitride app allows to connect through a wide range of devices via Bluetooth including your Movea bike. The app is free-of-charge and can be downloaded through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store.

How does it help when I connect my Movea Bike via bluetooth?

- GPS tracking of your rides and where your bike is

- Locking the rear wheel making it very difficult to pedal (available when the battery charge is greater than 20%)

- Custom dashboard and changing power modes (see next question)

 What kind of information does the App on my phone provide?

- State of charge of the battery in percentage

- Active power mode (you can also switch between power modes while on the go)

- Warning icon

- Lock and unlock my bike

- Total/Partial odometer

- Road slope

- Motor Power


Can I ride the bike without the smartphone?

Yes, you can! Your Movea Bike will remember your favourite settings, so you can get the best experience out of it. 

Can I still ride the bike when the power mode is turned off?

Yes, you can. Even when the regenerative braking is turned off, you can continue to ride the Movea in the same way as a non-electric lightweight bike.

Can I buy accessories and components for the Movea bike?

Mudguards, bungee cord and a charger for the Movea are all included with your bike. You can mount any other standard bike accessories on your Movea.

What size should I ride?

20" wheels if you are 150-185cm tall (both men and women)
24" wheels if you  are 160-195+ cm tall

story:
Why we made OULOO-BX ???

 

 

  •  The train is late—again—and when it finally pulls into the station, it’s packed with so many sweaty faces you have to suck in your stomach just to squeeze inside
  • Road construction has brought morning traffic to a standstill. As you count your breaths to distract yourself from the meeting you know started five minutes ago, you look out your window wistfully at the motorcycles weaving across the asphalt, slicing between cars like a cocky knife through butter worry about parking spots anymore.

 

                                            

 

  • After carrying your fixed-gear bike down three flights of stairs and taking the bridge, you’ve finally arrived at the office. You’re not sure whether that feeling tickling your chest is pride, or the slow waterfall of sweat that has staked a claim on your button-up.
 

For that  we design OULOO-BX to be most city commuters you like, It is Small in stature, big in attitude    

 

 

 

How is OULOO-BX different from other e-bikes? Glad you asked.!!!

LET'S DISCOVER OULOO-BX IN DEPTH

 

  • Small in stature, big in attitude. OULOO-BX boasts just as much power as its competitors, at a fraction of the size (and cost).

 

  • No road left untraveled—with 12-inch wheels and superior rear suspension, OULOO-BX can ride anywhere your commute takes you.
  •  

  • Light as a feather, stiff as aluminum. We use Aluminum 6061, the strongest and lightest form of aluminum available.
  • Ready, set, charge—not only can one charge carry you up to 60 miles/km/hours[1] , but if your phone or other electronic device needs a boost on the go, you can get a little juice from the USB plug, and keep an eye on battery levels with the LCD screen.

 

●       Easy on the arms. The distance between OULOO-BX’s handlebar and saddle point is 15 cm (5 in) longer than that of other e-bikes, which results in an easier and more ergonomic ride.

●       Power seat—An angled saddle not only means greater comfort, but also greater pedal power and stability.

 

  • Leg room—the OULOO-BX saddle is also adjustable up to 195 cm (76 in), which means one size really does fit all.
  • Can I get an extension? The rear wheel extends back further than most other e-bikes, which performs double-duty, giving you extra stability, especially when you flip on the motor, as well as an easier turning radius.

 

`

  • LCD Display Includes all functions of the above original display ,Full-color LCD display for easier viewing,Any time access to advanced settings
  • Displays battery life in %, distance covered, speed, all needed data

 

  • Configurable for personalized settings
  • Built-in USB charger
  • 3 speeds and 0 (no assist)
  • On-the-go power-for lock currently speed for comfortable riding

 

 

  • Water and dust poof
  • Plug and play wiring system

  

Fiend Your OULOO-BX :                                                                        

        

 

A Closer Look At What Make OULOO BX Number 1 In World

 

                                                       
 
 

OULOO-BX Colour 

 

OULOO-BX Add-ons and Accessories 

 

         

 

         

 

Our OULOO-BX Team Family !

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

How much weight can OULOO-BX handle?

OULOO-BX can easily handle riders of up to 120 kg, or 265 lbs.

The price is very low for an e-bike. How is that possible?

With extensive experience manufacturing e-bikes in China, we’re able to manufacture them ourselves in our factory in China, which allows us to control every step of the engineering process—from the cost of each part, to the quality of material. Our shipping partners are also able to bring down the shipping cost, a savings we pass on to you.

Does OULOO-BX come in different sizes?

With saddle and handlebar adjustments that can accommodate any height from 150 cm/4’9” to 215 cm/7’0”, OULOO-BX is one-size-fits-all.

I can't see the battery - where is it?

We believe batteries should be felt, not seen. That’s why ours is tucked inside the bike’s frame, protecting it from harm and you from an eyesore.

Can I still ride my OULOO-BX if the battery runs out of power?

Of course! You always have the option to ride it as you would a regular bicycle.

How much does shipping cost?

Since we ship directly from our factory in China, we’re able to keep costs low, to $99 worldwide.

Note: If you live in an area that’s classified by the post office as difficult to ship to, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that we may not be able to ship to some destinations, such as remote islands. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, please contact us before placing your order

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. Duties/VAT/GTS are to be paid before we can deliver your OULOO-BX. We’ll send payment links, an invoice, and will ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship your OULOO-BX.

My bike box arrived damaged. What should i do?

If there is visible damage to your OULOO-BX box that appears to have damaged the bike and/or its other contents, please notify the courier immediately, as they are held responsible for all damage caused in transit. Request documentation from them stating that you have received a box with visible damages. You will need this for insurance purposes to qualify for a replacement OULOO-BX.

What kind of warranty do you offer?

All OULOO-BX bikes and batteries come with a 2-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter some production-related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty. As many elements of a bike may get damaged due to normal cycling use/natural wear, we don’t offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, chains, brake pads, etc. For more details, please contact our customer service department.

What is your returns policy?

This is the "OULOO-promise": We are so confident that you will love your OULOO-BX that we offer you a 14-day money-back guarantee after you’ve received it.

Note that if you decide to return your OULOO-BX bike during this time, it must be in new and re-sellable condition. Also, returns shipping to our nearest regional warehouse must be covered by you.

What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?

Please visit the ouloobikes.com shop (coming soon) to explore our accessories, and check back regularly for new products. Also, let us know what kind of accessories you’d be most interested in seeing You can message us at info@ouloobikes.com.

How do I buy spare parts or service the bike? Can I go to any bike shop?

Any local bike store is able to service your OULOO-BX, as most of the components are standard. The battery and electronic modules can be bought directly from us and are easily installed. A number of accessories will also be available on our website, which is coming soon.

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.


In the event we are unable to deliver your OULOO-BX to your location due to any legal restrictions on the import or delivery of your bike, we shall refund you 75% of the amount on your Indiegogo campaign contribution. You are responsible for determining whether its legal to import, deliver, and operate the OULOO-BX at your location. In the event you cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made, we will assess an administration fee of 25% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder. 

Do I need a license to ride OULOO-BX ?

No. Our bikes are made 100% street legal. We offer two distinctive versions of OULOO: OULOO-BX with a 250W motor, which is legal in the EU; and OULOO-BX with a 350W motor for the US.

No road left untraveled—with 12-inch wheels and superior rear suspension, OULOO-BX can ride anywhere your commute takes you.
 

Light as a feather, stiff as aluminum. We use Aluminum 6061, the strongest and lightest form of aluminum available.
Ready, set, charge—not only can one charge carry you up to 60 miles/km/hours[1] , but if your phone or other electronic device needs a boost on the go, you can get a little juice from the USB plug, and keep an eye on battery levels with the LCD screen.
 ●       Easy on the arms. The distance between OULOO-BX’s handlebar and saddle point is 15 cm (5 in) longer than that of other e-bikes, which results in an easier and more ergonomic ride.●       Power seat—An angled saddle not only means greater comfort, but also greater pedal power and stability. 
Leg room—the OULOO-BX saddle is also adjustable up to 195 cm (76 in), which means one size really does fit all.
Can I get an extension? The rear wheel extends back further than most other e-bikes, which performs double-duty, giving you extra stability, especially when you flip on the motor, as well as an easier turning radius.
 `

LCD Display Includes all functions of the above original display ,Full-color LCD display for easier viewing,Any time access to advanced settings
Displays battery life in %, distance covered, speed, all needed data

 


Configurable for personalized settings
Built-in USB charger
3 speeds and 0 (no assist)
On-the-go power-for lock currently speed for comfortable riding

 

 


Water and dust poof
Plug and play wiring system


   
Fiend Your OULOO-BX :                                                                        
         
 
A Closer Look At What Make OULOO BX Number 1 In World




 
                                                       

 
 
OULOO-BX Colour  

 
OULOO-BX Add-ons and Accessories 
 
          
 
         
 
Our OULOO-BX Team Family !

 
 
 
       FAQHow much weight can OULOO-BX handle?OULOO-BX can easily handle riders of up to 120 kg, or 265 lbs.The price is very low for an e-bike. How is that possible?With extensive experience manufacturing e-bikes in China, we’re able to manufacture them ourselves in our factory in China, which allows us to control every step of the engineering process—from the cost of each part, to the quality of material. Our shipping partners are also able to bring down the shipping cost, a savings we pass on to you.Does OULOO-BX come in different sizes?With saddle and handlebar adjustments that can accommodate any height from 150 cm/4’9” to 215 cm/7’0”, OULOO-BX is one-size-fits-all.I can't see the battery - where is it?We believe batteries should be felt, not seen. That’s why ours is tucked inside the bike’s frame, protecting it from harm and you from an eyesore.Can I still ride my OULOO-BX if the battery runs out of power?Of course! You always have the option to ride it as you would a regular bicycle.How much does shipping cost?Since we ship directly from our factory in China, we’re able to keep costs low, to $99 worldwide.Note: If you live in an area that’s classified by the post office as difficult to ship to, such as remote locations, extra shipping costs may be applied. Please also note that we may not be able to ship to some destinations, such as remote islands. If you think you live in a hard-to-reach location, please contact us before placing your orderWho is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. Duties/VAT/GTS are to be paid before we can deliver your OULOO-BX. We’ll send payment links, an invoice, and will ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship your OULOO-BX.My bike box arrived damaged. What should i do?If there is visible damage to your OULOO-BX box that appears to have damaged the bike and/or its other contents, please notify the courier immediately, as they are held responsible for all damage caused in transit. Request documentation from them stating that you have received a box with visible damages. You will need this for insurance purposes to qualify for a replacement OULOO-BX.What kind of warranty do you offer?All OULOO-BX bikes and batteries come with a 2-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter some production-related manufacturer’s defect during this time, we will take care of it according to our warranty. As many elements of a bike may get damaged due to normal cycling use/natural wear, we don’t offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes, chains, brake pads, etc. For more details, please contact our customer service department.What is your returns policy?This is the "OULOO-promise": We are so confident that you will love your OULOO-BX that we offer you a 14-day money-back guarantee after you’ve received it.Note that if you decide to return your OULOO-BX bike during this time, it must be in new and re-sellable condition. Also, returns shipping to our nearest regional warehouse must be covered by you.What kind of accessories do you currently have or can I expect in the near future?Please visit the ouloobikes.com shop (coming soon) to explore our accessories, and check back regularly for new products. Also, let us know what kind of accessories you’d be most interested in seeing You can message us at info@ouloobikes.com.How do I buy spare parts or service the bike? Can I go to any bike shop?Any local bike store is able to service your OULOO-BX, as most of the components are standard. The battery and electronic modules can be bought directly from us and are easily installed. A number of accessories will also be available on our website, which is coming soon.Can I get a refund?Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.In the event we are unable to deliver your OULOO-BX to your location due to any legal restrictions on the import or delivery of your bike, we shall refund you 75% of the amount on your Indiegogo campaign contribution. You are responsible for determining whether its legal to import, deliver, and operate the OULOO-BX at your location. In the event you cancel your Indiegogo contribution more than 10 days after it was made, we will assess an administration fee of 25% of your pledge and shall refund the remainder. Do I need a license to ride OULOO-BX ?No. Our bikes are made 100% street legal. We offer two distinctive versions of OULOO: OULOO-BX with a 250W motor, which is legal in the EU; and OULOO-BX with a 350W motor for the US.

story:
What if there was a product that eliminated flat tires in developing countries?

What if this product was affordable and increased incomes for those on the edge of extreme poverty by 25%?

What if this same product made it safer for women to travel on their own and allowed more children to attend school reliably? 

And what if YOU could support a cause that would impact millions of families whose income depends upon bicycles?

This product exists …. and you can change those lives NOW! 

Baisikeli Ugunduzi has a revolutionary product that eliminates the biggest problem with bicycles in the developing world - flat tires. The milele bicycle tube replaces the traditional pneumatic tube with a flexible tube that never needs air and never needs to be patched. 


Ben and John with the signature green milele tube sticking out of a tire

The largest group of cyclists who will benefit from this new product are the 1 million African bicycle taxi drivers (boda boda, in Kenya). Boda boda earn about $2.50 per day. This leaves them struggling to feed their families and send their children to school. Heavy load haulers carry over 200kg for up to 100km each day and are at risk of being robbed should they have a flat tire. 

Because of the poor quality pneumatic tubes and poor road conditions, people earning a living on their bikes suffer two or more flat tires per day. Each flat costs boda boda 25 cents and an hour of lost work. 

A boda boda spends 25% of their income repairing flat tires! 


A boda boda with a flat tire

What is the milele tube?  
The milele tube is a flexible, solid, foam tube. It's compatible with all boda boda, heavy load, and commuter bicycles. The milele tube installs inside the normal tire and is reused when the tire is worn and replaced. The milele tube will last five years! At a price of $10, The tube pays for itself ten times over in the first year and up to 50 times in its life. 

Who is Baisikeli Ugunduzi?
We are a company of engineers, returned peace corps volunteers, bikers, designers, and entrepreneurs. Baisikeli Ugunduzi produces high quality bicycle components with those who depend on their bicycles to earn a living in Sub-Saharan Africa. We work with Kenyan riders, mechanics, and bicycle taxi unions on a daily basis to design, produce, and distribute innovative, professional quality bicycle components.

We are not an NGO, we are a social business. We are a for-profit business driven by social impact rather than profit. 
Baisikeli Ugunduzi’s social business model focuses on increasing the value of working bicycles, decreasing the costs of bicycle ownership, and improving the profitability of those depending on bicycles. We are a business that manufactures in Kenya and will distribute products directly to rural areas, where most bicycles are used.

For boda boda drivers and mechanics, our company fills a huge void. Customers are extremely frustrated with poor quality, Asian-made products that are not designed for the rough life-cycle and pot hole ridden terrain of working bicycles in Africa. 

How did we get our data and why should you believe us?
Baisikeli Ugunduzi has spent nearly two years developing the milele tube by co-designing with boda boda and extensive product testing in Kenya. They have tested and we have listened, building trust and love for the Baisikeli Ugunduzi brand. The milele tube is as much designed by boda boda as it is by us. Over half of the Baisikeli Ugunduzi team now lives in Kitale, Kenya and is working with boda boda daily. The milele tubes are already in use here! We have a local distribution agreement and manufacturing operations are set to launch. 


A boda boda carrying heavy loads

Where does your donation go? 
Every dollar donated will go towards manufacturing milele tubes and getting them on Kenyan bicycles. We can afford to manufacture the first several thousand tubes, but this hardly satisfies the need here in Kitale, let alone the rest of Western Kenya. Not a cent of your donation will go towards salaries, overhead, or anything else! With $40,000 we will be able to manufacture nearly 8,000 milele tubes. However, if we do not reach at least $40,000 we will be left with only the few thousand tubes we can now afford to produce, leaving thousands of customers waiting for a solution to flat tires. 

If we don't reach $40,000 within 40 days we don't get a penny. 

If we raise $40,000, we will: 

  • supply thousands of customers and bicycle shops in Kenya with the milele tubes! 
  • improve the livelihoods of over 8,000 boda boda in Kitale 
  • eliminate most bicycle flats in Kitale
  • increase boda boda's incomes by 25%

Each donation will make a world of a difference for people who depend on their bicycles to earn a living.

EVERY $1000 DONATED IS 250 MORE TUBES WE CAN BRING TO PEOPLE WHO DEPEND ON BICYCLES.

We have put together a wide range of locally made rewards to thank you for your support.

So come, join Baisikeli Ugunduzi and help us eliminate flat tires! 


Your reward - Baisikeli Ugunduzi jewelry
 

Your reward - a sample of boda boda photography

For more information, please contact us: 
E john@baisikeliugunduzi.com / ben@baisikeliugunduzi.com 
W www.baisikeliugunduzi.com 
FB www.facebook.com/BaisikeliUgunduzi

The Baisikeli Ugunduzi team (Kabole, Ben, Joseph, Susan, and John) in front of New Generation Cycle Mart, the first to carry our tubes. Jackie and Owen are busy taking photos.

story: Hello everyone, I need your help to be able to have a car to transport me to work
story_txt: Hello everyone, I need your help to be able to have a car to transport me to work

story:
Want to Read Our Story in German?

Please visit dailybeam.

 

 

About CityLeo

Living in crowded cities means that people have to endure heavy traffic every day, while according to statistics, for many people commute distance (one way) is less than 10km (6.2miles), and this distance is suitable for riding electric bikes. If people go to work by e-bikes instead of cars, there will be a green future.

At present, most e-bikes are too big and inconvenient to use, so we want to create an e-bike that can be taken with us anywhere. This e-bike should be foldable and takes up little space when it's folded, and we can pull it just like a suitcase. CityLeo is our product for this purpose.

 

 

CityLeo has a simple, straight aluminum frame with internal transmission system, which gives CityLeo a neat exterior. You can ride it just like a normal bike, or you can travel with it at up to 15mph (25km/h) powered by a 250W electric motor. With up to 28miles (45km) on a single charge, CityLeo makes your commute easier. CityLeo is a compact bike with 12'' wheels, so you can travel with it in small streets freely.

 

With our quick-fold design, CityLeo can be folded and unfolded in seconds, and you can take it with you anywhere, for example, in a bus, a train, an elevator or the trunk of your car.

 

 

One-Piece Frame

With minimalism in mind, we designed a straight one-piece frame to connect the front part and the rear part of CityLeo, which makes riders get on/off CityLeo more easily. Made of 6061-T6 aluminum alloy, the frame is high-strength and lightweight.

 

Internal Transmission System

CityLeo has a dual chain drive system, and the chains are installed inside the frame, so you don't have to worry about getting dirty by chain grease.

With dual chain drive system, you can travel 10.5' (3.2m) when the cranks turn a circle, comparing to 12.5' (3.8m) for a normal full-size urban commuter bike.

 

3 Ride Modes

Traditional Pedaling: ride CityLeo with no power assist just like a normal bike

Pedal Assist: get power assist when you pedal

Completely Electric:  twist the throttle and enjoy your ride without pedaling

( According to EU regulations, license is needed to ride an e-bike in completely electric mode. )

 

 

Power System

Powered by a 250W electric hub motor, CityLeo has a top speed of 15mph (25km/h) and this top speed is street legal in EU and US. You can ride uphill without breaking a sweat. A 36V8Ah high quality lithium-ion battery is tucked neatly into the bike frame and gives CityLeo a 28-mile (45km) range in pedal assist mode or a 18.6-mile (30km) range in completely electric mode. You can plug the bike directly to a power outlet to charge the battery, or remove the battery easily from the bike frame and charge it. The full charging time is 4 hours.

 

 

Dimensions

CityLeo's dimensions are meticulously designed, so that it can be conveniently used in crowded cities.

When it's unfolded, CityLeo has a size comparable to that of a normal full-size urban commuter bike, so you can have a comfortable riding posture all the way.

When it's folded, CityLeo has a folding size comparable to that of an electric scooter, so you can  take CityLeo with you easily.

 

Quick-Fold Design

With special folding mechanisms, CityLeo can be folded and unfolded in seconds.

1. Folding CityLeo

 

2. Unfolding CityLeo

 

When CityLeo is folded, you can pull it just like a suitcase.

 

CityLeo takes up little space when it is folded, so you can take it with you anywhere.

 

Components

 

Colors

CityLeo is available in 4 distinct colors: white, black, green or red. So you can pick your favorite color to match your style.

 

 

 

We are living in Foshan, a crowded city of China and we spend a long time on traffic every day, so we hope to think out a method to keep away from traffic jam, and we think an electric bike could be the answer. We want an electric bike that can be taken with us anywhere, so it should be foldable and takes up little space when it's folded, and we can pull it just like a suitcase.

In 2016, we founded our company LeoWorks to develop our dream bike. After several months of hard work, we made the first prototype, and now we are testing this prototype to find out problems and solve them. We have put all of our passion in making CityLeo a perfect bike, and we believe CityLeo will be a convenient, fun and affordable electric bike for all people.

With your support, we can bring CityLeo to life and together we make the environment greener and better.

 

Q: Do I need a license to ride CityLeo?

A: No. Our bikes are made 100% street legal. We offer two versions of CityLeo: CityLeo EU Model and CityLeo US Model. CityLeo EU Model is legal in the EU and the US without license. CityLeo US Model is legal in the US but illegal in the EU without license. Because CityLeo EU Model comes without throttle and can't be ridden in completely electric mode, while CityLeo US Model comes with throttle and can be ridden in completely electric mode. According to EU regulations, license is needed to ride an e-bike in completely electric mode.

Q: Can I order CityLeo EU Model if I don't live in EU?

A: Yes. We deliver CityLeo EU Model worldwide.

Q: Can I order CityLeo US Model if I don't live in US?

A: Yes. We deliver CityLeo US Model worldwide.

Q: Can I still bike on CityLeo if the battery runs out of power?

A: Yes. If you run out of power, you can cycle as you would do with a normal bike.

Q: Can the battery be removed?

A: Yes. The battery can be removed with 2 easy steps. Fold the bike, pull out the battery and it's done. 

Q: How is CityLeo delivered and is it easy to assemble?

A: CityLeo is delivered in safely packed box and requires minimal assembly. However, if you don't have much experience with bikes, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to get all parts tightened and thoroughly checked.  

Q: Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

A: The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. They vary from country to country. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.

Q: Do you offer warranty?

A: Yes. All CityLeo bikes come with a 1 year warranty. Should you encounter some production related defect in this period, we will take care of it. Note this does not include rider damage. As many elements of a bike may wear down due to normal cycling use, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, brakes, chain etc.

Q: Can I get a refund?

A: Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here.

Q: If I have other questions, who should I contact?

A:  We will answer your questions in time. If you have any questions or comments please email us to 394777624@qq.com
